1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni a b+hi She ka ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po// // bam po dang po/
1b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
2a1(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa
2a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
2a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par smras pa'i khang bzang
2a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad+mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen
2b1(rgyud 'bum): po nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos ngos gnyis rnam par spras pa la bzhugs nas lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ / 'di lta
2b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ dper ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni nam thang ba'i nam mkha' la lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang
2b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po de la lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos
2b4(rgyud 'bum): kun nas bskor te/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs ni
2b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par byin gyis brlabs/ g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang ni bral zhing lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi dgongs
3a1(rgyud 'bum): @pa mdzad pa la 'jug cing / 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / ngag mnyam pa
3a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang
3a3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge/
3a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin de thob pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyi byin
3a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
3a6(rgyud 'bum): nas 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo //
3b1(rgyud 'bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa 'di na byang chub tu/
3b2(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed pa dang / spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / sa sgrub dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po
3b3(rgyud 'bum): ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis so/ / mdor na sems can gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnam
3b4(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pas bsdus pa sha stag ste/
3b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis dge ba mngon par du byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de dag thams cad mthong
3b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par lta zhing nye bar sems te dge ba ji tsam mngon par 'du byed pa'ang rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung zhing ya mtshan
3b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam ste cang mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par lta zhing nye bar sems so// de nas bcom ldan
4a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor
4a2(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer stong phrag du ma mgur nas phyung ngo / / de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
4a3(rgyud 'bum): dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dbangadang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan rims nad bral ba de// dbang sgyur rgyal po'i khang pa ni//
4a4(rgyud 'bum): skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na// snying 'thang chen po seng ge'i khri// dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa la// pad+ma'i snying por de bzhugs nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor// gnas der zung
4a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po yis/ / bkod pa chen po gang sprul pa// de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang // dbyibs dang kha dog gang yin pa// de ni bskal pa grangs med du// bstan par nus pa ma yin no// de ru de la dpa'/
4a6(rgyud 'bum): po che/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ yid gnyis som nyi spangs pa yi// dgongs pa gcod pa lta bar gyis// zhes bskul lo// de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
4a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mgur du rang gi gnas su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzod spu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i
4b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba/ 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste/ de'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
4b2(rgyud 'bum): la/ 'dren pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang // sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir// khyed cag thams cad ma shol de ring gshegs//
4b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes yang dag par ston to// de nas 'od zer de dag yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul
4b4(rgyud 'bum): ma thag tu rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
4b5(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen por mchi ba na/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang
4b6(rgyud 'bum): zhig na mchis/ gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes
4b7(rgyud 'bum): zhus so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
5a1(rgyud 'bum): bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa yod de/ 'jig rten
5a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams rab 'byams re re nges par ston pa re re la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kyis mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byams du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu dag
5a3(rgyud 'bum): de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya
5a4(rgyud 'bum): dag gang gi khongasu 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gis khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhug
5a5(rgyud 'bum): pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams kyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa gcig go/ / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'bam
5a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gis khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa rab 'byams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan
5a7(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud par ma gcig go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
5b1(rgyud 'bum): par ma bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des
5b2(rgyud 'bum): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongs su sbyangs so/ / rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig pu de nyid bcom ldan/
5b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sa las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha' nyid byang
5b4(rgyud 'bum): chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlabs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de na rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na bzhugs so/ / rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni de 'dra ste/ de'i yon
5b5(rgyud 'bum): tan nam/ spyod pa 'am/ smon lam mam/ ye shes kyi mtha' ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems
5b6(rgyud 'bum): dpar gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de/ nged ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa gzo ba/ byas pa shes pa dag go/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam
5b7(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa
6a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / ji lta la bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang / ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang
6a2(rgyud 'bum): po byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brtsams te/ ngag sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byams go bar
6a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad par bzhed nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po 'di phyung ngo / / de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa
6a4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen blo gros la rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di byin no/ / nA maHsa man+t+ra mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA a dza na/ rigs kyi bu khyod rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis 'jig rten
6a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag
6a6(rgyud 'bum): dums yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin
6a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pag la ba der song ste phyin nas/ thams cad
6b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po'ang rin po che dang rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen pos mngon par bkab bo// de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang /
6b2(rgyud 'bum): byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo// bcom ldan 'das rnam
6b3(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du ma bskor ba byas nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar
6b4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po che dang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje'i dbyug gu dang / pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas
6b5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che rdo rje chen po'i yi ge'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go// lho phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
6b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/
6b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang / blta ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir song zhig/ de nas
7a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /
7a2(rgyud 'bum): na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ma hA badz+ra gra ba raM hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing / bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas byang chub sems
7a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig
7a4(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i
7a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad ni rin po che rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so/ / rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
7a6(rgyud 'bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang / rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa
7a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po snang bar byas so/ / mchog sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byas so// go bar byas nas kyang ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho phyogs su gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po mchog las byung ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 'dug go/ / nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b2(rgyud 'bum): s angs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog rdo rje chen
7b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i pad+ma'i mchog gi snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma mchog gi
7b4(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka ru Na ba la badz+ra pad+ma gra sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
7b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi
7b6(rgyud 'bum): khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir
7b7(rgyud 'bum): song zhig ces btang ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing
8a1(rgyud 'bum): / mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas
8a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas
8a3(rgyud 'bum): nas pad+ma chen po rdo rje'i rgyal por 'dug ste/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi
8a4(rgyud 'bum): stobs kyis rang gi lus rnam par rig byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun tu bkang nas snang bar byas so/ / byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
8a5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'khrugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnon pa/ rdo rje chen pos rnam par rol pa/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do//
8a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub kyi snying po chen po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta mu khe
8a7(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ba rad mnar a kri gri/ 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang
8b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dbang gyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song rig ces btang ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'jig rter gyi khams
8b2(rgyud 'bum): nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang ldan cig tu 'jig rten gyi la
8b3(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar
8b4(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyan bkod par byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs
8b5(rgyud 'bum): bcu rgyas par 'gengs so/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ byang chub
8b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rin po che cod pan la dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
8b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byang gnas kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM oM rdza sa/ 'di
9a1(rgyud 'bum): byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la brgya
9a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i cod pan bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems
9a3(rgyud 'bum): d pa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod
9a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas
9a5(rgyud 'bum): nas dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug ste/ dkon mchog gsum pa'i sku'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs
9a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod
9a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i
9b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma hA badz+ra me g+ha bi kri Di ta bi shwa saM b+ha ba ha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i
9b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
9b3(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
9b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ong ba bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas
9b5(rgyud 'bum): sprin chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi rnam par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin byin gyis brlabs nas/ mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par
9b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gengs shing 'dug go/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa'
9b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dpa' bo la rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rtog gis rdo rje
10a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po las byung ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rod b+ha bai swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems
10a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa'
10a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
10a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad ga la der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen
10a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyan rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing rdo rje'i gzugs kyis brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de
10a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs snyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do//
10a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pas rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
10b1(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra rak+Sha niN+yo Sha bi kAn+ta swAhA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sla'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'ji
10b2(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig
10b3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang bag la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs
10b4(rgyud 'bum): p a bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te dbyangs kyi rig byed mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing rang gi smon lam las nges par byung ba'i rin po che chen po'i
10b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma la 'dug go/ / 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'
10b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i yan lag la spyod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA haM he swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems
10b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' pad+ma'i yan lag la bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub dpa 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/
11a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pag la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po
11a2(rgyud 'bum): ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar
11a3(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par
11a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gengs shing pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go/ / steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal
11a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba la byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub
11a6(rgyud 'bum): / kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bo d+h+yaM ga ra d+harma swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan
11a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
11b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
11b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du gnas
11b3(rgyud 'bum): nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mtha' yas pago bar byed pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing chos nyi las byung ba'i pad+ma chen po la 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems
11b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing 'khod pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo //
11b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing nam mkha' ltar gzod ma nas zhi ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i
11b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'ang mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sgra skad gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o// gdod
11b7(rgyud 'bum): nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa/ / mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di// ji ltar sa la snang zhig gu// sku yis 'phrin las mi mdzad la// gsung dang thugs kyis mi mdzad cing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang
12a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra/ / sku yis sems can thams cad la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnams mdzad kyang // sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste// thub pa de ni 'gyur med
12a2(rgyud 'bum): mnga'/ / gsung ni brag chag 'dra ba ste// bstan du med cing gzugs med kyang // lha yi rnga chen ji bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad// thugs ni rlom sems bral ba ste// de la
12a3(rgyud 'bum): yul ni mnga' ma lags/ / yul rnams dang ni de bral yang // sems can rnams kyi yul du gyur// gsung ci de bzhin sems can te// de bzhin sku dang de bzhin thugs// mtshan nyid gcig
12a4(rgyud 'bum): dang rab ldan zhing / / smra ba'i nang nas mchog tu snang // skye ba med las grol ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa yod min pas// gang dag skye ba med shes pa// de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes
12a5(rgyud 'bum): mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhag cing / / lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang // rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du// thub pa rgyun du rab tu snang // byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid// shin/
12a6(rgyud 'bum): tu dka' ba byed pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba// 'di 'dra yongs su tshol bar byed// de la mig ni mi snang zhing // rna ba dang ni sna yang min// lce dang lus dang yid kyang
12a7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / de phyir de yi yul ma yin// gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te// dri dang ro dang reg ma yin// dbang po ma yin rnam shes min// thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi// yul can dang ni yul de
12b1(rgyud 'bum): dag/ rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin// yul can yod pa ma yin pas// yul rnams srid pa ma yin no// byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin// de ltar gang tshe yod ma yin// de tshe mgon
12b2(rgyud 'bum): po yod gyur te/ / rnam par ma rtags tshul du'o// de ni kun tu thams cad la// bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzad pa// ston pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar// kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin// gzugs
12b3(rgyud 'bum): brnyan 'byung ba tshul gyis su/ / ting 'dzin dbang bskur rnams la ni// blta smra 'bel gtam thams cad kyis// kun tu longs spyod 'os su 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas//
12b4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe kun gyis ting 'dzin dang // gzungs dang rig dang rnam par thar// bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad 'thob// gzugs la dbang ni thob gyur cing // sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa/
12b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang // phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa yin// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs// de ni gzugs kyi mchog yin te// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas
12b6(rgyud 'bum): dag par/ / de ni bdag cag thob par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pa
12b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sa gang yin pa la 'jug go// de ci'i phyir
13a1(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so// de bzhin du ngo ba nyid yongs su shes pas ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
13a2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' mi dmigs so/ / lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
13a3(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na gnas
13a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod bdag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs
13a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha' bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob
13a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de das
13a7(rgyud 'bum): gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan tham
13b1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / stong thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la phab
13b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang / re ba snga tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna mog dang / theg pa sna tshogs
13b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshul rnam par gnas pa dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / ljongs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs
13b4(rgyud 'bum): dag la sgra dang tshig brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag
13b5(rgyud 'bum): par ston cing / rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
13b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po den yod pa dang / bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig mas gcig tu
13b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang / rdo rje chen po'i 'od
14a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa dang / gsang sngags rnam par dag pa'i sgos rdo rje'i khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje
14a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen po bskur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo / / de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa'o// rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam
14a3(rgyud 'bum): par mi rtog pa'o/ / ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o// gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o// bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir
14a4(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ / yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yang
14a5(rgyud 'bum): dag par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su 'thun pa/ 'jig rten
14a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na 'dug pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po ri ni thang med pa gos dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu ni 'di su'i yin/ 'di ci zhig
14a7(rgyud 'bum): ces sems can rnams kyis mi shes te ya mtshan ci zhig tu gyur to/ / gang dag blo gros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang the tsom dang bral ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/
14b1(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang spyod pa'i tshul la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rnam par
14b2(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/ de dag ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'di mnyan pa dang
14b3(rgyud 'bum): bslabs pa dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang / dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skal ba yod do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis
14b4(rgyud 'bum): gling bzhi pa par ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud pham par mdzad nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste mthar gyis spyad
14b5(rgyud 'bum): pa spyod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos bstan to/ / bcom ldan 'das de'ang bstan pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /
14b6(rgyud 'bum): byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sem
14b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' ngan song thams cad spong ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
15a1(rgyud 'bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs te thams cad kyi mdun du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas/ lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bsgyur bas byang chub sems dpa'
15a2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do/ / lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub pa'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes pa'i
15a3(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / / bam po gnyis pa// / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan 'byu
15a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas na/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu 'thun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nags
15a5(rgyud 'bum): tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems kyi
15a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang / tshe dang
15a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa nyin gung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang
15b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgrag can zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi la chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang
15b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa steng rgyas 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa tshem can dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang / tshe dang ldan
15b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyad bu'i nor dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang / tshe dang ldan pa srung spyod dbang po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang /
15b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs cig go// byang chub sems
15b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i tshogs chen po la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang dra ba can gyi gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub
15b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rin po che'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa chos la gnas
15b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bstan pa dang / byang chub
16a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas phan byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems
16a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam
16a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sang sang po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dri ma med pa dang / byang chub
16a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgribs pa thams cad rnam par
16a5(rgyud 'bum): sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs
16a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang thabs cig ste/ de dag thams cad kyang sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzungs dang /
16a7(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / dbang thob pa dang / sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems
16b1(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sngon gyi smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa/ dag pa rgyun mi 'chad par dam pa'i
16b2(rgyud 'bum): chos yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs
16b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'ang ma lha'i
16b4(rgyud 'bum): bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to// lha ma
16b5(rgyud 'bum): yin gyi dbang po rab sim dang / thags bzangs ris dang / zhi mchog dang / baTi dang / rnga chen dang / dus kyi 'khor lo can dang / dri ma med dang / rtog dang / zla gdong dang / rnam par
16b6(rgyud 'bum): 'joms dang / zab mo dang / stobs can dang / sgra gcan dang / rtog dregs dang / rnam par snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sna tshogs 'phreng ba can dang / de dag
16b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyis dbang po gzhan stong dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi mthu chen po dang / lha ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul
17a1(rgyud 'bum): chen pos me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
17a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal skyugs po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
17a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ji ltar sprul pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang /
17a4(rgyud 'bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdo ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor
17a5(rgyud 'bum): to/ / gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer rgyas pa dang /
17a6(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po rini po che'i cod pan can dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dzeg po dang / klu'i rgyal po sog pa med dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi
17a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po na rdum dang / klu'i rgyal po bang+ga dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dus can dang / klu'i rgyal po rigs can dang /
17b1(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po mgo gcig pa dang / klu'i rgyal po brdzun po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs ldan dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/
17b2(rgyud 'bum): klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos can dan gor shir Sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la
17b3(rgyud 'bum): bder song ste lhags nas/ ji ltar sprul pa'i spos chu'i sprin rnams kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug por char mngon par phab bo// phab nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag
17b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung dang /
17b5(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phags skyes po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang ba bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang
17b6(rgyud 'bum): po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rmongs byed 'dzin pa chu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag brgyad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang / de dag la
17b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang / 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
18a1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnams thogs nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal skyugs po ga la ba dang / bcom
18a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ga la bder song ste lhags nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
18a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor mi
18a4(rgyud 'bum): 'am ci du ma dang ldan pa'ang mi 'am ci'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
18a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob du ma thogs pa brgya stong du ma dag rang gi gnas nas byung ste shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan
18a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
18a7(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig
18b1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'khod do/ / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnam par bdud kyi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'jigs 'gro dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'dab brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
18b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug pud can 'khor nam mkha' lding brgya stor du ma dang ldan pa'ang / bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin po'i
18b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po khros bzhin dang / srin po'i bdag po mche ba bzang dang / srin po'i bdag po drag po dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / 'jigs 'jigs lha dang / skrag byed dang / 'jigs
18b4(rgyud 'bum): byed chen po dang / gdong bcu dang / gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i dril bu dang / rnam par 'jigs 'jigs lha dang / zla ba'i sde 'khor srin po du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la swa
18b5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
18b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khod do/ / drang srong chen po me 'khor drang srong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/
18b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rlung sprin gyi 'phreng ba can dang / rlung 'jig byed dang / rlung 'chags byed dang / rlung kun tu 'jog byed
19a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / rlung rnam par 'thor dang / rlung dus ldan dang / rlung rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rlung rlung dmar dang / rlung 'jig rten 'dzin kyang / bcom ldan 'das pa la
19a2(rgyud 'bum): ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod
19a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ nyi ma'i 'od zer
19a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba can dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / skems byed dang / du ba 'byin dang / rab 'bar dang / nyi ma sreg byed 'khor lha'i bu gzi brjid 'phags pa brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag
19a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkodapa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
19a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / klu'i rgyal po chu lha 'khor klu'i rgyal po du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
19a7(rgyud 'bum): ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
19b1(rgyud 'bum): na das gal 'de rdzogs byed das/ ma ldan 'das tha 'bas la goms byag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'du pa/ rnas pa mngams kyi
19b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor 'byung po
19b3(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
19b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / gza'i rgyal po chen po sman drug gi bu 'khor gza' brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
19b5(rgyud 'bum): tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// sprin lha'i bu skya bo zhes bya
19b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sprin lha'i bu glog 'phreng zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu sprin gyi dra ba stug po 'jig byed ces bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa
19b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
20a1(rgyud 'bum): dum dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya
20a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs ri dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang
20a3(rgyud 'bum): ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po mi mjed dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse mo brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po rigs sngags 'chang dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang
20a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo
20a5(rgyud 'bum): sa phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / gzhi rje / mtshan mcheg mo dang/ btson dag po can dang / sgras rga nag po dang / 'chi bdag dang / dpal sbyin dang / na mag pa'
20a6(rgyud 'bum): sal bu tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan pabang pa'i rigs tshal stug po ga la 'dang / bcom ldan 'das gal bde sa ma gan / com ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma thos phyag 'tshal
20b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'khod do/ / dka' thub bzlog ma dang / tsa muN+Da dang / drag po'i chung ma dang / tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / gzhon nu'i chung ma dang / lus ngan gyi chung ma dang /
20b2(rgyud 'bum): phag gi chung ma dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom
20b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / chu klung chen po gang+gA dang / chu klung chen po si ta dang / chu klung chen po dbyangs can dang / chu klung chen po bi da sta dang /
20b4(rgyud 'bum): chuklung chen po zla ba'i cha can dang / chu klung chen po ya mu na dang / chu klung chen po kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / chu klung chen po mgyogs ldan dang / chu klung chen po mtsho sten dang / chu klung chen po ba la sbyin
20b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ldan dang / chu klung chen po brtse ba sbyin yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dri za'i rgyal
20b6(rgyud 'bum): po sna tshogs 'phreng ba can dang / dri za'i rgyal po 'phrog po dang / dri za'i rgyal po shugs chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po rnam par gnon pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / dri za'i rgyal po ut+pal lta bu'i
20b7(rgyud 'bum): mig dang / dri za'i rgyal po tsan dan brtsegs kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
21a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thog dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nye ba'i thog dang / rigs sngag
21a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi rgyal po rab tu gtum pa dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po bsnyems ldan dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po shugs 'chang dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang /
21a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po de dag dang / gzhan yang 'khor rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga
21a4(rgyud 'bum): la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin mo so can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo
21a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yengs byed ces bya ba dang / srin mo mtshan mo rmya zhes bya ba dang / srin mo so 'cha'am zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rmongs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo dgod ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rdo rje lta bu'i
21a6(rgyud 'bum): lho zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bum lho ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zangs 'dabs can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo glog lce ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bu tsa li zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bong mo zhes bya ba
21a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / srin mo 'jigs su rung ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zhib ma lta bu'i sen mo can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo chen mo de dag dang / gzhan 'khor srin mo du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi
21b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung
21b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po mdung can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gtun shing can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol 'dzin dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po 'gugs byed dang / 'byung
21b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po yang dag 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gnya' drag 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang
21b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sha za thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad dang
21b5(rgyud 'bum): gnon po thams cad dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / stobs po che'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang /
21b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
21b7(rgyud 'bum): bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / srin mo bzhi gang yin pa de dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas lhags te gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
22a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de'i tshe shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshar bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po shin tu yangs shing zag
22a2(rgyud 'bum): / gru che la ka tsa li ni di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur cing / sa gzhi rdo rje dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / spug gi kha khyer gyis rnam par phye ba/ ngos gnyis sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gis brgyan te mdzes
22a3(rgyud 'bum): par byas pa/ steng du rin po che chen po'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bris pa/ mu tig gi do shal mang po spungs pa/ dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa/ sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i
22a4(rgyud 'bum): sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog gis sa phyogs de bkram par gyur te/ 'dir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul
22a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad rdo rje chen po 'khor yug gi ris bskor ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su gyur pa/ chu zheng dpag tshad 'bum
22a6(rgyud 'bum): / brag bcu pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs cha yongs su gang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyis byung ba ste/ dper na
22a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhar 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas dag pa'i las byung ba lham me lhang nge 'dug pa de bzhin/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi mdus
22b1(rgyud 'bum): lhan ner rnam par mdzes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
22b2(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung phyung ste rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// /
22b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// rdo rje 'byung gnas stobs po che// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// rdo rje stobs chen srung bar gyis// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te
22b4(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHswA hA/ rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i mchog 'di gsung ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du rdo rje 'byung
22b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi snying po'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur ces grags par gyur te/ rdo rje 'byung gnas dbang po che// sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// thub pa chen
22b6(rgyud 'bum): pos byin gyis rlobs/ / rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyang // snying po 'di ni 'dzin gyur cig/ des ni 'dir ni de dag kun// tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog/ ces bsgrags so//
22b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
23a1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes
23a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa dang / gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i gnas rdo rje ye shes kyi
23a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ston pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu 'bras bu mang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i
23a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang chen byang chub sems dpas legs par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'phrul/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu mas rnam par rol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig/ nyan
23a5(rgyud 'bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi shes na/ sems can gzhan dag gis shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi
23a6(rgyud 'bum): dring mi 'jog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur
23a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des
23b1(rgyud 'bum): mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus lags so// de bar gshegs pa 'di ni tshod lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes
23b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngon gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te
23b3(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA khaM/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i snying gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes skyid pa che/
23b4(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan bde ba mchog thob pas// kun kyang de yi ngang du gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar rtse gcig tu gyur par mkhyen nas/ dpal be'u
23b5(rgyud 'bum): las byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te/ yang bcom ldan gyi dpal gyi be'u nyid du zhugs
23b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
23b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi sngon spyod pa bstan par smon lam btab nas/ gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ dbus kyi 'dzam bu gling mi mjed 'dir lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phrog gnas kyi gnan gnas
24a1(rgyud 'bum): pade 'od zer gyi snang bar gyur pas mig rang bzhin rgyas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cang mi zer
24a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'ong bar 'gyur pa'i brda mdzad de tshigs su bcad pa'ang gsungs so// sems can dag pa zla/
24a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin tshur shog cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs byang chub gzhol// bsam pas mnyam nyid legs rtogs khong chud byed// rtag tu sangs rgyas byas gzo tshur shog cig/ dus gsum
24a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog/ phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig/ sems can don mdzad bsam yas gzugs mnga' ba/ de dag ma
24a5(rgyud 'bum): lus don gyi mdun 'gro khyod/ / gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog/ gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po tshur// gdul dka' rtag 'dul dbang thob tshur shog cig
24a6(rgyud 'bum): brten te byung las skyes pa po/ / dus dang tshod shes tshur shog cig/ dam pa thob pa tshur shog cig/ dam pa sbyin byed tshur shog cig/ dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa// bde bar gshes
24a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sras tshur shog/ sems can bzang po stobs po che// rdo rje lta bu tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med pa// stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog/ rtag tu srid pa gsum po la//
24b1(rgyud 'bum): snying dga' byed pa tshur shog cig/ yang dag lam ni ston byed pa// stobs bcur gnas pa tshur shog cig/ sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrul che// kun tu bzang po tshur shog cig/ kun tu mdzes pa tshur shog/
24b2(rgyud 'bum): cig/ srid gsum dbang phyug tshur shog cig/ khrid ni gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan// glang po rna ba khyed tshur shog/ sna tshogs gzugs can 'khrul med khyed// mthong na dga' ba tshur shog cig/
24b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro lding ba yi gzugs can tshur// tshur shog na dku ber// rtag tu sna tshogs gos 'phreng 'chang // cod pan mgul pa tshur shog cig/ mi 'jigs thob pa tshur shog cig/ 'jigs pa
24b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che// phyi bshol ma byed tshur shog cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'ong ba la
24b5(rgyud 'bum): / 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a bi sma e be sha ra r+ya mu khe b+ha ga ba ti badz+rA a ma li ni mA bi laM ba swA hA/
24b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis
24b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag tshu shog/ bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang
25a1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
25a2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du mas ni yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
25a3(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo / / de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs
25a4(rgyud 'bum): de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ sems can chen po bka' stsal pa bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang /
25a5(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal
25a6(rgyud 'bum): sdug po ga la ba der bzhud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa ston pa la snyoms par zhugs so// /
25a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
25b1(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams tsam du yang shing rgya che ba/ nor bu chen po'i ka ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zug pa/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / stegs bu du mas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las
25b2(rgyud 'bum): shing sA la gcig pa lta bur byas pas rnam par spras pa/ mtha' mthar phug ron lta bu'i 'bring gis mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig sna gnyis kyi dra ba bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu ga yer ka'i
25b3(rgyud 'bum): dra bas stang gi bar snang yongs su bskor ba/ lha'i ras bcos ma dang dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i sal snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/
25b4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu len gar byed rol mo byed cing snyan par smra la/ gdu bu dang rna cha gdub kor gyis brgyan cing lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba/ rin po che chen po'i bla re
25b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bres pa/ phyogs bai DUR+Ya chen pos legs par spras pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i
25b6(rgyud 'bum): them skas kyi 'phreng gis rnam par spras pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / bya'i
25b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs du ma sgra 'byin pa dang / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / pad+ma dang / ka lha ra ka dang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus
26a1(rgyud 'bum): gang ba'i rdzing byang chub sems dpas yongs su spyad par bya ba/ lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzab kyi rnyog ma can gyis kun nas mdzes par byas pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
26a2(rgyud 'bum): khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sa brtol dang / sa brtol chen po me tog gi char mngon par 'babs pa/ a ka ru nag po'i bdug
26a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sprin mang pos khebs pas rnam par mdzes pa byung bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad so so'i gnas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du las kyis bskyed pa
26a4(rgyud 'bum): dag mngon par sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re la'ang rin po che dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yong
26a5(rgyud 'bum): su spyad par bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dag bkod do// rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad
26a6(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas mdzes par byas so// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu'ang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rnams sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyang bai DUr+yaR+Ya
26a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po gsal ba'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shin tu phyis pa'i me long ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'ang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing
26b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba ste/ bai DUR+Ya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang ngo // dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'gro ba thams
26b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po rin po che chen po'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to/ / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag khang pa brtsegs pa der kun nas rtag tu babs par
26b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par sprul te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
26b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag
26b5(rgyud 'bum): khrig brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub semasad pa'i mthu chen pos khang pa brtsegs pa de lag pa gnyis kas
26b6(rgyud 'bum): blangs te/ steng gi bar snang las babs te shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
26b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ngo / / khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'od kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur
27a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ gang dag 'khor der 'dus shing 'khod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dang
27a2(rgyud 'bum): snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa dang / steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam
27a3(rgyud 'bum): par mdzes par mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis phan tshun rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
27a4(rgyud 'bum): dag gzungs thob pa dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs thob pa de dag gis kyang rnam par bltas na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes pa
27a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas/ de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
27a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi steng gi bar snang la lham me lhan ne lhung nger gda' zhing / bcom ldan 'das rtogs par dka' la mi mdzes par dka' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces
27a7(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la 'aka'
27b1(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba de nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen ba kun bya ba
27b2(rgyud 'bum): dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te/ nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
27b3(rgyud 'bum): pa bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ 'di ni chos gang gis yon tan bskal pa brgyar yang mthar rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lham me lhar ne lhang nger 'dug go/
27b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de'ang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu 'dri'o// bcom ldan 'das
27b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis tshig 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar snang la 'dus nas/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
27b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
27b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / pheg rdob pa'i sprin mngon par sprul te char du phab nas/ steng gi nam mkha' las babs te khang pa brtsegs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// phul nas kyang
28a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs mkhyen pas// rnam dag brtul zhugs bzang po pa// rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa// phyag 'tshal sems
28a2(rgyud 'bum): can dag khyod la/ / mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // sna dang de bzhin lce dang ni// lus dang de bzhin yid kyang ni// smra ba'i mchog la phyag mi 'tshal// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya yul
28a3(rgyud 'bum): can btsal ba yi/ / dngos po kun las rnam grol ba// rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes la// sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yis// gzugs brnyan lta bur
28a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten du/ / mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tu gda'// khyod ni sems can srog ma lags// gang zag kun gzhi khyod ma lags// dus dang rang bzhin las ma byung // ji ltar ma lags ci ma lags//
28a5(rgyud 'bum): khyod ni brten nas byung ba tsam// sgyu ma lta bur dngos po spangs// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni// thugs su khyod chung rkang gnyis mchog/ khyod ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong // stong pa nyid kyang cis ma lags// /
28a6(rgyud 'bum): stong dang mi stong rnam par grol// nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas g.yog
28a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha zhing phyogs gcig tu
28b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dug go/ / de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dang / bkod pa de dag dang / sil snyan dang pheg rdo ba de dag las theg pa chen po'i theg pa'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag go// gzod
28b2(rgyud 'bum): nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ / chos nyid gcig pu dag pa ste// khyed cag the tshom dogs spongs la// kye ma 'di la brtson par gyis// theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni// sngon gyi spyad pa bla na med// /
28b3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i rgyal po skyed che ba// kun gyis shin tu thob par gyis// sngon gyi spyad pa rgya mtsho rnams// yongs su dag pa'i rgyu yis ni// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni// rtag tu 'di la mdzes la
28b4(rgyud 'bum): stes/ ston pa gang du'ang mi gnas la// gang du'ang spyad par mi gnas kyang // gang dag spyod pa rnam sbyangs pa// de dag kun la gnas par gyur// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni// rna ba de
28b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin sna dang ni/ / lce dang de bzhin lus dang yang // yid du snang ba ma lags so// dang po 'byung ba'i spyod pa ni// gang gi tshe na sbyangs gyur pa// de tshe bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad// rab 'byor can gyis
28b6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mthong / / ring ba ma lags nyi ma lags// nang dang phyi ni ma lags te// rtag tu nam mkha' 'drar gnas par// rnal 'byor pa ni chen po snang // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
28b7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag brjod ma thag tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
29a1(rgyud 'bum): bder logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
29a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
29a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pa
29a4(rgyud 'bum): khyod sems rangs par bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
29a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ji lta zhig lags/ spyod pa de rtogs par khong du chud pa ni su zhig
29a6(rgyud 'bum): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can chen po legs so legs so// sems can chen po /
29a7(rgyud 'bum): khyo de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri ba'ang legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par
29b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub bo// rigs kyi bu gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhi'o// de'ang snying rje/
29b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas yul dang dus kyi dbang gis de'i rnam pa ston pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'dus
