29b3(rgyud 'bum): byas kyis rab tu phye ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'o// 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po nyid ni theg pa chen po'o// /
29b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang stong pa nyid kyi rang rang gi ngo bo'o//
29b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul dang dus kyi
29b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ bya ba dang las kyis kun tu bslangs pa'i tshul gyis 'dogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po'o// rigs
29b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen po nyid theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni
30a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi tshigs bla dgas so/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis
30a2(rgyud 'bum): la mi ltos pa ste/ de la gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo'ang med do// gang la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo med pa de la spyod pa med do// gang la spyod pa med pa
30a3(rgyud 'bum): de brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ / gang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o// gang dngos po thams cad dang bral ba de mi 'khrugs pa'o// gang mi 'khrugs pa de chos so//
30a4(rgyud 'bum): chos gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bden pa'o// rigs kyi bu bden pa gang yin/
30a5(rgyud 'bum): pa de yod pa'o// yod pa gang yin pa de brdzun ma yin pa'o// gang brdzun ma yin pa de yang dag pa'o// yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do// chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi rtog rnam par
30a6(rgyud 'bum): mi rtog go/ / gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye shes so// ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
30a7(rgyud 'bum): btags pa'o/ / btags pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa'o// rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstan te/ kun rdzob yod pas spyod pas btags so// btags pa yod pas de bzhin
30b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bzhi pham par byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs
30b2(rgyud 'bum): su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa 'jig
30b3(rgyud 'bum): rten du kun tu ston to/ / rigs kyi bu de la sogs pa dus dang yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to//
30b4(rgyud 'bum): chos bstan pa de ni yang dag phul yin te/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba/ yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams
30b5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa 'am/ rnam par rig pa med cing mi dmigs te/ ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// de la ni spyod pa'ang med//
30b6(rgyud 'bum): mi spyod pa'ang med/ bslab pa'ang med/ bslab pa ma yin pa'ang med/ 'dul ba'ang med/ 'dul ba ma yin pa'ang med do// de la ni lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyi 'jug
30b7(rgyud 'bum): paba'am ldog pa mi dmigs so/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am/ nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
31a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ chos zhes bya ba 'am/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ klu zhes bya ba 'am/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba 'am/ dri za dang /
31a2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/ yod ces bya ba 'am/ med ces bya ba 'am/
31a3(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams zhes bya ba 'am/ 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba 'am/ thar pa zhes bya ba med do// rigs kyi bu de la ni dus zhes bya ba
31a4(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ tshod ces bya ba 'am/ skad cig ces bya ba 'am/ yud tsam zhes bya ba 'am/ thang cig ces bya ba med do// de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am/ skar ma zhes bya ba 'am/ nyi ma zhes bya ba 'am/
31a5(rgyud 'bum): me zhes bya ba 'am/ rlung zhes bya ba 'am/ chu zhes bya ba 'am/ sa zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/ nyin mo zhes bya ba dang / dus tshigs zhes bya ba 'am/ lo khyud kor zhes bya
31a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'am/ zla ba zhes bya ba med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rtogs pas btags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar lhung ba ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i btags pa'i sgo ji snyed pa de dag
31a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni de la mi 'gyur zhing ming de mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ de la gnyis mi 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
31b1(rgyud 'bum): na nam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams ni gnyis su med do/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa
31b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams su bstan to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod pa ma yin
31b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/ / slob pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o// thob pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o// rtsom pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'/
31b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi rtsom pa'o// 'dul ba ma yin pa ni 'dul ba'o// gdags su med pa ni gdags pa'o// mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen
31b5(rgyud 'bum): bkur byed pa'o/ / mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o// khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o// 'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o// gnas med pa ni gnas so// stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni stong pa
31b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid do/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya//
31b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa spyad pa'o// gang du'ang mi chags so// gang du'ang rjes su chags pa med do// gang du'ang khong khro ba med do// gang da'ang zhe
32a1(rgyud 'bum): sdang ba med do/ / de mi snang ma rmongs phyin ci log par rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ zhi ba/ legs par gnas pa/ zla med pa/ mi g.yo ba/
32a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / sems can gyi don bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba/ dus gsum yang sgyid lug pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
32a3(rgyud 'bum): na nam mkha'i khams ni rdul lam/ ngu ba 'am/ sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams rnam par mi
32a4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu spyad pa'ang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la
32a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i tog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams sogs pa'i chos
32a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
32a7(rgyud 'bum): po kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag
32b1(rgyud 'bum): gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa dag lta smos
32b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
32b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa ni gnas bsam gyi mi khyab
32b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul la skal ba mchis pa lags so/ / bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med pa 'bral du 'bras bu mang ba bshad du gsol/ de
32b5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par
32b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra sgrogs te/ gsung gcig tu rdo rje
32b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brjod cing shing swa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan
33a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdo rje chen po pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
33a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bskrun gsol te/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'tsho 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas
33a3(rgyud 'bum): sam zhes bskur gsol lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad glod
33a4(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/ oM badz+ra ka ra khang swA hA/ de nas de
33a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
33a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du che'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lta zhing 'khod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
33a7(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan du che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dag
33b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa/ gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas// rnam par 'dren rnams mi gsung las// bde gshes
33b2(rgyud 'bum): sras la rdo rje yis/ / dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'// gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang // don kun
33b3(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i spyod pa thob/ / gsang sngags spyod las 'byung ba yi// theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen// sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis// nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu
33b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / sA la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che// spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i gnas// sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pas// gsang sngags shes las 'byung bar bshad// gang
33b5(rgyud 'bum): dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // mgon po gang dag da lta byung // rnam par 'dren par bzhugs pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs
33b6(rgyud 'bum): shing / / gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg pa chen po'i dbang bskur 'di// bdar gshegs sras la rab tu stsol// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po pa// kun gyi dbang
33b7(rgyud 'bum): ni bdag lags so/ / 'jig rten phan par 'tshal bas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol pa 'tshal// bstan pa kun tu bsrung ba dang // dam chos rtag gnas bgyi slad du//
34a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug tu// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis dbang bskur stsol// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg chen rtogs par khong du chud//
34a2(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi smon lam nges 'byung ba// sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lags// sangs rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhig ste// bde gshegs sras po chags med pa// byang chub mthar thug dbang
34a3(rgyud 'bum): po lags/ / gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu// thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di// sangs rgyas 'dra'am ci zhig ste// bder gshegs sras po chags med pa//
34a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mthar thug dbang po lags// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu// 'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na// gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas//
34a5(rgyud 'bum): ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs// thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin 'gyur te// bde bar rtog la brtson par gnas// dpa' bo che rnams the tsom dang // de bzhin yid gnyis gsal
34a6(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / da ni dus la bab lags na// phyi bshol ma mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen
34a7(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsungs pa/ / 'dren pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas// chos nyid 'di ni
34b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu mchog/ rtag tu mnyam gzhag rnams kyis ni// rab tu bsgrims te de rtog bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
34b2(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po kun tu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa/ / gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/ sgo khang dang
34b3(rgyud 'bum): rta babs dang / stegs bus brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu spyangs pa/ rin po che sna lnga'i sring bu 'brel bar byin gyis brlabs te dbus su rdo rje
34b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i khri dang / phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i 'phreng bas bskor ba dang / rdo rje'i phyi ras kun tu bskor ba dang / phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i srad bu bres pa dang / rdo rje'i
34b5(rgyud 'bum): bcings pas bcings pa dang / rdo rje'i phur bu dag btab pa dang / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes
34b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo / / 'od zer de dag phyung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug tu
34b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes
35a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i snying po smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shA mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a pra ti ha ta ba la/ ma hA badz+ra a dz+nyA ka ra NA/ na mo stu te swAhA/ de nas thogs pa med
35a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags
35a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bden pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom
35a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / nges pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag tu byin no//
35a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kun tu bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du de
35a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
35a7(rgyud 'bum): dri zadang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/ kye ma byang chub
35b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o/ / lag na rdo rje'o zhes brjod do// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam po gsum pa/
35b2(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas yang gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
35b3(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA gu h+ya badz+ra d+ha ra swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du
35b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i bdag po'o/ / gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags nas/ 'di lta ste/ snying po 'di'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
35b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de
35b6(rgyud 'bum): / dag gis bstan pa kun tu srung ba dang / 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha
35b7(rgyud 'bum): ra bir bi ra bi ki ra bi ki ra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje
36a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
36a2(rgyud 'bum): zhabs kyi drung rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / las dang po pa rnams dang / sems
36a3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi rgyab dang / mdun dang / ma nyal ba 'am/ gnyid kyis log pa 'am/ chos ston pa 'am/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ sems can gyi don byed
36a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ sprul pa rab tu 'byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cod pan can du kun tu snang ngo // yang de bzhin gshegs pa de
36a5(rgyud 'bum): dag gis phyogs rdo rje bcing ba zhes bya ba rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dig badz+ra Ta TA Ta Ta To swA hA/ phyogs rdo rje bcing ba'i snying po
36a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sems can ma rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcings par snang ngo / / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i rdo rje 'am phur bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying
36a7(rgyud 'bum): po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tha tha tha pra traM swA hA/ sa rton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
36b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i sa rton to zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te/
36b2(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ya Ta ya TaM swA hA/ sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du kye ma byang
36b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi
36b4(rgyud 'bum): / 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsin+ta sar+b+ba bIr+ya tu raka dim pra barma lab+hA bi dza ya swA hA/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'gro
36b5(rgyud 'bum): ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
36b6(rgyud 'bum): po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i
36b7(rgyud 'bum): snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra yak+Sha nI gr-i ha data swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab
37a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byams thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig
37a2(rgyud 'bum): tu bur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
37a3(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA ha ra ha ra nA ga badz+ra swA hA/ de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa'
37a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA
37a5(rgyud 'bum): ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba thA ma tha ma tha badz+ra gan+d+harba hri da ye swA hA/ rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
37a6(rgyud 'bum): dri za'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
37a7(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra bi ta ta d+ha ra ka ra haM ha swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po nam mkha'
37b1(rgyud 'bum): lding gi dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
37b2(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje chen po 'di ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi 'am ci'i snying po gsungs pa/
37b3(rgyud 'bum): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+haHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra kin+na ra dan+da bi dza ya shab+da swA hA/ de nas mi 'am ci'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
37b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mi 'am ci'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
37b5(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA me ho ra ga badz+ra dz+wA la ya swA hA/ de nas
37b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / lte 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
37b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/
38a1(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA badz+ra rAk+Sha sa krU ra da ha pa tsun+du rbu dzuM swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'ji
38a2(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur
38a3(rgyud 'bum): / ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra hr-i te
38a4(rgyud 'bum): / he ha swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thug tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub
38a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po
38a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mA khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha le hu le badz+ra ma hA b+hU te shwa ra swAr+tha/ rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag
38a7(rgyud 'bum): tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / 'byung ba'i gnas thams cad du gyes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'byung po'i rdo rje chen po
38b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ud ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po gsungs pa/ nA maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
38b2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA ma hA badz+ra pi shA tse shwa ra bi shwa hri da ya gaM/ mi tsi mi tsi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab
38b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byams thams cad dang / sha za'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
38b4(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra du ti pe shA tsi ki ri mi ri mi le swA hA/ rdo rje
38b5(rgyud 'bum): / chen po sha za mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sha za mo'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
38b6(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje 'di ni sha za mo'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje srin mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
38b7(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ka ra li ra shA si hA ri bi ri swA hA/ rdo rje srin mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin mo'i gnas
39a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje'i srin mo'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin
39a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gnon po'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM s+phA ra ka badz+ra hi si swA hA/ gnon po'i rje
39a3(rgyud 'bum): rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnon po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni
39a4(rgyud 'bum): gnon po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba/
39a5(rgyud 'bum): tathA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ki li ki li badz+ra bi d+ha hi ni swAhA/ grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
39a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / grib gnon gyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni grib gnon gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
39a7(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brjed byed kyi gdor 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA gr-i gr-i s+pha ra Na badz+ra swahA/ brjed
39b1(rgyud 'bum): byed kyi gdon 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / brjed byed kyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
39b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni brjed byed kyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsung
39b3(rgyud 'bum): nam/ sar+b+ba twA tib+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu kha~M b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba thA bI brjesar+b+bA ma ha ni btsun dzA Ti la ma bodar nga thar u0f7f swAhA/ gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying blo 'ad dag gsul m
39b4(rgyud 'bum): a thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gdon thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ra rdo rje 'di ni gdon thams
39b5(rgyud 'bum): cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba
39b6(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra badz+ra saM saM swA hA/ lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang
39b7(rgyud 'bum): lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lha la sogs pa'i snying po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ /
40a1(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA
40a2(rgyud 'bum): b+hai Sha dz+nyA badz+ra a mr-i ta b+ha ba swA hA/ rtsi sman chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa'
40a3(rgyud 'bum): sems chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rtsi sman gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad gdon bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po
40a4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tra ta trad badz+ra swA hA/ nad bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig gyi khama?/
40a5(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rje 'di ni nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
40a6(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba'i gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a mri tod b+ha ba badz+ra la
40a7(rgyud 'bum): la la la swA hA/ rga ba 'gog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
40b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa
40b2(rgyud 'bum): / namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka di badz+ra dza ya ha ha swAhA/ 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
40b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'chi ba las kyang rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin
40b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pa ra ma badz+ra sar+b+ba shri aM a b+hu da yan da da ma hA kA ru
40b5(rgyud 'bum): Ni ka d+ha ka d+ha ka swA hA/ rgud pa thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems
40b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba chen po
40b7(rgyud 'bum): stobs thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM badz+ra tsakra brti hUM swAhA/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gsang sngags
41a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
41a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang /
41a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
41a4(rgyud 'bum): / yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dzI shri hUM swA hA/ de nas de bzhin
41a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po la sogs pa rdo rje chen po'i snying po rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la byin no/ / byin nas kyang 'od zer
41a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprid stug po'i dra ba chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po dang /
41a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas chos gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings
41b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka'
41b2(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag tu rdo rje dbang bskur bas khyod dbang bskur to//
41b3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so// rdo rje'i snying po thams cad
41b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod la bstan to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod la bstan pa thams cad kyi don bya ba dang srung bar gnang ngo // khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs so//
41b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu da rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig/ rigs kyi bu lag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lag
41b6(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / chos kyi rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ngo mtshar thob pa
41b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam pa thob pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba mdzad do//
42a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
42a2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs so/ / de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams
42a3(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos
42a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / chomachim rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem mo// 'phrul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/
42a5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rab tu ldeg go// shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' 'o// nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma' 'o// lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma' 'o// byang phyogs
42a6(rgyud 'bum): mtho na lho phyogs dma' 'o/ / dbus mtho na mtha' dma' 'o// mtha' mtho na dbus dma' 'o// snang ba chen po'ang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// gang dag 'jig
42a7(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi bar ma mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa na 'khod pa de dag kyang 'od des snang bar byas nas/ sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun lta zhing gcig gis gcig mthong nas
42b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gzhan dag cig 'dir skyes pa lta/ sems can gzhan dag cig 'dir skyes pa lta'o snyam mo// de dag gis bltas pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
42b2(rgyud 'bum): po lag na rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po'i gzungs kyi chos ston to/ / de dag gis chos de thos nas dad pa rnyed de shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
42b3(rgyud 'bum): nags tshal stug po ga la ba der lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba chen pos dbang bskur ba chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
42b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir dong ngo // tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang skad cig de dang / yud tsam de dang / thang cig de la chad par gyur to// de'i tshe dud 'gro'i skye
42b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi ming yang mi grags par gyur to/ / yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi ra bas kun tu bskor ba dang / lha'i zas dang / skom dang / yo byad
42b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lha'i lus dang ldan par gyur to// shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags stug po 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar
42b7(rgyud 'bum): byas so/ / lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 'di gnyis lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang / sa bcu
43a1(rgyud 'bum): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog por gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di la ma
43a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe spu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo'i rgyal po dag byung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po ni bsgrags/ lag na rdo rje ni thogs gdong gi dpral ba'i khro gnyer
43a3(rgyud 'bum): ni bsnyer/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni dbyangs gcig gi go bar byed cing / kye ma rungs pa'i srin po dang / phan mtshun dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang
43a4(rgyud 'bum): gdon dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / grub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / 'gegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa gdon gyi tshogs
43a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad/ ser sna yongs su btang byos la// dul ba'i sems kyis mnyam bzhag ste// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// mkhas pa dag ni skyabs su dang // rdo rje 'dzin
43a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dpal ldan de/ / rdo rje rab tu 'bar 'dzin pa// nags tshal dam pa nyams dga' bar// yid 'ong khang pa brtsegs na bzhugs// deng la mgon po de las ni// dam tshig yongs
43a7(rgyud 'bum): su brtsal byos la/ / nga rgyal nga yi med byos te// sa rnams kun tu rgyu bar byos// gzhan du khyed cag de ring nyid// rdo rje 'bar ba rab 'khrugs pa// 'bar ba 'jigs chen
43b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag gis/ / mgo ni shin du 'gems par 'gyur// de lhur khro bo'i rgyal po dag/ 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// brtsal med tshig gis go byas nas// rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan
43b2(rgyud 'bum): dengs shig/ ces tshig tu brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de'i tshe 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i bstan pa tshol zhing // sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo //
43b3(rgyud 'bum): chos la skyabs su dong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ma rdo rje la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
43b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu leb+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NA badz+nyA pA Ni hUM phaTabyang chub sems
43b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras ma thag tu/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
43b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mI dang / mi ma yin pa
43b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag po'o/ / lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags
44a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul chen po la smon lam shin tu btab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes
44a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje drag po'i snying po 'di smras nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil 'khor chen po smras so//
44a3(rgyud 'bum): de la slob dpon ni gsang sngags de kho na'i don la mkhas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa/ snying rje ba'i rang bzhin can/ bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sangs
44a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bsam pa nges pa/ dus shes pa/ g.yer ba/ sro shi ba ma yin pa/ mdangs che ba/ zab mo'i chos la mos pa/ bzlas
44a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod la brtson pa/ rtag tu bsam gtan byed pa/ lag na rdo rje la dga' ba/ ming thos sngags pa rtag par ni// mchi ma 'byung zhing spu zing byed// rmi yang lag na rdo rje la/
44a6(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis the tsom med pa dang // 'du shes de bzhin tshod shes shing // byas gzo de bzhin bden pa smra// slob dpon de lta bus ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi
44a7(rgyud 'bum): spyan snga 'am/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te/ gong du smos pa'i snying po de dag re re zhing yang 'bum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu lag na rdo rje drag po'i snying pos yungs
44b1(rgyud 'bum): kar dang mngar gsum bsres pa dag lan khrir sbyin sreg bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po
44b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bya'o/ / drag po'i snying po chen pos slob ma dag par bya ba dang srung ba'i cho ga bya'o// de'i 'og tu sa brtag par bya swA/ rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa
44b3(rgyud 'bum): skye ba po grog sbur la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sa ni thams cad du'ang shis pa'o/ / der gza' gtum po la ma bab pa/ tshe grangs ngan pa ma yin pa/ mi mthun par 'jug pa
44b4(rgyud 'bum): dang phrad pa spangs pa/ nyi ma dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' bzang por mngon pa las brtsams na shis par 'gyur ro// dmar dang
44b5(rgyud 'bum): ser dang dkar dang gnag/ 'dren ma pa ni lnga pa yin// gang yang rung ba'i sa der ni// mkhas pas khru gang tsam brkos te// sngags pa yis ni brkos pa de// sa de nyid kyis
44b6(rgyud 'bum): dgang bar bya/ / lhag na rnam pa kun tu mchog/ khad chad ni 'bring du brjod// gang bar ma gyur sa de spangs// mkhas pas der ni brtsam mi bya// dkar po dag ni zhi bar bstan//
44b7(rgyud 'bum): dmar po dbang gi don du 'dod// ser po rgyas par shes par bya// nag po drag shul spyod par shes// der ni mchod yon gtor ma dang // mar me spos dang bdug pa dag/ bsgrims
45a1(rgyud 'bum): te byin nas bsrung bya ste/ / mnyam par bzhag nas sa la brjod// de yi nub mos de ni// klug bting ba'i sted durtul// gal tes ni rung gyur na// 9
45a2(rgyud 'bum): ri bsgrims te bri bar bya/ / sngon gyi sangs rgyas mi mchog gis// de ni bgegs med yin zhes brjod// gzhan du na ni der mi zi// bgegs dang bcas pas phung bar 'gyur//
45a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas sngags pa langs nas ni// de yi nyin mo mkhas pa yis// sa ni shin tu yongs sbyangs phyir// sbyin sreg bya ba 'di bya ste// sbrang rtsi dang ni 'o ma dang // mar bsres sbyin
45a4(rgyud 'bum): sreg mchog tu 'gyur/ / zhi ba'i sems kyis sbyin blugs ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya// de nas sngags pas sa brkos la// sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo // yang na
45a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor las kyi tshe/ / sngags pas spos kyis sa dgang ngo // legs par brdung zhing mnyam 'jam bya// phyogs cha dag dang sgo yi rnams// kun kyang rnam pa thams
45a6(rgyud 'bum): cad du/ / rin chen sna lngas rab mdzes bya// bye brag tu ni sa dbus su// rin chen sna lnga gzhag par bya// de nas yon tan ldan pa yi// slob ma dag ni gdams te gzungs//
45a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnam kun gyis// bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya// mchog sbyin rdo rje blo ldan gyi// gsang sngags 'di ni zlos pa na// skyon dang yon tan rnam dpyad pas//
45b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag thog mar brtag par bya// yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni// shin tu brtags nas gzung bar bya// rigs dang gzo ni phun sum tshogs// gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang /
45b2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ldan brtan byas gzo dang // dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang // gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang // gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang // byung
45b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' kun la yang / / gang dgra rtag tu gus gnas dang // pha la gus dang ma la gus// bla ma mchod la rab brtson dang // gang dag pha rol don spyod la// snying
45b4(rgyud 'bum): nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang / / gang dag dran zhing nges pa dang // g.yo sgyu med cing chos brtson dang // lus dang ngag dang yid dag pa// de dag nye bar rtag gzung bya// gang dag
45b5(rgyud 'bum): snying nas 'jig rten 'di/ / 'jig rten pha rol yid ches dang // bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs gang dag chos brtson zhing // sngags kyi theg pa rtogs
45b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa/ / de dag bsgrims te gzung bar bya// nyan thos theg pa pa rnams min// zhar ba lag zha za ma dang // sgur po 'on pa mi'u thung dang // gang dag sna leb gyur pa dang /
45b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin mig yon gnod bag can// 'jungs dang byas pa mi gzo dang // mkhas bsnyems sems dang g.yo can dang // sngags kyi theg pa sgyid chen gyis// theg pa la ni ma mos pa/
46a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag nam yang gzung mi bya// de dag bstan 'dir skal ba med// bstan bcos mi shes mi gzung ste// tho bu tho bu 'dzin pa dang // de bzhin bla ma mi gus pa/
46a2(rgyud 'bum): smad pa de dag ring du spang // gang dag yan lag ma tshang dang // rkang zha dag dang 'theng po dang // yan lag lhag par gyur pa rnams// mkhas pas bsgrims te yongs su spang // ji skad
46a3(rgyud 'bum): smos pa'i slob ma rnams/ / de tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te// gcig pu yod na'ang de gzung ngo // yang na slob ma bzhi zhig gzung // de nas spyang ba byed bcug la// spos dang me tog
46a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mchod/ / dkyil 'khor nang gi sa la ni// ku sha gding ba bting ba la// des pas slob ma lhan cig tu// der ni rab tu nyal bar bya// slob dpon yud tsam yud tsam zhing //
46a5(rgyud 'bum): de tshe slob ma rnams la ni// theg chen zab mo rgya chen gyi// chos kyang rab tu bshad par bya// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// yon tan kun tu brjod na phan// byang chub sems
46a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dpa' rnams kyi/ / rdzu 'phrul la sogs yongs su brjod// pha rol rgyu la snying rje ba// de dag yud tsam yud tsam brjod// nam gyi bzhi cha lus pa'i tshe// gal te rmi lam
46a7(rgyud 'bum): bzang rmin/ / dkon mchog gsum la gzhol rnams kyis// rnam nangs pa dang legs rab tu// sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// khyod kyis de dag brjod par gyis//
46b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i steng du 'dug na mchog/ gzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// rgya mtsho mthong bar rmis pa dang // rgyal dang 'thungs pa'ang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas mthong na snying dga' ste/
46b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang // 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dag dang gang mkhas pa// de dag mthong na snying dga' 'o// me yi phung po grags pa dang //
46b3(rgyud 'bum): ba glang khyu mchog glang chen dregs// rta ni dkar por gang gyur pa// de dag mthong na zhon pa dang // ba lang khyu yang shis pa yin// bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // rgyal po dge bar
46b4(rgyud 'bum): grags pa dang / / sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang // nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // de dag mthong na shis par 'gyur// rmi lam smra zhing gtam zer dang // rang gi mgo bo gcod pa dang //
46b5(rgyud 'bum): sha chen za bar byed pa dang // khrag gis khrus kyang byed pa dang // de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa dang // zho dang 'bras chan za ba dang // chang yang 'thung bar byed pa dang // skra 'dreg pa ni
46b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog yin no/ / so yang ltung bar gyur pa dang // ri dang shing ni n+ya gro dang // de la 'dzegs na shis par 'gyur// legs so bu zhe'am blo ldan zhes// sgra ni de skad thos pa dang //
46b7(rgyud 'bum): yid du 'ong ba'i bud med dang // nyin mo nyal po byed pa dang // tshangs pa drag po'i nyi ma dang // khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang // lus ngan po dang nor sbyin dang // brgya byin dang ni chu lha dang /
47a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag mthong ngam smras pa dang // 'bel gtam byed na nges par 'grub// gzhan yang de lha'i rmi lam dag/ dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis gzung // rmi lam
47a2(rgyud 'bum): de las bzlog pa dag/ 'jigs pa med kyis gzung mi byed// sa la rgyug dang mchong ba dang // gar byed pa dang glu len dang // dgod dang bong bu rnga mo la// zhon pa shin tu ngan pa yin//
47a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bru mar gyis ni lus bskus dang // gcer bu dag dang smra ba dang // zhar ba 'theng po sgur po dang // mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang // phag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang // bong bu rnams
47a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin te/ / ma he rnga mo ce spyang dag/ rmi lam mthong na rtag tu smad// rtse gsum rtse gsum gdengs thogs dang // mig dmar shin tu 'jigs pa dang // gcer bu dag dang sna leb
47a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sngags mo byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang // mdog gnag mi bzad chen po dang // gos sngon gzugs byed mi sdug pa// su yi rmi lam rmis pa ni// de la dngos grub yod rmi
47a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zung zhig rgyob cig choms shig ce'am// zo zhig ces pa'i mi bzad sgra// drag po'i 'jigs byed khro thos dang // phud dang ma rnyed thos pa dang // bya rgod bzhad
47a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bya gar dang / / 'ug pa bya rog byi la dang // byi ba sdig pa sre mo sprul// gang yang gzhan dag skye bo gdug/ de dag rmi lam mthong gyur tam// reg par gyur na'ang mi dge'o// /
47b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas byi de nyin par slob dpon gyis rdo rje'i snying pos pa'i rnam lnga la sngags kyis btab ste/ slob ma bos la rdo rje drag po'i snying pos bsang gtor byas te// shing a shwad tha'i
47b2(rgyud 'bum): lo ma kyong ba 'am snyim pa'i nang du snod du bya ba sbyin zhing / / khyed de ring zas kyi tshad shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// nyi ma nub na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyi sreg
47b3(rgyud 'bum): blugs dang / yam sreg shing nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas a shwad tha'i shing ngam// yang na u dum ba ra las// sor brgyad tsam gyi so shing bya// thog ma gcig
47b4(rgyud 'bum): ni me tog brgyan/ / rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab la// de dag la ni bca' phyir sbyin// shar gyi phyogs su mdun bstan nam// yang na byang phyogs bstan te gzhag/ gsang
47b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags mgon po dran byas la/ / gar bltas de bzhin shes par bya// de nas phyi nyin slob ma rnams// smyung ba byed du bcug nas su// rdo rje mi 'jam me zhes bya// srid pa gsum po
47b6(rgyud 'bum): rmongs byed pa/ / rtag dran bya phyir de dag la// dri ma med pa'i gzungs byin bya// snying du sdug pa'i dam tshig brjod// nyams pa la yang lhag par brjod// sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed//
47b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu bkra shis byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa// thams cad kyis ni ma yin te// sdig pa thams cad byang byed pa// de ni kun tu rtag dran bya// sob
48a1(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyis ni thams cad du/ / rtag tu mnyam par gzhag sems kyis// sna lnga'i tshon las byas pa yi// thig skud rab tu bzang blangs la// bsgrims te
48a2(rgyud 'bum): sa 'di thams cad la/ / thig ni legs par gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor dkyil du 'dug nas su// sngags pas de bzhin gshegs rnams la// de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba
48a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'khor los sgyur ba dran byas la// bdag nyid der bsgoms byas nas su// de'i sngags yid kyis dran byas la// de nas shar phyogs kha bltas te// shar phyogs
48a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid du thig gdab bo/ / de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis// nub phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas su// nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo// de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis// byang
48a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ / byang phyogs su ni thig gdab bo// de nas kyang ni bsgyur byas la// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te// rnam par dbye ba shes pa yin// lho phyogs nyid du
48a6(rgyud 'bum): thig gdab bo/ / de ltar nang logs dkyil 'khor ni// cha brgyad yod par rab tu bya// de nas de lta'i tshul gyis ni// phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor byas la// kun tu gru bzhi
48a7(rgyud 'bum): lham par ni/ / rab tu bsgrims te thig gdab pa// dbus kyi gnas nas byung nas su// me yi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// sngags pas sngags kyi cho ga bzhin// shar phyogs
48b1(rgyud 'bum): ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ / de nas cho ga shes pa yis// gus par dbang ldan phyogs song la// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te// byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// dbang ldan
48b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nas song nas su/ / rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// der ni lho phyogs kha bltas te// nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// gnas de nas ni de byung la// bden
48b3(rgyud 'bum): bral phyogs su dong nas su/ / me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni// thig skud legs par gdab par bya// kun tu gru bzhi lham par ni// de ltar gnas te byas nas su// de nas
48b4(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol de bzhin du/ / cho ga bzhin du cha brgyad bya// tshad ni bcu drug khru yin te// slob dpon nyid kyi khru yin no// de nas byung la blo lhun gyis// cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya//
48b5(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol sa dang bcas par ni// khru grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// der yang snga ma bzhin du ni// cha brgyad nyid du gcad par bya// brgyad pa nas ni gzung nas su// sngags pa yis ni
48b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / 'khor sa'i thig ni gdab par bya// gnas gsum dag tu nges par yang // cha brgyad tsam yang 'tsham pa yi// thog ma'i sgo ni gdod par bya// dkyil 'khor
48b7(rgyud 'bum): rim pa bar ma la/ / snga ma nyis 'gyur sgor shes bya// rim pa gsum par sum 'gyur dang // sgo khang dag kyang mkhas pas bya// rta babs dag gi tshad rnams ni// dbus kyi
49a1(rgyud 'bum): cha dang mnyam par bya/ / lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang // sgo khang dag ni bya ba bya// rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas// de ltar dkyil 'khor legs phye la/
49a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags mgon gnas la 'dug nas su// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// tshon rtsi 'dir ni bye brag tu// rin chen sna lnga yin par 'dod// sa la btags pa'i bye yang rung //
49a3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'byor pas byar yang rung // gos dkar bgos shing gtsang byas la// dul zhing ze'u ka bcings nas su// bsgrims te phreng shar phyogs mtshams nas// tshan rtsi dag ni kyi
49a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis sam// yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas sam// snod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam// rig byed 'don pa'i lag pas so// thog mar dkar po
49a5(rgyud 'bum): dgye bar bya/ / de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye// de yi 'og tu ser po ste// de yi 'og tu ljang khud gye// thams cad dag ni nang rol du// sngags pas tshon rtsi nag po dgye/
49a6(rgyud 'bum): cha brgyad dag tu gang bstan pa// dbus kyi cha yi cha rnams ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste// de dag rdo rje bcing tshul 'dod// gdan ni pad+mar bstan pa ste/
49a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu dkar zhing mdzes pa yin// de yi steng du rdo rje gzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje'i gtsug tor te// me lce 'bar ba'i snying po bya// mdor na sa bon ldan par bya// de la sha
49b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog gzhag par bya'o/ / lho phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o// nub phyogs su de bzhin gshegs
49b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od dpag med do/ / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can no// shar lho'i phyogs
49b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs so/ / lho nub kyi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob bo// nub byang gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa
49b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba 'jig go/ / mdor na dbus kyi pad+ma ni// 'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa ste// 'dab ma dkar po shar phyogs su// nub phyogs su ni dmar po nyid// byang phyogs su ni
49b5(rgyud 'bum): ser po ste/ / lho phyogs su ni nag po nyid// 'dab ma lhag ma rnams kun tu// rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dren mar gsungs// de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// bum pa zla 'od
49b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba bri/ de yi steng du rlung chen te// 'bar zhing tog dang ldan par bri// zla gam 'dra zhing drag po ste// 'od ni dbyar sprin mdog 'dral// rlung gi steng du me bris te/
49b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs ni gru gsum gnas pa yin// rtags ni 'bras bu zur gsum pa// 'jigs pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad+ma bri// 'od ni dus mtha'i me dang 'dra//
50a1(rgyud 'bum): de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// 'khor los sgyur ba bri bar bya// de la bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs sam/ phyag rgya'am/ yi ge ci rigs su gzhag
50a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / phyag rgya gzhag na rdo rje ste// bsgrims nas sa bon ldan par bya// de yi phyi rol cha rnams ni// brgyad po dag tu snga ma bzhin// sngags pas cho ga ji bzhin du//
50a3(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya// de la shar phyogs su ni 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du me'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs pa pad+ma sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje ut+pa la'i
50a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/ / shar lho'i mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
50a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/ / lho phyogs su ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje 'chang thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o//
50a6(rgyud 'bum): lho nub kyi mtshams su ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o//
50a7(rgyud 'bum): nub phyogs su ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bri'o// nub byang gi mtshams su ni pad+ma
50b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa ril ba spyirings kyi phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/ / byang phyogs su ni pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por
50b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bri'o/ / byang shar gyi mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub
50b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o/ / phyogs bzhir ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khor dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil
50b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i nang du chud par bri'o/ / de la rnam thos kyi bu'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to yin no// 'phags skyes po'i phyag rgya ni be con no// mig mi bzang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o//
50b5(rgyud 'bum): yul 'khor srung gi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o// phyi rol 'khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang /
50b6(rgyud 'bum): mu ran shin tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor ba'o// de'i nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas par bri'o// de la shar phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po
50b7(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / de'i byang phyogs su ni tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// tshangs pa'i byang phyogs su ni
51a1(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi wang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang
51a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su ni dpal chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor
51a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / brgya byin gyi lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// me'i phyogs su ni drang srong
51a4(rgyud 'bum): me'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcus pa bri'o/ / lce phyogs su ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar
51a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su ni 'chi bdag gi dril bu bri'o/ / mtshan mo nag mo'i ni tog go/ nag po'i ni zhags pa'o// drag po'i chung ma'i ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o// tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ni
51a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'o/ / khyab 'jug gi chung ma'i ni 'khor lo'o// gzhon nu ma'i ni mdung thung ngo // phag gi chung ma'i ni tho ba'o// tsA mud+b+ha'i ni mi thod do// dbang po'i chung ma'i na rdo rje'o//
51a7(rgyud 'bum): lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug to'o// gshin rje'i nub phyogs su ni yi dgas rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas 'bri'o// sha za rnams ni dra ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang
51b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa bri'o/ / gnon po rnams lcags kyi rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// grib gnon rnams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// brjed byed rnams ni lag
51b2(rgyud 'bum): bzang la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// srin mo rnams ni mche ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya 'am lce rdo rje
51b3(rgyud 'bum): can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / sha za mo rnams ni rdo rje babacol gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i
51b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogs su ni chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhags
51b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nye bar dka' thub bzlog pa rtse gsum gdengs
51b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / sgo'i byung phyogs kyi ngos su tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs su zag bzangs ris
51b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//
52a1(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs su rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi shar
52a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / de'i 'og tu nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa 'dab ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar
52a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su sna tshogs 'phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams dang / ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'kho dang bcas pa rig phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/
52a4(rgyud 'bum): de la dri za dag gi phyag rgya rnams ni rnga phreng bu dang pheg rnams so// mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya dag ni sku'i pi wang la sogs pa brdung ba sbrang ba rnams so// de nas lto 'phye chen po rnams
52a5(rgyud 'bum): dnga'abab chu chen po rnams rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / de nas skye dgu'i dag po rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi shar phyogs su zla ba 'khor
52a6(rgyud 'bum): drang bcas pa pad+ma dkar po dang bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / nub sgor ni ki li ki la rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri ste drag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// byang sgor ni sgo srungs gnyis
52a7(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya ste/ de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ni dbyug to'i phyag rgya dang bri'o// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bri'o// shar skor ni khro bo'i rgyal pog
52b1(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya ste/ de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// be con sngon po can ni be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// lho sgor ni thub par dka' tho ba'i phyag
52b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / mngon phyogs na rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// 'og logs su ni rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram ni sring mo bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// de la
52b3(rgyud 'bum): tum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to'o/ / rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o// rnam par rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'o// mi pham ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo'o// gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i
52b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o/ / sring mo bzhi'i lho phyogs su ni smin drug bu 'khor dang bcas pa mdung thung gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral
52b5(rgyud 'bum): gri dang ras la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ / 'khor thams cad kyi gnas ni thig ler bri'o// de dang de ltar lhag ma brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/ thams cad kyang
52b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi las ci bya ba de thams cad ni rdo rje drag po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ dkyil
52b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnams dgod pa'i cho ga'o/ / cho ga shes pas de lta bur// rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog bris te// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su// rab tu bsgrims te mchod pa bya//
53a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag/ kha yi chag shal kha can// mgrin pa ring zhing lto che ba// nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya// sa bon rin chen sman gyis bkang //
53a2(rgyud 'bum): spos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang // kha rgyan yal gas khebs byas shing // de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la// mgul chings kyis kyang bcings byas pa// kha dog ci rigs
53a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dgod/ / sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du// bum pa snga ma ji bzhin du// brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa ste// dgu pa de ni bsang gtor ba// rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu//
53a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrims te de ni sngags kyis gdab// bcu pa dbus su shes par bya// de ni 'khor los sgyur la dbul// rta babs rnams ni mdzes pa ste// rin chen rnam pa bzhi las byas//
53a5(rgyud 'bum): yang na yid 'ong shing la bya// tsan dan yang na gzhan yang rung // dum bu ma yin ma grugs pa// gas pa med cing 'dzer pa med// pa ru na dang sha ma dang // sa la ba'i kang
53a6(rgyud 'bum): ka ta yang rung / / rin chen dril bu rab sbyangs shing // dar dang ras la sogs pa sna brgyan// khwa ni brgyad dam bdun rnam drug/ me tog 'phreng dang ldan par 'dod// steng du rin chen
53a7(rgyud 'bum): bla re bre/ / mu tig rgyan 'phreng rnam par spyod// dar dang ras kyang spyang bar bya// dkyil 'khor bas ni che ba bya// kha dog sna tshogs pa dan rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu spyang bar bya//
53b1(rgyud 'bum): srad bu la ni brgyu bar bya// dril bu sgra 'byung ldan par bya// kha dog sna tshogs gdugs kyi rnams// ci rigs par ni bre bar bya// rin chen bzhi las byas pa 'am// de med zangs
53b2(rgyud 'bum): las byas pa'ang rung / / mchod pa'i g.yog ni snod bzhi zhig/ blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya// sna tshogs spos su gsungs pa ni// gur kum dang ni tsan dar dang // spri ka la
53b3(rgyud 'bum): sogs ci yang rung / / srog chags yan lag kun mi rung // sna tshogs bdug pa dbul bya ste// a ka ru dang sgron shing dang // ga pur shir ba sa ga/ tso pog dang ni ru rta dang /
53b4(rgyud 'bum): sA la'i shing gi thang chu 'am// yang na thang shing thang chung dbul// rdo rje 'byung ba'i rig pa 'am// rdo rje drag pos bzlas brjod bya// ut+pa la dang pad+ma mchog/ tsam pa ka dang klu shing
53b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ge sa ra dang ma li ka/ mya ngan 'tshang dang sgra snar dang // ta ka ra dang pu na ka/ dong ka'i me tog mdzes pa yin// ka ra wI ra ku mu dang // sna ma d+ha nu ska ri yi// me tog tsa
53b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs dbul bar bya/ / de bzhin lha shos sna tshogs te// 'o brug shing dang 'bras chan dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi rab tu bzang // bag chos dang ni la thu dang // sbrang rtsi bzhag pa'i
53b7(rgyud 'bum): cung beng dang / / a shi brti pa na ka/ spun gzigs kha drar grags pa dang // shi ri ba d+ha ka mo dang // gar b+hod ka ra ka dang ni// be reg dang ni tre ye rtse// sha ku la dang
54a1(rgyud 'bum): par pa ta/ / 'bru yi la thug 'breng bu dang // shun+da di ba la gi dag dang // g+ha ri ka dang swa sti ka/ mon sran gre'u gyi zhu te'u dang // rtsa ba dang ni rdungs pa dang /
54a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu sna tshogs dbul bar bya// sran tshod kha dog ldan pa dang // sge'u gsher nges par dbul bar bya// sran tshod ril bu che chung dang // be 'ga' na dang saM b+ha d+hi/
54a3(rgyud 'bum): bu ram bsres pa'i khu sman dang // rab tu bsgrims te byas pa dang // bu ram sna tshogs btsos pa dang // kun tu rnam pa thams cad dbul// rnam pa sna tshogs zho dag dang //
54a4(rgyud 'bum): zho bsrungs bu ram btab nges dbul// 'o ma legs par btsags pa dang // de bzhin btung ba rnams kyang dbul// kha ra'i dbu ba khar dang // mar dang bu ram 'bru mar
54a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sbrang rtsi dang ni lan tshwa dang // dge bar grags pa dbul bar bya// btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang // tam po la dang mal cha dang // snod spyad bzang zhing mdzes pa dang //
54a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs rtsi sman rnams// rab tu bsgrims te cho ga bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' skyob la dbul// de nas so so re re la'ang // na bza' ras zung re re dbul//
54a7(rgyud 'bum): me long mig sman yid 'ong dang // dung dang de bzhin gi'u wang rnams// byang chub tshogs ni bkang ba'i phyir// mgon po kun la dbul bar bya// skyob pa rnams la thams cad du//
54b1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar legs par mchod byas nas// de nas sngags pas sbyin sreg bya// snying po cho ga bzhin du bya// sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// thams
54b2(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub byed yid 'ong ba/ / mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o// yi ge klog pa bzhi dag kyang // phyogs bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// de la shar phyogs gzhag pa ni// 'phags pa
54b3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab pha rol phyin/ / byang phyogs su ni mdo gzhag pa// gser 'od dam par dam pas bzhed// nub phyogs su ni gzhag bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin//
54b4(rgyud 'bum): sdong po bkod pa tshul chen ni// lho phyogs logs su shes par bya// dkyil 'khor lha rnams ji lta bar// de dag la yang gus par mchod// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa 'di//
54b5(rgyud 'bum): srung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin// de nas lha rnams thams cad kyang // de yi tshe na dgyes par 'gyur// gang dag 'jig rten mi bsrun pa// de dag phyogs phyogs/
54b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar 'gyur// de lta bas na rnam kun tu// de tshe dam chos bklag par bya// slob ma thams cad bos nas su// de dag la ni skyabs gsum sbyin// sdig pa mi
54b7(rgyud 'bum): bya brjod par bya/ / sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug/ mkhas pas cho ga 'di bzhin du// byang chub sems kyang bskyed du gzhug/ rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis//
55a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas kun la bsang gtor bya// dam tshig yongs su brjod byas la// mkhas pas nang du zhugs nas su// gos rnams yongs su brjes byas te// sngags
55a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis yongs su gdab par bya/ / de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis// slob ma de dag gdong bkab la// 'khor los sgyur ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya sngags pas 'ching bcug ste/
55a3(rgyud 'bum): lag tu me tog sbyin byas la// de tshe snying khar yi ge bsam// skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni// me tog de dag 'thor du gzhug/ blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi// rnagayas rdo rje
55a4(rgyud 'bum): dril bu gzhag/ rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba yi// lha mo chen po g.yon par ro// me tog rnams ni gar bab pa// lha de de yi yin par 'dod// de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas// de tshe
55a5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig bstan par bya/ / mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// 'di ltar sbyin sreg rab tu bya// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
55a6(rgyud 'bum): rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang de bzhin drag shu la spyod// sbyin sreg las ni mdor bsdus pa// sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod//
55a7(rgyud 'bum): tshig thams cad rgyas pa dang // de bzhin tha dngad las kyang gsungs// sems dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du// me yi thab kyi khung bu bgyi// ya ma sreg shing cis ji lta bur// las/
55b1(rgyud 'bum): ni ci zhig brtsam par bgyi// khyab bdag thab khung bka' stsol la// bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
55b2(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// khyod kyis dri ba gang byas pa// de dag thams cad brjod
55b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / g.yeng ba med pa'i yid kyis nyon// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni// sbyin sreg me thab khung bu bya// de tshad gtan la dbab pa ni// khru gang tsam du brjod pa
55b4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / mtho gang tsam zhig brkos nas su// dbus su rdo rje gzhag par bya// kha khyer yang ni der byas te// mkhas pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su bya// rtsa ba rtse mor dkris pa yi//
55b5(rgyud 'bum): ku sha dag ni derang gram mo// de ltar kun tu legs par yang // sngags pas shin tu dgram par bya// ha cang mi nye mi ring bar// sbyin sreg me yi thab bya ste// tshul bzhin du ni byas nas
55b6(rgyud 'bum): su/ der ni sbyin sreg brtsam par bya// ku sha sbrams steng bdag 'dug ste// de bzhin gshegs rnams dran byas nas// de nas me ni 'bar byas la// de la bsang gtor bya ba
55b7(rgyud 'bum): brtsam/ / de yi 'og tu me der ni// me tog gcig gcig gzhag par bya// de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas 'gug par 'gyur// de la me yi phyag rgya ni//
56a1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa sams pazad 'byung ste// mthe bangs pa rgyung chu kru thugs/ sngags 'di dag gis dkrug par bya'o// nam sarbatwas+'utAr+dz+dza sar+b+bas 9b+h+ya/
56a2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA ar+dz+dza ye swA pre kA byA ba sa na ya sarba/ blo dang ldan pas rang sngags kyis// de nas dgang thugs sbyin sreg b+ha// de lang gang blugs phul nas ni// slob mi g.yon dug
56a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de yang re ro'i phyir yang na// dgang blugs nyi shu lnga lnga sreg/ rnam pa sna tshogs las kyi rnams// 'di lta bu dag rab bya ste// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang drag
56a4(rgyud 'bum): shul spyod pa'o/ / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'o mar bcas// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o// rgyas la zho dang 'bras chan dang // gang dag gzhan las gsungs pa'o// drag shul spyod pa
56a5(rgyud 'bum): tsher mar gsungs/ / dbade byar snga ma ji bzhin du// las 'dod 'jigs pa med rnams kyis// ci rigs par ni sbyin sreg bya// ji ltar rigs pa so so las// de dag las ni
56a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon dgug go/ / yang na yid la gang 'dod pa// de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis// de yi tshen slob dpor la// slob ma rnams kyi yon dbul lo// ma byin na ni dam tshig nyams/
56a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// dper na nyi ma zla ba gnyis// 'jig rten mig tu mkhas pas 'dod// de bzhin skye ba 'di la yang // slob dpon de ni mig 'drar 'dod/
56b1(rgyud 'bum): dper na me yi khams de ni// bud shing thams cad sreg par byed// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// mi shes bud shing sgeg par byed// dper na chu yi khams de ni// 'jig rten/
56b2(rgyud 'bum): gdung ba thams cad gcod// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // gdung ba kun gcod shes par bya// dper na rlung gi khams de ni// 'jig rten thams cad rtag tu sgrub// de bzhin slob
56b3(rgyud 'bum): dpon slob ma la/ / dge ba rnam par sgrub par byed// dper na lus can thams cad la// sa ni rten du grags pa yin// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // chos kyi rten du 'dod
56b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / dper na bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad// chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// // dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang//
56b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba thams cad 'thun par 'dzin// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // 'dir ni sngags kyi gsang ba 'dzin// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams// de ni rtag tu rjod par byed//
56b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// bsngags pa chen po'ang rjod par byed// dper na sangs rgyas mig 'dra ste// yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pa// de bzhin sngags pa 'jig
56b7(rgyud 'bum): med kyang / / theg chen gnas 'di ston pa yin// bdag ltar sngags pa de bzhin te// slob dpon ji bzhin rgyal de bzhin// slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung // skyon
57a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams rnams kyang gzung mi bya/ / yon tan 'dzin na grub par gyur// nyes pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams// slob dpon la ni smad byas nas// 'ja
57a2(rgyud 'bum): rten dag na tshe thung zhing / / de bzhin ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur// nya ba la sogs rigs su ste// 'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te// mkhas pas bla ma skur mi gdab// chos 'dod
57a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis slob dpon la/ / rtag par rgyun du mnyes par bya// gang na rgyal ba'i sras gnas pa// sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin// der ni rgyal sras thams cad dang //
57a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang snying las chung ngu yin// sbyin sreg las ni dam pa 'di// dpa' bo khyod la brjod pa ni// sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa// mgon po rnams kyis sngon chad bsha/
57a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rnams la// gang gis 'di ltar rnam shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/
57a6(rgyud 'bum): me'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par phye ba'o// // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam po bzhi pa// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
57a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / sangs rgyas snga mas bsngags pa yi// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod par bya//
57b1(rgyud 'bum): khrugasum tshad gcig bzhag nas su// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi tshad ni khru bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor logs su mngon phyogs bya// der yang sngags pas cha bsdams shing
57b2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu gru bzhi lham par bya/ / sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas te// me yi phyogs su 'dug byas la// de tshe byang du mngon phyogs te// cho ga bzhin du thig skud bre// snga ma'i
57b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni spangs nas su/ / dbang ldan phyogs su 'dug byas te// rlung phyogs spyod yul bar du ni// byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// rlung gi phyogs su 'dug nas ni//
57b4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs ngos su mngon bltas te// 'don bral phyogs kyi bar du ni// nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// de bzhin rlung gi phyogs sbas te// bden bral phyogs su 'dug
57b5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / de nas shar phyogs mngon bltas te// sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing // me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni// lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// cho ga
57b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin thams cad kyang / / gru bzhi lham par rab tu bya// mkhas pas thog ma nyid du ni// nang rim cha brgyad byas nas su// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/
57b7(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas rim pa gnyis su bya// dbus kyi pad+ma mdor brjod na// 'dab brgyad ze bar bcas pa ste// 'dab ma'i 'bar bar thams cad du// rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya/
58a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag la yang snying po dri// rang gi snying pos bskul nas ni// phyogs spyong brgyad po de dag kyang // ji bzhin gnas su rnam par dgod// de la nang rol tu
58a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / 'jig rten skyong ba rnam par dgod// bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gzhag/ dkyil 'khor lha la ji lta bar// der yang mchod pa
58a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bya/ / ras dang bla re dril bu dang // gdugs dang me tog rnams kyang dbul// mu tig 'phreng sogs me tog 'phreng // ci nus ci 'byor dbul bar bya// de la dbus
58a4(rgyud 'bum): su ni phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan bri'o/ / rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa rin po che dang sman thams cad kyis bkang ba rin po che me tog dang / me tog kun tu rgyas
58a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa
58a6(rgyud 'bum): dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur ro/ / sngags pa pad+ma dam pa der// rab tu bzhag nas bdag nyid kyis// me tog spos kyis mchod byas la// mar me mchod yon dbul bar bya// gdugs
