58a7(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / / sil snyan sgra rnams phyung ba dang // rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis// yang dag mngon du dga' byas la// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du// bsgrims
58b1(rgyud 'bum): tede ni dbang bskur ro/ / ji ltar gling bzhi'i dbang phyug po// 'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang bskur ba// de bzhin sngags pas ngo mtshar dang // bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskur ro//
58b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog rnams dang bdug pa dang // spros mchog rnams kyis yang mchod la// lag pa g.yas su rdo rje dang // g.yon du 'khor lo bzhags nas su// slob ma de la 'di skad du/
58b3(rgyud 'bum): rjesrab dpon khyod gyur te// de nas rdo rje ldan pa khyod// rdo rje chos ni rab brjod pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi khyod lag tu// ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rdo rje rkyen// de nas
58b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ / lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// sdang ba rnams ni tshar gcad dang // bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa// de dgra gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// bden pa
58b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis rdo rje byin/ / ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal// bdag por bya phyir dbang sgyur ba// de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje blo ldan dbang bskur brjod//
58b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// de la bsrung bar bya ba ni// slob ma rdo rje chos brjod la// lag pas bslang bar byas nas su// dkyil 'khor chen po der khrid la// dam
58b7(rgyud 'bum): tshig dag ni rnams bsgrags te/ / byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya// khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang // lag na 'khor lo gzhar mi gtang // blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang /
59a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ba 'a khyod gis ni// nam yang yongs su gtang mib+ha// khro sran byang chub sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te// ji ltar gyi
59a2(rgyud 'bum): sras bsdus pa/ / de ma khyod kyis 'di srungs shig/ de byas sangs rgyas byas gzob// sangs rgyas sras zhes brjod pa yin// gzhan du na ni dam tshig nyams// rdo rjen
59a3(rgyud 'bum): khyod mi 'gyer/ / rdo rje chung ba thams cad kyi// rigs ni byang chub sems yin te// rtags ni snying rje mis shes brjod// thabs ni ba'i du bstan pa ste// rdo rje bzhag pa
59a4(rgyud 'bum): bgos/ / rdo rje mtshon cha thogs pa yin// khyod la lha rnams phyug kyang 'tshal// khyad la srung ba kun tu byed// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // rnam pa kun
59a5(rgyud 'bum): srung ba mdzad/ / lagan rdo rje dbang 'gyur ba las/ dbang bsgyur ba'i ma par bye ba rdzogs so// / de nas 'jam dab dpal ldan pa// ma mtshan gyis rnam
59a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pas/ / rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smras// dpa' bo gzi brjid chen po lags// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog/ gang gis
59a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ / gsang chen bcas pa yang gsungs shig/ lha rnams thams cad so so dang // byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// phyag rgya dang ni sngags bcas pa'i/
59b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba rnams kyis rab sbyar dang // bsam gtan brtan bca' man ngag dang // rig pa'i chos ni gang yin dang // brtul zhugs dang ni spyod dang rtags// yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dang /
59b2(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin drag shul spyod pa dang // 'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang // nor pa'ang rab tu dgug pa dang // gsang sngags spyi yi mtshan nyid dang // bye brag
59b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang bshad par mdzod/ / 'jig rten 'di ni 'dor ba su// gzhan du 'gro ba su zhig gsungs// 'di dang gzhan 'bras 'jig rten na// rnyed dka' rgyal ba rnams
59b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs dang / / las ni gzhan gyis byas 'gyur la// 'bras bu gzhan spyod 'gyur ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams kyi// 'bras bu bdag la bshad par
59b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'// gsang sngags 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dka'// sangs
59b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyis de ring khyod/ / phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// bstan pa 'di yi bya ba la// gsang chen 'dzin par dgongs pa ste// dkyil 'khor 'di yi bar dag gi
59b7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rgyas par bshad par mdzod/ / de skad ces spras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
60a1(rgyud 'bum): smras so/ / 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis gang dris pa'i tshig de legs par smras pa ste/ de'i phyir 'jam dpal rab tu nyon cig/ 'jam
60a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yin no/ / kho bo gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yin no// lha'i gnas gang yin pa de kho bo'i gnas so// kho bo'i gnas
60a3(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor ro/ / dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ni gsang sngags te// dkyil 'khor med par gsang sngags med do// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dkyil 'khor ni gzugs
60a4(rgyud 'bum): yod pa dang gzugs med pa'o/ / de la gzugs yod pa ni ri mor bri ba'o// gzugs med pa ni bri ba ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang bri bar bya ba ni bri ru rung ba'o// mi bri ba ni brir mi
60a5(rgyud 'bum): rung ba'o/ / gzhon nu de la bri ba ma yin pa ni las thams cad bya'o// bri ba ni bya ba dang las kyi rgyu tsam du zad de/ de ni pha rol dad pa skyed pa yin la/ gcig gis ni lha'i gnas
60a6(rgyud 'bum): su byin gyis brlab par bya ba ste/ don gnyis sgrub pa dang / bya ba dang / rnal 'byor tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// slob dpon las dang /
60a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / dus dang / byed pa dang / nus pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan du bya ba dang / man ngag dang / rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan pa bdag la
60b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / gzhon nu de la man ngag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / slob ma'o// slob dpon ni slob dpon gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o//
60b2(rgyud 'bum): de ni de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug cing tshig bzhin du byed la mi slu ba'o// tshad ma de ni man ngag go// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang tshad ma gang zhe na/ gang mdo sde dang gsang
60b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi don mi slu ba dang por shes nas de'i ro myang ba dang / don de shin tu chud pas de las mi nyams pa dang / brtan par 'gyur ba de ni chos nyid do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de ni man ngag bshad
60b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ gzhan du mi 'gyur bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma ste de ni mi slu/
60b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'o// de mngon par rtogs pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / 'bras bu 'thob pa gang yin pa thob pa de ni chos nyid do// gzhan yang chos nyid de thob par byed pa'i rnal 'byor
60b6(rgyud 'bum): la sbyor ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'o/ / 'jam dpal gzhan yang yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bzhed do// dkyil
60b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni gsang chen 'di/ / rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bshad do// gzhan du bri ba 'ba' zhig ni// rgyu dang 'bras bu bral ba yin// 'jam dpal gzhan yang lha rnam
61a1(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis te/ 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang / rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo'o// de la 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni chos nyid rtogs pa'o// chos nyid thob pa de gang yin pa ni 'bras
61a2(rgyud 'bum): bu'o/ / 'bras bu gang yin pa de rnam par smin pa'o// rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ngo bo'o// ngo bo gang yin pa de tha snyad du lhung ba'o// tha snyad du lhung ba gang yin pa dang /
61a3(rgyud 'bum): tha snyad kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni btags pa'o// de ni bya ba'o// bya ba gang yin pa de las so// chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni 'bras bu med// mngon par rtogs pa med//
61a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du bya ba med/ rnam par byang ba med kyang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
61a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu dang / thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ston to// gzung ngo // brjod do// 'dogs so// rab tu 'jog go// rnam par
61a6(rgyud 'bum): grel to/ / 'chad do// tshul bstan pa sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs so// 'jam dpal gzhan yang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
61a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga ba zhes bya ba dang / 'che ba
61b1(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba dang / nad ces bya ba dang / rgud pa zhes bya ba dang / phun snam tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang / 'grob
61b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang / 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / rig pa zhes bya ba dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab ces bya ba dang / rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags zhes bya ba
61b3(rgyud 'bum): dang zhe sdang zhes bya ba dang / gti mug ces bya ba dang / 'ching ba zhes bya ba dang / thar pa zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / sred pa
61b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang / de kho na zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / mi slu ba zhes bya ba dang / mig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang /
61b5(rgyud 'bum): lce zhes bya ba dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces pa
61b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / chos zhes bya ba dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / nyan thos zhes bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang
61b7(rgyud 'bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /
62a1(rgyud 'bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i
62a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhan yang lha zhes bya ba
62a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin zhes bya ba dang / dri za zhes bya ba dang / lha ma yin zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha' lding zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci zhes bya ba dang / lto 'phye
62a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po zhes bya ba dang / mi zhes bya ba dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang / skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / bud med ces bya ba dang / ma ning zhes bya ba 'dogs so// 'jam dpal de ltar na las
62a5(rgyud 'bum): dang rnam par smin pa med pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis 'dogs pa mdzad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
62a6(rgyud 'bum): gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos de la ji ltar gdags pa 'am rnam par rig par mdzad/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa nyid la gdags pa
62a7(rgyud 'bum): 'am rnam par rig par mdzad do/ / 'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid de la'ang gcig ces bya ba 'am/ gnyis zhes bya bar 'dogs te
62b1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar grangs bstan pa rnams dang / ming gi brdar byas pa rnams kyis 'dogs pa mdzad pa la ltos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang nam mkha'i khams las dang rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin na
62b2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la'ang sngon po zhes bya ba dang / ser po zhes bya ba dang / dmar po zhes bya ba dang / dog ces bya ba dang / yangs zhes bya ba dang / dag ces bya ba dang / ma dag
62b3(rgyud 'bum): ces bya bar 'dogs so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
62b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dogs pa mdzad de/ 'dogs pa de'ang las dang rnam par smin pa med pas byas pa yin na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyis khong du ma chud par zad de/
62b5(rgyud 'bum): dedag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba la gzhug pa'i sgo dkyil 'khor 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsum ni 'dus par gyur pa las// sngags 'byung bar ni 'dir
62b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan to/ / phyag rgya'ang de bzhin 'byung ba ste// gzugs can ma yin bstan du med// rtag tu 'jig rten gsum rnams su// thogs pa med cing chod pa med// dper na gtsub stan
62b7(rgyud 'bum): bsten nas su/ / gtsub shing gtsub pa byas gyur na// mi yis rtsol ba byas rgyu las// stobs dang ldan pa'i me 'byung ngo // de bzhin gsum ni 'dus pa las//
63a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags dang ni phyag rgya lnga// chen po dag ni 'byung 'gyur te// byung nas yid la gang bsams pa'i// las rnams byed par gyur pa yin// 'jam dpal
63a2(rgyud 'bum): dper na rig sngags chang rnams kyis bsams ma thag tu lha'i zas dang / skom dang / rgyan dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bud med dang / khang khyim
63a3(rgyud 'bum): dang gzhal med khang la sogs pa thams cad 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / lha 'dus pa las thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jam
63a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba med par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe gang bsams pa de thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin
63a5(rgyud 'bum): du sngags kyi tshul yang khong du chud par bya'o/ / 'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi gzugs yongs su spangs te/ lha'i nga rgyal la the tsom med pa thob pa de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi chos nyid
63a6(rgyud 'bum): des chos nyid ston te/ de'i tshe des tshig gis de'i rnam pa brten pa na bya ba nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal brten pa'i chos nyid ji ltar las byed nus par 'gyur ba la ltos
63a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal brten nas rgya'i 'bur 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdzas med na yang rgya'i bur ni mi 'byung la/ yod kyang bya ba dang las dang bral na rgya'i
63b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bur mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal gnyis ka'ang phan tshun du bltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro// mis rtsol ba byas pa 'di las ci 'dir rdzas byung ngam/ 'on te las kyi bya ba de byung
63b2(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ / gang yin te snga phyi 'gal ba'i phyir brten nas/ gsang sngags sam phyag rgya 'byung ba tsam la ma gtogs par 'byung ba med do// 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi nyon
63b3(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan las rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'ang de snyed du blta'o/ / 'di la rgyal bar byed pa su yin zhe na/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang ldan pa'i chos
63b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings kyis rgyal bar byed do/ / 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa mang por brtags pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di ni/
63b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags so// 'di ni phyag rgya'o// 'di ni lha'o zhes rnam par gzhag pa mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings de ni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ gzung ba ma yin pa//
63b6(rgyud 'bum): dkrug pa ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rnam par gzhag pas rnam par gzhag go// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad byed do// 'jam
63b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhan yang ji ltar gzhan gyis las byas pa la ji ltar gzhan spyod ces gang smra ba de ni/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu dbang phyug rang gi sems la dbang thob pa de 'dod pa
64a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du longs spyod sna tshogs la yongs su spyod par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa dang / rnga dang / glang po che
64a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / shing rta dang / bud med dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas bdag kyang yongs su spyod cing gzhan dag la'ang sbyin par byed do// de ci'i
64a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir zhe na/ de nyid kyis sngags de bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas pa la gzhan yongs su spyod do// 'jam dpal gcig byed pa la mang po yongs su
64a4(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i rnam grangs yod do/ / dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am zhing pa bzhin no// 'jam dpal gzhan yang 'jig rten 'di 'dor ba ni su/ gzhan du 'gro ba ni su zhes smra ba
64a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs 'dus byas kyi khams la gnas pa de'i tshe de 'jig rten 'di yin no// gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i
64a6(rgyud 'bum): tshegs de nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten 'di 'dor zhing 'jig
64a7(rgyud 'bum): rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'o zhes 'dogs te/ 'di ni chos nyid rtogs pa'i gang zag gi tshig bla dgas so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams su rnam par gnas
64b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ de ni nam du'ang 'dus byas kyi dri mas mi gos so// 'di lta ste/ dper na rdo rje ni 'dam rdzab kyi rnyog pa'i dri ma'i skyon thams cad kyis mi gos so// de bzhin du chos nyid de'ang
64b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dus byas kyi skyon thams cad kyis mi gos so/ / 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyun du lhung ba ngar 'dzin pa
64b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ba'i sems pas srid par skye ba nyon mongs pa can rnam par sgrub bo// de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas te 'du byed kyi tshogs 'di 'gags pa'i tshe
64b4(rgyud 'bum): lha'o snyam pa 'am/ mi'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal nyid rgyu de'i rjes su 'brel to// 'di lta ste/ dper na rab tu byis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin lta ba'i mi ni bdag gi bzhin
64b5(rgyud 'bum): yon tan khyad par can 'di lta bus bzang ngo zhe 'am/ mi bzang ngo zhes rtog par byed kyis/ de dang tha dad pa'ang ma yin/ tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khrul
64b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir sems la ngar 'dzin pa bskyed do/ / 'jam dpal mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags rnams kyi dug dang rims la sogs pa sel ba'o//
64b7(rgyud 'bum): ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/ mngon sum dang rtog pa'i dra ba dang bral ba bsam gtan rtogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ste/ rjes su dpag pa dang dpag par bya ba'i rtog ge ba'i
65a1(rgyud 'bum): yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ yid ches pa'i lung gis grub pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rigs pa dang ldan pa dang / rang gis myong ba'i
65a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa ni 'bras bur bstan te/ 'di ni ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang drag shul spyod pa'i las smros shig ces gang smras pa ni bya dgos par gyur pa na khro bo nyid
65a3(rgyud 'bum): brtsam par bya ste/ zhi ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba dang / byams pa'i rang bzhin dang / rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la lha bla lnga'i gzugs dang / rang gi khro bo'i
65a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs tha mi dad par sbyor ba dang ldan par bya bas me'i khro bo'i gzugs la cig shos kyang khro bo'i gzugs so/ / rang bsgyur ba'i khro bos sngags kyi ngo bos bkug la myur du zang ngam/
65a5(rgyud 'bum): snying kha'am/ mgo 'am/ lho 'am/ rked pa 'am/ byin pa 'am/ rkang pa 'am/ rgyab tu rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la srog chags thams cad dgod kyang
65a6(rgyud 'bum): rung / rtse'ang rung / chags kyang rung sdang yang rung / lam du 'gro'ang rung / nyal yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / chu klung gi
65a7(rgyud 'bum): pha rol dpag tshad brgyan 'dug kyang rung / lha la sogs pas bsrungs kyang rung / bdag la me sbar bas sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o// zhi ba la ni zhi
65b1(rgyud 'bum): ma zhi ba la ni ma zhi bar gsungs so/ / de nas lag na rdo rjes thogs pa med pa'i ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang bsdan pa don yod par yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir
65b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi gsung bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas
65b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe stobs mtshungs pa med pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dam tshig chen po'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra sa ma ya d+h+r-ika/
65b4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi rdo rje'i gsang sngags smras ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i sgra 'ur
65b5(rgyud 'bum): ces grags so/ / 'di thos byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de dag skad cig de nyid la// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga ru// rdo rje mchog stobs gzungs thob bo// yang bdud bzhi
65b6(rgyud 'bum): pham par byed pa'i rnam par bsgyings pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ srung ba chen po stobs po che stobs bcu'i gzi brjid las byung ba'i gsang
65b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di smras so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+haHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/ 'dza gi ni badz+ra shu u la ni/ badz+ra mu te re ba li na ma a mra/ ma hA ba laM
66a1(rgyud 'bum): hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ shi li shi li/ Ti lo Ti lo/ Ta Ta le/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ ku ru b+ho na/ shwe ta pad+ma mA li ni/ hi hi he he/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/
66a2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA sa ma ya a nu ga te swA hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma srung ba dam pa 'di// gsang sngags rjes su spyod pa yi// sems
66a3(rgyud 'bum): can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ / lag na rdo rjes rab tu brjod// de nas lag na rdo rjes yang dkyil 'khor gyi thabs thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod spras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga
66a4(rgyud 'bum): / teb+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHbadz+ra gra d+hA ra a na la bi shA saM b+ha ba swA hA/ rdo rje'i me lce chen po 'bar ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHtsat+taM badz+ra
66a5(rgyud 'bum): a tsi s+pha ra Na swA hA/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra ka ba tsa bi s+phu ra badz+ra ga sA hA/ rdo rje go che'i sngags so//
66a6(rgyud 'bum): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHmahA badz+ra a gra d+ha ri te dzod ga te swAhA/ rdo rje mchog gi spyi gtsug gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
66a7(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra a nan+ta ga ti hi swAhA/ rdo rje gtsug tor chen po'i sngags so// na ma/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khaM b+h+yaHta thA ga te A shA pa ri bu ra tsin+t+ra ma Ni rA dza badz+re ts+tsha rdo rje mdzod spu'i
66b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / namaHsar+b+ba d+ha thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+haHta thA ga te lo tsan dz+nyA na badz+ra sUhA/ rdo rje can gyi sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
66b2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra a na na swAhA/ rdo rje zhal gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khaM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te sa t+ya d+harma pra tiSh+Thi te badz+ra ka ru sa ra swa ti bu ha a laM kA ra gar+b+ha badz+ra dza hA hU~M b+ha ga/
66b3(rgyud 'bum): ba ti/ sar+b+ba satwa an+do sha na ka ri swA hA/ rdo rje ljags kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHbadz+ra a gra sa ma b+h+yo bi bi shwa ru pa d+ha ra sA hA/ rdo rje
66b4(rgyud 'bum): sku'i sngags so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHar+g+ha badz+ra swA hA/ mchod yon gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
66b5(rgyud 'bum): gan d+ha a ba b+ha sa na swaH/ dri'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHpuSh+pa badz+ra a gra d+ha ra ka sAh+ma/ me tog gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba
66b6(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHdz+nyA na badz+ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHA sha k+Sha ya d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na badz+ra sAh+ma
66b7(rgyud 'bum): lha bshos kyi sngags so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHta thA ga te tsak+Shur badz+ra swA hA/ mar me'i sngags so// dkyil 'khor gyi thabs kyi sngags kyi mdzod
67a1(rgyud 'bum): do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te
67a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen po gsang mtho ba'i tog rdo rje mthon po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas
67a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje lhangs zhes bya ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba de byin no/ / na maH
67a4(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHta Ta ta Ta/ s+pho Ta ya badz+ra shaM kr-i ta bi d+ha dzi hA dur dAn+ta da ma kaHda ha si ta laM bo da ra ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsu aT+Ta ha sa na/

67a7(rgyud 'bum): ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje tshim zhing yi rangs nas/ de'i tshe rdo rje me zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge
67b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'di la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu

68a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje thogs pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du smras go bar byed pa dang / lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa dang / swa

68b1(rgyud 'bum): khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi lus dang ldan pa/ rab tu 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang 'dra ba/ dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa can/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i pags pa khrag can gyi smad g.yogs/
68b2(rgyud 'bum): gyon pa bka' nod cing 'dug pa bstan to// yang dpral ba'i dkyil nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gzhan khro bo'i zla ba'i thig le zhes bya ba lag pa brgya stong du ma yod pa/ mig gsum pa/
68b3(rgyud 'bum): mche ba bzhi pa/ gad mo rta gad kyi sgra 'byin pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs 'dra ba/ khro bo'i g.yog 'khor brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa

72b1(rgyud 'bum): mra Anan bdud d+hA durang nAng ma ka pra dz+wal dka6/ mkha rom shi na da 'i bidu s+pha ri da dz+r-id/ tsan+ta adi t+yam guT/ gau ta ba ri tsi ta kri bar bajug dge sma gA N+Da lA a la kr-i shA /
72b2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra ni la badz+ra a~M la~M badz+rA taswA/ 'adz+ra tsaraH/ 'dza thAHbadz+ra na dA nI la badz+dza/ badz+ra ga thArba pa mu kha ka ni kaM b+hIr hU~M kA ra ra ti ta sa ti si ti ha sa ta ma tho dar
72b3(rgyud 'bum): zathas pra sa/ br-i ba sha/ A bi sha A bi sha/ g+hur+Na g+h+rAH/ g+hur+Na pa ya b+hur+Na pa ye/ sar+b+bA sata thA mthum/ b+hu ma ya b+hU ma ya/ sar+b+bA dur+thapa tsa pa tsad ha
72b4(rgyud 'bum): ma tha ma tha hUM hUM badz+ra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ rdo rje na da ku be ra'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pra tsa la mo bu li bid d+ha ra badz+ra kr-i ta na kha badz+ra
72b5(rgyud 'bum): satwa swAhA/ rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA shud+d+ha badz+ra pra kri ti shud+d+ha sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba sAhA/ rdzas thams cad dag par
72b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i sngags so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ag+ni badz+ra sA hA/ rdo rje me'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
72b7(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba bAdz+ra a na la pra tsa la mau li thing ru da ra sA hA/ rdo rje rlung gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ga badz+ra d+ha ri dza ga na sA d+ha ka ra suH
73a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sa'i sngags so/ / namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi ra dze badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje rdul dang thal ba'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba ShA
73a2(rgyud 'bum): ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba thA smr-i ti dang badz+ra satwa swahA/ rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ka te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pad+ma badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags so//
73a3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu Shi b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rod ta ma ka ru Na maN+Da la swAhA/ rdo rje snying rje'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba bu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA maM t+yu ga ta/

77a1(rgyud 'bum): smra/ sa'an rnam
77a2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu le thA/ sar+b+ba thAs shrI tit+ta badz+re badz+rA ba Ni hri mig sa~M b+h+yaHzan mo ni rje lags gnas ma'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+bAd+ha bag+hA trAn+tu/ sar+b+ba mu khe u0f7f/ swAr+b+bA thA badz+ra s
77a3(rgyud 'bum): ngags so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta~M b+hU/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dza a ka ri badz+ra sha ri rA Ni swAhA/ zan mo rdo rje rgyal byed ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba tA thA ga
77a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas laH/ s+yAm+b+hab+hA badz+ra kar d+he badz+ra hU~M tsa na~M k+ki sar+tha/ za ma du kyim ma'i sngags kyi mam sar+thahA bka te b+h+ya/ bar+b+bas lad+d+ha bar+b+ba da badz+ra dz+dza
77a5(rgyud 'bum): bai ti ke swam+b+ha bran mo rdo rje gsod byed kyi sngags so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA me kha la la li ta ke sha bi ri badz+ra gan+d+ha ri swaH/ bran mo rdo rje tshig 'dzin
77a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi sngags so/ / namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA su sid+hi ka ra badz+ra sAd+ha ka ya~M sar+b+ba badz+ra pA Ni ra a dzA ku ru swAH/ rig pa'i rgyal po legs par grub byed kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+bata
77b1(rgyud 'bum): thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsarbA thA drA mA li badz+ra d+hA saH/ rig pa'i rgyal po rin chemang bu chur rtse gsum gyi sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba ta thAg de b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mraShe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba bA bo r+thad+d+ha ma tsan+ta badz+rahA/
77b2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa mchog gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ba la ke li kI la badz+ra ma ku Ta d+hA ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po ba la ke li ki la'i sngags so//
77b3(rgyud 'bum): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ra na ke li ki la rat+na ma ku Ta d+ha ra sA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rin chen ke li ki la'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
77b4(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA su rU pa mA la badz+ra badz+ra hi taM ka ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po gzugs legs kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra bai du gang badz+ra d+ha ra sA hA/
77b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje thogs pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA la li ta badz+ra pu ru Sha ma hA yak+Sha ru pa d+ha ra sa ra sa ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje
77b6(rgyud 'bum): / rol pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ga dza karna lo tsa na tsa tsa na lak+Sha sA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po glang po rna ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga
77b7(rgyud 'bum): teb+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tra Ta badz+ra kany+tsA hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA b+hi Sha Na badz+ra b+hi ma
78a1(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA Ni a dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hA ri di sar+b+ba dra med pa tiH
78a2(rgyud 'bum): ta ta ra ta ra sAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'phrog byed kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hA sa badz+ra d+ha ra su tA nu sar+b+ba ar+ha sar+b+bA u0f85hi ri sAhA/ rig pa'i r
78a3(rgyud 'bum): gyal po rdo rje bzhad pa'i sngags so/ / / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud bam po lnga pa// / de nas yang lag na rdo rje yan lag thams cad
78a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus bu snying nas skyes pa'i kha nas byung ba dag yid dang yan lag thams cad las byung ngo // de la lag
78a5(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis las ni gzhon nu lag bzangs so/ / kha nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje sde'o// rdo rje cod pan las ni gzhon nu rdo rje cod pan no// spyi gtsug nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje gtsug nas byung ngo // rdo rje
78a6(rgyud 'bum): me tog rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog go/ / rdo rje me tog thod las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog thod do// rdo rje'i brang las ni gzhon nu rdo rje phreng ngo // rdo rje'i snying las ni gzhon nu rdo rje sdug go/
78a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rdzo pral ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'o// rdo rje'i srin ma las ni gzhon du rdo rje sbyin ma'o// rdo rje'i rna ba las ni g.yon nu rdo rje 'chang ngo // rdo rje'i mig las ni gzhon nu 'jig rten zags sa
78b1(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / rdo rje'i snga las ni gzhon nu rdo rje shugs 'chang ngo // rdo rje'i mkhur chos las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i rten no// rdo rje'i ko sko las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gces pa 'dzin to// rdo rje'i so rnams las ni
78b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu rdo rje'i mche ba'o/ / rdo rje'i mgul ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i glu'o// rdo rje'i mtshan khung las ni gzhon du rdo rje me 'bar ba'i gzi brjid do// rgyab las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gnya' shing 'dzin to//
78b3(rgyud 'bum): de ltar de dag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i bu gzhon nu khro bo dag lag na rdo rje thogs pa/ sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ sring rje'i dkyil 'khor las yang dag par
78b4(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ lag na rdo rje'i smon lam gyis snying rangs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa rnams su byang chub mchog dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang
78b5(rgyud 'bum): gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skabs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / stong pa
78b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid chen pos lus rnam par bskyed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje'i snying du 'thad pa sha stag go// de nas gsang ba'i bdag
78b7(rgyud 'bum): po lag rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra se nod b+ha ba badz+ra pA Ni pri ya swAhA/ rdo rje sde'i sngags
79a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ba hUd d+hU ba badz+ra ba hU shu ra ga ma swAhA/ rdo rje lag bzang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA/
79a2(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi tsi tA badz+ra she kha ra badz+re shi kha ra baM lam bi ta ha ra swAhA/ rdo rje me tog thod kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA kaM riH
79a3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra d+ha ri bi shud+d+ha a~M ga ra swA hA/ rdo rje cod pan gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra mUr d+ha a gi ta hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ rdo rje gtsug nas byung ba'i sngam

79a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA badz+ra ba ra d+hA ri u ra badz+rod ta ma swAhA/ rdo rje zang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra hr-i dA ya badz+ra pA Ni pri ya satwa hi haM ka ra swAH

79a7(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra tsakra maN+Da la saM bu ta badz+ra hu ba swaH/ rdo rje smin ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra a ku d+ha ri shu tra d+ha ra d+ha ra nidza
79b1(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ rdo rje mchog 'chang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra lo tsan dz+nyAn tsak+Shu rbang swAhA/ rdo rje mig gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+hA
79b2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra be ga d+ha ri ma no dza ba d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ rdo rje shugs 'chang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ud d+ha ra badz+ra sa ma ya ma
79b3(rgyud 'bum): nu pa la ya swahA/ rdo rje'i rten gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+haHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra d+ha ra d+ha ra dz+wa li ta mUrti swA hA/ rdo rje gces pa 'dzin gyi sngags so//
79b4(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba tA thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra aM ku ra badz+ra ke tu sa ra sa ra swa hA/ rdo rje mche ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA saM bo d+hi badz+ra d+ha ra
79b5(rgyud 'bum): / pri ya badz+ra gI ti swAhA/ rdo rje glu'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dz+wa li ti badz+ra muNi badz+ra d+ha ra swA hA/ gzhon nu rdo rje 'bar ba'i sngags so// mam
79b6(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA te dza a ba laM ti bi ta murti d+ha ka swA hA/ gzhon nu gnya' shing 'dzin gyi sngags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin
79b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa lag na rdo rjes rdo rje las yang dag par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang bskur zhing gnod pa thams cad 'gog pa
80a1(rgyud 'bum): lus la srung ba chen po'i srad bu thogs pa/ rtag tu ma byed ces zer ba phyung ngo // na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA he badz+ra shU li ni badz+ra ma taM gi
80a2(rgyud 'bum): A nan+da mu kha badz+ra ti li dza yan taM ru ti mu kha ti sa pu ran+ti swA hA/ mA ma kI'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+hAHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pu bi mo badz+ra mA lI ni/ badz+ra ad
80a3(rgyud 'bum): b+hu te/ sany+tsa ya sa man+ta shI di sha ma badz+ra ran d+ha ne na/ g+hu d+hu g+hu d+hu/ dza hi dza hi mA bi lam+ba/ b+ha ga ba ti bA rA hI/ smA ra sma ra/ badz+ra saM gI ti sA hA/ rdo rje mtshams kyi
80a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ma hA man+da daR+sha ya badz+ri bi kra ma sA hA/ rdo rje lding khang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu kha b+h+yaH

80a7(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra pad+mo b+ha ba/ badz+ra A sa na badz+ra na dang swAhA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe
80b1(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA swAH/ badz+ra d+ha ra k+Sha swAhA/ rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba b+hA ba d+hi bi bo d+ha na badz+ra bam ba ma ba swAhA/ rdo rje byang chub kyi sngags/

80b3(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dz+nyA na badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje shes sbyin gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a mr-i ta badz+ra pa swA hA/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sngags
80b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pra brta ya badz+ra dz+nyA na sA ga ran ra swA hA/ rdo rje chos brjod kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra sa

81a1(rgyud 'bum): mA lin swAhA/ rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngags so// de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang
81a2(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa sems can
81a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'jig pa'i dus chen po'i tshe 'byung ba'i nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar ba/
81a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho'i gling chen po'i me sgron ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs za ba/ 'jigs pa'i me chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje snying po'i mchog 'di smras so// na maH
81a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA phaT hUM/ 'jigs pa'i me chen po'i snying po smras ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang
81a6(rgyud 'bum): rlung drag po chen pos bskyod pa bzhin du 'gul nas/ stan thams cad las kha sbub tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
81a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po sa bcu la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ / lag na rdo rje'i mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang /
81b1(rgyud 'bum): khor yug dang / khor yug chen po 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po thams cad bskams nas rnam par tshig ste thal bar gyur par mthong ngo // lag na rdo rje
81b2(rgyud 'bum): snying kha nas kyang khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig pa'i me chen po zhes bya 'byung nas/ gad mo rta pa gang chen po rgyas par 'byin cing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi snying rnams yongs su bsdus
81b3(rgyud 'bum): nas nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du gyur te/ lag na rdo rje'i snying gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs so// lag na rdo rje'ang snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin
81b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka' stsal pa/ sngags
81b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ni/ / snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di// bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing // theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la// gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste// dpa' bo
81b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po khyod kyis bshad/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'khor lo chen po rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyel bar rig nas cher snying rje skyes te/
81b7(rgyud 'bum): mig gnyis kyis ring du bltas nas rdo rje mchog gi snying po dam pa sbyin pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ spyod pa chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po la lta zhing
82a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rab dam pa rnam par rgyal ba thob pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di
82a2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad cig stsol cig dang / de bstan pa 'di la srog gi re ba thob cing dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces
82a3(rgyud 'bum): smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing // nam mkha' lta bur
82a4(rgyud 'bum): chags med la/ / kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa// gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang // de bzhin gsang sngags sgrub pa dang //
82a5(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs dang ni rtags dang gzugs// dus dang yul dang cho gshod// de'i tshe rdo rje de rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyi gzungs dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no//
82a6(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA e hi ma hA badz+ra ko TI ku Ti la pA pa ka aM ku la shi khe ka pi la ke shrI ta Ti ta Ti/ ko Ti ko Ti/ karka Ti mu Ti ma hA thin dud
82a7(rgyud 'bum): lo lo/ du ka du ka/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ sUr s+phur/ u do ti taM/ ha ri bing ga le tsa Ti bi tsaT/ dz+wa le bi dzA la
82b1(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra b+h+yon/ badz+ra sa raHSh+Tapra ha ra Ne/ ma ti b+hU ta/ rat+na tra ya/ ati ta le/ badz+ra lpa bI shwa sa ma/ a pra ti ha ta tha man ni sAH/ de nas 'jam dpal
82b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de la spras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mi 'pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed 'di dran par gyis shig dang / 'di khyed la phan pa dang / bde
82b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / srog thob par byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes rig pa chen po 'di smras ma thag tu/ de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rjes 'khor de byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa
82b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te/ skad cig de nyid la 'khor de langs nas kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byad
82b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lta zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma ye shes kye ma skyed/
82b6(rgyud 'bum): kye ma sngags shes bsam mi khyab// des ni bdag cag thams cad kyang // dgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan// sems zhi tshegs ni ma mchis par// sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur
82b7(rgyud 'bum): len 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// bdag cag thams cad mchis nas su// cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir// snying po dag ni dbul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
83a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang lag na rdo rjes dbang chen pa bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'di rang gi slong po 'a
83a2(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / nam/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po'i mchog lags te/ rig byed bzhi rab tu brjod pa/ rigs bzhi
83a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'jog pa/ dbyangs dang ldan pa'i bkod pa chen po 'god pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las rig byed rnams 'byung / sngags rnams dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i las rnams
83a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'o// lag na rdo rje smras pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje aM zhes bya ba ste// byams dang
83a5(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin las skyes/ / nga rgyal rnam par sbyangs pa legs// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//
83a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po rgyal srid thams cad la dbang sbyin par bgyid pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi d+ha rA ya
83a7(rgyud 'bum): zo lo mo ma~M/ bi hu'i rba swAH/ bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bdag lnga rnams kyi bdag po bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen
83b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir zhugs par gyur pa der bdag gi snying po sgrub par 'tshal na/ / des dang po lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar thang shing gi yam sreg shing mar dang sbrang rtsi
83b2(rgyud 'bum): dang lhan cig tu lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// shi 'phos nas kyang mtho ris su skyes par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas
83b3(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyis na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje la lta zhing zas mi 'tshal bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid 'thob ste/ dam tshig nyams pa ni ma gtogs te mi 'grub
83b4(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po mchis te/ des na bdag
83b5(rgyud 'bum): cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o/ / dngos grub stsal bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi'o// dug bsal bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
83b6(rgyud 'bum): mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA re re ra taM nA ga le li ri/ pud+d+ha / dzi he swAhA/ snying po 'di'i sgrub pa lags te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ mtsho chen por zhugs /
83b7(rgyud 'bum): lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas klu gang yang rung ba mngon du phyogs par mchis par mthong ngam/ mtsho 'khrugs kyang de la 'jigs par mi bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro//
84a1(rgyud 'bum): tha mar seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la bsnyugs pas lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis te de lta na'ang 'grub bo// de 'gro ba 'am mi 'gro ba'i dug rnams
84a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang bsams pa tsam gyis sel bar 'gyur/ sgrub pa po'i las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bsams pa tsam gyis bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos
84a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi bus/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ba mang po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi phun sum
84a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa'i rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA yak+Sha sha ra/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/
84a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i mi bai shra ba Na pri ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di sgrub pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung ngu gcig pu mchis te snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas
84a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la/ mtshan thog thag tu til nag po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg
84a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / zas mi 'tshal bar lkog tu dben par gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis te/ nyin zhag bdun du lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis na gnod
84b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mo stsal bar 'gyuraro/ / ma gcig gi bar duyin re zhing dran par bgyis na gter gcig stsol bar bgyi dang// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde pon chen po 'phrog gnas kyis
84b2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces spras so/ / bdag kyang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya
84b3(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA wi mi si ri s+saTi pe ri pU ra yan/ pra ti dz+nyA man+ti tA kre swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyi
84b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i slad bzhin du bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor mchis la yan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing yungs kar dang / zho dang /
84b5(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis ni gang 'tshal ba de stsol to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung gis/ byang chub sems
84b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
84b7(rgyud 'bum): mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi d+ha d+ha ri/ gan+d+ha ri ri si swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid pa de la dus ma lags par 'gum pa mi 'byung ngo //
85a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dpal gyis 'khor bar 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal ba des zla ba tshes nas bzung ste/ nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin me tog gi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin
85a2(rgyud 'bum): sreg bgyi'o/ / de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag 'bras kyi'o thug sbyin sreg bgyis na grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de stsol to// de
85a3(rgyud 'bum): nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang gis/ / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bsam pa thams cad yongs su
85a4(rgyud 'bum): bskang ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA shI d+hi d+ha ra ya bi rU pAk+Sha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
85a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//
85a6(rgyud 'bum): ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la/ mtshan thog thag gu gul shing gI yam
85a7(rgyud 'bum): sreg sbrang rtsi dang mar la bsnyugs pa khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal bde stsol to/ / ma grub na'ang yul gru bzang po lnga stsol to// de nas chu dbang rmugs byed 'dzin
85b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi don thams cad grub pa snying po mchog 'bul lo//
85b2(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ku ru tsu ru/ mu ru dzam+b+ha dza lod+b+ha ba sAn+ta/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis pa
85b3(rgyud 'bum): de la ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rgyal srid dam gter chen po stsol to//
85b4(rgyud 'bum): gi'u wang la lan cig bsngags te mig la bskus na gang bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo gdong la bsngags te bsams nas nyal na ci bsams pa de rmi lam du mthong ngo // gos 'ad
85b5(rgyud 'bum): name tog kha dog ci 'dra ba chur bor ba de 'dra ba'i gos dag rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / phyugs chung 'dod na zhag bdun gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan la bsngags lar cig btab pa'i me tog phog par
85b6(rgyud 'bum): bor na rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal che bar 'gyur ro// de nas lag brgyad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
85b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
86a1(rgyud 'bum): mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsakra dA dA bA hu rA dza swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di sgrub par bgyid pa des bsrung ba bgyis la skyed mos tshal gyi phyag
86a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsang mar shing mya ngan 'tshang gi 'og tu lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar gzhon nu la ci 'byor pas mchod de mtshan thog thag a ka ru'i bdug pa bsregs la bzlas brjod bgyis
86a3(rgyud 'bum): na nam phyed dam nang par de la bdag bstan par bgyi'o/ / dam pa gang 'tshal ba stsol te/ zan mi za bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nyid du gnod sbyin mo mchi'o// gang 'tshal ba
86a4(rgyud 'bum): de stsol to/ / ci ste mi mchi na 'gum par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen gyis btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//
86a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang sgrub pa po gsang sngags sgrub pa la brtson pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / spa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo//
86a6(rgyud 'bum): namaHsar+b+ba da thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pany+tsa la pany+tsa mu kha pany+tsi ka hrI hAMHrak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
86a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dam tshig thob ste/ gsang sngags sgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po 'di lan cig brjod par bgyi'o// de la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang
86b1(rgyud 'bum): sbaska ba bgyi ba'i slang lnga brgya'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o/ / bdag mchi ba'i snga lhas ni sgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngang 'bab par 'gyur/
86b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ 'gegs thams cad ma mchis par tshogs chung ngus des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste bdag gi snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshal sa
86b3(rgyud 'bum): des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag ste du ba 'phrul lam 'bar gyi bar du
86b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis la/ de 'thungs na gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ci ste ma grub na'ang skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur
86b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsams nas lan
86b6(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na grub par 'gyur te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas thag bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
86b7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba su
87a1(rgyud 'bum): She b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ba tru gi ni bod de mA li ni dza ti mi hU swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang chen drag po dam pa 'di sgrub par brgyad
87a2(rgyud 'bum): pa des/ dpal gyi sgo mo'i sgor mchis la snying po 'di lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe'i 'bru bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin
87a3(rgyud 'bum): sreg bgyis na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan pa ma mchis shing 'khrul 'khor ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bdag cag gis rim gro cher bgyis te rigs kyi bu de gzhug
87a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / yo byad thams cad kyang stsol bar bgyi'o// dngul chu dang sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas sna tshogs 'phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i
87a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam/
87a6(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA mad ta ma tang gi swab+hA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// 'di bdag cag dri za'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o//
87a7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo // mdor na bgyi ba bgyid pa thams cad nus so// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad na mchis so// ci ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal
87b1(rgyud 'bum): na/ des thog mar ri phrug tu ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la snying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod 'gyis na de nas grub par 'gyur ro// tha mar du ru ka'i 'bru mar gyi mar me dus la/ a
87b2(rgyud 'bum): ka ru'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin bsreg bgyis na/ de nas de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// gi'u wang la sngags kyis btab te dpral bar thig le bgyis na skye bo thams cad
87b3(rgyud 'bum): dka' bar 'gyur ro/ / lag mthil la sngags kyis btab ste gdong la bya bas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
87b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba/
87b5(rgyud 'bum): tA thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ti ti li drA swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o//
87b6(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchi'o// lha dang
87b7(rgyud 'bum): klu'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis kyang bkur ro/ / snying po 'dis ci la'ang mi brjed do// ci ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal na/ des gcig pur dgon par slong mo'i zas 'tshal
88a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba'i sna lnga dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor bskus la ci 'byor pas mchod
88a2(rgyud 'bum): de/ gur kum gyi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas grub par 'gyur te/ mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing gang 'dod pa de bgyid do// de nas rnam par
88a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi bu la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor
88a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA raM kA ri bi Sha ri bi She Sha ni kr-in+ta ni ku mA ri ke ha sA hA/ phu phu swA hA/ bdag cag gi snying
88a5(rgyud 'bum): po 'dis klu thams cad rang gi dam tshig la dgod par bgyi'o/ / snying po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis klu thams cad bdag gi phyag brnyan du 'gyur te/ 'jig shing zhum pa dang / sngang
88a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / re ba chad par 'gyur/ dug ma mchis shing phyogs phyogs su 'bros par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ci ste rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig snying po 'di grub
88a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshal na/ des mtsho chen por zhugs la mid pa tsam nub par 'greng ste snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas mtsho de nyid nyin gcig bzhin skam mo// klu'i gnas
88b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / rang gi gzugs kyang ston to// bgegs gzhan brgya dag kyang bgyid de/ de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o// de nas mtshan ma de dag byung nas tha mar ba lang /
88b2(rgyud 'bum): gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba de nyid kyis rgya mtsho ngos su dkyil 'khor bskus la/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ dug dang nye ba'i dug thams cad las klu'i rgyal
88b3(rgyud 'bum): po brgyad bgyis la/ de nas ske tsho'i 'bru re re nas khrag gis bslus te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas klu thams cad lpags nas dam pa long zhig ces mchi na sdug par mi bgyi'o// 'di
88b4(rgyud 'bum): spyad du phyag brnyan dag tu gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas 'jigs su rung ba la
88b5(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying
88b6(rgyud 'bum): po 'bul mo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA kAM kA ri Ni luSh+Te ni sahA/ bdag gi snying po 'dis mi thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs 'phrog par bgyi'o//
88b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mdor na chu ba dang mi ts+tsha ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po dag ni ci'ang dkon pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la
89a1(rgyud 'bum): la zhig 'di sgrub par 'tshal na/ des dur khrod du du ba 'thul bar zas su sha 'tshal zhing gos sngon po bgos la lag tu ral gri thogs te/ snying po 'di lan
89a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o// ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la nam byed kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas srin po'i
89a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la 'jigs pa mi bya bar mchod yon stsal la bdag la 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi dngos grub byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des
89a4(rgyud 'bum): ral gri de blangs nas stsol bar 'gyur te/ de nas lha'i 'gro ba can du 'gyur/ ngo mtshar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po mes/ byang chub
89a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang sgrub pa po rnams la sman pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo//
89a6(rgyud 'bum): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka pi la dz+yo ti ni ra Na pi ga la lo tsa na swAhA/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags te/
89a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bdag kyang bkug ste dbang du mche'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// nor sul bar 'gyi'o// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis ma nor 'dra bar 'gyur ro// snying po 'das
89b1(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba'i sbyin sreg bgyis na bza' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mdor na rdzas gang sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i rdzas de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la
89b2(rgyud 'bum): slong mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod 'gyi'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de me thab bgyis la rgya shug gi yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
89b3(rgyud 'bum): mar la bstsags la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te dga' mgur las rnams byed do// de nas sprin gyi 'phreng ba can la sogs pa rlung lha rnams kyis
89b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' lag ni rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi
89b5(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'bul lo/ / sgrub pa po dngos grub grub par 'tshal ba rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// na maHsar+b+bad thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
89b6(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA b+ha ma ra b+ha ma re/ tsa pa li tsa pa li ka/ he ram+bi ni swAhA/ 'di bdag cag gi snying po mchog lags te/ 'dis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin bgyi'o//
89b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung dang mi 'gal bar bgyid do// phan pa dang bde ba sgrub par bgyi'o// byang chub
90a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des thog mar snying po 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas bdag cag gis de'i bgyi ba thams
90a2(rgyud 'bum): cad gnang bar bgyi'o/ / ci ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal na des zas mi bza' bar lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba lang gi lci ba sa la//
90a3(rgyud 'bum): ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor lnga bgyi'o// kha dog sna tshogs kyi ba dan bdun gzhag go// de nas ba dan 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas grub par 'gyur te/ bskyed
90a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang dgag pa la sogs pa las rnams dga' mgur bgyid do/ / de nas skar ma'i rgyal po zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
90a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po gdul ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dpal yang dag par 'jog par bgyid pa 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA
90a6(rgyud 'bum): gte b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsan+d+ra kAn+ti bi shud d+ha haM ga swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi gdung
90a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na bkra mi shis pa rnams sel to// dpal bskyed do// rtag tu skal ba bzang po stsol to//
90b1(rgyud 'bum): ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des zas su 'o ma btung zhing pad+ma'i rdzing du zhugs la snying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar zla ba nya la shel lam mar gsar las zla ba bgyis la
90b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i phrag tu stsal te/ mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma shar ka'i tshe 'od zer 'byung ste/ byung nas kyang sgrub pa po'i khar 'jug go/
90b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor 'khor nas kun nas 'khod par gyur te 'dug go// de nas grub par 'gyur te gdung ba ma mchis pa dang nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ bdag
90b4(rgyud 'bum): gi gzhal med khang du bskal par gnas shing lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gnas par 'gyur ro/ / dpal yang mchis par 'gyur te/ rgyal srid la sogs pa gang 'dod pa stsol to//
90b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po gzi brjid dang stobs
90b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad pa zhes bya ba mchis te/ sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / nad med pa bgyi ba'i slad du de dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo//
90b7(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA sid d+hi bi d+yod na swahA/ bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa po gang la las snying po bzlas brjod bgyis na de la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
91a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na gzi brjid can du 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des 'bab chu'i 'gram gyi bye ma la mar me kha lnga bus la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas//
91a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyi'o// de nas mer sbyin sreg bgyis la nyi ma nub kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas nyi ma gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la mchod yon la sogs pa stsal
91a3(rgyud 'bum): la gang 'dod pa de bslangs la/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mchi bar 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de bgyid do// gzhal med khang gang yang rung bar mchis so// de nas klu'i rgyal
91a4(rgyud 'bum): po chu lha klu'i rgyal po du ma dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor 'dir rang gi snying po 'bulo//
91a5(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a pa ma pa ti bi ra dza swA hA/ gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis
91a6(rgyud 'bum): na/ de rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// spyod pa gtsang ma thams cad la blo mngon sum du 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na rgya mtsho chen por med pa nub tsam du zhugs la
91a7(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas tha mar rin po che sna bzhi las klu bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ klu'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gnas kyi bar
91b1(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas brjod bgyis la mchod yon stsam te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de phan chad grang bsgo bde bgyid do// de nyid du zhugs nas lo mang por gnas
91b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas khyab 'jug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor
91b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA e ka e ka/ ba ra ba ra/ dz+wa la dzA la/ biSh+Ta be swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying
91b4(rgyud 'bum): po ni 'di lags te/ 'dis snang ba thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// phung bar bgyi'o// yams kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par
91b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyid na de'i blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ / ci ste snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa dang ba'i
91b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam lnga bsres pas khyab 'jug gi gzugs lag pa bzhi pa bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon pa gcig na 'khor lo// g.yas pa gcig na dbyig to// g.yon pa gcig na dung //
91b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa gcig na dam pa sbyin pa bgyis la/ ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod la/ kha nub phyogs su bltas te mchis la/ khyab 'jug
92a1(rgyud 'bum): gi gzugs 'gul ba 'am/ dung sgra 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ dgos pa gang bsam pa de thams cad bgyid do// de nas yi dgas
92a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po drag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchis te/ des na bdag las drag po/
92a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa'i slad du sems can thams cad kyis drag po zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bdag rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum ma rungs par
92a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyid do/ / dbang du bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hUM phaT/ bcom
92a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad pa'i nor lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin
92a6(rgyud 'bum): du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ / yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig bka' bzhin bgyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des dur khrod du lus
92a7(rgyud 'bum): thal ba'i byugs la/ mi mgo 'am thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan thogs shing lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs te khri'i zur shing khyer la/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs 'tshal cing slong mo'i
92b1(rgyud 'bum): zas bab bab tu 'tshal la/ snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas du ba 'thul ba'i dur khrod du ba lang gi lci ba sa lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis te mdung rtse gsu/
92b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang khri'i zur shing gzhag la/ ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis nas sha chen gyi bdug pa sreg cing mtshan thog thag brjod pa bgyis na/ drag po nyid yi dgas mang pos bskor nas
92b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs 'jigs lha chen po'i gzugs can du mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la mi 'jigs par bgyi zhing mchod yon stsal lo// de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad
92b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang bgyid do/ / de'i slad bzhin du bka' bzhin sdod pa lhur len to// de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di
92b5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bon+de te dat+ta b+hU ta a
92b6(rgyud 'bum): d+hid+he pA ti swAH/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'od rtag tu dran par
92b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na/ bdag rtag tu de'i srang bzhin 'brang bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des skyed mos tshal dben pa'i gnas su
93a1(rgyud 'bum): zas nub mo 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyis te tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg cing / gtor ma rgya chen
93a2(rgyud 'bum): po'ang phul/ mar gyi mar me brgyad kyang phul la/ nyi ma nub pa nas brtsams te nam phyed kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o// de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad kyang sgrub
93a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ sman bcud kyis len kyang stsol to// de nas lha mo dka' thub bzlog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
93a4(rgyud 'bum): / ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA u ma ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni skal ba
93a5(rgyud 'bum): / bzang po thams cad bgyid pa ste/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ lig bu mig gam/ gi'u wang la sngags lan cig btab ste bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na skal
93a6(rgyud 'bum): pa bzang por 'gyur ro/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des dbang ldan gyi snying po lnga cho ga rgyas pa nyis 'gyur du sbyar te bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas gza' chen po smin drug gi bus/ byang chub sems dpa'
93a7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir yid rab tu dga' zhing rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
93b1(rgyud 'bum): thA he ku mA ra dz+wa li ta murti tsa ru tsi tra ma pa ra swA hA/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad kun tu skrag par bgyid ste/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
93b2(rgyud 'bum): glags tshol ba'i gdon thams cad kyis glags mi thod do// rma bya'i mjug ma la sngags kyis btab ste/ gdon gyis btab pa la byab pa bgyi zhing / de'i bdug pa'ang bsregs na sos
93b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des thog mar byis pa khye'u brgyad bkur sti cher bgyis te 'tshal ma stsal la/ de dag zas gang la sred pa stsal lo// de nas ma mo'i khyim du
93b4(rgyud 'bum): lag na mdung thung thogs la gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar ma mo'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du mchod pa ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis te
93b5(rgyud 'bum): bab chu'i 'gram gnyis kyi 'jim pa las gzugs brnyan bgyis la/ snying khar mdung thung btsugs te/ ji srid shi'o zhe 'am rgyab chag go zhes sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na grub par
93b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas lha'i bu smin dkar sprin gyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
93b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA gu lu gu lu/ gardza brdza/
94a1(rgyud 'bum): ma hA spud b+ha ba/ pa ra bin du tud mA la/ da ra da ra/ pu ra pu ra/ ka sa ka sa swA hA/ bdag cag gi snying po 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad la sman par bgyid pa ste/ 'dis ni bdag
94a2(rgyud 'bum): cag rgya che zhing sdug pa'i sprin gyi dra bas nam mkha'i dkyil khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas lo tog thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/ / sa chen po 'di'ang char pa'i rgyun chen pos tshim par
94a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de la chus 'phongs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
94a4(rgyud 'bum): lus la nad thams cad kyang mi mchi'o// de'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par mchi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des byams pa pa dang ldan pas zla ba drug tu zla ba shar ba
94a5(rgyud 'bum): nas brtsams te/ zla ba shar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zla ba drug tshang nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis te/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu blangs la bum pa zhabs nag po med
94a6(rgyud 'bum): pa bkang ste/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mchod la/ nam chu las dbu ba byung zhing gyen du 'thor ba dang / sgra 'bug 'bug gam/ 'brug gi sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod
94a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na/ lha'i bu char sprin gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas chu bar snang la 'thor ro// de nas grub par 'gyur te 'dod pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad bgyid do// de nas glog sprin 'jom
94b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / glog gzi brjid dang / glog 'od snang dang / glog 'phreng bzang zhes bya ba rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces
94b2(rgyud 'bum): spras so/ / bcom ldan 'das gnod pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
94b3(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA d+hA ra ya d+ha ra ya/ s+phu ra sar+b+ba ma hA pr-i ti ka ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na de la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang
94b4(rgyud 'bum): sba bar bgyi'o/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des phyogs bzhir sgron me bus shing / phyogs bzhir bdug pas bdugs la/ ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis te/ phyogs bzhir kha dog ji lta
94b5(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhin du bum pa bzhi bzhag la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas phyogs bzhir glog byung ba la 'jigs par mi bgyid par thams cad la mchod yon stsal na grub par 'gyur
94b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gnas su khrid nas srung bar bgyid/ yid kyis bsam pa rnams sgrub par bgyid do// gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de stsol to// de nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa ri'i rgyal po chen po
94b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
95a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
95a2(rgyud 'bum): thA/ tsa la tsa la/ ma hI d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di gang zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na nye dgon par mchis pa'i tshe/ bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang /
95a3(rgyud 'bum): bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang bgyi'o// des ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa
95a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas bdag cag ri'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis te 'di skad ces
95a5(rgyud 'bum): smras so/ / bu tshur shog nga'i gnas su 'dod / ci 'dod pa de sbyin no zhes smra'o// des kyang nam bdag dgos te dran pa'i tshe tshur shog cig ces smras na/ de bzhin du gyur cig/ thams cad
95a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi yis/ khyod su la'ang slong zhig ces smra'o// de nas gshin rje dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / be con nag po can dang / skyes bu nag po dang / rna nag mo dang / dpal byed ma rnams
95a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba tra
95b1(rgyud 'bum): thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bai ba sa twa ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag gi de gsang dgug gi spang du rang gi g.yog 'khor
95b2(rgyud 'bum): mi dgye bar bgyid do/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des zla ba mar ngo'i zhag bcu bzhi 'am zhag brgyad la bsrung ba bgyis te/ 'bras sA lu btags pa las/ gshin rje sor brgyad dam sor drug
95b3(rgyud 'bum): nas 'khor dang bcas pa bgyis la/ ma he dang be con yang ngos gnyis su gzhag ste/ de nas ci 'byor pa'i marjod pa bgyis nas mtshan thog thag gsang sngags brjod na/ nam phyed dang nyi ma shar na ma he sgra
95b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byin pa 'am be con 'gul te/ mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la bri bar bgyi'o// de nas grub par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i las rnams bgyid do// de nas mtshan mo nag mos rang gi snying po

100b3(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA kre ka ri ko ta re pi ti ke/
