100b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong ngam/ dur khrod chen por gcig pu bong bu la zhon zhing bslangs pa ma lags pa'i kha zas 'tshal na/ lag na thi thogs
100b7(rgyud 'bum): shing ce spyang gi pags pa 'am/ byi la'i pags pa'i sham thams bgos la snying po lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mnya sha la sogs pa ci 'byor pas mchod la/ ba lang gi
101a1(rgyud 'bum): lci ba'i bdug pa sreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ phyogs phyogs su bya b+he rud+d+hA ka phyogs bzhir sgra 'byin pa 'am/ bong bu kha nas me lce 'bar ba/
101a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bkyi zhing 'jigs pa mi bgyi bar leg par 'ongs so// zhes brjod la mchod yon stsal to// legs so zhes brjod nas mi spang bar 'gyur ro// de nas grub par 'gyur te/
101a3(rgyud 'bum): gang 'tshal bde bgyid do// bong bu la zhon zhing gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i rgyal po brtsegs pa la sogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems
101a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i

101a6(rgyud 'bum): gi li gi li/ b+hU te shwa ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag des bsgrib bzhin bgyi'o// bye brag tu ni zas kyi phud srul na don thams
101a7(rgyud 'bum): cad bslab par bgyi'o/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des shing ba ti'i drung du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o// tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg cing kha zas mi bza' bar 'byung po'i rgyal
101b1(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad lhags nas gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa sgrol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yang na rang gi khyim du khrid nas dngos po thams cad kyis 'gron bgyid do// gang
101b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal ba de stsol to/ / las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang bgyid do// de nas ba lang skyong la sogs pa sha za thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal
101b3(rgyud 'bum): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba tra thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA mi tsi mi tsi/
101b4(rgyud 'bum): khi si khi si swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag cag de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad la gnang ba stsal bar
101b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong du snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de gzegs ma'i sreg blugs sam/ rgya skyegs kyi sreg
101b6(rgyud 'bum): blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na sha za gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas dam pas 'gron bgyid do/ / gang 'tshal bde bslang bar bgyi ste 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang 'tshal ba de bgyi'o//
101b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas gnon po 'gul po la sogs pa gnon po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po
102a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA gu ru gu ru swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par
102a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na/ de la 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // de nas rnam par 'byam la sogs pa grib gdon rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//
102a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul le// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA gi ni dzA miny+dzi swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig
102a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de la grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // de nas nya mid la sogs pa mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
102a5(rgyud 'bum): rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA gaM li
102a6(rgyud 'bum): kI li swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag cag de'i mdangs 'phrog par mi bgyi'o// de nas bzhin ngan la sogs pa yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cang
102a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
102b1(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA b+hi mi ri b+hI mi ri/ dung la b+he swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag cag de'i dgos pa thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid do// de nas
102b2(rgyud 'bum): legs rgyal la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir
102b3(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi stobs thams cad pa zhes bgyi ba'i snying po 'bul lo/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA taM gi ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu
102b4(rgyud 'bum): dran par bgyid na/ bdag cag de'i gan du mi mchi bar bsrung ba bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar gtsang mar bgyis shing gos gtsang ma bgos la skyed mos tshal lam/
102b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gnas su glu len par bgyid cing rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dag gis yid dga' bar snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas de nyid du yo byad thams cad kyis
102b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya cher mchod la/ spos thams cad las 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs bgyis te/ mar gyi mar me brgyad bus la glu Sha Ta ba 'am/ mad d+ha ma'i dbyangs kyis mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod bgyis
102b7(rgyud 'bum): na/ nam phyed na dga' ma 'am sdug ma dang lhan cig tu mchis shing / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rjes su rgyu ba nyid kyang rung ste dam pa stsol to//
103a1(rgyud 'bum): cis ma grub na song dang pa brgyang tshul to// bskal ba bzang po mchog dang ldan 'ang 'dod pa'i lha gnas pa dang 'dra bar stsal rgyu bar 'gyur ro// denas rgyal ma ma mogs
103a2(rgyud 'bum): bsrang mo rten za zan phyogs pazhi nas 'ongs te 'dug nas de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor rjem
103a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ / de nas rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsa ye tsa yod b+ha be swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdas
103a4(rgyud 'bum): gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i srad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// bu mang por bgyi'o// skal ba bzang po stsal bar
103a5(rgyud 'bum): / / ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu'i klung du zhugs kyang rung / ro'i rtse mor mchis kyang / sring po 'di la 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha par gcig pus
103a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gtsang ma dben par ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ ba ser mo'i mar gyi mar me bus te nam gyi gung la yungs kar gyis spyir sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur
103a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / 'dod dgung 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang / dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras
103b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dza yod ta re dza ya bi dza ya ni nan+da ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag
103b2(rgyud 'bum): de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ / tshe ring ba dang / nad med pa dang / phun sum tshogs par stsal bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des yang snga ma bzhin
103b3(rgyud 'bum): lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// ma grub na'ang skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// nor chen po dang ldan pa dang lan smra
103b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas mi 'pham mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA an+te a dzi te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag
103b5(rgyud 'bum): gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag de'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rtag tu srang bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin
103b6(rgyud 'bum): du snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de mtshan thog thag tu gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing // til nag pos nam gyi gung la sbyin sreg bgyis
103b7(rgyud 'bum): nade nas 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/ / de nas gzhan gyis mi thub mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM nardza be a
104a1(rgyud 'bum): ku ti le a ba rA dzI te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag de bsrung ba'i slad du rtag tu spang bzhin 'azung bar
104a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / gzung ba'i tshig dang / skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma
104a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de klu shing gi me tog mar dang bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na de dag grub par
104a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ tshig tsam gyis las bgyid de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de nas tum bu ras/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
104a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'ang bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ /
104a6(rgyud 'bum): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM he dzaM b+he oM he mo he swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni gdong bzhi pa phyogs bzhi nas byung ba/ skye dgu
104a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ 'byor pa/ byin pa/ sdud par bgyid pa ste/ 'bru dang bsangs dang bkra shis dang // dpal dang rnam par 'byor pa 'phel// ngo mtshar mang po rnams dang ldan/
104b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bcud kyis len gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dus thams cad du yid la bgyid na/ bdag 'khor dang bcas te de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o//
104b2(rgyud 'bum): ci sde sgrub par 'tshal na des 'greng yang rung / 'jug kyang rung nyul yang rung / lam du 'gro'ang rung te/ bdag la rnam par dgod pa bgyis pa bzhin du skyes bu bcing
104b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / gdong bzhi pa rnam par bkod la phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba nya'i bar du bgyi'o// ci 'byor pas mchod de 'bras sA lu
104b4(rgyud 'bum): btags pa las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ze ba dang bcas par bgyis la/ snying po oM zhes bgyis pa dang / dza zhes bgyi ba shar phyogs su dgod do// b+ha zhes bgyi ba nub phyogs su
104b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag go/ ma zhes bgyi ba byang phyogs su gzhag go// ha zhes bgyi ba lce phyogs su gzhag la// dngos grub 'tshal bas rtswa ku sha la sbam pa'i steng du mchis te/ rub gcig
104b6(rgyud 'bum): lan tshwa'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na nang par dngos grub ci 'tshal ba'i 'bras bu stsol to/ / bzlas brjod bgyis na yi ge go rims bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de nas
104b7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rjes ngo'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bltas nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag 'di ltar khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po rnams
105a1(rgyud 'bum): smras shing phul pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba ni grogs po dag legs so legs so// snying po 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis drangs pa ste/ de bas na 'di dag ni
105a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis zin pas dngos grub sbyir bar 'gyur ro/ / gang la la zhig bstan pa 'di las 'das na snying po mchog gi rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu mched cing 'bar bas de'i mgo 'bems par 'gyur gyi/
105a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du ma yin te/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin tu smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
105a4(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pas de'i tshe rdo rje ye shes chen po'i 'od 'phro 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas/ lag pas lag na rdo rje las rdo rje blangs te/ ye shes las byung ba'i
105a5(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal dri ma med par byas nas/ ye shes chen po las byung ba'i ut+pa la de la rdo rje gzhag go/ rdo rje chen po de bzhag ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
105a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du kye ma 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// de'i tshe 'jam dpal
105a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhon dur gyur pa'i snying kha nas mchog tu gsang ba'i ring po byung ngo / / na maH/ sa~Mr+b+ba ta thA ga teSh+ThaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA many+dzu badza dza ya ra ti ta bi las sU kr-i ra na ku mA ra swA hA
105b1(rgyud 'bum): r do rje'i snying po'i hUM zhes bya ba mchog dang ldan pa byung ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas
105b2(rgyud 'bum): papa brkyang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje chen po legs so legs so// stobs chen rdo rje dam pa sbyin// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur
105b3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ dngos grub sgrub pa rgya cher ni// bstan pa 'di la bshad par gyis// de skad gsungs nas rdzu 'phrul che// sangs rgyas de dag der bzhugs bzhin// 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i spyi
105b4(rgyud 'bum): bopo nas/ / phyag rnams de dag slar bkug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnang bas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba smras pa/
105b5(rgyud 'bum): thog ma nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du snying po gang yang rung ba rgya cher brjed de/ slob dpon mgu bar
105b6(rgyud 'bum): byas la gsol ba gdab ste/ slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag la gsang sngags stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// slob dpon la de skad
105b7(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol ba btab nas/ thal mo sbyar te pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs la/ lag pa stong pa ma yin pas sngags gang 'dod pa mnod par bya ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi
106a1(rgyud 'bum): bar du'o zhes tshig brjod par bya'o/ / gzhan du sngags bdag gis blangs na ni grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa snying po 'di dag gi spyi'i
106a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub sgrub pa 'di yin te/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ khang stong ngam/ dur khrod dam/ phug gam/ chu klung ngam/ dben pa gang yang rung ba des gnas la slong mo'i zas
106a3(rgyud 'bum): za'ang rung / slongs pa ma yin pa'i zas za'ang rung / gtsang mar byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la/ dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos lan gsum brjes te/ snying po gang yang rung zhig lan
106a4(rgyud 'bum): sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas ldong ros sam/ lig bu mig gam/ gi'u wang ngam/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus kyang rung / ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng du bzhag kyang rung ste/
106a5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas nas bzung ste nya'i bar du gzhag go// bdag gis lha dang bdag gi gzugs tha mi dad par byas la mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// de la mtshan ma 'di yin te/
106a6(rgyud 'bum): sngon ma byung ba'i chos thob par 'gyur ba dang / snang ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa myong ba snyam
106a7(rgyud 'bum): du shes pa dang / bdag nyid la yid ches par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ rdzas de lag pa'i snyim par bcug la mtshan
106b1(rgyud 'bum): thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar rdzas de 'bar ba 'am/ du ba 'phrul pa 'am/ dro bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba ni lus la bskus na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/
106b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma shar ba lta bu mdog can dang / bskal par gnas pa dang / thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad du rgyu ba dang / 'dod na mchi bar 'gyur ro//
106b3(rgyud 'bum): du ba 'phrul na sum ris byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// ma grub na las su rung ba dang / blon po chen po'i srid thob par 'gyur ro//
106b4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gcig sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed cing snying po gang yang rung ba zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la lta zhing mtshan
106b5(rgyud 'bum): thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de'i gzugs de grub par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang yang rung ba'i mdun du bsgrubs na'ang de bzhin du 'grub ste gang 'dod pa de byed do//
106b6(rgyud 'bum): sngar spyad pa ma byas kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la dbus kyi yul du ni 'khor lo sgyur ba bcom ldan 'das drag po chen po 'grub bo// lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni lag na rdo rje drag po
106b7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub bo/ / 'gro lding ba'i yul du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'gro lding 'grub bo// byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo 'grub bo// shar phyogs kyi yul du ni dam pa
107a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'grub bo/ / skyed mos tshal chen por ni gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang gnod sbyin mo rnams 'grub bo// khang stong du ni sha za dang sha za mo rnams 'grub bo// dur khrod du/
107a2(rgyud 'bum): ni ma mo rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / srin po dang / srin mo la sogs pa 'grub bo// ri rnams su ni rig sngags 'chang rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams 'grub bo// dgon pa chen po
107a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams su ni dri za rnams 'grub bo/ / 'bab chu rnams su ni klu rnams 'grub bo// khang pa chen po dang shing pa ta'i drung dag tu ni 'byung po rnams 'grub bo// byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni gnod sbyin chen
107a4(rgyud 'bum): po dang na da ku be ra 'grub bo/ / rgya mtsho chen por ni sring mo bzhi dag 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang grong khyer chen po rnams su ni rig sngags kyi rgyal me sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can 'grung po//
107a5(rgyud 'bum): chu dus su ni tshangs pa 'grub po// dur khrod du wa dang bcas par ni drag po 'grub bo// skyes bu chen po'i gnas su ni khyab 'jug 'grub bo// byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni nyi ma 'grub bo// gang
107a6(rgyud 'bum): ril ni zla ba 'grub bo/ / lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni smin drug gi bu 'grub bo// ri sul dag tu ni lha ma yin rnams 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu dag rgya mtsho chen po rnams su ni lto 'phye chen po rnams 'grub
107a7(rgyud 'bum): tho/ / yul ma gad+ha ni drang srong chen po rnams 'grub bo// mya ngam dag tu ni yi dgas rnams 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ri rnams su ni rin po che dag 'grub bo// 'bab chu rnams
107b1(rgyud 'bum): su bab pa 'bab chu chen po dag 'grub bo/ / yul ka li kar ni 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan 'grub bo// stor khung rnams su ni gnon po dag 'grub bo// khyim gyi bar rnams su ni grib gnon
107b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'grub bo/ / rten dang gnas rnams su ni brjed byed kyi gdon rnams 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu bdag gzhan yang yul lang ka dang rim la ya'i steng du ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub
107b3(rgyud 'bum): bo/ / gzhan yang srin po chen po rnams ni yul lang ka dang ri ma la yar 'grub bo// gzhan yang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen por 'grub bo// gangs khrod du ni dbyar
107b4(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams 'grub bo/ / gzhan yang ri rtse brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni klu bdud 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
107b5(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung ste/ dus kyi dbang gis gsang sngags 'grub pa gdags par mdzad cing rnam par gzhag par mdzad do// de nas byang
107b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dus zhes bya ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dgas
107b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi zu dus zhes bya ba 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshig tha/
108a1(rgyud 'bum): dgas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de srid du gsang sngags
108a2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par khong du chud par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po na 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po yod de/ nor bu rin po
108a3(rgyud 'bum): che chen po rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de srid du chu skam par mi 'gyur te/ nor bu rin po che chen po mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho chen po de'ang skam la gnas pa dang chu la gnas
108a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kha cig tu ni btung bas/ kha cig tu ni gnas kyis/ kha cig tu ni rin po che rnam par 'gyed pa nas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi bar
108a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing / nam yang nye bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po de med par gyur na chu med pa dang / dngos po thams cad med pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen
108a6(rgyud 'bum): po'ang srog chags thams cad kyi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
108a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang nye bar bzung nas dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dngos grub de'ang nye bar 'a
108b1(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros ltos ji tsam du shing yod pa de tsam du me 'bar te/ shing med na me mi 'bar ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags
108b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par khong du chud par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni dus yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag
108b3(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas 'byung bar brtson par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags spyad pa
108b4(rgyud 'bum): la mkhas par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la gsang sngags spyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / spro ba dang / yi dam la brtan par gsang sngags kyi gzhi re re
108b5(rgyud 'bum): nas spyad par bya'o/ / ji tsam du 'gro'ang rung / 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung ste/ de sems rtse gcig kho nas 'jug ste gnyis su ni ma yin no// gcig pu gnyis su med
108b6(rgyud 'bum): par dben par nyams dga' ba 'du 'dzi med pa rang gi yul na gnas shing sngar spyad par bya'o/ / de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te nya'i bar du bya'o// de nas ral gri 'am/ 'khor
108b7(rgyud 'bum): lo 'am/ lig bu mig gam/ gi'u wang la sogs pa gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba ba gcin dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor byugs la sgrub pa'i dkyil
109a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / 'khor lo sgrub na 'khor lo rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// ci ste ral gri sgrub na des rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// ci sde lig bu mig dang
109a2(rgyud 'bum): gi'u wang la sogs pa sgrub na mdung rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / ci 'byor pas mchod la dmar thag chad nas nyi ma shar gyi bar du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
109a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas pas bsrung ba byas pa dang / byams pa'i sems kyis rdzas de blangs te mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dang nyi ma 'char
109a4(rgyud 'bum): kar rdzas des nges par 'bar zhing 'gyur ro/ / 'bar na yan lag bkra la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad 'ong zhing / de dag gis bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas rig
109a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur te 'dod na 'chi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang / sems can thams cad
109a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i yid du 'gyur ro/ / gi'u wang la sogs pa de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// 'bar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su
109a7(rgyud 'bum): spyad pa'i spyod pa dang / bskal par gnas shing rgyu ba dang / 'dod dgur thags thogs med par 'gro bar 'gyur te/ shi 'phos nas kyang rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro//
109b1(rgyud 'bum): du ba 'thul na mi snang ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang / 'dod pa bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyu ba dang / longs spyod kyi drug cha 'phrog par 'gyur te/ shi 'phos nas kyang dga'
109b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan gyi lnga'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad shes par 'gyur te/ shi 'phos nas kyang 'dzam
109b3(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gling 'di nyid du gnod sbyin po brang 'khor lcang lo can du skye bar 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin gzhon nu'i lus 'thob bo// ci ste ma grub na'ang nges par yul thob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam
109b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la yang 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
109b5(rgyud 'bum): rjerten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du gyur pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa gsang sngags kyi mgon po'i sgrub pa nyon cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros thog
109b6(rgyud 'bum): ma nyid du sngar spyad pa byas pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dam tshig thob pa/ gnang ba/ rdo rje 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
109b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bris la/ rin po che dang / spos dang / sman thams cad kyis bkang ba'i bya ma bum bcu drug 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa de
110a1(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis spyi bor dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / dus thams cad du lha'i gzugs mthong bar bya'o// de nas ri'i rtse mor song la slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dus gsum du khrus bya/
110a2(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du gos brjes la shing ltar mi smra bar bya zhing / gtsang sbra dang gtsang sbra spyod pa phun sum tshogasas par byas la/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po sa ya
110a3(rgyud 'bum): phrag 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas rdo rje drag po'i snying po lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gser mgar gso sbyong bzung bas gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa 'am/ drug
110a4(rgyud 'bum): pa nor bu me shel gyi lte ba can 'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba byed du gzhug go/ de nas spos chus bkrus te mchog sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i sngags kyis gzi brjid bskyed par bya'o// de nas rdo rje drag
110a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i snying pos bsgrub par byas te/ bskul nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na tsan dan gyi sgrom bu yod pa'i nang du bcug la gzhag go// de nas bde bar gshegs
110a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku mtho gang tshad kyis mchod rten khri bya'o/ / de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te a kA ru'i bdug pa sreg cing zla ba nya'i bar du bya'o// bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byed cing bslangs pa ma
110a7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'i zas za bas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o//
110b1(rgyud 'bum): den 'dug pa'i 'khor lo lag pas blangs la 'khor lo las 'od zer rnams ma byung gi bar du mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o// de dag gis sgrub pa po snang bar byas nas lus 'gyur ro// nam
110b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i rol mo'i sgra 'byung ngo // lha'i spos chu dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char bar snang las 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
110b3(rgyud 'bum): las 'das pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad dus te/ de dag gis dbang bskur nas lha'i rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang dag mthong ba dang / gang dag
110b4(rgyud 'bum): gis mthong ba de dag dang lhan cig tu gyen du 'phag go/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan zhing yid mgyogs pa'i shugs 'chang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa
110b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
110b6(rgyud 'bum): lto 'phye chen po dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong nas gong du 'gyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang dang / lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i g.yog 'khor can
110b7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur nas/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po bya ba bla na med pa thob
111a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo de la zhon te 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su mchod pa'i don du skad cig re re la'ang me tog thams cad
111a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / spos thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / ras thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / rta dang / glang po che dang /
111a3(rgyud 'bum): shing rta dang / gzhal med khang thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / zas dang / skom thams cad dang / lha'i bu mo thams
111a4(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thams cad dang / dus thams cad du lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams 'bul
111a5(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du ni bza' ba dang / gos dang / rgyan gyi sprin mngon par sprul pa byed do// 'dod na 'chi'o// rgyal ba'i sras mos pas spyod pa gzhal du med pa'i sa thob pa
111a6(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / grags pa chen po dang ldan no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bskyed pa thob
111a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams ma gtogs par gzi brjid dam/ stobs sam/ ye shes sam/ bkod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ 'phrul pa 'am/ gzugs sam/ dpal lam/ spobs pa de
111b1(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa 'am/ lhag pa gang yang med do// zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ji ltar bkod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par grub pa dang
111b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan dang / bsam pa zad mi shes pas re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ji tsam du mi mnyam pa dang ningo
111b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshar to/ / 'jam dpal gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen po rtag tu rjes su dran pa de dag kyang yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal
111b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//
111b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ni yon tan gyi chos dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho'ang sa
111b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa chen po ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro//
111b7(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di ni lo tog thams cad skyed do// sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du bcom ldan
112a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po yang thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsam gtan dang / bzlas brjod byed pa dang / bsgrubs pas kyang rnam pa thams cad du byang//
112a2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis
112a3(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab pa nyid do/ / klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do// bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do// bdud bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do// las bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do//
112a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes gang dag yang dag par smra bas smra ba de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de dag thams cad
112a5(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan kha cig bsam gtan sgrub pa 'am/ bdud dam/ 'dod pa'i khams
112a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang phyug gam/ klu 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di
112a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs kyang ston to// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba
112b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di ji ltar gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po dang / gtso bo dang / mnga' mdzad pa dang / 'di las gzhan pa'i go 'phang mchog gzhan la med par rig par bya'o// 'khor
112b2(rgyud 'bum): lo la ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa gdengs pa dang / mdung thung dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa
112b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / thong gshol dang / zhags pa dang / ka na ya dang / lcags mda' dang / lcags thag dang / gzhu dang / be con dang / mdung dang / gtun shing rked nyag dang /
112b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyug to rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par bya'o// lig bu mig dang / gi'u wang dang / ldong ros la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bsgrub par bya ste/ de dag gi dngos grub thams cad
112b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin du rnam pa gsum mo/ / ci ste ril bu sgrub par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sngags sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas ldong ros dang
112b6(rgyud 'bum): lig bu mig dang / ad ma gug ti'i rtsa ba dang / a d+ha pus si ka'i rtsa ba rnams cha bsnyams te gcig tu bsres la ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad du byas te/ lcags sna gsum
112b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis bskor la/ 'khor lo lag na thogs sam/ ral gri lag na thogs shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du zas mi bza' bar de khar
113a1(rgyud 'bum): bcug la nub kha dmar thag chad nas bzung ste/ 'khor lo dang ral gri las sngon po dang ser por snang ba'i 'od zer byung gi bar du bzlas brjod byas na/ sgrub pa po snang
113a2(rgyud 'bum): bar byed cing grub par 'gyur te/ nyi ma shar ba'i mdog can dang / rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / bskal par gnas pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzug can du 'gyur ba de shi
113a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phos nas kyang rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / ri mo'i sku gzugs dang / sku gzugs med par bgyis nas bsgrubs kyang dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// ci ste ri
113a4(rgyud 'bum): mo'i sku gzugs sgrub par 'dod na bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ gso sbyong bzung ba zhig la rin la ma brtses
113a5(rgyud 'bum): par nyos pa'i shing bal 'khal du bcug la/ tshes grangs byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang po la yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i tha ga pa 'thag tu bcug ste/ ba lang gi lci
113a6(rgyud 'bum): ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do// sgra med pa dang / mnyam pa dang / 'jam par bya'o// tha ga pa'i
113a7(rgyud 'bum): thags sha rnams kyang ba'i rnam lnga dang spos chus bkru'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros thams cad kyang rdo rje drag po las chen po'i snying po lus bsrung bar bya'o// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung ba dang /
113b1(rgyud 'bum): / mkhas pa dang / dad pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pas ser sna med pa dang / yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhig sa phyogs dben zhing dug med pa/ gtsang ba me tog bkram par a ka
113b2(rgyud 'bum): ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing tshon rtsi gsar pa sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug go/ zhi ba'i blo gros yang na sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis bri bar bya'o// gdugs dang / rgyal
113b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing sil snyan dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sgra mang po dang / shis pa rgya chen po dang / bkra shis brjod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros
113b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thod ze'u ka bcings pa/ sngags bgrang nor bu 'phyang ba dang bcas par ri mo mkhan gyi rgyab na 'dug cing / bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur
113b5(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i gzugs dang kha dog bsam par bya'o/ / phyag rgya dang yi ge rnams kyang bsam zhing bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bri bar bya ste/ pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa
113b6(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi kha dog gi mdog can/ me lce 'bar ba lang long du gyur pa/ thor tsugs can/ dar ram ras kyi sham thabs mnabs pa/ na bza' bla gos dar la mnabs pa/ ting nge
113b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa/ zhal yid tsam 'dzum pa/ mtshan thams cad dang ldan par bri'o// de'i g.yas rol du dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje gur kum gyi kha dog can phud bu lnga pa
114a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pal sngon po lag pa g.yon pa na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs bgos pa
114a2(rgyud 'bum): bla gos dar la gyon pa/ me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ pad+ma dkar po la 'dug pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa bri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i g.yon rol du ha
114a3(rgyud 'bum): cad yang mi ring bar de'i zhal du blta ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ cod pan thogs shing cod pan 'gul ba/ gos
114a4(rgyud 'bum): tshig du gyon pa/ pus mo btsugs pa/ rdo rje dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba bka' nod pa bri'o// de'i mdun du snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas
114a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod de lag na ral gri 'am/ lag na 'khor lo thogs shing mtshan thog thag a ka ru'i yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pas sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed dam/
114a6(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma 'char kar nges par ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag 'byung ste/ de dag gis snang bar byas nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin gar dga' ba der 'gro'o// ri mo'i gzugs de
114a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba tsam gyis kyang sdig pa thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / ri mo mthong ba'i mthu yis ni// mtshams med lnga la sogs pa'i las// sdig pa sngon chad gang byas pa/
114b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad byung bar 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba gzi bo che// mgon po dran pas 'dod pa bzhin// 'jig rten kun gyi don sgrub pa'i// 'phrin las mdzad pa smos ci dgos//
114b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas ri mo'i gzugs mdun du// pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na// 'dod bzhin dngos grub mchog sbyin pa// dpal ni mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur// sngags pas gang
114b3(rgyud 'bum): yang rung bar ni/ / zad mi shes pa'i gter mthong zhing // nam mkha' la yang 'gro bar 'gyur// bsam pa bzhin du 'dod pa rnyed// gi'u wang dang ni ldong ros dang // lig bu mig
114b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin te/ / kha zas mi bza' gtsang byas la// mkhas pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya// sngar bsnyen bya ba med par yang // sngags pas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med//
114b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum na mi snang zhing // skye bo kun gyis thub mi 'gyur// ri dang nags tshal bcas pa yi// sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che// rga dang
114b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang drag po chen po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa 'di yin te// rang gi yul na gnas shing gtsang mar byas la byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid du
114b7(rgyud 'bum): byas te ri'i rtse mor song la/ slong mo'i zas bza' zhing gos lan gsum brjes la/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams te/ gus shing de dang 'thur pa'i
115a1(rgyud 'bum): cha byad du byas la mi smra bar sa ma tshig 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu ral gri 'am/ 'khor lo 'am/ be con nam/ zhags pa 'am/ dgra snga'am/
115a2(rgyud 'bum): gtun shing rked nyag gam/ tho ba 'am/ mdung thung blangs la/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus shing / spos chus kyang bkrus la shubs dang bcas par lag na thogs te/ 'greng yang rung
115a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dug kyang rung / 'gro'ang rung / zla ba gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// nyal yang 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos bsrung bar bya'o// de nas zla ba phyi ma la tshes nas brtsams te/ nya'i bar
115a4(rgyud 'bum): du bdog pa thams cad gtang bar bya'o/ / de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod de ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la/ ri'i rtse mo de nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
115a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten gyi drung du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang tshad kyi sku gzugs bzhag la mchod pa byas te/ phyogs gcig tu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o// de la shar phyogs su rig sngags
115a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi rgyal po yan lag bkras byin gzhag go/ lho phyogs su ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po sna tshogs sde gzhag go/ nub phyogs su rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog ldan gzhag go/
115a7(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs su rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po ki li ki la gzhag go// grwa bzhir ni tshon sna bzhi pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa gzhag go// dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
115b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ze ba dang bcas pa bris la snying po'i steng du gang sgrub pa de bri'o/ / de'i steng du rdzas bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de shing a shad tha'i lo ma'i steng du gzhag go// pad+ma nas khru gang tsam gyi
115b2(rgyud 'bum): sa gzhi bor la rdo rje rgya zam bris te/ der 'dug la bsrung ba byas te 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'bar nas g.yo bar 'gyur ro// yang na rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro//
115b3(rgyud 'bum): yang na me tog gi char 'bab bo// zhi ba'i blo gros yang na snang ba chen pos sgrub pa po snang bar 'gyur ro// yang na me tog gi 'greng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te/ mchod yon byin la blangs na
115b4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang / yid ltar mgyogs pa dang / khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
115b5(rgyud 'bum): cad la mchod cing rim gro bya la mkhas pa dang / dbang phyug thams cad kyi gnas thob pa dang / 'dod na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs
115b6(rgyud 'bum): pa mi 'byung ngo / / bdag 'chi ba shes par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje bdag nyid ston par byed do// shi 'phos nas kyang lcang lo can du lag na rdo rje'i khyim du gzhon nu'i lus thob par
115b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / nyin gcig bzhin snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i chu 'thungs na nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang la lan cig bsngags te mig la bskus
116a1(rgyud 'bum): na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / so shing la sngags lan cig btab ste 'chos na 'dod pa'i zas rnyed do// chu'i nang du me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba bor ba de 'dra ba'i
116a2(rgyud 'bum): gos rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / kha la sngags kyis btab na gang dang smras pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la hUM zhes bya bas dug sel to// khros pa dang bcas pas
116a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mos bsdigs na bag 'khums par 'gyur ro/ / gdon gyis zin pa la rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la hUM zhes bya bas bsngags shing / raM zhes bya ba 'bar bar byas pa tsam gyis
116a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bros te the tshom med do/ / gdon gyis zin pa la lag mthil du ha zhes bya ba bsams la bya bas na sos par 'gyur ro// me tog gam/ spos sam/ bdug pa la sngags kyis btab ste
116a5(rgyud 'bum): su la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gdon drag po thams cad kyang cho ga 'di nyid kyis bros par 'gyur ro// sngags pa dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa slong mo'i zas bza' zhing bsrung ba byas
116a6(rgyud 'bum): la/ klu'i mtshor lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na klu 'byung ste/ gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed do// skud pa sngon po la sngags kyis btab ste/ rims kyis btab pa'i mgul par
116a7(rgyud 'bum): bcings na de'i mod la rims las thar par 'gyur ro/ / mig na ba la shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma blangs te lan cig sngags kyis btab ste/ zangs kyi snod la brud de mig la bskus na de'i
116b1(rgyud 'bum): bong la sos par 'gyur ro/ / klad nad thams cad la ni gu gul la sngags kyis btab ste/ lus thams cad g.yogs la mgor gtugs na klang nad med par 'gyur ro// zas ma zhu na chu
116b2(rgyud 'bum): la sngags kyis btab pa'i sbyor chu lan bdun 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro/ / lho na pa la ni skud pa dmar po ldum bu rang na so rtsi'i rtsa ba dang bcas pa la sngags kyis btab ste/ rkeng
116b3(rgyud 'bum): par bcings na lton pa'i nad sos par 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa gdon thams cad sel ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros
116b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las 'di dag grub pa yin par bstan tam/ 'on te ma grub pa'ang yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni
116b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu grub pa yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba ma gtogs par sngar spyad pa bya mi dgos/ sngar bsnyen par bya mi dgos par tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i
116b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa la bye brag tu brjod pa'i sgrub pa rnams bstan to// shing arka dkar
116b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i rtsa ba dang / ki ri karka dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / ka ra wI ra dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / u shi ra dang / ba la ka dang / tsan dan dang / na le sham dang / nir kun di dang / gu gul dab
117a1(rgyud 'bum): mar du bsres pa'i bdug pa ni gdon thams cad bung bar byed pa'o/ / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// dpal dang ldan pa dang tshe dang skal ba bzang po byed pa'o//
117a2(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la/ bram ze blo gros ldan pa zhes bya ba rig byed rnams la rig byed kyi don la
117a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa/ bzo dang sgyu rtsa la thams cad mngon par shes pa/ gsang sngags kyi don la mkhas pa zhig byung ste/ de ri zhig gi rtse mo la brtson 'grus brtsams nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje
117a4(rgyud 'bum): drag po chen po 'di sgrub sgrub na/ bgegs dang log 'dren ma rungs pa dag gis gtses nas/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
117a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze bla
117a6(rgyud 'bum): gros ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de de'i tshul smos te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na ri che ge mo zhes bya ba'i rtse mo la brtson
117a7(rgyud 'bum): 'grus brtsams nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje drag po chen po lan gnyis su sgrub na/ yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de'i dngos grub ma rnyed ma thob mi dmigs nas/ rdzas cung
117b1(rgyud 'bum): zad cig sgrub na de thams cad kyang bgegs rnams kyis phrogs na de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
117b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis/ bram ze blo gros ldan la bdug pa 'di bka' stsal cing / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang gsungs so// skad ya the dam ru ru le le
117b3(rgyud 'bum): bud d+ha ma tang gi/ puk+ka si sha ba ri ka/ gr-ih+Na khA da ya swA hA/ zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sgrub pa'i bram ze blo gros ldan zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa
117b4(rgyud 'bum): snyam du khyod dogs sam yid gnyis za na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros rdo rje 'chang spros pa med par gnas pa zhes bya ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams 'di
117b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'dus pa yin te/ spros pa rab 'byams rgya chen po mtha' yas pa la mkhas pa des gsang sngags 'di dang bdug pa'ang rnyed de bsgrubs so// ci ste ri mo'i gzugs sgrub par 'dod
117b6(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'dres pa dag gis ras la lag na rdo rje ut+pa la'i 'dab ma'i mdog lho bu 'am/ bri yang ku'i kha dog lta bu'i mdog sngo
117b7(rgyud 'bum): bsangs sam/ margad kyi kha dog lta bu'i sngo bsangs su bri bar bya ste/ bzung ste phyed snang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzhin cung zad khros pa dang bcas pa
118a1(rgyud 'bum): gos tshig gu gyon pa/ rin po che'i brag la rin po che'i phug na tshul bzhin du shis shing skyil me krung phyed bcas te 'dug pa/ bsgyings pa dang bcas pa/ snyems pa
118a2(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa/ me lce 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can/ lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa gsor ba bri bar bya'o// de'i mgo bo'i g.yas rol gyi steng du ha cang yang mi ring bar de
118a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim snang dpal pad+mo dkar po la skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa mdzad pa bri'o// g.yon rol
118a4(rgyud 'bum): du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra bas rab tu 'joms pa dbugs 'byin pa snga ma bzhin no/ / lag na rdo rje'i 'og g.yas rol du phyag brnyan sog ma'i du ba'i mdog lta bu'i gos dri ma can gyon
118a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba/ mig dmar ba/ dpral bar khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang bcas pa/ lag na zhags pa dang ral gri thog pa/ bka' nod pa lhur len pa/ pus mo gnyis
118a6(rgyud 'bum): btsugs pa bri'o/ / g.yon rol du phyag brnyan ma pus mo btsugs pa/ mdog sngo bsangs/ ral gri so gcig pa yu ba can dang zhags pa lag na thogs pa snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o//
118a7(rgyud 'bum): dben pa dugs med par de'i mdun du zas dkar gsum bza' zhing / gos dus gsum du brjes la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de a ka ru'i yam
118b1(rgyud 'bum): sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi la bsnyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag byung ngo // yang na ri mo'i gzugs 'gul lo//
118b2(rgyud 'bum): yang na me tog gi 'phreng ba 'gul lo// snga ma bzhin du grub par 'gyur te las thams cad byed do// rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sa ma skal pa bzang po
118b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang ldan zhing nad thams cad las thar par bya ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang 'jigs pa'i me'i snying po chen po stobs
118b4(rgyud 'bum): dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
118b5(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / lha ma yin pas mchod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos/ smyung ba bya'ang mi
118b6(rgyud 'bum): dgos par ri'i rtse mor song la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ske tshe'i 'bru'i sreg blugs dug dang / khrag dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pa lan sum
118b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bum sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po grag cing snga ma bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang / yid lngar mgyogs pa dang /
119a1(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid mtshungs pa med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par de bas lhag pa su la'ang med do// rtag tu bzlas brjod
119a2(rgyud 'bum): byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ / lha ma yin gyi khung gi sgor song nas khros te lan khri bzlas brjod bya zhing sbyin sreg kyang snga ma bzhin byas na/ lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad
119a3(rgyud 'bum): gtan pa med par 'gyur te/ ci 'dod pa bzhin yongs su spyod cing 'dod pa bzhin du rang 'byung ngo // las thams cad byed do// ci ste gter chen po 'byung bar 'dod na zas mi bza' bar snying po 'di/
119a4(rgyud 'bum): lan khri bzlas brjod byas la/ tha mar shing ka ra wI ra'i lcug mas lan gsum bsnun na rang 'byung ngo // rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// khros pa'i
119a5(rgyud 'bum): mdun du phyag rgya bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na dang bar 'gyur ro/ / byis pa gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// gdon chen po thams cad la
119a6(rgyud 'bum): ni gzugs byas la rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ gdon de tshig cing sgra 'byin cing 'bros par 'gyur ro// dris pa myur du smra bar 'gyur ro// ci ste pha rol gnon
119a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste pha rol gnod par byed par 'dod na pa ru ra'i shing bu sor drug pa dag cig la ming nas brjod cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags la/ nam phyed na khang steng ngam
119b1(rgyud 'bum): sgo'i steng du btsugs na khyim du gnod pa chen po 'byung ngo / / sems kyi nad chen po'ang 'byung ngo // yid kyis ni zhi bar byed do// ci ste mo'i sku gzugs sgrub na ras la bcom ldan 'das
119b2(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje 'od kyi kha dog dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba/ rgyan med pa/ mig dmar ba/ khros pa/ ma mchu sos mnan pa/ dpral bar khro gnyer gyi rim pa 'chas pa/ rkang pa g.yon pasas
119b3(rgyud 'bum): mnan te 'dug pa/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i rdog pas mnan pa ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs mo byed pa/ lag pa g.yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje mi bzad pa 'phen
119b4(rgyud 'bum): paltar 'dug pa bri bar bya ste/ bsrung ba byas pa rdo rje gtsug tor gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid
119b5(rgyud 'bum): du gyur pas sa phyogs dben par dugs med par mchod pa rgya cher byas la/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung ba 'drir gzhug go// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba/ dam tshig
119b6(rgyud 'bum): thob pa/ spro ba dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug gi/ gzhan ni gang gis kyang ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros dam tshig mi shes pa/ dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba gang la la zhig gis ri mo'i gzugs
119b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong na/ de'i mod la de nad rnam pa gnyis kyis btab par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rims drag po dang / gcod chen por 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros kyis
120a1(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ 'jam dpal kye ma gang gi yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu bstan pa'i snying po mchog/ don chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di ngo mtshar to//
120a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal snying po mchog 'di ni gang zhig/ 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sra ba'i yon tan rnams dang
120a3(rgyud 'bum): mthu la ni mtha' med do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'i me las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ste/ ma dul ba thams cad 'dul ba/
120a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bstan pa mchog tu kun tu srung bar smon lam btab pa/ sems can
120a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas rgya mtsho rab 'byams rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam sgrogs
120a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgo la 'jug pa thams cad du sngon du rgyug pa'o/ / de'i mdun du ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te/ gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur
120a7(rgyud 'bum): tegang 'dod pa de byed do/ / ri'i rtse mo'am rgya mtsho'i ngogs su song ste ri mo'i gzugs bris la slong mo'i zas sam/ bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas bza' zhing mid pa nub tsam du chur zhugs
120b1(rgyud 'bum): la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la/ ral gri 'am 'khor lo lag na thogs shing dug dang / khrag dang / yungs kar bsres pas sum khri sbyin sreg
120b2(rgyud 'bum): byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rgya mtsho las sgra 'byung zhing bskams par 'gyur ro// ri'ang 'gul ba 'am grub par 'gyur ro// las thams cad du nus par 'gyur ro// rdzi char
120b3(rgyud 'bum): ram lce 'bab pa la'ang lan cig bsdigs pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur ro/ / 'chi ba thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / gnod pa 'byung ba thams cad la lam gyi bzhi
120b4(rgyud 'bum): mdo'am shing drung gcig yod pa 'am/ 'bab chu'i ngogs sam/ mtshan ma gcig yod pa 'am/ grong khyer gyi sum mdor ri mo'i gzugs bris la rgya cher mchod la spos dang
120b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog gis mchod pa'i bum pa yungs kar gyis bkang la/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags bzlas brjod bya ste/ snying po snying khar gzhag la ri mo'i gzugs de la shis pa snyan pa rgya chen po
120b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pas mngon sum du dga' bar byas te dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / yungs kar de dag ni gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'chi ba thams cad sel to// sems can/
120b7(rgyud 'bum): dpag tshad tsam na 'khod pa thams cad kyis ri mo'i gzugs 'di mthong na'ang de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam b
121a1(rgyud 'bum): dun pa/ / // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros rig pa'i
121a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di dag gi spyi'i sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba nyon cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros de la sgrub pa po rig pa'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba sgrub par 'dod pas rig sngags gdon par bya ste/ tshes grangs
121a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang po la spyang ba byas la/ mar gyi mar me bus te ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la rang bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi
121a4(rgyud 'bum): mdun du rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs med mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o/ / nang par khrus byas la dri zhim pos bskus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la zas dkar gsum zos te dbang po gsal
121a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / nyams tha mal par gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i slob dpon bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas la thal mo sbyar te pus mo btsugs la
121a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba btab ste/ slob dpon bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i slad du rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la stsal du gsol/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du bgyi'o zhes brjod
121a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / slob dpon gyis kyang thams cad du snying rje dang ldan pas ser sna med par byas la slob ma de la sbyin par bya'o// de ltar rig sngags dang dam tshig mnos nas ji skad bstan pa lta bu'i sa
121b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams su de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du bsgyur la ri'i rtse mo 'am/ 'bab chu'i ngogs sam/ nags khrod dam/ chu mig gi dngo 'am/ yid du 'ong ba dben pa der zas dkar
121b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum za ba 'am/ 'o ma btung zhing lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri 'am/ rdo rje 'am/ mdung thung ngam/ be con nam/ mdung rtse
121b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa 'am/ lcags sna gsum gyi 'khor lo blangs la ba'i rnam sngas bkrus te/ ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng du bzhag la rdo rje drag po chen po'i snying pos bsrung bar bya'o//
121b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas zla ba tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la spos chus bkrus te/ ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la snga ma
121b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris te/ ci 'byor pas mchod la shing a shwad tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar nges par
121b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bar zhing rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'dus te/ de dag gi bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba dang /
121b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// ci ste ma grub la brtul zhugs ma nyams na de bzhin du lan gsum du bsgrub
122a1(rgyud 'bum): pa byas na/ mtshams med pa'i las byas pas kyang nges par 'grub bo// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// sman la bzlas brjod byas te
122a2(rgyud 'bum): 'thungs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ / mar la sngags kyis btab ste zan za khar 'thungs na lo khyud 'khor du lus brtan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi mdun du mig btsums
122a3(rgyud 'bum): te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba brjod do// de bzhin du rna ba bkag ste bzlas brjod byas na'ang thams cad
122a4(rgyud 'bum): thos par 'gyur ro/ / nyal kar ma la du zhugs la mig la lan brgyad brgya bsngags te nyal na snang bar 'gyur zhing thams cad mthong ste/ nyin mo ji lta ba ltar mtshan mo'ang de bzhin
122a5(rgyud 'bum): no/ / so shing la lan cig bsngags te 'chos na ma bslangs par zas rnyed do// lig bu mig gam gi'u wang la lan cig bsngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga'
122a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / spos la bzlas brjod byas te bskus na gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag dbang du 'gyur ro// dgra mthong na phyag rgyas bcings la lan cig brjod na dgra dang bral bar 'gyur
122a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / spos dang me tog la sogs pa la sngags kyis lan cig btab ste gang la byin pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// ci ste g.yul ngor 'jug par 'dod na skyes bu bcings pa byas la
122b1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs na g.yul ngor rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste dmag rengs par bya bar 'dod na pa 'i kang ka ta'i shing gis me bus la/ gru tshal gyi ya ma sreg shing gis lan khri sbyin sreg byas na
122b2(rgyud 'bum): dmag rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ / gnod pa thams cad la mngar gsum gyi sreg blugs lan sum khri sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// thal bas ni rdzi char gcod do// shing bu
122b3(rgyud 'bum): 'am mtshon gyis ni lce 'bab pa bzlog go/ skud pa sngon pos ni 'byung po'i gdon zhi bar byed do// gzugs byas la thal ba 'am shing ka ra wI ra'i lcug mas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar
122b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gdon chen po la'ang de bzhin du bya'o// byis pa gdon gyis zin na 'bras sA lu btags pa las gzugs byas la ske tshe'i 'bru dang lan tshwa dang bsres te/ phub ma'i
122b5(rgyud 'bum): me bus pa'i nang du sbyin sreg byas na dus thams cad du ming tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / rims kyis btab pa la lag pa g.yon pa la sngags kyis btab snga
122b6(rgyud 'bum): mgo la bzhag na rims nad sel to/ / nad thams cad bsal bar 'dod na sman thams cad bsogs la ba ru na'i shing gis me bus te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas
122b7(rgyud 'bum): na de phyin chad nad thams cad sel to/ / ci ste ri mo'i gzugs sgrub par 'dod na ra sa skra med pa ma dras pa la snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung ba la sbyin dang ma bsres
123a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshon rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po 'drir gzhug ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ cod pan mgul la thogs pa/ pad+ma dkar po la 'dug
123a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rgyal po chen po'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ me lce 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba kun nas yang long du gyur pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yas pas dam pa sbyin pa/ skyil
123a3(rgyud 'bum): mo krung du bzhugs pa/ zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ sgrub pa po la gzigs par bri'o// de'i 'og rol tu sgrub pa po lag na pog por thogs shing de'i gdong du lta ba la brtson pa/ tshul dang
123a4(rgyud 'bum): 'thun pa'i cha byad can pus mo btsugs pa bri'o/ / de'i mdun du lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na snga ma bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po spyir sgrub pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan
123a5(rgyud 'bum): yang lag na rdo rje'i bu smon lam chen po la dbang thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa rnams kyi spyi'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ snga ma bzhin du 'khor los sgyur
123a6(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i tsho gas gsang sngags gang yang rung ba mnos la/ ji skad brjod pa'i gnas kyi nang nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu ngogs su song la lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas
123a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas zla ba tshes nas bzung ste rdzas gang sgrub pa de blangs la zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de/ ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil
123b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bskus la bsrung ba byas te/ gu gul gyi yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar nges par
123b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur te rdzas de 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / de blangs na rdo rje'i rigs su rdo rje gzhon nu'i lus 'thob bo// gzungs chen po 'thob bo// 'dod na 'chi'o// ci ste ma grub na'ang las
123b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ / shi 'phos na'ang lcang lo can nam longs spyod chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// lag na
123b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje la blta zhing bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur ro/ / lus thams cad la byabs pa byas te nyal na rmi lam na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing de nyid du
123b5(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyang 'thob po/ / zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba ser mo ma smad spu 'thun gyi mar blangs la zangs kyi snod du bcug ste/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas la der gzhag ste/ zla ba la mi
123b6(rgyud 'bum): blta bar dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la/ de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bar na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// du bar 'thul na mi
123b7(rgyud 'bum): snang bar 'gyur ro/ / dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ci ste ri mo'i gzugs sgrub par 'dod na cho ga snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sprin dang
124a1(rgyud 'bum): ma bsres pa'i tshen rnams kyis sgra med pa'i ras la gzhon nu gang yang rung ba zhig 'drir gzhug ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phung bu gsum gyis mgo
124a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ pad+ma dkar po la 'dug pa/ ral gri 'od 'bar ba'i dbus na 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ lag pa g.yas pas sgrub pa po la
124a3(rgyud 'bum): dbugs 'byin pa/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'am bri yang ku'i kha dog ltar sngo bsangs bri'o// de'i mdun du mchod pa chen po byas te sgrub pa brtsams na snga ma bzhin du grub par 'gyur ro//
124a4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i bu nad ku ba ra lag na rdo rje dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos/ smyung ba bya mi dgos par lag na
124a5(rgyud 'bum): be con thogs shing dgon pa chen por zhugs la lam mi bzur mi smra bar lus la glang po che'i pags pa bgos la/ de dang 'thun pa'i cha byad du bsgyur te/ lag na rdo rje drag po'i sring
124a6(rgyud 'bum): po'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos bsrung ba byas la slong mo'i zas bza' ba 'am/ zas mi bza' bar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ nad ku be ra nyid 'ong zhing dam pa stobs te/
124a7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do// klu'i mtshor zhugs la lan khri bzlas brjod byas na klu byung ste gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do// lha ma yin gyi khung sgor lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lha ma yin gyi
124b1(rgyud 'bum): bu mo nyid byung nas 'jug par byed do/ / sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do// ci ste mi 'dod na de nyid du de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dug cing dbang phyug thams cad kyi bde ba
124b2(rgyud 'bum): 'thob pa dang bskal par gnas par 'gyur te/ lus de nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong ba dang chos kyang thos par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos na'ang sangs rgyas kyi
124b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing rnam par dag par skye bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mthong ba tsam gyis srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad ring ba bas kyang ches ring du 'bros
124b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros mdor na ji ltar bsgrubs kyang rung / cho ga zhib mo gzhan nas 'byung bas bsgrubs kyang rung ste nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam
124b5(rgyud 'bum): par rgyal ba'i bsgrub pa yin te/ mtshan gcig yod pa 'am/ dur khrod du thal bas lus bskus te/ lag na mdung rtse gsum pa dang rdo rje thogs pa slong mo'i zas bza' zhing yul rgyu ba
124b6(rgyud 'bum): dang gnas med par rgyu ba dang / gtsang ba dang / bzod pa dang / nang gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba dang / ser sna med pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar byas la ri dgas kyi dbang po'i
124b7(rgyud 'bum): pags pa'i sham thabs bgos te/ snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas mtshan gcig yod pa 'am/ dur khrod dam/ yang na shing drung gcig yod par sngags pas sgrub
125a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir song la/ zla ba nya la snga ma bzhin// khong pa'i nang gi rnam dag pa// mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas brjod bya// nam phyed dam ni nyi 'char kar// rdzas de bzhin
125a2(rgyud 'bum): du yongs 'gyur phyir/ / 'od ni me lce 'bar 'phreng 'dra// grub nas nam mkha' spyod yul 'gyur// rnal 'byor che ba bskal par gnas// 'jig rten kun tu rnam par rgyu// mchod pa
125a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po byed par 'gyur/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gsang sngags grub pa dang 'dra ba dang ni 'jig rten gsum po dag na su'ang med do// ma bsgrubs kyang las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ phyag rgya
125a4(rgyud 'bum): bcings la gdon thams cad la bltas na de'i mod la gdon gyis gtong ngo / / rims kyis btab pa la bltas na rims las sos par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad du rang gi cho ga zhib mo'i tshe
125a5(rgyud 'bum): ga'am/ gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga 'am/ gang yang rung bas byas kyang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang lag na rdo rje dga' ba khro bo zla ba'i thig le'i sgrub pa
125a6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di yin te/ ri'i rtse mo 'am/ rgya mtsho chen por mid pa nub tsam du chur zhugs la/ bslangs pa ma yin pa'i kha zas bza' zhing / shing ltar mi smra bar byas la/ stag lpags kyi sham
125a7(rgyud 'bum): thabs bgos la lam mi bzung bar 'khor lo 'am/ ral gri 'am/ mdung rtse gsum pa 'am/ rtse gsum gdengs pa po lag na thogs la yi ge 'bru grangs bzhin du lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o//
125b1(rgyud 'bum): tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de zla ba nya la thod ze'u ka bcings shing bsrung ba byas te mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'grub ste nam mkha' la 'gro bar
125b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ gzi brjid mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ grub pa thams cad kyang de las ring du 'byor par 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pas kyang zil gyis gnon
125b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mi nus so/ / mkha' 'gro mas rgyas btab na rgya'i gzugs kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bris te/ sngags kyis btab la nad pa la bstan na rgya bshig pa byas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i
125b4(rgyud 'bum): srin po'i gdon gyis zin na dur khrod kyi sol bas gzugs sam ming bris la shing sha la ta ka'i lcug mas gzhu'o/ / yang na ba lang gi rnga ma'i srad bu hUM zhes bya ba dang bcas pas bsdigs na de'i mod
125b5(rgyud 'bum): la sgra cher ngus te 'bros so/ / gang dris pa de smra'o// gang yang rung ba'i cho gas sbyor ba byas kyang de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i tshigs kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub bo//
125b6(rgyud 'bum): lan cig bzlas brjod byas kyang rung / bzlas brjod ma byas kyang rung ste/ rjes su dran pa nyid kyis 'grub bo// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs las
125b7(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa/ lag na rdo rje'i rigs su skyes pa/ stobs po che'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos so// smyung ba bya mi
126a1(rgyud 'bum): dgos la sngags kyang rung / sbags pa ma yin yang rung / khrus byas kyang rung / ma byas kyang rung / mi thod kyi 'phreng ba thogs shing khri'i zur shing thogs pa/ du
126a2(rgyud 'bum): khrod na gnas pa'i thal bas lus bskus la/ gang du'ang rung bar snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar de nyid du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus la bsrung ba byas te/
126a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de thogs nas thogs pa med par 'gro bar rig sngags 'chang
126a4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyis 'di'i stobs la zil gyis gnon par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams dang / spyod pa thob pa'i
126a5(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di dang mtshungs pa su'ang med do/ / rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / gnod pa
126a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad du'ang dran pa nyid kyis thams cad zhi bar byed do// lha ma yin gyi khung du 'jug par 'dod na shing sha ma'i be con thogs la lha ma yin gyi khung sgor
126a7(rgyud 'bum): yan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la/ dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe'i 'bru bsres pas lan khri sbyin sreg byas pas lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad
126b1(rgyud 'bum): du bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / be con de la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste sgo de la bsnun na lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'byung ste/ de dag gis sgrub pa po de rang gi khyim dag
126b2(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jug par byed do/ / sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa thams cad kyang sbyin par byed do// gang 'dod pa de byed do// gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho gas byas kyang 'grub bo// khro bo'i rgyal po
126b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ste bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis thams cad byed do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang phyag brnyan thams cad spyi'i sgrub pa 'di yin te/ mtshan mo zas za ba/ gos
126b4(rgyud 'bum): dri ma can gyon pa/ nga rgyal bcag pa/ brnyas par gyur pa/ smyon pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ bgad pa dang / gar bya ba dang / sil snyan rnams la mkhas pas khang stong ngam/ shing drung gcig
126b5(rgyud 'bum): yod par 'gro'ang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung / glu len yang rung // gar byed kyang rung / snying po 'di sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar ba lang gi
126b6(rgyud 'bum): lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la me tog bkram ste ci 'byor pas mchod la lcags ur mo las gri bya rog so byas pa dang / mi'i sgra'i zhags pa khru bcu gnyis pa 'am/ khru
126b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa 'am/ khru gang ba thogs thag la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'bar bar 'gyur te/ de thogs na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur
127a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i gzugs 'chang bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gsum po'ang bcings nas khrid de 'ongasan
127a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can phal pa rnams lha ci smos/ rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur/
127a3(rgyud 'bum): nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang phyag brnyan ma lag na rdo rje'i rigs su skyes pa rnams kyi spyi'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ gcig pu gnyis su med par khang
127a4(rgyud 'bum): stong ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ phug dben pa dugs mad par phyag brnyan ma gang yang rung ba zhig lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mched de gri bya reg gi so lta bu'i
127a5(rgyud 'bum): yu ba can dang / zhags pa lag na thogs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig
127a6(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs 'chang bar 'gyur ro// lan tshwa las gzugs byas la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pas mchod de/ gnas dben pa dugs med par
127a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhag la gcig pus mtshan thog thag lag pas brang du bsnun cing bzlas brjod byas na/ de bzhin du nges par 'grub ste gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyir bar byed do// tsher ma a pa mtsha'i
127b1(rgyud 'bum): so shing la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste 'chos na ma bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / mdor na cho ga gang dang gang gis sgrub pa de nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni rang bzhin
127b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'grub pa ste/ 'dod pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang po nya thams cad kyi spyi'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ slong mo'i zas bza' zhing rgya
127b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la/ de bzhin du shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog mar la lan khri sbyin sreg byas na 'grub
127b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de byed do/ / gzhan yang sgrub pa 'di yin te/ mar gsar las gzugs byas la spos dang me tog gis mchod de/ zla ba nyal tsan dan gyis dkyil 'khor bskus
127b5(rgyud 'bum): te zla ba la mi lta bar 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la/ de blangs na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// ci ste du ba 'thul bar 'thungs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen
127b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dro bar gyur pa de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs
127b7(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// mchog tu skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// shi 'phos na'ang lha'i nang ngam lhung le
128a1(rgyud 'bum): can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros rang bzhin dag gis grub pa dag ste 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa bklags pas 'grub bo// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang po
128a2(rgyud 'bum): mo 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don byed pa rnams kyi spyi'i sgrub pa 'di yin te/ grog mkhar gyi sa 'am ngos gnyis ka'i sa las gzugs byas la/ skyed mos 'tshal dben pa dugs med par ci
128a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pas mchod de/ rig pa lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar zla ba nya la gtor ma rgya chen byas la lig pu mig gam/ gi'u wang ngam/ ldong ros spos chus bskus te/
128a4(rgyud 'bum): de'i lag tu bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'bar na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dre bar gyur na dbang du 'gyur ro// steng gi
128a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par rgyu ba dang / nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang / rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi don byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ma
128a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur te/ gi'u wang la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste gdong la byugs na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// lig bu mig la sngags kyis btab ste mig la
128a7(rgyud 'bum): bskus na gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / kha la sngags kyis btab na gang dang smras pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// me tog dang spos la sogs pa la sngags kyis btab nas su la byin
128b1(rgyud 'bum): pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / dben par lam du 'dug ste/ gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa de'i ming nas brjod de lag pa snying khar bcar la rig pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na 'ag
128b2(rgyud 'bum): bdun na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / chu la sngags kyis btab ste gdong bkrus na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// lan tshwa'i sreg blugs brgya spong sbyin sreg byas na skal ba bzang po mchog tu
128b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / phyugs chung 'dod na shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog a ka rus bdugs pa la sngags lan res btab ste zhag bdun du rgya mtsher 'bab pa'i chur bor na nges par rnyed par 'gyur ro// ra'i
128b4(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma la sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na'ang de bzhin du rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / bu 'dod na thang shing gi yam sreg shing ba ser mo'i mar la bstsags pas zhag bdud sbyin sreg byas ra bu yod pa
128b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na rnam grangs 'dis las stong byed de/ dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed/ dpal yang skyed par byed do// rdo rje pho nya mo rer po 'di dag ni bklags pas
128b6(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba'i bran rnams kyi sgrub pa nyon cig/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer gar bab bab tu
128b7(rgyud 'bum): nyal ba/ sus bcos kyang nga rgyal bcag pa/ bran gyi gzugs 'dzin pa/ ges dri ma can gyon pa/ skra shig shig por 'dug pa/ khrus mi byed pa/ dri ma can gyi snying po
129a1(rgyud 'bum): gang yang rung ba zhig grong khyer chen po'i sum mdo 'am/ ma mo'i khyim du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar de nyid du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor
129a2(rgyud 'bum): bskus la ci 'byor pas mchod de lcags sna gsum gyi mchil lham mam/ lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing gi mchil lham blangs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam phyed dam nyi
129a3(rgyud 'bum): ma 'char kar nges par 'bar zhing 'grub par 'gyur te/ shing gi mchil lham gyon na gang 'dod pa de nyid du 'gro'o// 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin cing rlung ltar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ma grub kyang
129a4(rgyud 'bum): las su 'gyur te rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na rtag tu phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / rims kyis btab pa la skud pa nag po bcings na rims las sos par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad
