129a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / gnod pa thams cad la yungs kar ram/ spos chus byab pa byas na sos par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du til nag po'i zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pa lan
129a6(rgyud 'bum): sum khri sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa byed pa'ang las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros bran rnams ni gang mi byed pa
129a7(rgyud 'bum): ci'ang med de dam tshig rjes su srung bar byed/ bstan pa'i don byed/ sgrub pa na dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ston par byed do// gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga 'am/ ji ltar 'byor
129b1(rgyud 'bum): pa byas kyang nges par 'grub 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros lag na rdo rje
129b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i snying por gyur pa/ gsang ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ las sna tshogs byed pa las gang dag dran pa tsam gyis
129b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dag yod de/ de dag gi sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos/ smyung ba bya mi dgos par mtshan mo zas za ba bslangs
129b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ma yin pa za ba de dang 'thun pa'i cha byad 'dzin par ral gri so gcig pa yu ba dang bcas pa lag na thogs la/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chur rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te lan sum 'bum
129b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bya'o/ / tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor pas mchod de yungs kar dang gur kum bsres pas mtshan thog thag lan sum 'bum sbyin sreg byed na/ nam byed dam nyi ma 'char kar nges par
129b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de thogs pas yid ltar mgyogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du mar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa chen po byed pa dang / thogs
129b7(rgyud 'bum): pa med par 'gro ba 'am/ sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa gzhan yang yod de/
130a1(rgyud 'bum): ri'i rtse mor song la de bzhin du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de 'o ma'i sreg blugs lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa byed pa'ang nges
130a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ri mo'i gzugs dang sku gzugs med par yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor mthong bas bla mas gnang ba/ ser sna med pa
130a3(rgyud 'bum): dad pa dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba/ spro ba dang ldan pa/ yi dam la brtan pa/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na'i don la mkhas
130a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bla ma la gus pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan du ni ni brgya byin de nyid chen pos bsgrubs kyang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sbyin par mi byed de/ yon tan ji skad brjod pa dang ldan
130a5(rgyud 'bum): ba la nges par 'grub bo/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros bran po dang / zan mo dang /
130a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag brnyan dang / phyag brnyan ma dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo la sogs pa 'di dag gis mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan ji skad brjod pa gzhan yod kyis/ legs par rab tu
130a7(rgyud 'bum): nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / kho bos khyod la bshad do// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon
130b1(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal 'di ni dus yin/ 'di ni tshod yin te/ 'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros de la cho ga snga ma
130b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sngar spyad pa byas pa'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pas/ spang ma 'am/ ba bla 'am/ ldong ros gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la zangs kyi ga'ur bcug ste/ dang ma
130b3(rgyud 'bum): shor bar byas la zla ba mar gyi ngo la zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ lha chen po'i gnas su lha chen po'i g.yas rol gyi lus la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te du bar 'phrul gyi bar du
130b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / des lus la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bu btsas pa'i khyim nas thal ba blangs la snyim par bcug ste/ de bzhin du zla ba mar gyi ngo la lha chen po'i glo g.yas rol gyi lus
130b5(rgyud 'bum): la bzlas brjod bya ste du ba 'thul ba'i bar du bya'o/ / des sum ris byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la skar ma rgyal la gza' zla ba la bab pa'i tshe/
130b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa shi ba dur khrod du bsregs pa'i me'i nang du ba ru ra'i shing bcug la tshig pa dang rang gis khrag gis bsad de/ de'i sol ba thogs la khang stong dben zhing dugs med par ba lang gi mkhris pas
130b7(rgyud 'bum): thig le byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lig bu mig blangs te cho ga snga ma bzhin lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la
131a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ser mo'i mar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas te/ de nas zla ba nya la grub kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la/ des mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad kyis lus mi
131a2(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros yang ldum bu at+ma gup+da'i rtsa ba cho ga snga ma bzhin du blangs te lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo la lha rten tu mtshan thog thag
131a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / shu dag dkar po'i rtsa ba dang rgya spos kyi rtsa ba la snga ma bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// skar ma rgyal gyi tshe
131a4(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal sngon po blangs la ra'i 'o ma dang btags te zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe/ zangs kyi snod dam shing a shwad tha'i lo ma kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug ste/ zla ba btang gi bar du bzlas brjod byas
131a5(rgyud 'bum): la de 'thungs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang gur kum dang / dU ru ka dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / ba ser mo ma smad spu 'thun gyi mar dang btags la snga ma bzhin du
131a6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba spyad kis zin pa'i tshe zla ba btang gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la/ de 'thungs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros shing a sa na'i me tog dang / shing de ba'i me tog ri dgas
131a7(rgyud 'bum): nag po'i khrag dang btags la zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe zla ba btang gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la/ de 'thungs shing lus la'ang bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros
131b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang a ka ru nag po blangs la sbrul nag po'i mig dang / snga ma gzhin du lha chen po'i glo g.yas rol gyi lus la bzlas brjod bya ste du ba 'thul gyi bar du bya'o// des thig ler byas
131b2(rgyud 'bum): na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po kha gnyis pa bzung la til nag po dang lhan cig btags te/ zla ba mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag
131b3(rgyud 'bum): smyung ba byas te/ 'bru mar des du ba chags par byas la/ de la'ang sngags kyis btab ste mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang a ru ra'i rus pa'i
131b4(rgyud 'bum): rkang phyung ste/ sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btags nas a shwad tha'i lo ma'i bar du bcug la/ mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dus na 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la the tsom
131b5(rgyud 'bum): yong med do/ / mkhas pas chu 'dus ga la bar// khong pa nad ni rnam dag par// yid gzhungs pas ni thig le byas// de tshe lus ni mi snang 'gyur// lu klu dang ni spang ma dag/
131b6(rgyud 'bum): rin la mi rtse gnyos nas su// zangs snod kha sbyar nang bcug la// cho ga bzhin du sngags brjod na// nam phyed dus na 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tsom yong med //
131b7(rgyud 'bum): lus la bskus pa byas na yang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'jig rten drug cha phyogs nas su// de tshe bsod nams las su 'gyur// ril bu sgrub pa bshad par byas//
132a1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros de nyon cig/ mtshal dang de bzhin spang ma dang // at+ma gup+ta'i rtsa ba dang // ku ta dza dang ldong ros dang // mkhas pas gcig tu bsres nas
132a2(rgyud 'bum): su/ / rgya shug tshig gu tsam byas pa'i// ril bu blangs la bsgrims nas su// sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas te// sna gsum lcags kyis dkri bar bya// dur khrod
132a3(rgyud 'bum): du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ nam byed dus sam yang na ni// nyi ma
132a4(rgyud 'bum): 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe/ / rdzas de gzhan du yongs 'gyur te// me lce 'bar 'phreng lang long 'gyur// sngags pas de ni khar bcug na// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/
132a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma 'char 'dra'i mdog can dang // 'dod pa'i gzugs can 'jigs pa med// 'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs shing // bskal par gnas la gzi cher 'gyur// bstan
132a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don byed dpal ldan zhing / / rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs// zhi ba'i blo gros ril bu gzhan yang yod de/ ba gu la yi snying blangs la// blo ldan dong ka'i me tog dang /
132a7(rgyud 'bum): lig pu mig dang spang ma dang // cha shas bsnams par byas nas su// sna gsum lcags kyis dkris byas la// mtshan gcig yod pa 'amadur khrod dam// shing drung gcig pa 'am phus
132b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / dbyar srungs 'jug tshe bsgrub par bya// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas pa lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung
132b2(rgyud 'bum): bas dkyil 'khor bskus la ci 'byor pas mchod de dbus su rdo rje bzhag la/ de'i steng du shing a shwad tha'i lo mo'i steng du ril bu gzhag ste/ rdo rje drag po'i snying po 'am/ rdo rje gtsug tor
132b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis bdag dang rdzas bsrung ba byas la/ ba dmar ser gyi mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa lan stong rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin sreg byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas nam byed
132b4(rgyud 'bum): dam nyi ma 'char kar rdzas de 'gyur te/ de khar bcug na nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang / bskal par gnas pa dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs pa dang / 'jig rten
132b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams gzhan du mar rnam par rgyu ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don byed par 'gyur ro// phyung na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing yid ltar mgyogs par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos
132b6(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / ril bu gzhan yang yod de/ ba la a ra ba la'i rtsi// de bzhin gser dang dngul dang ni// lig bu mig dang shu
132b7(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / / de bzhin du ni shing shun dang // de dag cha shas bsnams nas su// phye mar skam por byas pa dag/ char pa'i chus ni sprul nas su// ril bu gsum zhig byas pa la/
133a1(rgyud 'bum): zangs kyi leb mas dkris nas su// sngags pas snga ma bzhin du gzhag/ zla ba spyad kis zin pa'i tshe// zhag gcig smyung ba byas nas su// grub pa de/
133a2(rgyud 'bum): ni khar bcug na// rtag tu mi snang 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang ril bu gzhan yod de/ shing ti la ka'i me tog dang / byi la nag po'i snying dang / ba wang gi snying skam po btags
133a3(rgyud 'bum): la char pas sbrus pa'i ril bu'ang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / ril bu gzhan yang yod de/ shing pa na sa'i sa bon dang / dza ban da'i sa bon dang / a ga ta'i me tog dang /
133a4(rgyud 'bum): byi ru dang / stang zil dang / shing kan tsa'i me tog rnams cha bsnyams pa'ang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro// shel dang / lhang tsher dang / shing ba ru ni'i sa bon dang
133a5(rgyud 'bum): dris na d+hi'i sa bon rnams cha bsnams pa'ang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / ril bu gzhan yang yod de/ dung gi lte ba dang / ag+ni dza la dang / ldong ros rnams cha bsnyams
133a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / ril bu gzhan yang yod de/ dug dang / bong nga dang / lang ga li dang / du ru ka'i rtsa ba dang / de dag cha bstabs pa'ang snga
133a7(rgyud 'bum): ma bzhin te grub par 'gyur ro/ / ril bu gzhan yang yod de/ shing ma d+hu ka'i snying po dang / shing sA la ser po'i snying po dang / khab long rnams cha bsnyams pa'ang snga ma bzhin te
133b1(rgyud 'bum): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsungs shing byin gyis brlab
133b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la zhig ril bu 'di dag sgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu mngon
133b3(rgyud 'bum): par brtson par byed pa de/ tshe 'di la chos gnyis re bar bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos nyid
133b4(rgyud 'bum): du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang chos gnyis te/ tshe 'di la dngos grub nges par gzhon par 'gyur ba dang / shi 'phos nas
133b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang rdo rje'i rigs su gzhon nu'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/ / yang gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
133b6(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi spyod yul la
133b7(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa dang / yid gnyis dang the tsom dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje can dang byang chub kyi sems dang
134a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i yid du bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
134a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ ji ltar brtul zhugs la gnas pa yin/ ji ltar
134a3(rgyud 'bum): spyad pa spyod pa yin/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgro spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la gnas na yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /
134a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags rnams la dngos grub 'thob pa dang / theg pa chen po las yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
134a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros legs so legs so// yang legs so// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon
134a6(rgyud 'bum): la yid la zung zhig dang kho bos khyod la bshad do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa bdag nyid rang gi lha'i gzugs su byas la
134a7(rgyud 'bum): the tsom med pa'i yid kyis nga rgyal bskyed cing 'gro'ang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung / rtag tu dus thams cad du bskyod kyang mi g.yo ba de'i tshe/
134b1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no// gang gi tshe des lhas bstan pa de'i
134b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul dang 'thun par bya ba byed pa dang / de'i rnam par bsten pa dang rnal 'byor la brtson pa de'i tshe brtul zhugs la gnas pa yin no// gang gi tshe brtul zhugs de la bzlas brjod/
134b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i las spyod pa'i tshe spyad pa spyod pa yin no// lha'i gzugs de dang tha mi dad pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson zhing / gang gi tshe bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang
134b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gzung ste/ theg pa chen po la spyod pa de'i tshe gsang sngags rnams la dngos grub 'thob bo// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags
134b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mtshan ma med pa la gnas par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod
134b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ji ltar mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa yin zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub kyi sems bsgoms na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang la mtshan ma rnams ma
134b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung zhing thams cad kyi thams cad du med de mi dmigs pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros sems mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su
135a1(rgyud 'bum): med do/ / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub kyi sems
135a2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/ / sems can rnams la phan bzhed pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa yi// brtul zhugs dang ni tshul khrims
135a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / spyod dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la// gang tshe gnas nas de'i tshe// sngags pas 'di ltar sngags sgrub bo// rtog dang bral ba'i ye shes ni// sngon gyi rgyal bas
135a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon sangs rgyas/ / rtog dang bral ba de la ni// gsang sngags 'grub par bstan pa yin// de yi 'bras bu rnam dag pa// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal 'gyur//
135a5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rtog la gnas byed pa// de la dngos grub mi 'byung ngo // de lta bas na rtog spangs la// sngags kyi gzugs ni bsam par bya// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
135a6(rgyud 'bum): pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir byis pa rtse ba'i spyod pa'i gar rnam par dag pa'i
135a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
135b1(rgyud 'bum): des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs can stobs po che// dpa' bo chen po cher grags pa// ma dul rtag tu 'dul
135b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / sngags dang gsang sngags spyod pa dang // rnam pa kun tu byis rtsen dang // ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang / bsam gtan bsam gtan byed rnams kun//
135b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba// gsang sngags shes pa che 'byung ba// dkyil 'khor chen po gtsor gyur pa// spyod pa kun tu brtan pa'i
135b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhi/ / dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bshad du gsol// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur pas gzod ma nas skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ rang gi snying po rdo rje chen
135b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i yi ge smras so/ / na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA ba ra da badz+ra maM de nas ram pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i snying po chen po 'di smras mthag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
135b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshar du gyur nas mgrin gcig tu/ kye ma dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje chen po 'di ni sngon gyi spyod pa las byung ba'o zhes smras so// yang 'jam dpal gyis rang gis dam bcas pa'i yi ge'i rdo rje
135b7(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA he he ku mA ra ka/ badz+ra badz+ra sma ra sma ra/ pra ti dz+nyAM sA hA/ 'jam dpal gyis yang rang gi ngag yang dag par grub
136a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzhi smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bA kyeng tA re ku mA ra rU pa d+ha ra swA hA/ yang 'jam dpal gyis rang shing ga yang dag par grub pa'i
136a2(rgyud 'bum): sgo'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsaur+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA rA kyi da badz+ra he swAH/ 'jam dpal gzhon du gyur pas nga gi ngag gi don sgrub par byed pa'i gsang snga ga smras
136a3(rgyud 'bum): pa na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bA kye da badz+ra ko bi ra swA hA/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo ldeg pa smras pa/
136a4(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA taM badz+ra hri swA hA/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi pho nya mo'i tshogs kyi snying po smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
136a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ro ba ke Shi ni sAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+red kra ke Shi Ni sA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
136a6(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba thA su ma tI badz+rI NI sAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsitA k+Shi badz+ri Ni sA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA A
136a7(rgyud 'bum): karA Ni badz+red gi swA hA/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor spras pa/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor che 'di ni// kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/
136b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mtshan rtags mtshan ma can// de yi dbus su bya ba ni// gru gsum rnam par gnas pa ste// gru gsum lta bur gzhag par bya// me las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri/
136b2(rgyud 'bum): tshon ni kun tu dmar po ste// rdo rje 'bar bcas mtshan ma can// de yi cha gsum bzhag nas ni// ut+pa la yi gzugs bris te// de yi steng du rdo rje bris// 'bar dang bcas shing
136b3(rgyud 'bum): thig ler mdzes/ / tha ma thog thag bya ba ni// ut+pal gzugs kyi 'phreng ba'o// sngags pas de yi dbus su ni// gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs ldan pa// mgo la phud pu lA
136b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag pa/ / sha mdog gur kum 'dra ba gzhag/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal rdo rje dang bcas pa thogs shing g.yas pas dam pa sbyin pa'o// yang na phyag rgya'i gzugs so//
136b5(rgyud 'bum): yang na yi ge'o// de yi phyag rgyar bri ba ni// ut+pal rab tu bzang po ste// de yi steng du rdo rje bri// 'bar dang bcas shing thig les mtshan// de'i g.yas rol tu snying po rnam
136b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag go/ / g.yon rol tu pho nya mo rnams so// 'og rol tu khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo ldeg pa'o// lho phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o//
136b7(rgyud 'bum): nub phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'o// byang phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ste cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// yang na phyag rgya rnams so//
137a1(rgyud 'bum): yang na yi ge'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas snying po mchog ni 'di sgrub par smras pa/ de la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ dbang bskur ba/

137a3(rgyud 'bum): ur mo 'am/ lcags sna gsum mam/ tsan dan las byas pa'i ral gri'am/ 'khor lo 'am/ lcags kyu 'am/ be con nam/ dgra sta 'am/ mdung thung ngam

137a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / tha mar de nyid du mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus te dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pas a ka ru'i ya
137a6(rgyud 'bum): sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi la bsgrags pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na/ nab phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar mtshan ma chen po dag 'byung zhing rdzas kyang 'gyur te grub par 'gyur ro//

137b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi gzungs thob pa dang / nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don

137b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ro// ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin rjes su dran par byed na mtshams med pa la sogs pa las
137b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/ / nyin gcig bzhin du nyi ma 'char kar phyag rgya bcings te lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na zla ba drug na yul gru sbyin par byed do// shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog dag la
137b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan re re btab ste nyi ma'i gzugs la bsnun na zla ba gcig na grong dam pa brgyad sbyin par byed do/ / pad+ma'i rdzing du song ste pad+ma dag la lan bdud sngags kyis btab nas/ bcom
138a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje la phul la snying po mchog de nyid kyis 'bras kyis 'o thug gis lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid byed do/ / gdong la sngags

138b1(rgyud 'bum): pa mthong na lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la sngags kyis btab ste bsdigs na bzlog par 'gyur te the tshom med do/ / ci ste 'chi byed la phur bus gdab par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phur bu 'am/

139a1(rgyud 'bum): @a ka ru'i bdug pa sreg cing zas mi bza' bar gnod sbyin mo yid la byas te lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te gang bslangs pa de sbyin
139a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa byas shing nor bu bzang gi lag nas bzung ste lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ zla ba drug gis di na ra brgya sbyin par byed de/

139b4(rgyud 'bum): mar la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab pas lto ba na ba sel lo/ / rab tu 'khru ba la srad bu sngon po la sngags kyis btab ste rkeng par bcings na rab tu khru ba sos par 'gyur ro//

140a1(rgyud 'bum): ma byas la kha dog sna bzhi pa'i bum pa bzhi la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab ste lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ shing sdong gcig pa'i drung du ma ning ngam/

140a5(rgyud 'bum): bor 'jug la de logs su bltas te/ dug dang khrag dang lan tshwa dang ske tshe'i 'bru bsres pa'i sreg thugs rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo ldeg pas lan nyi shu

140b1(rgyud 'bum): do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos bskal pa nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog cher rgyas rgyal ba'i
140b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po mnyes par byas na/ zhi ba'i blo gros des kho bo shin tu dka' bar byed par gzigs pas cher thugs rje'i stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas snying po dam pa 'di byin no// zhi ba'i
140b3(rgyud 'bum): blo gros snying po dam pa 'di thob ma thag tu kho bos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs chen po 'bum phrag bcu dang / mngon par shes pa chen po

140b5(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum las yang dag 'das pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad de/ kho bo'i chos ma grangs 'di lta ste/ snying po mchog de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis skad cig
140b6(rgyud 'bum): thang cig yud tsam la bzung ngo / / blangs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe snying po dam pa 'di thob pa'i skad cig de la zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod
140b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyan la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo 'bum phrag grangs med pa thob bo/ / zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
141a1(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byams dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag la gnas te/ gsang sngags yang dag par ston pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
141a2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams grub cing rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las grol ba de dag thams cad kyang snying po dam pa 'di nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas thams cad kha dog sna tshogs su
141a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur te/ gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// zhi ba'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
141a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas me tog char rgyas rgyal po'i dbang po 'di'ang cho ga med pa dang / yo byad med pa dang / ri mo'i gzugs med par bdag nyid grub pa'o// ci ste ri mo'i gzugs sgrub pa
141a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang por gtogs pa la rin la mi rtseg par rgyu skung nyos la/ rdo rje drag po chen po'i snying pos srung ba'i cho ga byas pas ba lang
141a6(rgyud 'bum): gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la/ me tog bkram par tha ga pa yan lag yongs su tshang ba/ dge ba'i ming can/ gso sbyong bzung ba/ zas dkar gsum za ba/ dbang
141a7(rgyud 'bum): po thul ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ rtag tu chos la dga' ba zhig thags cha ba'i rnam lngas bkrus pa dag gis sgra ma shor bar khru lnga ma 'am jug pa zhig 'thag tu gzhug go// khrus
141b1(rgyud 'bum): byas shing byug pas byugs la thod ze'u ka bcings shing dri zhim po'i dri dang ldan par byas pas mchod pa cher byas la/ a ka ru'i bdug pa sreg cing thag pa la yon bzang po byin la dkrol bar

155a1(rgyud 'bum): steng du rdo rje bri/ / rdo rje'i steng du bad+ma'o// lho phyogs su ni song nas su// rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya bsgrims te bri bar bya// de yi steng du rlung
155a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag go/ / de yi steng du pad+ma ste// dus mthu'i me 'aza'i 'od can bri// de yi steng du blo ldan pa// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri// nub phyogs su ni song nas su// ut+pa la zhes bya ba
155a3(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / phyag rgya shin tu mdzes bris te// pad+ma'i steng du gzhag par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yin// bden bral phyogs su song nas su//
155a4(rgyud 'bum): ral gri gcig ni bri bya ste// pad+ma dkar po'i steng du gzhag/ 'od zer gyis ni 'khor bar bya// sgo yi g.yas g.yon ngos gnyis su// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bri ste// 'jig rten
155a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum rgyal mgon po dang / / khro bo zla ba'i thig le'o// khro zla thig le'i tho ba ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal thig le'o// de nas sngags pas mnyam bzhag ste// phyi rim
155a6(rgyud 'bum): ngos su bri ba ni/ / de la shar phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pa zi'o// byang phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs su ni
155a7(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje 'khor dang bcas bzi'o/ / nub phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o// sgo'i g.yas g.yon phyogs su ni thub dka' dang mngon du gyur pa gnyis bri bar
155b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / phyogs bzhir ni srung ma chen po bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs su ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin ma'o// byang phyogs su ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o// lho phyogs su ni
155b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer can zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/ / nub phyogs su ni 'jigs pa 'jigs byed dbyug to'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// de nas phyogs bzhir bum pa mgul
155b3(rgyud 'bum): chings dang bcas pa bzhi gzhag go/ / dbus su bum pa gcig gzhag go// de nas slob dpon gyis/ cho ga snga ma'i tshul bzhin du// rab tu bsgrims te slob ma bzung // dkyil
155b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor snga ma'i skabs bzhin du/ / spos dang me tog sbyin par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros ngo mtshar gyis 'dun par gyur pa'i snying gis// byang chub sems
155b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' lag na rdo rje la rnam par blta zhing 'dug nas tshig smras pa/ kye ma sems can chen po gang // sangs rgyas zhing du thams cad du// bsgrags pa chen po bstan pa ni//
155b6(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis spyod pa ci 'dra zhig/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong nas su// gang gi dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje dbang bskur dam pa mchog/ shin tu rmad du byung 'di
155b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / de skad ces spras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros legs so legs
156a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / tshig brjod pa 'di bzang ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'di skad du/ lag na rdo rje rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni mchog tu
156a2(rgyud 'bum): ches gsang ba'o zhes gsungs so/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems dpa' chen
156a3(rgyud 'bum): bo rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ji skad du bstan pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so//
156a4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros gang khyod kyis dris pa legs so legs so// zhi ba'i blo gros rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i mthu bgyis pa nyon cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros dkyil 'khor 'di lta zhog gi/ de
156a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin du ma las nges par byung ba/ gzungs du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'ang kho bo la byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
156a6(rgyud 'bum): shes 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams pas ches snga ba'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros ye shes kyi rdo rje 'di ni sngags pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la mgu ba'i mgo bor bsams la
156a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par bya ste/ 'di nyid de'i dam tshig yin no// des na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag po'i rdo rje 'di mchog tu srung bar byed pa dang / de nyid de
156b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa yin pa dang / bgegs thams cad phung bar byed pa'i phyir ro// de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje bsngags pas nam yang rnam pa thams cad du yongs su
156b2(rgyud 'bum): btang bar mi bya'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas
156b3(rgyud 'bum): gang khyod kyis mchog tu gsang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa legs so legs so/ / ye shes rdo rje bla na med// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yi// ye shes gzugs su snang ba
156b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ / blun po rnams kyis mi shes so// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so//
156b5(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i blo gros khyod la gsang chen bshad kyis/ zhi ba'i blo mos khyod kyis ma dad pa su la'ang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di ma bsnyad cig/ dam tshig 'di'ang yongs su dag pa ma gco
156b6(rgyud 'bum): bar su la'ang ma sbyin cig/ lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe
156b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la spras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags
157a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa yang dag par bstan pa las don nges par byung ba rnams kyi rtags su gyur pa/ rdo rje mchog
157a2(rgyud 'bum): las yang dag par byung ba'i phyag rgya rab 'byams dbyings rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par grub pa/ sems can gyi khams bsam pa tha dad pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par tshim
157a3(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa/ 'gro ba tha dad pa rnams dang / rigs dang / skye gnas dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs tha dad pa rnams dang / spyod pa tha dad pa rnams dang / bsam pa
157a4(rgyud 'bum): tha dad pa rnams dang / tshul dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa tha dad pa rnams dang / tshig gi lam tha dad pa rnams su sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i lus kyi dbyibs dag mngon par sprul nas/
157a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa rnams su sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyis mnyam pa nyid las nges par sbyor bar byed pas chos kyis rnam par
157a6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'phrul las yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyag rgya rab 'byams dag yod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi
157a7(rgyud 'bum): sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du de dag kho bos khyod la bshad kyi nyon cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
157b1(rgyud 'bum): paphyag 'ardo rjes spru la/ rigs kyi bad+mo'i dus yinano/ 8'tshang yin gyis/ rigs kyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bya snang po'i rgyun gyi na'i phyag kyar ba 'byams bshang/
157b2(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na de'i dus lags/ de'i tshod lags
157b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma
157b4(rgyud 'bum): thag tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brgyan du gyur pa'i phyag
157b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya rab 'byams smras pa/ thog mar lag pa gnyis snying khar sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du gzhug/ gung mo gnyis gzhi bas te gyen du bsgreng la/ mdzub mo gnyis tshigs
157b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i thad ka nas gang gis ma reg tsam du bzhag la/ mthe'u chung gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis kyang de la phyogs par gyen du bsgreng ngo // 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
157b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te sa ma ya badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ya mtshan gyis
158a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par gyur nas/ drang srong chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi dam tshig 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang // rang
158a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal dag dang 'jig rten na/ / gnyis med bse ru lta bu dang // tshangs pa la sogs 'phrul po che// 'jig rten lha rnams gang yin dang // gang gzhan gnod sbyin dri za dang //
158a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lding mi 'am ci sogs dang // srin po yi dgas gnon po dang // gri ba gnon brjed byed grags pa rnams// de dag kun gyis tshig smras pa// dam tshig dam pa ngo mtshar
158a4(rgyud 'bum): to/ / sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig 'di las su 'das pa// sdang sems ldan pa de dag gi/ mgon po dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // sems can kun la phan
158a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pas/ / me lce 'breng 'khrugs mi bzad pa'i// rdo rje rnams kyis rtag tu 'gems// dam tshig 'das pa nges par ni// ngan song 'gro la sogs par 'gyur// skyob pa byang
158a6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' dang / / rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mi mnyes byas// de dag dngos grub tshe 'di dang // tshe gzhan 'bras bur 'gyur 'di med// gal te 'bras bu mchog
158a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na/ / de ltar byas na rnam kun tu// blo dang ldan pas bsgrims byas la// dam tshig 'di ni bsrung bar bya// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis de nyid du sbyar ba ni rdo rje
158b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis byur du spang bgyed pa ni rdo rje dzA gar gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis bsogs su bkyed pa ni kun tu brjod pa me'i phyag rgya'o// bya
158b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug pa ni rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste thur du bstan la mthe bong dang lhan cig bzhag pa ni rdo rje phur bu
158b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis bkug la lhag ma de bzhin bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'dra ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo thams cad gcig tu kha 'phye
158b4(rgyud 'bum): ba la thug pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje ut+pa la'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad 'khyud la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i drung du gzhar ba ni rdo
158b5(rgyud 'bum): rjegadu bu'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i ngos la gzhar ba ni rdo rje kha'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje kha'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis nang
158b6(rgyud 'bum): logs su bcug la bstod de bzhag pa ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i logs su yid tsam dgug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
158b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug/ srin lag gnyis gzhibs te gyen du bsgreng ba ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di
159a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis bsnol bar 'khyud la/ lhag ma de bzhin bzhag pa ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//
159a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis 'khyud la lhag ma de bzhin du bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das mA ma kI'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis
159a3(rgyud 'bum): srin lag gi drung du gzhar ba ni rdo rje sgeg pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje sgeg pa'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gcig bkyed pa ni rdo rje me tog gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la
159a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bcug ste gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa ni rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo rnams lan thabs su byas la bzlog ste mdzub
159a5(rgyud 'bum): / mo gnyis gzhibs pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pas mthe bong g.yas pa mnan la lhag ma snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o//
159a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bkyed la mthe bong gnyis de logs su phyogs par bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis brkyang
159a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ni rdo rje sder mo can gyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang la mthe bong gnyis sbas pa ni rdo rje rigs mdzes ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis snying khar gzhibs
159b1(rgyud 'bum): te mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la lhag ma thams cad brkyang ba ni rdo rje bla re'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang nang du bkug pa ni rdo rje tog gi phyag
159b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong gi rtse mor bzhag la snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni rdo rje lag pas sangs rgyas pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka'i snyim pa
159b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te sor mo thams cad dril bu'i tshul du byas la srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste bskyod pa 'di ni rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa la mthe'u chung gnyis
159b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje rnga bo che'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs la mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug pa ni rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid
159b5(rgyud 'bum): las gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgrengs te 'khyud pa'i tshul du bya zhing / mthe bong gnyis yid tsam dgu bor bya ba ni rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya'o// 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang
159b6(rgyud 'bum): du bcug pa ni be con sngon po'i phyag rgya'o/ / 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis mdzub mo'i ngos kyi drung du bzhag ste gzhar ba ni rdo rje lus mar gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur
159b7(rgyud 'bum): bcangs la bskor ba'i tshul gyis gzir zhing mthe bong bsgreng ba ni rdo rje kI li kI li'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong nang du bkug la srin lag gnyis bslangs te tshigs gsum
160a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dgug pa ni gzhon nu lag bzangs kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs la tshigs gsum bkug pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje ske'i phyag rgya'o//
160a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgrengs la lhag ma snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa nang du
160a3(rgyud 'bum): bkug pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje dbu rgyan rtse bran gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan la srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs te gung mo gnyis dbus su rtse mo dgug
160a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni na da ku be ra'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug la srin lag gnyis thad kar brkyang ba ni khro bo zla ba'i thig le'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa
160a5(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur bcings la smin mtshams su bzhag ste mdzub mo dang gung mo mig gi tshul du dpral bar sbyar ba ni rdo rje 'jigs 'jigs lha'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la
160a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzum mo gnyis kyis gung mo gzhibs pa la 'khyud pa ni kun tu bzang po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo
160a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis brkyang ste yid tsam bkug pa ni stobs po che'i be con can gyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo sprang de zlum por byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o//
160b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo de nyid las bsnol te sbyar ba ni rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya'o// 'di nyid las g.yon pa yid tsam bkug pa ni rdo rje yu ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin dugag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te/
160b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis lag mthil du bkug la gung mo gnyis tshigs gsum pa bkug ste thur du bstan pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la srin
160b3(rgyud 'bum): lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug ste mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bong gnyis la 'khyud pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo thams cad bsdus
160b4(rgyud 'bum): la gung mo yid tsam brkyang ba ni rdo rje gtsug tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje mtshams kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo dang mdzu
160b5(rgyud 'bum): mo gzhibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong de gnyis kyi drung du bcar la lhag ma snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//
160b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la khu tshur g.yon pa brdeg par gzas pa ltar bya zhing khu tshur g.yas pa brang la bcar te mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni mngon du gyur pa'i phyag rgya'o//
160b7(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis bskor ba'i tshul du khu tshur bcangs la rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang la khu tshur bsnun pa'i thabs su ston pa ni thub dka'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar
161a1(rgyud 'bum): la mthe'u chung gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug pa ni rnam thos kyi bu'i dbyug to'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid mdzub mo gnyis zhags mig gi tshul du byas pa
161a2(rgyud 'bum): ni zhags pa ste nor rgyas kyi bu'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad 'khyud pa ni sa'i snying po'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o//
161a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis ral gri'i tshul du sbyar ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'i ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// ral gri'i phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis nang du bkug pa ni sgrib pa thams cad
161a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / ral gri'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug pa ni zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan te srin lag
161a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bsgre ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis mthil du gzhar ba ni spos kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis gung mo gnyis la bcar
161a6(rgyud 'bum): ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis mthe'u chung gnyis kyis 'khyud pa ni mchod yon gyi phyag rgya'o// mthe bong gnyis brkyang ba ni mar me'i
161a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / mthe bong sbas te mdzub mo bskum pa ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar la mthe bong dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te srin
161b1(rgyud 'bum): lag gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje dbyangs can gyi phyug tu las ma dzus mo gnyis nang du bgug la mthe'u chung gnyis mthe song la phyogs par bya ba ni rdo rjebs
161b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya las mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sprin ma'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje smin ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis mig gi tshul du bkug ste grung
161b3(rgyud 'bum): mo'i ngos la gzhar ba ni rdo rje mig gi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje mig gi phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje rna ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje rna ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo g.yon pa bkug pa ni rdo rje
161b4(rgyud 'bum): lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje lte ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo g.yas pa bkug ste g.yon pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje mkhur ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje ma khur ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis
161b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad ste rtse mo bkug la sbyar ba ni rdo rje nu babs kyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje na babs kyi phyag rgya las mthe bong g.yon pa bsgrengs la g.yas pa bkug pa ni rdo rje rked pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo
161b6(rgyud 'bum): rked pa'i phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis bye ste phyir brkyang ba ni rdo rje mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje mtshan gyi phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis yid tsam bkug la thur du bstan pa ni rdo rje brla'i phyag rgya/
161b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje brla'i phyag rgya las srin lag g.yon pa yid tsam brkyang ba ni rdo rje byin pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje byin pa'i phyag rgya las srin lag g.yas pa brkyang ste g.yon panang du bkug pa ni rdo rje rkang pa'i
162a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis bsnol te rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul du bcings la mdzub mo gnyis bsdigs pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje lag pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje la
162a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo g.yon pa bkug pa ni bran po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni bran mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di
162a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid las gung mo g.yas pa phye ste brkyang ba ni pho nya thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo g.yon pa phye ste brkyang ba ni pho nya mo thams kyi phyag rgya'o// snga ma bzhin
162a4(rgyud 'bum): du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du byas la mthe bong g.yas pa bsgreng ba ni phyag brnyan thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pa brkyang ba ni phyag brnyan ma tham cad kyi phyag
162a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kha phye la thug pa'i tshul du thal mo sbyar te spyi bor bzhag pa ni gzhon nu gtsug nas byung ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la
162a6(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong g.yas pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje lha rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yas pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgya'o// snga ma bzhin du snyim par sbyar ba mdzub mo
162a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa bkug pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//
162b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba nI rdo rje rje pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje rje ba'i phyag rgya las srin lag g.yas pa bkug pa ni rdo rje lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las srin lag g.yas
162b2(rgyud 'bum): pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis ka bkug pa ni rdo rje mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid
162b3(rgyud 'bum): las mdzub mo g.yon pa bkug pa ni rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid brkyang ba ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo g.yas gnyis bkug pa ni rdo rje srin
162b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid brkyang ba ni srin mo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis bkug pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las brkyang ba ni rdo rje gnon
162b5(rgyud 'bum): bapa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung bkug pa ni rdo rje grib gnon gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid brkyang ba ni rdo rje brjed byed kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka snyim
162b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul du sbyar te song mo thams cad sbar la mthe bong gnyis so so'i lag mthil du gzhar ba ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yas pa rang gi
162b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas su bzhog pa ni skye ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du mthe bong giyon pa rang bzhin gyi gnas su bzhag pa ni rga ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mthu
163a1(rgyud 'bum): bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni nA ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong gzhar ba ni dbul ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag
163a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bye ste mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar ba ni rgud pa 'gog pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa la mthe bong g.yas
163a3(rgyud 'bum): pas 'khyud cing / / de bzhin du mdzub mo g.yas pa la mthe bong g.yon pas 'khyud pa ni 'chi ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la gung mo gshibs
163a4(rgyud 'bum): te bsgrengs la srin lag dang mthe'u chung mdzub mos 'khyud de mthe bong gnyis de dag gi drung du bzhag pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
163a5(rgyud 'bum): s nyim pa sbyar la srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste gung mo gshibs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste ngos la gzhar zhing mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du bzhag pa ni sangs rgyas thams
163a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rig pa mchog gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis bsgreng ba
163a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste gung mo la nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par bzhag pa ni legs par grub byed kyi phyag rgya'o//
163b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis su sbyar la dril bu'i tshul du sor mo thams cad 'gyed pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis pad+ma kha bye la thug pa'i
163b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid cung zad kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni mthu chen thob pa'i phyag rgya'o// snga ma bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la
163b3(rgyud 'bum): gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung rnams nang du bkug ste mdzub mo rnams gzhibs la mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du gzhar ba ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o//
163b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sprod du sbyar te phan tshun du 'khyud la sor mo rnams blas pa ltar byas te/ lcags sgrog gi tshul du bstan pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o//
163b5(rgyud 'bum): / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam po dgu pa// / de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
163b6(rgyud 'bum): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di
163b7(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la brtson pa rnams
164a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang rang gi phyag rgya rtags su gyur pa la stsal bar bgyi ste/ des rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag myur ba nyid du dngos
164a2(rgyud 'bum): grub thob par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so//
164a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu dag khyed kye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa khyed legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir rang rang gi phyag rgya rab 'byams dag smros shig/ de nas mi
164a4(rgyud 'bum): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas rang gi phyag rgya smras pa/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te sor mo gsum brkyang la mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis gcig tu sbyar bar bgyis te/
164a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi tshangs pa'i be con gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang gi phyag rgya smras pa/ lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la srin lag
164a6(rgyud 'bum): dang mthe'u chung rnams nang du bkug ste/ gung mo gshibs te bsgreng zhing mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du gzhag par bya'o// 'di ni bdag gi rdo rje'i phyag rgya lags te/
164a7(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad kyi don sgrub par bgyid do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis rang rang gi phyag rgya smras pa/ lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng bar bgyis te/
164b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam thos kyi bu bdag nyid chen po can dbyug to'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bzhag pa ni 'phags skyes po'i be con gyi phyag
164b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / be con gyi phyag rgya las mthe'u chung gnyis zhags pa'i tshul du bgyis pa ni yul 'khor srung gi zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// zhags pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis nang
164b3(rgyud 'bum): du bkug la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng ba ni mig mi bzang gi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nas lngas rtsen gyis 'di skad ces smras so// lag pa gnyis khu tshur
164b4(rgyud 'bum): bcangs la gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni lngas rtsen gyi mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang mdung gi tshul du bsgreng ba ni 'brog
164b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi mdung rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya'o/ / snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni lag pa brgyad pa'i mthe bong gi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim
164b6(rgyud 'bum): par sbyar la gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar zhing mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ de gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa sbyar la mthe bong gnyis de gnyis kyi ngos la gzhar zhing sor mo lhag ma gzhibs te
164b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pa ni rmugs byed 'dzin chu dbang gi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni
165a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong steng du bzhag pa ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las
165a2(rgyud 'bum): gung mo gnyis bye ste nang logs su sbyar ba ni dri za thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid nang du bkug pa ni rig sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid bsgreng zhing me lha'i tshul du phral la mthe'u
165a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis nang du bkug pa ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyang phral la lhag ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni srin po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa
165a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas gdong bkab la lag mthil du lces bldag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la sor mo thams cad bsnol te bsgreng ba
165a5(rgyud 'bum): ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan te skyibs dgu bor bgyis pa ni klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sbyar la mthe bong gnyis
165a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis gcig 'khyud pa ni khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni bde byed kyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya'o// mdung gi phyag rgya
165a7(rgyud 'bum): las srin lag gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug la lhag ma bsgreng ba ni dka' thub bzlog gi rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis
165b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhibs te tshigs gsum pa bkug pa ni smin drug bu'i mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong tha mal par bsgreng ba ni gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya'o//
165b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo brkyang ba ni drag po'i chung ma'i mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid pad+ma bzung ba'i tshul du bgyis la mthe bong gi rtse mor mdzub mo bzhag pa
165b3(rgyud 'bum): ni tshangs pa'i chung ma'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / mthe bong dang mthe'u chung sprad la lhag ma gsum ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni dbang po'i chung ma'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid dril bu'i
165b4(rgyud 'bum): tshul du khas sbub pa ni mtshan mo nag mo'i dril bu'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni 'chi bdag gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid khu tshur bcangs la mthe
165b5(rgyud 'bum): bong yid tsam dgu bor bsgreng ba ni phag gi chung ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa de nyid shugs kyi tshul du bgyis pa ni tsA muN+Di'i mi thod kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur
165b6(rgyud 'bum): bcangs la srin lag dang mthe bong gshibs pa ni grib gnon rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gzhibs pa grib gnon ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las
165b7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung yang sbyar ba ni brjed byed kyi gdon gyi phyag rgya'o/ / yang der mdzub mo'ang sbyar ba ni gnon po'i gdon rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung phyung ba ni byad kyi
166a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong tha mal par bsgreng ba ni tum bu ra'i dbyug to'i phyag rgya'o zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so// de bzhin
166a2(rgyud 'bum): du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong nang du bkug ste mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rgyal ba'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la gung mo bsgreng ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i ral gri'i phyag rgya'o//
166a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la srin lag bsgreng ba ni mi pham ma'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung bsgreng ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//
166a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te sor mo thams cad 'dab ma'i tshul du brkyang la/ mthe bong gnyis dbus su bsgrengs te mi 'gul bar bzhag pa ni nam mkha' lding gi rnam par
166a5(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi 'dab ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bsgreng ba ni klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du klu tham cad kyi phyag rgya ci rigs par go rims
166a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sbyar bar bgyis te klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ / lag pa gnyis ka'i ngos tshur bstan la glog rnam par gtor tshul gyis sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo spang de phyogs bzhir rnam
166a7(rgyud 'bum): bar gtor ba ni glog thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar la 'phreng ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni dbyar gyi sprin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa
166b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis snyim par sbyar la gung mo gnyis rtse mo spang ba ni chu lha'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las nang du bcug pa ni zla ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bkyed pa ni
166b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug pa ni dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis nang du btsug la mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ba ni chu klung chen
166b3(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la phral te lag pa g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa'i tshul du bzhag cing g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i
166b4(rgyud 'bum): tshul du bzhag pa ni me'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa oM zhes bya ba'i sngon du btang la bstan pa ni drang srong thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bstod de mdzub mo dang /
166b5(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni ri thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la mthe bong gnyis bsnol te mdzub mo gnyis kyang bsnol ba ni khor yug chen po'i phyag rgya'o//
166b6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyi stan la 'dug la blo dang ldan pas lag pa gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du lte ba'i thad kar bzhag pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa bstod de mi
166b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa bkan te dam pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni dam pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o//
167a1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo brkyang ste dpral bar khro gnyer bcangs la bzhag pa ni phyag rgya 'di ni bdud skrag pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa
167a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo dang srin lag bsgrengs te mthe bo'i drung du bzhag pa ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te phan tshun bsnol la sor mo rnams khu tshur
167a3(rgyud 'bum): bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la bkug ste dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sbyar ba 'di ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la khu tshur bcangs pa de mdzub mo bsgrengs
167a4(rgyud 'bum): la tshigs dang po bkug ste lhag ma rnams bsnol ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ / lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug ste de nyid la bcangs pa ni de
167a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag brkyang la lhag ma de bzhin bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las
167a6(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung brkyang ba ste lhag ma de bzhin bzhag pa ni rkeng pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug te nang du bcug la srin lag gnyis dang /
167a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung dang / mthe bong gnyis yid tsam bkug ste gung mo gzhibs pa 'di ni sbugs kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo
167b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams chen po gcad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / 'di nyid las gung mo bkug la mthe bong brkyang ba ni bsrung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste mthe bong gnyis
167b2(rgyud 'bum): nang du bcug pa ni rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la sor mo thams cad brkyang ste mdzub mo gnyis kyis ngos nas 'khyud pa 'di ni rdo rje/
167b3(rgyud 'bum): go cha'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje lce'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis
167b4(rgyud 'bum): bkug ste nang du sbyar la/ mthe bong gnyis bstod de yid tsam bkug la gung mo legs su phyogs par gzhag ste/ srin lag gnyis snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje zhal
167b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyag rgya chen po'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug la bkug ste bstod de bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis
167b6(rgyud 'bum): bkyed de tshigs dang po bkug pa ni rdo rje so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa'i tshul du sbyar la mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste/
167b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba 'di ni stobs bcu 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis rtse bkug ste sbyar ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las
168a1(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du srin lag gnyis bzhag pa ni rdo rje ye shes thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis
168a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi drung du bkug ste bzhag pa ni byabs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis 'khyud la mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du mdzub mo gnyis
168a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhag ste lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bkug ste srin lag de'i drung du bcar ba ni phyag brnyan ma
168a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo thams cad yid tsam bkug la gung mo bsgreng ba ni ut+pa la'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa khu tshur
168a5(rgyud 'bum): bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo bsgrengs te yid tsam dgu bor byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i so gcig pa yu ba can gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la mdzub mo
168a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis tshigs dang po bkug pa na nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis bsnol ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o//
168a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid nang du bcug pa ni gos bkra gyon pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya
168b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bsnol ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni spros pa med par gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar ba ni de bzhin
168b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i go cha las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo dang srin lag bkyed pa ni sgra cher bsgrags pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la sor
168b3(rgyud 'bum): mo thams cad bsnol zhing zla ba'i tshul du byas la bsdams te mthe bo nga gnyis ngos la gzhar ba ni nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis
168b4(rgyud 'bum): byung ste mthe bong gnyis dang rtse mo sprad pa ni stobs bcu las nges par 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis byung ste mthe'u chung snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni nam mkha'
168b5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bzhag pa ni ltad mo can gyi phyag rgya'o// mthe bong byung ste mdzub mo'i
168b6(rgyud 'bum): drung du bcar ba ni spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo dang mthe bong sbyar ba ni blo brtan gyi rin po che'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni
168b7(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong dang srin lag rtse sprang la gung mo brkyang ba ni lag na rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo
169a1(rgyud 'bum): dang mthe'u chung sbyar la mdzub mo bkug pa ni rtag tu brtson par gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis/
169a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo mnan te mthe bong ngos la bcar ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du
169a3(rgyud 'bum): bcug pa ni cher bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo
169a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la go cha'i tshul du 'khyud pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi go cha'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo g.yas sa la bkug pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi snyan gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo g.yas
169a5(rgyud 'bum): pa bkug la g.yon pa ni 'di nyid kyi smin ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni 'di nyid kyi shangs kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis dang srin lag la
169a6(rgyud 'bum): go cha'i tshul du 'khyud pa yid tsam bkug ste mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du gzhar pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid kha sbub ste smin
169a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du mdzub mo brkyang la mthe bong bstod de bkug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi phyag rgya chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di
169b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la slar bsgreng ba ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste phyir bsgreng ba ni ljags kyi phyag rgya chen po'o// 'di nyid
169b2(rgyud 'bum): las mdzub mo gnyis gdub kor gyi tshul du ngos la gzhar ba ni ma khur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug ste gung mo gnyis kyi drung du gzhar ba ni ko sko'i phyag rgya'o//
169b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya las mthe'u chung gnyis bkyed de snying khar bzhag pa ni dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar ba'i tshul du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gdub kor
169b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshul du gung mo gnyis kyi ngos lnga bcar ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni lte ba'i phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis nang
169b5(rgyud 'bum): du bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis kyi nang du mdzub mo bkug la rdo rje'i tshul du
169b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis snga ma bzhin du bzhag la mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du ngos la bzhag pa ni rdo rje
169b7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje'i yan lag las byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi drung du bcar ba lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rdo rje
170a1(rgyud 'bum): ltar mkhregs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis bsnol ba'i tshul du bgyis la g.yon pa kha spub la g.yas pa bkan te mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse
170a2(rgyud 'bum): mo spang la sor mo lhag ma rnams mdung rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni gnyis ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung dang mthe bong bcings pa'i tshul du bcing ba ni gdu bu'i
170a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ste mtshams bcad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas g.yon gnyis ka bskum pa ni sa bcing ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo snga ma
170a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin brkyang ba lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka'i gung mo bkug pa ni rdo rje 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo brkyang la srin lag g.yas pa bkug pa ni
170a5(rgyud 'bum): lus kun tu 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ / lus kun tu 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las srin lag brkyang ste mdzub mo'i tshigs dang po ni nam mkha' rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//
170a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'ang lag mthil du phur bu'i tshul du bzhag pa ni phur bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// phur bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad bskum pa ni rdo rje bkra
170a7(rgyud 'bum): shis kyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bkra shis kyi phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad bsgrengs te bzhag pa ni rdo rje tha re'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid sor mo bar phral te bzhag pa ni rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag
170b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyurgya'o/ / de nyid gtun shing gi tshul du gcig tu bsdus pa ni rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya las lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug la mdzub mo be con
170b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshul du bsgreng ba ni rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya'o/ / gung mo'ang de nyid la sbyar te brkyang ba ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya las tshigs dang po bkug pa ni 'khor lo'i rdo rje'i
170b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / 'khor lo'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las gung mo'i rgyab tu mdzub mo bkug ste sbyar ba ni rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje ljags mda'i phyag rgya las srin lag kyang de nyid la sbyar ba ni k+Sha
170b4(rgyud 'bum): Na ya'i phyag rgya'o/ / ka Na ya'i phyag rgya las gung mo bsgrengs te brkyang la de dag las gcig zhags pa'i tshul du bkug pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa
170b5(rgyud 'bum): sor mo gsum bsdus pa ni rdo rje rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje rus sbal gyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//
170b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo gnyis brkyang ste mdzub mo bkug pa ni stang stabs bkug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa snyim par sbyar te gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis la
170b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud la mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis ngos la gzhang ba ni rdo rje gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang nas su// mthe bong gnyis ni bsgreng
171a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / 'di ni gtun shing rkyen yongs te// kun tu thogs pa med par 'dod// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo de nyid du bkug pa ni rdo rje yan lag brgyad pa'i phyag
171a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'ang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags
171a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgo spyod pa rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs sla ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa/ rnam par
171a4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa med pa'i phyag rgya gsang chen yan lag dang yan lag nas byung ba/ rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /
171a5(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang gris byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyis mnyan pa 'am bzung ba rnams kyis ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang
171a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang shes par mi nus na/ gzhan 'jig rten pa mu stegs byed rnams kyis shes pa 'am rnam par shes pa lta ci smos pa bshad par brtsams so//
171a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'chang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i mig gnyis kyis rnam par bltas te/ rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor
171b1(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zur tsam gyis go ba'i ye shes las byung ba'o// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams/
171b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa sgrol bar byed pa yod do zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar nas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba'i
171b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa byung ngo / / de byung nas nam mkha'i khams kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa 'dun par
171b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi khams byin gyis brlabs te/ slar yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bskor ba byas nas
171b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ sems can chen po 'di ni dus so// 'di ni chod do// de nas bdag cag gis
171b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/ / bsrung ba dang / gzi brjid dang / phun sum
171b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa la bar bgyi'o/ / de nas rdo rje 'chang gis gsang chen dang bcas pa'i yan lag gi phyag tu smras pa/ mkhas pas dam tshig ces bya ba'i// phyag rgya thog mar bcings nas/
172a1(rgyud 'bum): su// sangs rgyas snying po dran byas la// lag pa g.yas pa bskul bar bya// oM rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni mi shes pa'i grong khyer
172a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig par byed pa ste/ rdo rje'i ye shes rnam par dgod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas su// steng gi phyogs su yongs bskyod na// sdang ba rnams ni bslad
172a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ / skyod byed rnams kyang g.yo bar 'gyur// btsums kyi tshul du byas nas su// lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas la// rnal 'byor pas ni 'tshogs mar gzhag/
172a4(rgyud 'bum): kha zhes bya ba 'bar 'phrang can// thig le dang ni bcas par yang // spyi bo'i steng du gnas par bya// me lce 'phreng ldan kun tu 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu lham me ba//
172a5(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor phyag rgya phyag rgya che// gtsug tor steng na gnas pa yin// sngags la/ badz+ra ho khaM swA hA/ lag pa de nyid mdzub bsgrengs te// bteg la smin mtshams gnyis kar
172a6(rgyud 'bum): yang sngags pas ha zhes bya bar ni/ / bskyed gnyis dang ni ldan par gzhag/ sngags la/ badz+ra ho hum swA hA/ rdo rje smin ma'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshul
172a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis su/ / lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// haM zhes bya ba mig gnyis su// skyeng gnyis dang ni ldan par gzhag/ sngags la/ badz+ra ho hri swA hA/ rdo rje mig gi phyag
172b1(rgyud 'bum): / / lag pa de nyid bdeg nas su// sa zhes bya ba stobs ldan par// mthe'u chung bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje bsnol la gzhag par bya// sngags la/ badz+ra ho sa
172b2(rgyud 'bum): rje sna'i b+hag rgya'o/ / bape nabyung bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis su// lag pa de nyid bteganas so// sngags pas rnab gnyis ka la// he zhes bya ba gzhag par bya// sa
172b3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra ga ho swAhA/ rdo rjen pa'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong bsgrengs te lag de nyid// bteg nas mjung chos gnyis ka yang // sa zhes bya ba skyed gnyis can// brtul zhugs
172b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis gzhag par bya/ / sngags la/ badz+ra ho ho swAH/ rdo rje mkhur ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags pas grung mo mthe basbyar te// lag pa ni nyid bteganas su// ha zhes bya ba
172b5(rgyud 'bum): skyed gnyis can/ / mchu gnyis su ni gzhag par bya// sngags la/ badz+ra ho hUM swAhA/ rdo rje mchu'i phyag rgya'o// sngags shes pas ni mtheb bsgrengs te// lag pa de
172b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid bteg nas su/ / ha zhes bya ba'i thig le can// lce yi gnas su gzhag par bya// sngags la/ badz+ra ho haM swAhA/ rdo rje lce'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa bte/
172b7(rgyud 'bum): nas su// sngags pas nu mjing gnyis ka yang // ra zhes bya ba gzhag bya ste// skyed gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o// sngags la/ badz+ra ha hor swAhA/ rdo rje nu mjing gi
173a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yon pa de nyid ni// mgul pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// ra zhes bya ba skyed gnyis can// mdzub mo'i rtse la gzhag par bya//
173a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ badz+ra ho hri swA hA/ dpal be'u rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// mkhas pas mtshan khung phyogs su gzhag/ ra zhes bya ba'i thig le can/
173a3(rgyud 'bum): der ni legs par gzhag par bya// badz+ra ho ra ma swA hA/ rdo rje mtshan khung gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// sor mo srin lag tshul gyis ni// ra gnyis brtseg
173a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas par yang / / lag pa gnyis kar gzhag par bya// badz+ra ho rA rA swA hA/ rdo rje dge ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// sngags pas snying gi steng du
173a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / ra zhes bya ba rna ru can/ ji lta bzhin du gzhag par bya// badz+ra ho ro swA hA/ rdo rje snying gi phyag rgya'o// lag g.yas dam pa sbyin byas la// mkhas pas sor mo mdzub
173a6(rgyud 'bum): mo yis/ / snying kha nas ni sor gnyis su// skyed gnyis ldan pa'i bar gzhag go// badz+ra ho b+ha swA hA/ rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid smad nas su// gung
173a7(rgyud 'bum): mos pa zhes bya ba gnyis/ / skyed gnyis dang ni ldan pa yang // rtsibs logs g.yon par gzhag par bya// badz+ra ho b+hi bi swA hA/ rdo rje rtsibs logs kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa
