173b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bteg nas su/ / mkhas pas rdzibs logs g.yas par ni// ba zhes bya ba'i thig le can// mthe'u chung sor mo gzhag par bya// sngags la/ badz+ra ho ra swAH/
173b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsibs logs g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// mthe bong dang ni gung mo yis// ba zhes bya ba'i thig ler bcas// rna ru rtags can lte bar gzhag
173b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ badz+ra ho baM swA hA/ rdo rje lte ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// lte ba'i 'og tu sor gnyis su// ba zhes bya ba'i thig le can// gnyis shig
173b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo'i rtse mor gzhag/ sngags la/ badz+ra ho baM baM swA hA/ rdo rje zla ba'i sdug gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// rked pa'i phyogs su blo ldan gyis/
173b5(rgyud 'bum): sor mo gung mo'i tshul gyis su// skyed gnyis ldan pa'i b+ha gzhag go// sngags la/ badz+ra ho b+hau swA hA/ rdo rje rkeng pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa kha sbu ba la/ lag
173b6(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pa de'i steng bkan te/ lag pa gnyis bsnol bar sbyar la/ mthe bong dang mthe'u chung phan tshun rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul du byas te mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la/ g.yon
173b7(rgyud 'bum): rol nas sor mo thams cad go bgo ba'i tshul du bskor ro/ / rdo rje go bgo ba'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ badz+ra haM ha swA hA/ mthe bong gnyis ni phye nas su// g.yas phyogs su
174a1(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs su 'phang / / tshangs pa la sogs lha skrod na// sdang sems can rnams smos ci dgos// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes// rgyal ba dam pa
174a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis gsungs/ / 'di bzhag bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// rgyal ba dam par 'gyur ba yin// sngags la/ badz+ra baM ba swA hA/ mdzub mo nang du bkug nas su//
174a3(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma snga ma bzhin du gzhag/ gung mo gyen du bsgreng byas la// 'og gi sa la gzhag par bya// sngags la/ badz+ra ho haM swA hA/ rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya'o// 'di
174a4(rgyud 'bum): dag thams cad shes nas ni/ / rdo rje'i lus su sra bar 'gyur// bltas pas bgegs kyang zhi 'gyur na// pha rol gnod pa smos ci dgos// bltas pas nad rnams
174a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed// phyag rgyar bcas te sngags brjod na// lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur// de nas slob mas brtag byas te/
174a6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// yan lag thams cad mtshan ldan zhing // yan lag rdzogs la 'thun pa bdag/ mngon pa nyams dang zur blta ba// ma rungs pa dang
174a7(rgyud 'bum): mi thung spangs/ / bye brag tu ni ldan pa brtag/ lta ba don kun grub par byed// drag dang 'jam dang bar ma dang // lta ba rnam pa gsum du gsungs// bskang dang
174b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang dang de bzhin du/ / bskam dang phung bar bya ba dang // ma rungs pa dag dbang bya dang // tshar gcad par ni drag po bstan// 'jam par lta ba 'jam por byed// sems can
174b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du byed/ / sgrub pa rgya chen sems ldan zhing // 'jam por lta bsnyan par smra// snying rje dang ni thabs ldan zhing // byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa//
174b3(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi dpung gi stobs po che// ma dul thams cad 'dul byed pa// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // sdang ba kun lta smos ci dgos// de lta bas na rnam kun tu//
174b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam por lta ba brtag par bya// mdza' dang dgra la sems snyoms shing // las su bya ba rnam spangs la// sngags pa bar mas gnas pa ni// gal te thabs la mkhas shig
174b5(rgyud 'bum): na/ yid la bsam par gyur pa yis// dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur// de lta bas na rnam kun tu// lta ba 'di ni rnam par sbyang // gang zhig lta bas yongs dgra
174b6(rgyud 'bum): cing / / de bzhin yid kyang rnam dag pa// de la rdo rje ye shes phyir// brtul zhugs can gyis mchog tu bstan// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sem
174b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis shes pa lha na/ bdag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' yid rnam par sbyang bar bya'o//
175a1(rgyud 'bum): snyam byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal legs so legs so//
175a2(rgyud 'bum): yid rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'di khyod kyis legs par smras so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir nyon cig dang / gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo
175a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsang sngags rnams la sngags kyi dngos grub thob par gyur pa yid rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /
175a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ yid snying rje dang ldan pa/ thabs la mkhas pa/
175a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi tshul bstan pa la mkhas pas 'di snyam du ngag ma gtogs par yid med/ yid ma gtogs par ngag med/ yid ma gtogs par lha'i gzugs med de/ yid
175a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid ngag yin la/ ngag nyid yid yin no// lha'i gzugs nyid kyang yid yin la/ ngag nyid kyang lha'i gzugs yin no snyam du bsam par bya'o// de ltar tha dad du bya ba
175a7(rgyud 'bum): med par mos na sngags pas yid rnam par dag par thob bo/ / yid rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa de gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du rtag par bdag gi lus dang lha'i gzugs su
175b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi ngag dang lha'i ngag tu/ bdag gi yid dang lha'i yid du mtshungs par mthong ba de'i tshe mnyam par gzhag pa yin no// gang tshe kun tu thams cad du// sngags pa mnyam par bzhag
175b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / de tshe lus la sogs pa yis// mnyam nyid gnas la zhugs par gyur// mnyam nyid gnas la gnas pa yin// yan lag bskyod pa ji snyed dang // tshig tu brjod
175b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ji snyed pa/ / de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya yin// sngags pa kun tu dgra med cing // rtag tu mi g.yo bde bar gnas// dbang phyug kun gyi go 'phang thob// 'dod pa
175b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa'i gnas la gnas/ / de bsil yongs su gdung ba med// bzod dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims sdom// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ byang chub
175b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu ji tsam du yid rnam par dag pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i
175b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par gyur la 'di ni ngo mtshar ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni rkang pa gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa rnams la phan par gyur pa yin
175b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos kyi sgo 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par gyur pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu gang /
176a1(rgyud 'bum): dag chos kyi sgo 'di la mngon brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i gnas la skal pa yod pa yin no// lag na rdo rjes
176a2(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa ste/ de dag ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen
176a3(rgyud 'bum): po la 'jug pa dang / mnyan pa dang / yang dag pa'i skal ba yod pa dag go// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
176a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag yid rnam par dag pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa de dag ni phyag bgyi ba lags te/ bdag
176a5(rgyud 'bum): cag thams cad g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas par 'dus nas gos dang zas rnams kyis de dag la bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o//
176a6(rgyud 'bum): grong na gnas kyang rung / dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste/ gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// phan pa rnams nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
176a7(rgyud 'bum): b u mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa de dag gi re ba thams cad ji tsam du yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis pa de srid du bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
176b1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so//
176b2(rgyud 'bum): grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ gang gi lag na yid rnam par dag pa'i sgo gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub bo// 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa
176b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'dzin pa la bsti stang bya/ ri mor bya ste 'di nyid bya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i
176b4(rgyud 'bum): spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams srung ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa mtha' yas pa'i gnas kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mra
176b5(rgyud 'bum): kho b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA ya b+hi kha te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hUM tsa bi la ni ka/ ke ka rak+Sha rak+Sha dA b+h+ya darma tAM gi tsaN+Da li shak+Sho li ti rat+na ha ma ba yi ni ma ni sa ma ma hA ya na si swA hA/ chos smra ba gang
176b6(rgyud 'bum): la lo zhig gis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par byas na de la 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / / de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te gung mo gnyis bkug la
176b7(rgyud 'bum): nang du bcug pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mnan pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyi tshigs dang po bkug pa ni bdud yang dag par bskul ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//
177a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis slar byung ste snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni bdud kyi dpung skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis gzhi nga
177a2(rgyud 'bum): te mthe bong gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni bdud kyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis phyung la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du bcug pa
177a3(rgyud 'bum): ni bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA he he swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pas mthe
177a4(rgyud 'bum): bong g.yas pa mnan pa ni gdon thams cad gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hi swA hA/ phyag rgya
177a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pas mthe bong g.yon pa mnan pa ni srin po thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu
177a6(rgyud 'bum): khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA te he re Te swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du drud pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying rnam par
177a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhom pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA he raM gi ni he hi swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las snyim pa'i tshul du byas
177b1(rgyud 'bum): la mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis dung gi tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dung gi phyag rgya ste/ klu thams cad kyi snying rnam par gzhom pa'o// sngags la/ na mA/ sar+b+ba ta thAg
177b2(rgyud 'bum): te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dza~M gi ri phut+ta re re swAhA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la gung mo gnyis bsnol ba ni gnod sbyin thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o//
177b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dzi gi ri ni hUM de ke swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la gung mo gnyis
177b4(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni dri za tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA he ri ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ phyag rgya 'di
177b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid las mdzub mo gnyis 'khyud pa'i tshul du byas pa ni lha ma yin nges par gzhom pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
177b6(rgyud 'bum): thA hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis 'khyud la bsgrengs te sor mo lhag ma brkyang ba ni nam mkha' lding thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags
177b7(rgyud 'bum): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha ri pid+mo li mu khe swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la lag pa g.yon pa bkan te g.yas pa kha sbub
178a1(rgyud 'bum): la srin lag gis lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du reg par byas pa ni mi 'am ci tshar gcad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ namaHsarba ta thA ga te
178a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba bA dza ya dza ya ni swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mos lag pa de nyid kyi mthil du reg par byas pa ni lto 'phye chen po tshar gcad pa'i phyag rgya'o//
178a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ga ra li ni hUM ka ri ni swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la lag pa gnyis bsnol ba ni snang
178a4(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad dgag pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA he tsan di he ri bi ke swA hA/ lag pa de gnyis sor
178a5(rgyud 'bum): mo rnams gcig gis gcig 'khyud la lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni srin po thams cad snying tshim par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA
178a6(rgyud 'bum): ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA kau ka ri Ni dzAM ka ri Ni ke swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis yid tsam bkug pa 'di ni srin mo thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed
178a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ka ra na dzi te/ bi kha la mu ke swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyi las mdzub mo gnyis bya/
178b1(rgyud 'bum): ste mthe bong snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni sha za 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'o// rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis rtag tu gsungs so// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH
178b2(rgyud 'bum): sarba thA mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis phye la mdzub mo snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni sha za mo thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/
178b3(rgyud 'bum): namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA bi sha tsi ni swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyang phye ste gung mo snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni 'byung po thams cad dbang
178b4(rgyud 'bum): du bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA gung gung sAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis kyang phye ba la srin lag
178b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni 'byung po thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA gu mi gu mi hi li ge swA hA/
178b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pa brkyang la lhag ma snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ namaHsarba ta thA gA te b+h+yaH
178b7(rgyud 'bum): sarba su khe b+h+yaH/ sarba bAts+tsha ga li swAhA/ de bzhin du mthe bong g.yon pa'ang brkyang la lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'i phyag
179a1(rgyud 'bum): / sngags pa// san twa kat+tab+h+yasnrus / san rdza la ni 'aN+Di sa/ sdug tsha las mdzub ma gnyis pasprum pa '
179a2(rgyud 'bum): dunas mthe bong gnyis kyi skyeng du bzhag ni brjid byed thams cad ga zhog pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ sa/ sas twa thAg te b+h+yaHsa pas kheSh+Ta/ sarbas la d+ha
179a3(rgyud 'bum): b+h+rU~M shi ni swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor po thams cad bye ste bsgreng ba ni brjed byed ma thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyug rgya'o// sngags la/ namaHsarba twa thA
179a4(rgyud 'bum): barbamra khe d+d+he/ sarba thA be rad+d+hi yu la ka mA ga tsi bu ri re swA hA/ de bzhin du mar mo thams cad bklag skye nang du bcug sa mthe bong gnyis bskyed skyed par byas pa ni byang rnams kyi snying ma
179a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / sdigs pa/ rnamaHsarba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaH/ sarba mu~M khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khi kho tsha yaM bi d+hA ra Ni swAH/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis 'akugs
179a6(rgyud 'bum): bcug la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba 'di ni byad thams cad kyi snying kun tu sbyar ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ nA ma/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA bi sir ni swA thA/
179a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i ye shes las mngon par byung ba rnams kyi
179b1(rgyud 'bum): don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying las byung ba'i phyag rgya gsang ba rab 'byams bstan pa'i sgo smras pa/ thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad phyag byas te/ byang chub kyi
179b2(rgyud 'bum): sems mngon du byas la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i mig gis sems can gyi khams khyab par byas te spos kyis lag pa bskus la/ kha shar phyogs sam
179b3(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs su bltas te phyag rgya legs par bcing bar bya'o/ / lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la bstod de bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog gi phyag rgya'o// sngags
179b4(rgyud 'bum): la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA tri rat+na ni ra dza ta hUM hUM swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis bkug ste bcar ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog kun
179b5(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dz+nyA na saM b+ha ba swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo
179b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bkug ste gung mo'i ngos kyi thad kar bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
179b7(rgyud 'bum): sarba thA a mi tod b+ha be dz+nyA na pa ri Ni sA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo bkug pa de nyid kyis rtse mo gung mo la reg par byas pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/
180a1(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA bi ga da dzA dzA na saM b+ha ba swA hA/ lag pa gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bong
180a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la 'khyud pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA ka na bi tsu ti ta dz+nyA no da ya swA hA/
180a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
180a4(rgyud 'bum): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dz+nyA na shi khi saM b+ha ba swAhA/ de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la srin lag gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyobs kyi phyag rgya'o//
180a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA bi shud d+ha ga ta dz+nyA na bi de sA hA/ snga ma bzhin du de ltar khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis
180a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dzi ma swA hA
180a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbu'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na ma
180b1(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA kha tra mi swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis phyung te gzhibs pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gtsug
180b2(rgyud 'bum): tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA dzam/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phyung ste tshogs dang po bkug pa
180b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid la sbyar ba ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tre b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA rbi/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis yid tsam
180b4(rgyud 'bum): bkug la mdzub mo gnyis la phyogs par byas te lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te
180b5(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA aM/ snga ma bzhin lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkyed de brkyang la tshigs dang po dgug cing mthe bong gnyis phyir
180b6(rgyud 'bum): bkyed de brkyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA shrIHphyag rgya 'di nyid
180b7(rgyud 'bum): la gung mo gnyis bkyed de brkyang la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
181a1(rgyud 'bum): sarba thA r+thi/ snga ma bzhin du de ltar lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis phyung ste bkyed pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi phyag rgya'o//
181a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA hri/ 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste dgos pa'i don thams cad
181a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'o/ / gang zhig nang gi dag pa yis// phyag rgya 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// sngags pa de ni sdig bral bar// 'gyur te 'di la the tsom med// rdo rje 'chang rnam
181a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha kun dang // blo dang ldan pa de la srung // de lta bas na rnam kun tu// bdag nyid
181a5(rgyud 'bum): la gus par bya/ / rig sngags rtag tu bzlas byas na// de la dngos grub mi dka' 'o// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsung pa'i sngags// tshe 'di la ni grub par 'gyur//
181a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten sngags rnams gang yin pa// de dag de yi dbang gyur te// bsgo ba ci zhig bgyi zhes shes// de yi g.yas g.yon 'khor bar 'gyur// lha min lha yi smad
181a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang / / de yi dbang du gyur cing 'khod// sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas nas// gang tshe lus ni 'dor 'gyur ba// dbang sgyur gyi ni gnas mchog tu// de
181b1(rgyud 'bum): de ni skye bar 'gyur/ / gang na dbang ldan bcom ldan 'das// rnam par snang mdzad che bzhugs par// rgyal ba'i sras po 'dod pa bzhin// skye ba dag ni 'dzin par 'gyur//
181b2(rgyud 'bum): ji srid byang chub gyur gyi bar// de yi spyod pa nyams mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang rnams thams cad kyis// thams cad du ni byin gyis brlabs// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
181b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste mdzub mo gnyis tshigs dang po bkug la/ gung mo gzhibs te nas gang gis ma reg tsam bzhag cing mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du bzhag
181b4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaNahUM/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub
181b5(rgyud 'bum): mo g.yas pas gung mo bsgreng ba la 'khyud pa 'di ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i mgo'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA maM/
181b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo g.yon pas gung mo bsgreng ba la 'khyud pa mdzub mo g.yas pa phye ste snga ma bzhin tshigs dang po bkug ste bzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//
181b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA dzI/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo bsgreng ba la 'khyud pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i
182a1(rgyud 'bum): byug rgya'o/ / sngags la/ namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA A/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis phye la grog 'gru ba'i
182a2(rgyud 'bum): thabs su brkyang ba ni rdo rje me lce 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA k+ShaM/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las
182a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug ste mthe bo'i drung du bzhag pa ni rdo rje drug po chen po'i dpral ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags la/ nA maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu She b+h+yaHsarba thA ni
182a4(rgyud 'bum): laM ba ti ka ti swA hA/ de bzhin du mdzub mo g.yon pa mthe bo'i drung du bzhag la gung mo bsdang ba'i tshigs dang po bkug ste yid tsam spang pa ni rdo rje drag po'i nu mthing gi phyag rgya'o//
182a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ka d+ha ka tsa ra tsa ra haM pra tsaN+Da badz+ra swA hA/ de bzhin du nu mjing gi phyag rgya las mdzub mo ga
182a6(rgyud 'bum): bkug ste bgying la brkyang zhing mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i dpal be'u'i byug rgya'o/ / sngags lA/ na maHsarba thAg te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
182a7(rgyud 'bum): sarba thA bi s+phu la badz+ra tsaN+Da swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung phyung ste snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i rkang pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga
182b1(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA bi tsi trag ti swAhA/ de ltar phyag rgya rab 'byams 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam pa sna tshogs su gnas pa
182b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams du mar sems can gyi khams du ma rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ dus gsum la ni stobs thogs pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa las byung ba/ de bzhin
182b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
182b4(rgyud 'bum): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba gcod par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtogs pa thob par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung
182b5(rgyud 'bum): dang thugs kyi bkod pa bstan pa'i rnam par gnas pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa sgrub par byed
182b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig
182b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa sha stag go/ / lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul rnam par sprul pa'i
183a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas las phyag rgya rab 'byams ji snyed cig rnyed pa'o/ / // bam po bcu pa// / de nas lag na rdo rjes bdud
183a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad pham par byed pa bkod pa rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/
183a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste lag na rdo rje'i mgo bo la byugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can kun la phan byed
183a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// gsang sngags spyod pa las byung ba'o// rdo rje stang stabs ched kyi phyir// sdang ba'i sems can 'jigs byed pa// ting nge
183a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ / rdo rje stang stabs cho ga'i rim// sems can chen po khyod kyis ston// rdo rje 'byung ba'i rkang stabs ni// sngags rgyal rnams kyi spyi yin
183a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ / 'dug pa dang ni 'gro ba dang // ldang dang rnam par gtor ba dang // dgug pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // rkang pas sa bcing bskum pa dang // spo ba dang ni gzhag pa
183a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / khu tshur bcangs pas gzung ba dang // gzir dang rdo rje'i gzhum pa dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya bur gdab dang // seng ge lta bur mchong pa dang // hUM zhes bya bas
183b1(rgyud 'bum): bsdigs pa dang / / stan las langs nas mchu mnan dang // khro gnyer dpral bar blta ba dang // smin ma bskyod par bya ba dang // de bzhin mig gnyis bgrad pa dang /
183b2(rgyud 'bum): rkang stabs rnam par 'byed pa dang // lag gnyis sbyar bar bya ba dang // de bzhin lag pa bskyod pa dang // rkang pa gnyis kyis mchong ba dang // lus ni snyems dang bcas
183b3(rgyud 'bum): par yang / / bye brag tu ni ston pa dang // gcad dang gtub dang bgad pa dang // bza' dang rnam par bgad pa dang // kun tu sgra dang rnam sgra dang // drag tu byed dang bcang ba
183b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sdang ba thams cad tshar gcad dang // rengs par bya dang rmongs bya dang // gyen du mchong dang nges bsnun dang // mdzes pa'i stabs dang gtsub bsdun dang // sgrub
183b5(rgyud 'bum): phyi dang po sngar spyad pa/ / de bzhin lha lnga bsnyen bya dang // sngags pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang // dngos grub ci 'dra yin pa dang // sems can khams la rnam kun tu//
183b6(rgyud 'bum): bsrung dang sba ba bya ba dang // dbang po 'di dag thams cad dang // gzhan yang yid la ci 'dod dang // sdang sems ldan pa de dag la// de bzhin phyir ni dgug pa dang //
183b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad rgya cher ni// sems can 'phang bar 'dod par spros// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rkang stabs kyis rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsung
184a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba nArbu hU hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ tsaN+Da badza/ pra dzA li ti nArti swA hA/ de nas lag mdza
184a2(rgyud 'bum): rjes gsang sngags 'di thos nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par bltas nas smras pa/ kye grogs po dag nyon cig
184a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can gang la la sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'dong ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod cing gsang
184a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi tshul la brtson pa de dag la ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir deng phyin chad srung ba gyis shig/ bsti stang du gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/
184a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod par gyis shig/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ chos kyi rje bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do//
184a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i
184a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la srung ba sgrub par brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig las 'gal bar byed na rig pa'i rgyal po
184b1(rgyud 'bum): drag pos 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu mched cing rab tu 'bar bas de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du'agems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub
184b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros stang stabs kyi mtshan nyid sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'thun pa'i
184b3(rgyud 'bum): rkang stabs byas nas su/ / de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas te// 'greng la thal mo 'tshogs mar gzhag/ gsang sngags
184b4(rgyud 'bum): lta bur 'joms mchog gis/ / rdo rje stangs tshul gar byed cing // 'tshogs nas thal mo phab nas su// snying khar gzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyogs rnams kun tu
184b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor bar bya/ / rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas la// g.yon pa rked pa'i rgyab tu gzhag/ rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su//
184b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa bskum par legs par sbyar// g.yon pa 'tshogs mar bstod nas su// sdang ba kun la bsdigs par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang bya zhing // gnyis ka
184b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur bcangs/ / khro bcas hUM zhes bya bas bgyid// rdo rje bsnun pas bsnun par bya// rdo rje gar gyis bsgyur nas su// rkang pa g.yon pa bkug byas la/
185a1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar phyogs bzhi rnams su yang // rdo rje'i mnan 'gros mnan par bya// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// rkang pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// rding spang
185a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas la gnas nas su/ / mig ni thur du blta bar bya// rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa ni// sa 'og rnam bdun g.yo bar 'gyur// 'brug sgra ngal 'dra'i hUM ldan zhing /
185a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar rdo rje 'chang 'dra bar// rdo rje gyen du gdeg par bya// rgyab tu thal mo sbyar bar bya// de nas rdo rje gar bya zhing // lte ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// 'di
185a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'i gnas la gnas nas su/ / tsham rngam legs par bslab par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro bo phyag brnyan bran mo yi// mtshon cha'i
185a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag brnyan ji snyed pa/ / rdo rje be con dbyug to dang // mdung thung mnga' chen 'khor lo dang // ka na ya dang gtun shing thogs// pho nya pho smos gang yin dang // bgegs
185a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa rnam par bzlog/ phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan gang gsungs pa// bgegs rnam gzhig par bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan rnams kyis// spyi yi
185a7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rgyas par ni/ / bslabs pa'i sngags pas lhar bcas dang // lha min gsang ba kun tu gzhom// dkyil 'khor la ni bgegs bya'i phyir// tshangs pa'i sdong bur thug
185b1(rgyud 'bum): pa nas/ / sa stangs gnas pa'i lha yi bar// gcig tu 'dus nas lhags gyur kyang // stang stabs chog shes pa yi// sngags pas hUM zhes byas pa yis// thams
185b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par 'thor 'gyur te/ / shing ba la 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin// rdo rje 'bar ba mer gyur nas// bskal pa'i me 'drar langs nas su// rdo rje rkang pa ldan par ni//
185b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// rdo rjes gnon dang ldan par ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su// sngags pas sa gsum phung byed na// bgegs dang log 'dren
185b4(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / bdag nyid chen po'i rdo rje'i rgya// stang stabs 'di ni spyi yin te// bsgrubs min don yang grub byed na// cho ga zhi ba las 'byung ci dgos// rdo rje
185b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'i dam pa ni/ / thog mar bcing ba byas nas su// de nas rdo rje mchog rigs las// 'byung ba gzhan yang bcing bar bya// 'di las gsang sngags rnams
185b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / stang stabs rnam pa thams cad 'byung // de lta bas na rnam kun tu// sngags pas bsgrims te bslab par bya// dam tshig chen po rdo rje 'byung ba'i rtsa ba'i
185b7(rgyud 'bum): stang stabs so/ / rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// seng ge bzhin du pha rol mnan// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// rdo rje rkang pa brkyang bar bya// hUM zhes bya ba'i
186a1(rgyud 'bum): sgra sgrogs cing / / rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su// sa rnams kun kyang g.yo 'gyur na// gsang dang klu rnams spros ci dgos// seng ge'i tshul
186a2(rgyud 'bum): du mchongs nas ni/ / bgegs dang seng ge'i gzugs 'dra dang // glang chen shing rnga spre'u dang // gzhan yang gang dag rkang bzhi pa// de nas rnam par 'bros pa 'am//
186a3(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med// tshangs pas byas pa'i bgegs rnams kyang // skad cig de la myur du 'joms// seng ge ltar pha rol gnon pa'i stang stabs so// rdo rje
186a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar yang 'dug ste/ / rkang pa bsnol ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ka ni// rkeng pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// hUM brjod mgul ba bsal ba'i
186a5(rgyud 'bum): sgras/ / rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni// de yi rtse mo sar btsugs la// rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni// lag pa rdo rje gsor bcas
186a6(rgyud 'bum): par/ / lag g.yon snying khar bzhag nas ni// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mer bsgyur nas// rdo rje nyi ma'i dmigs ldan par// rdo rje mgus
186a7(rgyud 'bum): pa bsal ba'i sgras/ / phyogs kun yongs su rgyas par bya// bgegs kyi gnas su dmigs nas ni// myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis// g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas
186b1(rgyud 'bum): nas te/ / rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// de bzhin phyogs dang mtshams rnams kyang // kun tu yang dag gzhom par bya// bdud sde mi bzang chen po dag/ phyogs rnams kun
186b2(rgyud 'bum): nas 'byung ba kun/ / g.yas brkyang gom pa'i stabs sbyar te// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// sa gsum thams cad g.yo 'gyur na// bgegs dang log 'dren smos ci
186b3(rgyud 'bum): dgos/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bltas nas ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // mi bzad gzugs can srin po rnams// phyogs rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur//
186b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje g.yas brkyang bya ba'o// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// tshogs mar rdo rje thal sbyar te// rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag bskor zhing // sprin ltar yongs su khyab par bya//
186b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing // mchu ni so yis mnan par bya// khu tshur g.yon pa gdag par bya// g.yas pa snying khar gzhag par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas su//
186b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas rol du ni gcu bar bya// 'brug sgra dal ltar hUM brjod pa// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i rkang gnas te// rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya// g.yas pa sa la gzugs par bya//
186b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rkang pas sa 'og tu// bsnun na thams cad g.yo bar byed// sa yi 'og na gnas pa'i klu// gsang dang lha min srin por bcas// thams cad g.yos pa 'di ci zhes//
187a1(rgyud 'bum): ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i sems gyur nas// ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i snying gis su// 'di dag thams cad cir 'gyur kye// bskal pa zad par ma gyur zang /
187a2(rgyud 'bum): de skad phan tshun 'dri bar byed// gnas de nas ni yang bskyod nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig ldan par// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas hUM brjod de// rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun par bya//
187a3(rgyud 'bum): klu dang gsang ba thams cad dang // gzhan yang gang dag sar gnas pa// gang na sngags 'chang 'dug pa yi// gnas de thams cad lhags nas su// lung ni yongs
187a4(rgyud 'bum): su nod byed cing / / rdo rje 'bar bas rab nyen pas// jo bo ci zhig tshol cig pa// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol// bcud kyis len dang dngul chu 'am// 'on
187a5(rgyud 'bum): mig bskus sman rdzas sam/ / gnod sbyin po mos 'phangs su 'am// 'on te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam// 'on te dpal gyi sgo bzhed ngam// 'on te yul sa gzhan
187a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhed na/ / rdo rje 'bar bas gzir gyur pas// bzhed pa thams cad bskang bar bgyi// sngags pas 'ga' zhig blangs nas su// de dag la ni bsam par bya// rdo rje gar ni
187a7(rgyud 'bum): legs bya zhing / / phyag rgya de ni bsdu bar bya// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis su// rdo rje gnas su gzhag par bya// gzhan du na ni gsang ba dang // srin po kun la gnod
187b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / glags lha klan ka chol byed pa// gzir ba de dag gnod par byed// thugs su 'gyur ba rtogs nas su// sngags pa la ni gnod pa byed// de ska bas na nas
187b2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu/ / bro dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// rdo rje'i gnas ni rig byas la// sdung sbubs bya ba sbyang bar bya// g.yon brgyang rkang pa'i stang stabs so// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dun
187b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su/ / dpral bar thal mo sbyar bar bya// rdo rje gar ni byas nas su// thal mo snying khar gzhag par bya// tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+ma'i thal mo rgyas
187b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs nas su// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yon pa snying khar bzhag gnas su// hUM dang bcas pas khro bsgyings shing // sos
187b5(rgyud 'bum): ni mchu yang mnan byas la/ / rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan zhing // bzhin ni khro gnyer mi 'chang bas// gang byed pa yi tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yas pas bsnun par bya// g.yon
187b6(rgyud 'bum): pas kyang ni de bzhin bsnun/ / rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya yis// lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// gyen du bltas nas drag tu ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag
187b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bsnun nas kyang / / tshangs par bcas dang brgya byin bcas// gnas dang bcas par thams cad 'gul// phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing // grogs dag bskal pa/
188a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs gyur tam// 'on te sems can che 'byung ngam// 'on te sangs rgyas byung gyur tam// ci zhes thams cad phan tshun smras// myos ches gyur nas
188a2(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun dang / / phyogs bcu dag tu lta bar byed// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir bas na// gnas de nas ni dong nas su// rdo rje ldan pa ci bzhed pa// gsungs zhes lung ni nod par
188a3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis shing // bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid ma lags// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir gyur na// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol// rdo rje
188a4(rgyud 'bum): can gyis rdo rje la/ / mig mi 'dzum par rtag tu lta// lha phal gzhan rnams de dag kyang // rdo rje 'bar bas brgyal gyur nas// rdo rje dam pa ldan pa la// thugs la ci
188a5(rgyud 'bum): dgongs bslang mdzod dang / / gal te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam// de bzhin mi dang lha bzhed dam// lha yi bu mo brnyes pa dang // lha yi bde ba yid mthun bzhed//
188a6(rgyud 'bum): thugs la gang bzhed de rnams kun// de dag 'bul bar bgyid par 'gyur// de nas lha mang rdzu 'phrul che// de dag yid ni rab dga' nas// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir ba dag
188a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po la myur du 'bul/ / de nas byams pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags pas bltas nas gtang bar bya// gzhan du na ni gzir de dag/ glags rnyed gnod pa byed par
188b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste// rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// rkang pa spro ba'i tshul
188b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis su/ / g.yas pa bteg cing de bzhin g.yon// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yod pa snying khar bzhag nas su// smin ma dgug cing
188b3(rgyud 'bum): bskul bskyod de/ / mig gis bgegs la bltas byas la// hUM dang bcas pas rab bskul na// gal te tshangs pa nyid gyur tam// gal te khyab 'jug nyid gyur tam//
188b4(rgyud 'bum): drag po brgya byin nyid gyur yang // bltas pas myur du 'jigs par 'gyur// ci sde khyab 'jug drag po rnams// bdag gi dbang du 'gyur 'dod pas// kun tu spyod pa'i tshul

190a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod par byed/ / thog mar 'jam por sbyar bar bya// lag gnyis tshe ni dbye bar brtson// gsum tshe mchod yon thogs nas su// me tog snyim par gnas

193b1(rgyud 'bum): bar byas nas su/ / mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa bsnol te khu tshur bcang // mthe bong gyen du bsgreng byas la// gung mo gzhibs te bsgreng bar bya//
193b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo de gnyis zla la bsgreng // rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin// rkang pa g.yas pa 'ardeg par bya// g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya// rdo rje me lce me ltar 'bar//

193b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa rdo rje me lce yi// me ltar bsgyur na de kun zhi// rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya// rdo rje kha glal ba'i gar stabs so//
193b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su// bgegs la gso ba byas na ni// nyes pa yod pa ma yin no// rgyal ba'i ye shes las byung ste// rdo rje slob
194a1(rgyud 'bum): dpon gso byed pas/ / bdag 'drar bsngags pa de 'dra ste// bsngags pa ci 'drar rgyal de bzhin// sems can kun la snying rje dang // byang chub
194a2(rgyud 'bum): sems ni bsnun byas te/ / thabs kyi dam pa thob gyur nas// rnam par gso ba thams cad bya// gzhan du na ni phyogs rnams na// bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur//
194a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dang bral ba ni// lha yis mchod 'os ma yin no// thabs dang shes rab bral gyur pas// rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos dang // gang yang rang sangs rgyas dag ni// /
194a4(rgyud 'bum): bka' 'grub gnas la gnas pa ste// bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pas// de dag la ni bya ba med// thabs dang ye shes las byung ba// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
194a5(rgyud 'bum): can/ / byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang // byams dang snying rje'i kha bsgyur dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo rje dang // thams cad mkhyen pa
194a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid pa dang / / byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la// brten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// sems can don dga'i brtse ba'i brtse// de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //
194a7(rgyud 'bum): thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa yis// sdang ba rnams ni thams cad kyis// sems ni rab tu gso bar bya// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas
194b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ rkang pa mthun pa'i gnas bzhag ste// rdo rje thal mo gzum byas la// rdo rje'i gar ni byas nas su// lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng // g.yon pa kos skor bcan
194b2(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / gung mo dang ni mdzub mo gzhig/ mthe'u chung mthe bong phrad par bya// g.yas pa lha yi ba dan gsum// g.yas brkyang rkang par gnas nas su// rdo rje
194b3(rgyud 'bum): bgad pa'i tshul gyis ni/ / kye ma bdag nyid rdo rje can// bdag nyid du ni bdag gnas so// hUM brjod snyoms dang khros pa yis// rdo rje yid kyis gtang bar bya// phyag
194b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyu 'di ni rdo rjes bsdigs/ / rdo rje bkang pas bsdigs pas na// lha dang lha min gsang bar bcas// dkyil 'khor tshe'am sgrub pa'i tshe// bgegs byed phyir ni 'a
194b5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ / rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar bcing // gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni// bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum zhes//
194b6(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing // srung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun// lhan cig dkyil 'khor drung ngu 'dong // rdo rje spangs kyis bskul ba na/ rdo rje slob dpo
194b7(rgyud 'bum): skal ba che/ / bsod nams tshogs ri bsags pa la// gzhan rnams thams cad phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/
195a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul byas te// skal pa'i me yi 'od 'dra bas// thal mo
195a2(rgyud 'bum): brdabs pa'i tshul gyis su/ / khros te lag pa phur bar bya// lag gnyis rdo rje'i tshul gyis su// mthe'u chung mthe bong sprad byas la// g.yon pas kos skor brten nas su//
195a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la// A hUM hUM hUM brjod de bskul ba yis// sngags pas ku tu sgra yang marjod// rdo rje'i sgra ni phyung bas na// sdang ba thams cad phung
195a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / brgya byin tshangs dang zla ba sogs// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' gzhan yang // zos pa tsam gyis sa g.yos te// kun tu sgra yis sems kyang nyams//
195a5(rgyud 'bum): de tshe thal mo sbyar te 'dud// rdo rje sgra chen gang na bar// thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su// rdo rje sgra yis gzir gyur te// stan las sems ni nyams pas na//
195a6(rgyud 'bum): mnga' bdag sugs las ci 'tshal ba// bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces// sngags pa la ni lung yang nod// sngags pas bsam te gar byas na// lha rnams myur du
195a7(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'gyur/ / de nas byams pa'i sems bskyed la// brtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol// rdo rje kun tu smra'o// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// rdo rje thal
195b1(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar nas su/ / phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te// mi mthun rkang skabs byas nas su// bsnol te khu tshur bcangs byas la// mthe bong gnyis ni gshigs
195b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgreng / / gung mo gnyis ni gshibs byas la// mdzub mo dbu ma'i tshigs bkug ste// gung mo gnyis la gzhar bar bya// rdo rje kha ni byas pas na// sdar ba thams
195b3(rgyud 'bum): cad zhi bar 'gyur/ / kha yi thad kar bzhag nas ni// rdo rje kha yang 'byung bar 'gyur// bdag ni rdo rje chen po can// rdo rje'i ye shes stobs dang ldan// hri ha hUM hUM/
195b4(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT phaT phaT/ rdo rje'i gom stabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje gnon pa'i gom pa yis// gzhag dang gdeg pas 'gro byed cing // phyogs rnams bzhi por brjod par bya//
195b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sgra phyung bskul bas na// bgegs chen rnams dang bgegs rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang // de yi mdun du 'gro bar byed// rdo rje sgra yis
195b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag tshig/ rdo rje sgra yis bskul bas na// bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos// rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol// gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed ngam/
195b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang // kun mas gter rnams gzigs bzhed ngam// bka' stsol cig ces de skad sba// dga' bar byin nas sgrub pa la// phyag 'tshal
196a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas nas dong / / rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i slob dpon mthu chen gyis// rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya
196a2(rgyud 'bum): bcing / / rkang pa pus mo btsugs nas su// lag pa gnyis ni khu tshur bcangs// gung mo gnyis ni bsgrengs nas su// mdzub mo gnyis ni ngos la gzhar// g.yas
196a3(rgyud 'bum): brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/ / myur du rdo rje gom stabs kyis// 'khrul 'khor kun la bsnun byas la// sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// lha min gnod sbyin rgyal po
196a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang // thams cad rang gi gnas nas g.yos// bskal pa zad dam ji skams sems// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na// sems
196a5(rgyud 'bum): ni blong zhes gyur nas su/ / ye shes rdo rje che ldan pa// ga la bder nye bar 'dong // rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig/ sngags pas dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam// 'on te
196a6(rgyud 'bum): dngul chu bcud len bzhed/ / rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol// smras nas kun gyis de mod la// yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed// gal te lha dang lha ma yin// gsang
196a7(rgyud 'bum): ba bkol bar 'dod na yang / / 'dod pas de dag lhags nas su// 'dod pa bzhin du las byed do// lung dang 'gal bar byed pa dag/ ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na// slob
196b1(rgyud 'bum): dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yongs ldan pa// sos ni mchu mnan khros pa dang // me 'bar lta bur 'jigs rung bas// myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/
196b2(rgyud 'bum): sa rnams kun la bsnun par bya// g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su// ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas ma/
196b3(rgyud 'bum): ha ha zhes ni de dag smra// stan las lus kyang rab tu nyams// lus ni me yis rab tu 'bar// rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa// ga la ba der nye bar 'dong // skal ba chen
196b4(rgyud 'bum): pos yongs su skyobs/ / bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol// lha dang gsang ba lha min rnams// 'bral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin byed// bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs
196b5(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / rang rang gi ni gnas su 'dong // de lta na ni lha dbang song // de lta ma yin mi gtang ngo // de nas bsgo lung bzhin byas nas// de dag myur du gnas su 'dod//
196b6(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// de nas phyag rgya gtang bya ste// rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni// rkeng pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang /
196b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya// dus bzhin rab tu bskul byas la// gal te bsgo lung 'gal byed na//
197a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i lcags kyus dgug bya zhing // rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bar bya// rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o// rdo rje thal mo btsum nus su// mthun pa'i stabs su/
197a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas bya ste// lag brgyab tu bsnun byas la// rdo rje gyen du 'phang bar bya// de nas rdo rje la bltas la// 'brug sba dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul
197a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis su/ / g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spro// lag pa gson pa'i mdzub mo dang // mthe bong sprad de zhags par bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis// rtse bkug
197a4(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu brtan por bya/ / rdo rje rgyags pa'i mig ldan pa// so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// gang la bgegs ni yod pa der// rdo rje'i stabs kyis myur song la//
197a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa g.yas brkyang stabs byas te// rdo rje'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing // rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya// gal te 'khor
197a6(rgyud 'bum): lo can dang ni/ / dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa// gal te rdo rje 'chang srung yang // sngags pas gzhan nas drangs te dgug/ bkug nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis//
197a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gzeb tu gzhag par bya// ji srid 'dod pa tshogs 'gyur ba// de srid bar du gzhag par bya// bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te// gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs na// bdag gi
197b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa 'dod pa yis/ / de la chad pas gcad par bya// de yi gzugs ni byas nas su// rdo rje'i rkang pas gzir byas nas// ha ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing // lha yi dbang po
197b2(rgyud 'bum): yang 'ong 'gyur/ / de la bsgo ba'i lung yang 'bog/ rdo rje gar gyis de nas yang // thal mo shin tu sbyar byas la// dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su// phyogs rnams
197b3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rgyas par bya/ / rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spro// lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su// phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcangs//
197b4(rgyud 'bum): gung mo gnyis ni gshibs nas su// mdzub mo de la gzugs par bya// nga yi rdo rje phyag rgya de// bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig yin// snga ma bzhin du sbubs tshul
197b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ / phyag rgya bgegs rnams bkug nas su// khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'dis// de la dam tshig sbyin par bya// rdo rje stabs kyis phyag rgya bcing // hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung
197b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ bdag nyid rdo rje bsgyur nas su// bgegs rnams thams cad bkug par bya// lan ni smra bar mi byed na// de ni gtang bar mi bya'o// gal te cung zad mi smran//
197b7(rgyud 'bum): de la chad pas gcad bya ste// shing gi dug dang ltar bu dang // yungs kar dag ni bsregs pa las// de yi gzugs ni byas nas su// me yi nang du bor byas na// gal te
198a1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pas bsrungs na yang / / bgegs de de yi mod la 'gro// sngags pas de la bsgo bar bya// de nas de la rgyas par bya// byams pa'i sems ni
198a2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas su/ / phyag rgya btang bar brtsams byas na// gzir dang bcing dang bkug pa rnams// thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //
198a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes che la rab gzhog cing // sems can don la snying rje bas// rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur te// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje
198a4(rgyud 'bum): thal mo legs sbyar te/ / phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// gom pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo// lag pa gar byed tshul gyis ni//
198a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas thal mo yang sbyar ro// gom pa bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas phyogs bzhi rnams su bskor// rdo rje rengs byed phyag rgya yi// bgegs rnams thams
198a6(rgyud 'bum): cad rengs par bya/ / myur du rdo rje gom pa yis// phyogs rnams rdo rje rengs par bya// rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che// rdo rje mtshan can bsam par bya// 'og tu lag pa
198a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can/ / steng du g.yas pa'ang rdo rje can// rdo rje rangs byed rab byed cing // phyogs rnams kun tu bskor byas na// gang dag sdang ba'i sems ldan pa// bgegs rnams
198b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rengs par 'gyur/ / rdo rje rengs byed byas pas na// bgegs byed phyir ni 'tshe mi byed// de yi spyi bor rdo rje ni// legs par bkug nas bsam byas na//
198b2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i gnas la thug pa nas// sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar// rdo rje rengs pas rengs 'gyur te// rmongs shing sems kyang med par 'gyur// sngags pa mkhas pas
198b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod par du/ / de srid du ni rengs par byed// rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas te// phyogs rnams kun tu
198b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byas na/ / kun nas 'byung ba'i chu rnams kyang // sngags pas skam par byed par nus// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje'i thal mo gzhum byas la//
198b5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni// zhags pa bcas par brkyang bar bya// de bzhin rkang pa g.yon pa ni// g.yon dang lhan cig gdeg par bya// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams
198b6(rgyud 'bum): su yang / / gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni// mngon du bskal pa'i me lta bu// so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// 'og logs su ni mig bltas te// rdo rje'i
198b7(rgyud 'bum): gom pas myur song la/ / rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas te// lhun po'i rtse mor gzhag par bya// 'og ma shugs nas 'byin pa'i lag/ g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te/
199a1(rgyud 'bum): mchong pa'i rkang skabs sbyar ba yis// kha yi tshul du 'dug par bya// rgod ma rta yi kha tshul gyis// rgya mtsho'i chu rnams btung bar bya// rdo rje ldan pa
199a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa yis/ / bsam gtan sngags pa ldan 'gyur nas// chu ni ha ha ha zhes su// sgra 'byin nas ni 'du 'gyur na// 'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang // sprin las bya ba smos
199a3(rgyud 'bum): ci dgos/ / bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi// chu las byung ba'ang skam par 'gyur// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i thal mo 'tshogs mar sbyar// phyogs rnams
199a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rgyas byas te/ / sprin bzhin yongs su rgyas par bya// dbang chen gom stabs byas nas su// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yon pa gyen bteg ste// de nas
199a5(rgyud 'bum): sa la gzhag par bya/ / rkang pa g.yas pa btag nas su// g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya// lag gnyis khu tshur tshul gyis su// rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa bslang //
199a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa mkhur bar brten nas su// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor// de bzhin g.yas pa bzhag nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas yongs su bskor// g.yas pa
199a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhur dang brten nas su/ / rdo rje ldan pa g.yon pa bsgreng // rdo rje gom pas myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis// ti se'i rtse mor rkang bzhag ste/
