199b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs chen sgra yang che ldan pa// gtum po chen po pha rol gnon// rdo rje'i tshul gyis steng bskor la// nges pa mnan pa blang bar bya// sngags pa sngags la 'jigs med
199b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / des ni gang du khros par 'dor// rdo rje des mnan tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su// rdo rje mnan pas bstun byas nas// dbang po chen po'ing
199b4(rgyud 'bum): phye mar rlog/ rdo rje mnan pas bsnun pas na// sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yos// lhun po man dang ti se dang // khor yug ri rnams g.yo 'gyur na// lha min sgo
199b5(rgyud 'bum): lta smos ci dgos/ / rdo rje ldan pas bshad na'o// bsnun pas rnam pa brgyar 'gyur te// phub ma spar gang rlung gtor bzhin// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// sa
199b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyang brtsam par bya ba ni/ / rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// snying khar bzhag ste rgyas par bya// rkang pa rting pa sprad nas su// lag pa gar byed sbyong ba dang // rkang pa gzhag
199b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshul gyis su/ / g.yas dang g.yon pa gzhag par bya// rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su// de nas rting pa yang sprad de// gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis// phyogs
200a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhir yongs su bskor bar bya/ / khros pas dbus kyi gnas su ni// rdo rje gom pas myur song la// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// gung mos
200a2(rgyud 'bum): srin lag 'khyud byas la/ / gnyis ka khu tshur bcang byas te// rting pa sprad pa'i rkang stabs kyis// sa la gzhag dang bteg byas te// g.yas su yongs su brkyang byas
200a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ / bar bur thams cad gsal bar bya// me lce zhes ni brjod byas la// nang na gang dag ci yod pa// sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya// hUM dang bcas shing phaT bcas
200a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / gsang sngags mkhas pas brjod par bya// 'og dang sa yi steng na ni// bar bur thams cad zhi gyur te// kun tu bgegs ni med gyur nas// sngags pas mnyam gzhag
200a5(rgyud 'bum): las rnams bya/ / de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje gzhag pas legs bslabs pas// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar
200a6(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / snying kha'i zad kar bskor bar bya// gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis// rdo rje khu tshur bcang bar bya// g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang bar bya// g.yas pa g.yas su brkyang
200a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rdo rje gom pas myur song la// g.yas brkyang gom
200b1(rgyud 'bum): stabs tshul gyis ni/ / rkang pa gzhag pa'i tshul gyis su// de nyid kyis ni yang bskor ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su bya// rdo rje khu tshur bskyod
200b2(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ / bgegs rnams thams cad da par 'gyur// rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis// sa bsdus 'dor bar 'dod na ni// gom pa gzhag pa'i 'gros kyis su// myur du g.yas pa
200b3(rgyud 'bum): brkyang byas la/ / gcig ni ri rab rtse la gzhag/ cig shos ti se'i rtse sor gzhag/ de ltar rkang stabs gzhag pa ni// kun tu 'dor bar rab byed cing // sa 'og na ni lag pa
200b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon/ / g.yas pa sa yi stang nA ste// hA ha zhes ni sgra 'byin cing // 'jig rten khams su 'phen byed pa// bgegs rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos// log 'dren
200b5(rgyud 'bum): sdang ba drag po rnams/ / mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas ni// gzhan du 'phen pa smos ci dgos// ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang // kun nas tshig par byed 'dod na// rkang
200b6(rgyud 'bum): stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/ / phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par bya// rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs tshul gyis// nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni//
200b7(rgyud 'bum): lce yi 'phreng ldan bzod dka' ba// rkang pa g.yon pa brtan byas la// rdo rje 'dzin de lag pa bsgreng // lus ni btud par byas nas su// rkang pa g.yas pa btes
201a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / sngags pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rlung rnams kun kyang sdud byed cing // nam mkha' me 'drang bsgyur nas su// sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur
201a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug/ lag na 'dzin pa'i rdo rje ni// kun tu ri rab 'drar bsams la// hUM zhes bya ba'i slas gnon cing // rdo rje 'og tu 'phang byas nas// ri dang nags su bcas pa yis//
201a3(rgyud 'bum): sa rnams thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur// de nas thal ba nyid 'gyur te// mer ni shing ba la bcug pa bzhin// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// de nas bsdu ba brtsa ma byas te//
201a4(rgyud 'bum): rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid de// bye brag tu ni lag pa sgreng // rdo rje gom pas myur song la// mchongs pas bskor ba byas nas su// phyag rgya yi ni stang stabs bya// rgyab nas rkang stabs
201a5(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis ni/ / dbus kyi gnas su phyin par bya// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang // rdo rje bsnun pas brdab par bya// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid dang // sngags pa blo ldan
201a6(rgyud 'bum): lag tshul gyis/ / sa rnams thams cad blang byas la// de nyid du ni gzhag par bya// kun nas bsdu bar rab byed cing // mkhas pas gsang sngags brjod byas la// rdo rje can
201a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis bshad pa bzhin/ / sa rnams kun tu gzhag par bya// rim pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis// mkhas pas thams cad kun tu gzhag/ de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje
201b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag pa legs bslabs pas/ / sdang ba lha dang lha min dang // mi rnams gzhag bya gdul bar bya// bsam dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yis// rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas//
201b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa// thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya// gdung bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni// gdung ba nyid kyis grub par 'gyur// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis
201b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / dpa' bo'i lnga po kun tu bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya// rkang stabs gzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'bem la lta zhing lag
201b4(rgyud 'bum): pa gtad/ / srin lag mthe'u chung spang byas la// lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bya// g.yon pa'i gung mo mtshungs par gzhar// g.yas pa yi ni mdzub mo de// brkyang ba'i tshul du
201b5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa ni/ / gzhu dang mnga' zhes brjod pa yin// gung mo yi ni rgyab logs su// mdzub mo mda' yi tshul du gzhag/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// hUM bcas brjod
201b6(rgyud 'bum): de phog par bsdun/ / gal te sa yi 'og gnas sam// tshangs pa rab tu gnas gyur tam// drag pos bsrungs par gyur kyang rung // rdo rje 'phang bar byas nas su// rdo rje mnga' yis
201b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gyur na/ / de ni gson par mi bsam mo// 'phang ba'i stang stabs so// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // thabs shes pa la mkhas gyur cing // 'phang ba'i tshul du legs
202a1(rgyud 'bum): bslabs pa/ / sdang ba'i sems can gdul bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas// srid pa gsum la khyab lus
202a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad gdul bar bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rkang pa gzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa gnyis// thal
202a3(rgyud 'bum): mo khong sdong sbyar bar bya/ / de yi phyag rgya bcings nas su// phyogs rnams kun la bskor byas na// srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na// log 'dren bgegs rnams smos ci
202a4(rgyud 'bum): dgos/ / dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas
202a5(rgyud 'bum): par byas/ / rkang stabs gzhag pa'i tshul gyis su// gnas ni myur du bzung byas la// rdo rje khu tshur snying khar gzhag/ khros pas hUM gi sgra brjod de// rgya mtsho bzhi po'i
202a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas rnams la/ / rdo rje'i lag pas bsnun par bya// klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba dag/ rgya mtsho nas ni 'thon par 'gyur// gang dag sa yi 'og gnas pa// lha min gsang ba srin po
202a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / bsgo ba'i lung la brtson yid kyis// ci tshol cig ces 'khor bar byed// rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag gzir// gnod sbyin mo 'am srin mo 'am// lha min me 'am klu mo 'am/
202b1(rgyud 'bum): bcud kyis len nam dngul chu 'am// rin chen rnams sam nor bu rgyan// dpal dang phur sum 'dod ldan nam// thugs la ci dang ci bzhed pa// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/
202b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas gang yang rung blangs te// gsang ba pa kun gtang bar bya// bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa// ci ste bsgo yang mi 'ong na// rkang stabs tshul ri de nyid kyis// g.yon
202b3(rgyud 'bum): brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya/ / lhun po la ni rkang gzhag ste// lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgra sgrogs cing ni thams cad nas// sa 'og thams cad mnan par bya//
202b4(rgyud 'bum): ha ha zhes ni sgra 'dod cing // bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa// thams cad kyis ni bzungs nas su// shin tu myur bar 'bul bar byed// sngags pas de gcig tshar gcad do//
202b5(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma thams cad gtang bar bya// bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag la// mkhas pas legs par bslab par bya// gsang ba srin po thams cad la// byams pa'i sems ni yang
202b6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed de/ / de dag dam tshig byin nas ni// de rnams kun tu gtang bar bya// // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las bam po bcu gcig pa//
202b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // snying brtse snying rje'i sems ldan pas// mi dang mi min la sogs pa// shin tu gnod byed lha rnams la// lha min gsang bar bcas pa rnams//
203a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs// nad sbrul dug la sogs rnams kyis// sems can rnams la gnod byed cing // dam tshig la ni mi gnas te//
203a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag/ nad dang mu ge la sogs pas// sems can rnams la gnod byed de// pha rol la gnod mngon dga' ba// de dag snying rje med pa dang // bstan pa las
203a3(rgyud 'bum): ni 'gal byed cing / / shin tu rgyags pa'i shas che ba// mthong nas de dag tshar gcang phyir// sngags pa mkhas pas sbyar bar bya// bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du// bdag nyid
203a4(rgyud 'bum): las ni mi sems shing / / bdag nyid la min zhugs gyur la// gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa// gzhan la gnod byed de dag la// sngags pas bzod par mi bya ste// skrag
203a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya zhing bcing bar bya/ / gtub par bya zhing gsang bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas// nam mkha' go skabs med byas te/
203a6(rgyud 'bum): rje'i dbyibs su bsgyur nas su// gus pas sgrim bcas 'jo tshul dang // bzhin 'dzum rgyags dang ldan pa yis// rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis//
203a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams kun tu gar bya zhing // dngos dang mthun par gzung byas la// bsgo ba la ni sems gzhag cing // rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus sra bas// mi mthun rkang stabs tshul gyis ni//
203b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang bas lag bsgreng ste// rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la// srid pa gsum po thams cad mnan// dpa' bo'i gnas su gnas nas su// rkang pa gdegs pa'i tshul gyis ni//
203b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs rung ba// mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba ste// kha ni rgod ma rta yi kha// lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo// lho ba rgya mtshor bsam par bya// lhun po de yi mgo bo bya//
203b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin lag pa khor yug ri// sa ni rkang pa gnyis yin te// nor rgyas bu sprul gsang bsrel yin// rlung ni de yi rna ba gnyis// de yi sgra rnams me yin te// lce ni 'jigs pa chen
203b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i glog/ ha ha ha zhes sgra chen ldan// 'brug sgra hUM zhe sgra phyung la// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su bskor// rab tu bskul bas de nas ni// rdo rje'i sgra yis rgyal gyur nas//
203b5(rgyud 'bum): klu dang dri za srin po dang // lha dang lha min sogs kun 'dong // hUM brjod pa ni 'jigs 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med// rdo rje sgra yis tshig gyur cing // blong bar gyur te/
203b6(rgyud 'bum): dman par lta// rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa// ga la bder nye bar 'dong // rdo rje chen po bka' stsol la// slan chad de ltar ma mdzad cig/ de nas dam tshig bzhag byas la// lha rnams
203b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gtang bar bya/ / rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum pa che// 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs bya rnams la 'jigs bskyed pa// chen pos mchod 'os rmad byung bas//
204a1(rgyud 'bum): mi dang mi ma yin rnams la// 'jigs chen lhas byung che 'byung dang // lha dang klu dang sha za dang // gza' dang ma mo brtse med rnams// nad dang mu ge la sogs dang //
204a2(rgyud 'bum): yul 'khrugs pa dang 'chi byed dang // bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren rnams// srul po srin po la sogs pa// bdag yul gzhan yul las byung ba'i// gnod pa gzhan yang du ma
204a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyar bar bya// rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul gyis// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na// rdo rje 'jigs pa rab bskul bas//
204a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad myur du 'jigs par 'gyur// 'di ni don yod thog pa med// rdo rje 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// sngags pas kun tu sbyor byas na// srid pa gsum yang dbang 'gyur na//
204a5(rgyud 'bum): mi yi 'jig rten mngag gzhug pa// byed par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// tshig gis cung zad bskul bas na// gang dag shin tu dregs ldan pa// srin po lha min gsang ba dang // de dag
204a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ / rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas// dbang phyug kun dang yon tan 'thob// lha rnams kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur// mkhas pas dbang la 'god par byed//
204a7(rgyud 'bum): klu yi gnas su klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyim dang // dri za rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// lha min gnas su lha min dang // mkha' lding gnas su mkha' lding dang //
204b1(rgyud 'bum): mi ci rnams kyis bdag por 'gyur// lha dang lha min mir bcas pa// bsgo ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis// rdo rje 'jigs sgra che ldan pa// de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur//
204b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po'i phyag rgya'o// kun la rdo rje rnam 'phrul pa// de yi 'og tu brjod par bya// dpal ldan mchod pa byed pa pos// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs rnams
204b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ / sangs rgyas rnam pa kun tu mchod// srid par bdag nyid che rnams kyi// bsam yas mchod min gang yang med// 'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas pas// g.yas pa dang ni
204b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon tshul gyis/ / rdo rje'i thal mo bcu ma byas la// phyogs bcu rnam pa kun tu gdung // dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs bskor zhing // dus
204b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnam par bzhugs pa yi/ / sangs rgyas kun la phyag bya'o// bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod// sems can gdul ba'i mchod pa ni// bsam pa ji bzhin 'dug pa ste//
204b6(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa tha dad sems can khams// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phel// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par rtogs// bsam pa chags byed de dang des// sngags pas rnam pa thams
204b7(rgyud 'bum): cad du/ / sems can khams mang gdul bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // kun la shes pa cher 'byung ba'i// stegs dang dpa' dang snying rje dang // bgad dang khros dang
205a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed dang / / 'jigs rung rmad byung zhi ba rnams// bsam pa chags pa rnam dgur dgongs// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // kun la ye shes
205a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung byed pa/ / rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni// gom pa mdzes dang ldan pa yis// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni// gar byed pa yi tshul gyis su// mdzub mo mthe bong
205a3(rgyud 'bum): rtse spang la/ / g.yon phyogs su ni blta bar bya// g.yas dang g.yon pa sbyar tshul gyis// 'dzum byas rgyas pa gus sgrim zhing // lag na rdo rje gsor ldan pas// rjes su chag
205a4(rgyud 'bum): pas gar bya'o/ / lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang // lha ma yin dang mi rnams dang // 'dod khams dbang phyug bdag po dang // sa gsum gnas rnams chags byed cing // mig
205a5(rgyud 'bum): zur bgrad dang lta ba yis/ / de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na// sa stangs mi rnams smos ci dgos// lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas//
205a6(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa can gyis dbang 'jog ste// thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed cing // mngag gzhug par ni rab tu dgod// rdo rje che ldan kun shes pas// rdo rje glu ni thang bar bya// rdo rje'i glu
205a7(rgyud 'bum): yis bskul bas na/ / rjes su chags shing chags chen 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpang spros pa yis// klu dang gar ni rab tu bya// bsam pa chags pas brgyal 'gyur bas/
205b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can khams ni rjes chags bya// rdo rje'i glu ni 'byung ba ste// sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' rjes su chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas// nyi ma stong phrag bcu pas rno ba'i
205b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer stong dang ldan pa'o/ / rnam mang cha byad gzugs kyis sems can 'gro ba rjes su chags mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar
205b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad gsol/ / shardza ba la sogs glu yis// rdo rje gar ni rab byas pas// sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na// sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos// rdo rje gar gyi phyag
205b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur zhing // rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// thams cad la ni gar mkhan bya// gom stabs thams cad mdzes ldan
205b5(rgyud 'bum): par/ / g.yas pas dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pas gtang ba'i phyag rgya bya// mig zur bgrad dang lta ba yis// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis// 'khyud par byed
205b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ / tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams ni// rnam pa kun tu dbang 'gyur te// mngag gzhugs pa ni rab byed cing // rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson// rdo rje chags
205b7(rgyud 'bum): pas chags byas pas/ / shin tu chags pas dregs myos pa'i// lha dang mi dang gsang ba pas// sgrub dka' rnams kyang sngags pas sgrub// rdo rje'i lus la yongs chags pa// /
206a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags thams cad yongs su dor// rdo rje'i glu snyan ldan pa yis// sems can khams rnams chags par bya// rjes su chags pas chags pa'i phyir// /
206a2(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje'i klu yis snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang // gzod nas rang bzhin dag pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul// sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam mang
206a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis// dbang sgyur de nas sangs rgyas snang // 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dren// bdud rnams
206a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su 'dul/ / shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyong // sems can thams cad yongs smin byed// glu 'di rab tu len byed cing // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas na//
206a5(rgyud 'bum): lha dang gang dag gnod sbyin dang // lha min krur bcas thams cad 'grub// rdo rje'i klus ni 'dren pa'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpar yang bsgyur te//
206a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen bsam pas kun chags pas// dpa' bo'i lnga po brten par bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa brkyang ba pha rol mnan// g.yon pa brkyang
206a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshul gyis ni/ / seng ge bzhin du bsgying bar bya// tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te// rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dang // rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni// tshangs pa la sogs bsdu
206b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje'i glu ni len byed cing // sa gsum 'bar ba'i sku ldan pa// nyi ma bye ba 'bar mtshungs pa// nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam pa med// chos dang rgyal mchog
206b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi gtso/ / sangs rgyas sku mchog de la 'dud// so yis mchu ni rab mnan cing // kun nas mig can khro gnyer bzhin// rked par rdo rje brten nas su// phyogs bcu kun
206b3(rgyud 'bum): tu blta bar bya/ / g.yas pa rdo rje tshul gyis ni// phyogs rnams kun tu rab bsgrags pa// lha 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing // sreg pa'i bskal pa bzhin lta bu// grub
206b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur rdo rje me 'bar bas/ / 'jigs pa che lngar bzod dka' bas// bgegs rnams la ni sbyong bar bya// 'jig rten gsum po thal bar rlog/ nyes pa chen po ma yin la// phyag
206b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya 'di ni sbyar mi bya/ / thun mong ma yin dgos pa ni// tha ma'i tshe na sbyar bar bya// rdo rje 'chang bas bsrungs gyur kyang // hUM brjod pas na thal bar rlog/ 'jig pa'i me ltar bzod
206b6(rgyud 'bum): dka' bas/ / rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rjedri ye shes legs bslabs pas// snying khar rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis// bzhag nas 'di snyam bsam
206b7(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / sems dmyal yi dgas 'dud 'gro dang // gang gzhan sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnams// lag pa drang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba kun gyis bstabs par bya// bza' btung
207a1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs char pa dang / / gos dang rin chen rgyan gyi char// de dag rnams la kun tu dbab// ci bder yang dag bstabs pas na// snying rjes spyad ras gzigs dbang
207a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / kun tu yongs su rgyas par bya// sems can kun gyis bla med bde// thob par shog cig bsam par bya// snying rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje ye
207a3(rgyud 'bum): shes legs bslabs pas/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bya zhing // 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar bar bya// bteg dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nas myur du smad par bya// rdo rje bgang
207a4(rgyud 'bum): chen phyag rgya 'di/ / rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du dgod// bgad pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lag g.yas bteg byas te// g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su gzhag/ g.yon brkyang
207a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang stabs byas nas su/ / de nas thal mo yang sbyar te// 'jigs rung sgra ni drag byed cing // thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya// 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas
207a6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang rkang pa'i stabs byas te/ / lag pa gnyis ni rgyab rol du// khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya// bgegs kun da bar bya ba'i phyir// mgul pa nges par smad bya zhing //
207a7(rgyud 'bum): sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba yis// bgegs rnams thams cad da par 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas
207b1(rgyud 'bum): la/ / lag pa gnyis ka lto bar gzhag/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// ha ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rgya che
207b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / ri rnams phye mar rlog byed na// sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te// sngags pa'i 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa gyen du bsgreng byas
207b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ / gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de bzhin so yis mchu mnan cing // g.yon pa brkyang ba legs sbyar bas// bgegs rnams kun la bsnun par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni sgra chen
207b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas// thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag gnyis
207b5(rgyud 'bum): zang la bcar ba las/ / lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te// rkang pa g.yon brkyang legs sbyar bas// tho ba yi ni phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'chang nyid yin na'ang bsdun// rdo rje
207b6(rgyud 'bum): bas bsnun pas na/ / de yi mod la bye mar 'gyur// tho ba'i stang stabs so// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang // lag pa mchan khung gzhug par bya// nyi ma 'bar 'dra'i
207b7(rgyud 'bum): lha 'bar bas/ / hUM brjod bsnyems par thur du blta// lag pa rdo rje nyid bsgyur te// 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra phyung la// rgya mtsho man dang bcas pa yis// sa rnams thams cad
208a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yo bar bya/ / so yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing // rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar byas// de dag thams cad da bar 'gyur// g.yas/
208a2(rgyud 'bum): brkyang rkang skyabs byas nas su// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs tshul gyis// g.yon pa brang la gzhar bar bya// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la// mdzub mo myur du bsgreng byas
208a3(rgyud 'bum): shing / / rdo rje'i sgra ni 'byung byas na// gal te sangs rgyas nyid gyur kyang // bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya// rdo rje can gyis bshad na'o// sdang ba'i sems can
208a4(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / phyag rgya 'dis ni bskyod pas na// de dag thams cad da bar 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la// lag pa thal
208a5(rgyud 'bum): mo brkyang bar bya/ / g.yon pa brang du gzhar bar bya// lag pas myur du bsnun stabs kyis// hUM dang bcas pas sa la bsnun// nam mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba yi// ral gri'i
208a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bcings byas la/ / bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya// rdo rje can gyis bshad na'o// mthun pa'i rkang skabs byas nas su// lag pa 'og tu btang nas ni//
208a7(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa'i bar nas bzung byas la// de ni gyen du gdeg par bya// rdo rje hUM brjod sgra dang ni// khros shing khro gnyer bcas pa yis// rkang pa de yis yang bsun la// de nas bgegs b
208b1(rgyud 'bum): sam par bya/ / rdo rje'i rkang pas bsrun byas nas// ri rab rnams kyang phye mar rlog/ rdo rje rkang pa'i stang skabs so// g.yas brkyang rkang skabs sbyor ba yis// lag gnyis 'kho
208b2(rgyud 'bum): lo'i tshul du brkyang / / so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// kun tu 'khor lo 'phang bar bya// phyogs rnams kun na gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams gzhig par 'gyur//
208b3(rgyud 'bum): zhig par gyur pa'i zhing rnams nas// rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyang 'byon// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// gang gzhan dbang ni thob gyur rnams// blong zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa// /
208b4(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje'i gan du 'ong // srog zad na ni mi rung gis// bu gcig nged kyis ci zhig bya// khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// nged kyis myur du sgrub bo zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo
208b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas/ / lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad// bskal pa'i me ltar gyur pa yis// g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya legs sbyar bas// sa gsum
208b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'bar bar bya/ / sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas// sngags pa rnams la rtag 'tshe ba// bgegs byed ma rungs chen po pa// srin po sdang ba rnams skrag go// phyag rgya
208b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas/ / de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// de tshe nges par bsnun blangs la// sngags pas gyen du 'phang bar bya// de tshe su yis/
209a1(rgyud 'bum): mchu mnan la// myur du gom pa gcig bor te// nges par bsnun pas bsnun pa'i tshe// srin po sdang ba bgegs byed pa// de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur//
209a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nges bsnun phyag rgya yis// de dag thams cad bzlog par 'gyur// dbang chen gnas la gnas nas su// lag pa gnyis ni bsgreng byas la// lhun po'i rgyal po blangs nas su//
209a3(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis su de bzhag nas// sngags pa la ni bgegs byed pa// sdang ba'i sems can rnams la bsnun// bsnun pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med//
209a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i sngags pa la// gang tshe bgegs shig bgegs byed pa// de tshe sngags pa stobs chen gyi// phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di la sbyar ba na// mthong nas de
209a5(rgyud 'bum): dag bar 'gyur/ / de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas// rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas// cod pan stabs kyi thabs bshad do// sngags pas shar
209a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kha bltas la/ / lag pa g.yas pa 'tshogs mar gzhag/ g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su gzhag/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la// 'brug sgra dal 'dra'i phyag rgya yis/
209a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis kyang // ngang pa'i rtsal gyi sbyor ba yis// lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas na// rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par
209b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ngang pa'i rtsal gyi phyag rgya'o// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su// lag pa gnyis ni sar btsugs la// ha ha zhes pas rnam brgyan pas// sa gsum thams cad bteg byas
209b2(rgyud 'bum): na/ / rgya mtshor bcas pa'i ri rab kyang // thams cad shin tu bteg par 'gyur// man da ra dang ti se dang // gzhan yang gang dag ri rnams dang // ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis// bsnun
209b3(rgyud 'bum): pab de dag slar mi 'chags/ / g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba dang // lag pa gnyis ni mchan khung gzhag/ hUM brjod bsnyen pas mar bltas te// so yis mchu ni mnan byas la// rdo rje
209b4(rgyud 'bum): cod pan phyag rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis// de yi tshe na g.yon bteg ste// khros dang bcas pas rkang gzhag pas//
209b5(rgyud 'bum): sa gsum thams cad drang bar bya// drang ba'i cod pan phyag rgya'o// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la// bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed
209b6(rgyud 'bum): cing / / 'khor lo bzhin du phyogs su bskor// phyag rgya 'di la legs sbyar nas// de dag 'ching dang gzir bar 'gyur// bgegs rnams thams cad sel byed pa// rdo rje can ni nyid kyis
209b7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / bgegs rnams skrag pa'i phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor stan la 'dug nas su// rkang pa g.yas pa gdeg par bya// lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// rkang pa gcig gis
210a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor/ / 'khor lo cod can phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// me tog thal mo
210a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar tshur gyis/ / de yi tshe na sa la gzhag/ de nas myur du yang gdeg go// 'dis mchod pas na sngags pa la// thams cad bgegs byed mi 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag
210a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i stang stabs
210a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na bskal pa dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs las ngas thos kyis/
210a5(rgyud 'bum): de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// de yis skrag par byas las bgegs// log 'dren thams cad gdung bar 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun
210a6(rgyud 'bum): tu 'bros byed cing / / 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med// lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas su// g.yon pa brkyang bar rab sbyar te// phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya'o// de nas
210a7(rgyud 'bum): rkang pas yang mnan to/ / skrag byed 'di ni skrag pa che// bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa ste// skrag pas rnam par lung 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med// de
210b1(rgyud 'bum): nas rkang pa'i tshul gyis kyang / / mig ni thung du bzlas byas pa// lag pa g.yas pa bsgra nas ni// g.yon pa thang la bzhag byas te// sagapas la bdabs pas ni// ngoH
210b2(rgyud 'bum): thal mos bstun par bya/ / rdo rje'i thal mo'i sbrang stabs so// rnal 'byor stan la yang 'dug ste// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su// 'khor
210b3(rgyud 'bum): lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/ / 'di ni rlung 'ching chen po ste// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// gal te rnam 'thor rlung byung yang // de yang mi g.yo 'dug par 'gyur//
210b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung 'ching ba'i stang stabs so// gar gyi tshul la legs bslabs pas// rkang pa spo bar bya bas kyang // lag pa thur du smad byas la// lag gnyis mthe bong srin lag
210b5(rgyud 'bum): sprad/ / g.yon pa brkyang la legs sbyar te// lag pa g.yas pa sa gar bya'o// gar gyis bgegs rnams thams cad ni// shin tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur// dga' bas
210b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa de la ni/ / de dag phyin chad bgegs mi byed// mthun pa'i rkang skabs byas nas su// lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te// g.yon pa ral gri'i tshul byas la// gnyis
210b7(rgyud 'bum): ka gcig tu sbyar bar bya/ / gal te rdo rje 'chang gyur kyang // bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya// kun nas shin tu drangs nas kyang // de nas phyag rgya gtang par bya//
211a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings byas la// gnod par gyur pas kun tu yang // ha ha zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing // sems ni blong zhes gyur pa yis// blo ldan lag
211a2(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje la/ / lung ni yongs su nod par byed// phyin chad bgegs ni ma byed ces// lag na rdo rje lung bsgo'o// rdo rjes gzir ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//
211a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas snying rje yang bskyed de// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag pa la// me tog thal mo sbyar nas su// de yi tshe na de dag la// gang tshe sngags pas mnyam bzhag tshe// khyed cag
211a4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs ni ma byed par/ / gnas su dengs shig brjod par bya// g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nasasu// lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis
211a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / khu tshur mchan khung gnyis su gzhag/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa// sngags pa drag po'i las byed pas// phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas kyang // rdo rje gzir bas gzir
211a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / gzhan yang gang dag log 'dren bgegs// srin po gang dag dregs pa dang // rgod ma rta yi khar gnas pa// de dag thams cad gzir gyur cing // rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis//
211a7(rgyud 'bum): gzir nas de dag lpags 'gyur te// shin tu mi bzang nga byed cing // srog zad gyur na mi rung gis// ci 'tshal bka' ni myur du stsol// bsgo ba'i lung ni nod par byed// sngags pas
211b1(rgyud 'bum): ci 'dod de bzhin du/ / gal te lung ni nod byed na// de lta na ni thar bar 'gyur// gzhan du na ni nam yang min// shin tu mi bzang gzir bas na// khyod ni ci bzhed de bzhin du// bgyid
211b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' lung stsol cig ces/ / de tshe de dag de skad smra// 'tshogs mar rdo rje thal bzhag nas// de nas de dag dam tshig sbyin// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te// g.yas pa
211b3(rgyud 'bum): brkyang bas gnas nas su/ / rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya// gtub pa byas pas de dag kun// de la skyabs su 'gro bar byed// snying rje
211b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis su/ / de nas phyag rgya gtad par bya// snying rje'i sems kyis de dag la// ma 'jigs shig ces smra bar bya// sngags pa de yi 'dod pa bzhin// de nas de dag
211b5(rgyud 'bum): rang gnas 'dong / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag phyag rgya gsum yod de/ gang ngas
211b6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i rgyun gyi snying po las phyag rgya gsum tho ba ste/ bskal pa
211b7(rgyud 'bum): du mar de bstan pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams kyis nga la ma gtses kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu bsgrims la nyon cig/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa g.yon pa snying
212a1(rgyud 'bum): khar gzhag/ g.yas pa gar dang bcas pa yis// 'tshogs mar legs par gzhag par bya// bgegs rnams rtag tu gzhig pa yi// dam tshig 'di ni brjod pa
212a2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / 'di ni bstan pa tsam gyis kyang // 'bros par 'gyur te the tsom med// phyir bzlog pa ni yang byas la// sa la lag pa brdab par bya// lag pa gnyis ni bteg nas su// /
212a3(rgyud 'bum): de tshe mkhur ba bud par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de tshe bgegs rnams bcom par 'gyur// rdo rje can ni nyid gyur kyang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcom 'gyur na// mthong ba tsam
212a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis bgegs rnams kun/ / phung bar gyur pa smos ci dgos// sngags pas shar phyogs bltas 'dug la// lag pa g.yas pa dgur brten te// g.yon pa brkyang la legs
212a5(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / g.yon pas thams cad dgug par bya// sa bcur gnas pa kun kyang dgug/ thams cad nas ni bkug nas su// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pa na// de yi mod la bye mar
212a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba/ lag na rdo rje nga'i slob ma rnams ma gtogs pa khyod kyis
212a7(rgyud 'bum): su la'ang bskrad par mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma dad pa de dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing de dag 'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ma yin no/
212b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes smra bar gyur pas de dag gi rna lam du'ang bsgrag par mi bya na/ phyag rgya lta ci smos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes nas sbyin par//
212b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no// de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang slob
212b3(rgyud 'bum): dpon la brnyas par bgyid pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skrag par 'gyur
212b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / de skad ma smra zhig/ gsang ba la'i bdag po 'on kyang 'ga' zhig brjod par bya yis/ dpa' bo bsgrims te nyon cig/ mtshams med la sogs mi bzad pa// dmyal
212b5(rgyud 'bum): ba gang dag ngas bshad pa/ / de dag rnams kyi gnas su brjod// der ni bskal pa mtha' yas so// de lta bas na rnam kun tu// de la nam yang brnyas mi bya// gsang ba pa'i
212b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag po slob dpon la slob mas ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji lta ba bzhin du'o// de yi sems ni de lta na// rtag tu dge ba skye bar 'gyur//
212b7(rgyud 'bum): de ni 'jig rten thams cad la// phan pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stang skabs kyi rim par phye ba rdzogs
213a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa chen pos//
213a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rgyas pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'jug cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par
213a3(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad du bdag byin gyis brlabs nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mngon du byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
213a4(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis ye shes shin tu
213a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa dpag tu med pa'i don thugs su chud nas/ de dag nyid na bzhugs bzhin du phyag brkyang ste lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor gzhag go/ bzhag nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
213a6(rgyud 'bum): sprul to/ / sems can chen po legs so legs// ye shes rdo rje rdzogs byed pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas byas pa gzo// sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che// thams cad mkhyen
213a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ye shes mchog/ dam pa gsang ba khyod kyis shod// gzungs sngags tshul du dgongs byos la// gang du zhugs ma thag tu ni// sdig pa thams cad med 'gyur ba// dkyil
213b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'dir ni bshad par gyis/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de dag thams cad phyag slar bskums so// de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge
213b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin las langs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed ma/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed ma/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/ bgegs thams cad 'jigs par
213b3(rgyud 'bum): byed ma/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed ma/ gzungs sngags chen po'i mchog smras so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA he bud+d+ha ma ti ri/
213b4(rgyud 'bum): sarba pA pa ni Sha Ni/ gardza gardza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ marda marda/ gam bI ra ga ma b+hI ra/ ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ bi d+hA na sa ya bi d+han sa ya/ sarba sha trun/
213b5(rgyud 'bum): ta ra ma ti/ bi ma le/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pra ti dz+nyA na/ sarba b+hU ta/ rU pa si te/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ga na ga na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma la sa ni/ kra ma ni/ ha da ba ni/
213b6(rgyud 'bum): ra ma ni/ ma taM gi ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rjes gzungs sngags mchog 'di smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la sa chen po 'di 'gul to// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// ldeg
213b7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu ldeg go/ / lho phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' 'o// byang phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma' 'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'ang sa la lhung ngo // rig sngags 'chang rnams kyang
214a1(rgyud 'bum): lhung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag kyang mog mog por gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
214a2(rgyud 'bum): blong blong por gyur to/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par gyur te/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 'khor de blong blong por
214a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa mthong nas de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye grogs po dag khyed kyis ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po dran par gyis shig/ de nas 'jam
214a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje'i gzungs 'di ni mthu chen po 'di yin na/ sgrub pa po gang la
214a5(rgyud 'bum): la zhig 'di 'dzin pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu ji lta bur rig par bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam
214a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal gzungs 'di'i mthu 'am/ nus mthu 'am/ mthu bsgyings ci 'dra ba ni/ 'jam dpal shar phyogs log
214a7(rgyud 'bum): na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dri ma med
214b1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das des thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la 'di bzhin
214b2(rgyud 'bum): du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' de la byin ma thag tu de'i mod la gzungs 'di'i mthus spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams 'byung zhing
214b3(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang
214b4(rgyud 'bum): thob pa gang dag gis kyang 'di ci yin zhes bstan par mi nus so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur
214b5(rgyud 'bum): nas gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'od zer gyis dbang bskur nas sku de nyid du bzhugs so// de
214b6(rgyud 'bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs sngags chen po 'di nyid kyi mthus so// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nus gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di
214b7(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi dbang por dbang bskur ba yin na/ khyed kyis kyang gzungs sngag
215a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes
215a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal don yod par grub par bya ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gang dag gzungs sngags kyi
215a3(rgyud 'bum): tshul du gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par dag zhon cig/ de dag gang zhe na/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba su khe b+h+yaHsarba thA
215a4(rgyud 'bum): a ma ri a ma ri/ Tata/ u0f7fny+dza/ dz+nyA dz+nyA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ s+pho Ta swoT/ ma ta ma ta/ dun+mad ma ka sA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaH/ sarba su khai b+h+yaHsarbaH/
215a5(rgyud 'bum): hehe/ ka ni Ti ka ni ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta ba na ke/ bo di nad de/ traT tra TA/ hUM phaT hUM phaT/ kAr+Na gardza/ ba ra ma tri/ bi hA ri ka sAH/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te d+h+yaH
215a6(rgyud 'bum): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA b+ha ga ba te/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA A/ sarba pA pa k+Sha maM ka ri/ dz+nyA na a pa s+pha ra Ni/ b+hany+dzab+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ A na ya A na ya
215a7(rgyud 'bum): m a marjes ram sa tha sa@#
215b1(rgyud 'bum): dun+du b+hi sA ra nir g+ho She ha na ha na/ bi d+hAn sa ya bi d+h+wan sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi pu la nir+m+ma la nir dzA te/ A ha ra A ha ra/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha sa rU ba
215b2(rgyud 'bum): bi ta mA bi lam+ba swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzungs chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ byang chub
215b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po ston par byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ma nor ba'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mig mi 'dzum par/ byang chub sems dpa'
215b4(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
215b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ye shes chen po sngon ma thos pa dang / dam tshig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ye shes chen por dbang bskur
215b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'di yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dbang chen po bskur ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa ye shes bya
215b7(rgyud 'bum): ba zag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las nges par byung ba ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs par gyur to/ / ye shes chen po'i rdo rje de rtogs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
216a1(rgyud 'bum): du mchod pa'i sprin chen po dag byung bar gyur to/ / kye ma ye shes chen por dbang bskur bas 'jam dpal 'di dbang bskur to// zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
216a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sba'u ra zhes grags go/ / de'i mthus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi
216a3(rgyud 'bum): rdul snyed dag ut+pal chen po'i nang du zhugs par mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
216a4(rgyud 'bum): spu'i khung bu'i mtshams rnams dang / cod pan dang / rgyan dang / nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams byung zhing zhugs te/ byang chub sems
216a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad thob pa dag gis kyang spu'i khung bu gcig gi tshad kyang rtogs par ma nus na/ nyan thos dang /
216a6(rgyud 'bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yid la byed pa de btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lag
216a7(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje la mig mi 'dzums par ring du bltas nas/ zhing rnams 'di dag yongs su sbyang bar bya// rgyal sras kun gyi smon lam mthun rdzogs bya// sems can phan dang snying
216b1(rgyud 'bum): brtses nad med cing / / zhi ba bdud rtsi rnyed dka' ye shes bstan// ye shes dam pa zhes pa 'di thob nas// sangs rgyas zhing nas sems can khrag khrig phrag/ grangs med
216b2(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis brjod pa dgrol bar bya/ / khyod kyi ting 'dzin bstan pa mchog tu bya// zhes ched du brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
216b3(rgyud 'bum): pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig smras pa ni shin tu gtsig te khyod kyang legs so// 'jam dpal khyod 'di lta
216b4(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gzungs sngags chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams yid la byed pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/ / 'jam dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
216b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes chen po 'di lta bu dag yid la byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / sgrub pa dang / glegs bam du byas nas nyin gcig bzhin phyag 'tshal ba de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/
216b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab
216b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdul snyed sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub
217a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / gang gi tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas thams cad mkhyen pa/
217a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par brtson par byed pa dag go 'phang de thob par 'gyur ba ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi
217a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo bskor ba sngon ma byung ba de sems can chen po shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
217a4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga po dag yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang / don thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ba dang /
217a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
217a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dgod pa de nyon cig/ 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la lus can thams cad la gsang chen dang bcas pa/ slob dpon
217a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis slob dpon mchog gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ming du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par
217b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la/ tshad ni khru brgyad tha ma ste// slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis bya// ye shes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor deng // tshan nam/
217b2(rgyud 'bum): pa gsum du bya// blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du// der ni sgo khyud rnam bya ste// der ni sgo yang bzhi btod do// gru bzhi lham paM kha khyer bcas// sngon gyi bzhin du cha
217b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum la/ / cha ni rnam pa brgyad brgyad bya// mkhas pas cha brgyad byas nas su// dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyed par// thang
217b4(rgyud 'bum): cig thang cig bsam byas la/ / phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa// dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya// sngags pas de yi dbus su ni// pad+ma mchog tu mdzes pa bri//
217b5(rgyud 'bum): kun kyang mar gang 'dra ba ste// 'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa yin// de yi steng du bum pa ste// bum pa'i steng du ut+pal lo// ut+pal steng du dung bri ste// me lce 'phreng
217b6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'khrigs pas mdzes/ / shes rab pha rol phyin de ni// ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan// cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang // dbus kyi cha las byung ba ste//
217b7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyis tshul du bri ba yang // cho ga'i rim bzhin mthun par bya// de la shar phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo dbang chen po'i dkyil 'khor la
218a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ut+pa la'i phyag rgyar bri bar bya ste/ mtha' rnams su ut+pa la bkra zhing me lce 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bya'o// bcom ldan
218a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA rA oM b+ha ga ba ti/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ti dza ni ke/ su
218a3(rgyud 'bum): rA ya pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta ta Ta Ta/ marda mdza/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hUM hUM dza hi dza hi swAhA/ dbang dag gi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham pa me lce zhes bya ba'i gzungs
218a4(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya ste/ chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa bri// de yi steng du 'khor lo ste// me lce'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa mdzes// de la gzungs sngags
218a5(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di yin te/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA hUM hrIHsarba bud ma ta hrIH/ b+hany+dza b+hUny+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma ma ni da ma ma ni/ garga ri garga ri/
218a6(rgyud 'bum): hrIHswA hA/ me'i phyogs su brten nas bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya te/ chu dang dbang chen ldan pa yis// phyag rgya gzugs
218a7(rgyud 'bum): bzang bri bar bya/ / pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje ste// me lde'i nang du shin tu mdzes// de la gzungs sngag ni 'di yin te// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/
218b1(rgyud 'bum): tra Ta tra Ta/ mu hU mu hU/ sarba pA pa sho d+ha ni swAhA/ lho phyogs su ni gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ me dang rlung dang ldan pa yis// ut+pa la ni der bri'o//
218b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi steng du rin po che// bsam pa thams cad yongs skong ba// me lce'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs zhi ba// pad+ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor// de la gzungs ni 'di yin te/
218b3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA na nir dza te sAhA/ bden bral phyogs su
218b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi me yi dkyil 'khor te// pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yin// de yi steng du sngags pa yis//
218b5(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu shin tu mdzes pa bri// phan tshun 'brel ba'i rdo rje dag/ blo dang ldan pas der dgod do// de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba/
218b6(rgyud 'bum): mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ha ha/ mi hu mi hu/ da ma dam/ kha hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi tsi/ durbAR+Sha da ma ni swAhA/ byang gi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgo
218b7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas ma bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yi// de yi steng du pad+ma ste// 'od na dus
219a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha'i me lta bu/ / de yi steng du ral gri ste// 'od zer rnams kyis yongs su bskor// me lce'i 'greng ba 'jigs ldan pa'i// ut+pal rnams kyis
219a2(rgyud 'bum): kun khebs bya/ / de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba pu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+phoT
219a3(rgyud 'bum): ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma swA hA/ rlung gi phyogs su dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// cha gsum la ni gtsug
219a4(rgyud 'bum): tor gnas/ / lcags kyus thams cad dgab par bya// me lce 'bar ba'i 'phreng bar ldan// nub phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma skul byed ma bri bar bya ste/ de la dbang
219a5(rgyud 'bum): chen dkyil 'khor te/ / de la rdo rje legs par gnas// de yi steng du pad+ma che// pad+ma'i steng du bklung nor 'phreng // de dag me lce'i 'greng ba 'khrigs// steng du pad+ma rnams
219a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis dag pa/ / de nas cha gsum pa la ni// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// sngags pas ci rigs bri bar bya// brgyad rnams su yang snga ma bzhin// de la shar du rnal
219a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pas/ / 'jig rten dbang po 'od chen bri// pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa ni// de yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin// me'i phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
219b1(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri bar bya'o/ / dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyag rgya ut+pal bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su ni lag na rdo rjeni
219b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rdo rje bri bar bya'o/ / byang phyogs su ni byams pa'i phyag rgya ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o// rlung gi phyogs su ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o//
219b3(rgyud 'bum): bden bral gyi phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ral gri bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
219b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ye shes
219b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa khyod yang legs so/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
219b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang dgra dang bral bar
219b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis
220a1(rgyud 'bum): mi tshugs par 'gyur/ chom rkun gyis bcom par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtses par mi 'gyur// de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi
220a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'ang de la nyin
220a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas yongs su zin par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang
220a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / ming tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des ngan song gi sgo tham
220a5(rgyud 'bum): ca gcad par 'gyur ro/ / des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang sring bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig nang par langs nas su// lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi// srid pa nyam pa
220a6(rgyud 'bum): gang byas pa'i/ / sdig las grol bar de 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam po bcu gnyis pa ste tha ma//
220a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces sbas so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su
220b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris nas der zhugs par gyur na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes spras pa/ 'jam dpal kho bos ni de'i bsod nam/
220b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po'i tshad ni bstan par mi nus mod kyis/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyis phung po ni sa'i rdul ji snyed yod pa de srid du
220b3(rgyud 'bum): rig par bya'o/ / 'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can sdig can gang tshul 'di la yid mi ches pa dag yod de/ 'jam dpal the tsom mang ba dang / rnam par rdzog
220b4(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tu zin pa dang / pha la ma gus pa dang / ma la ma gus pa dang / slob dpon dang bla ma la smod pa
220b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / bla ma'i skyon 'bru ba'i sems can de dag la ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lag tu'ang 'chang du mi gzhug go// rna lam du'ang
220b6(rgyud 'bum): grags par mi bya'o/ / 'jam dpal de dag gi mdun du ni gtam yang mi bya'o// glegs bam du bris pa'ang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar yang mi bya ste/ sems can sdig pa can
220b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag gis spong ba cung zad byas pas kyang ngan song sems can dmyal bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo / / 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes kyang zer te/ de dag
221a1(rgyud 'bum): ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed do/ / de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub med do zhes kho bos smras na/
221a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/ de dag rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur na/ nges par 'byin pa dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub
221a3(rgyud 'bum): gtan med do/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la
221a4(rgyud 'bum): dad pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
221a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub la nges pa yin te/ de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag
221a6(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang
221a7(rgyud 'bum): klog pa dang / 'dzin pa de'i bsod rnams kyi phung po ji tsam yod par rig par bya/ lag na rdo rjes spras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
221b1(rgyud 'bum): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de'i bsod rnams kyi phung po'ang de tsam du rig par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs
221b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/ tshul 'di ma rtogs pa blun po de dag gis ni mi shes so// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / sems
221b3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'khrul dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa
221b4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs ston pa de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang bdud pham par byed pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
221b5(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag kyang gzungs 'di dag gi mthu yin no// 'jam dpal su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur
221b6(rgyud 'bum): ba de ni dam tshig thams cad la zhugs pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam/ gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam/ dkyil 'khor
221b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir te/ de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ma gtogs bde las gzhan med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin
222a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ / su 'dir dbang bsrung ba de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba yin no// 'jam dpal phyogs gang du ye shes/
222a2(rgyud 'bum): chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa 'am/ gang gi lag na 'chang ba 'am/ gang gi phyir 'dri ba 'am/ gang zhig nyin gcig bzhin du nang par
222a3(rgyud 'bum): langs nas lan re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la nyin gcig bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro// 'chi khar yang de la
222a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par mdzad do/ / 'jam dpal ltos dang sa la gnas pa'i shing dang nag tshal thams cad ni sa med na de dag kyang med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du
222a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag la gnas te/ 'di dag gis byin gyis brlab
222a6(rgyud 'bum): pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang rnyed do/ / bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
222a7(rgyud 'bum): nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byed do// 'di ltar thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no// 'jam dpal de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang chongs shig/
222b1(rgyud 'bum): lhogs shig/ yid la gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig dang / de sems can la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sa phyogs gang na
222b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i phyogs de mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro/ / gang gi lag na 'chang ba'i sngags pa de la'ang ston pa'i

222b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'di rin po che za ma tog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal sems can sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ma gus pa'i
222b5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin can dang / slob dpon gyi skyon 'bru ba dag yod pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de dag la ni chung ngu na ni gtam du'ang bzlas par mi bya/ glegs bam yang bstan par mi bya na/
222b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / klog tu gzhug pa dang / ltar gzhug pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal de dag la ltar gzhug pa dang tshig tu dbyung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'

223a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po la slu ba ni tha'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba de ni de lha ma yin no/ / 'jam dpal
223a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon te/ dper na u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin no// de bas kyang gzungs sngags 'di 'dra ba dag ston pa ni dkon no// de bas kyang nan tan gyis

223b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos phul la/ mar me brgyad dang gser gyi bum pa lnga bzhag nas gro ga la bris te mgul

223b3(rgyud 'bum): de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di ni sems can rnams srung ba'i mchog yin te/ khyim mam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/

229a1(rgyud 'bum): zugs kyi mdun du gzhag go/ / de nas zas su 'o ma dang phyi'i lde gu za zhing bzhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas
229a2(rgyud 'bum): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la kha zas mi za bar lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ thig le byas pas lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing
229a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can la lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das ma mthong bar 'dod na zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing ri'i rtse mor song ste bcom
