229a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma la bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das ma nyid 'ong bar 'gyur te// de la ma tog dkar po dag gis mchong yon dbul lo// de nas bcom
229a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das mas sgrub pa'i spyi bor byugs nas bu legs so/ / khyod la mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya zhes de nyid zer ba dang / ci 'dod pa de bslang bar bya ste/ 'dod pa zho 'am
229a7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang de nyid dam/ lus mi snang ba 'am/ sa'i 'og tu 'gro ba 'am/ gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa ci'ang rung ba de thams cad bslang bar bya'o// ci ste ngang pa sgrub
229b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod na li khri las ngang pa'i gzugs byas te/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la/ kun da'i me tog gis mchod pa rgyas par byas nas/ mtshan rangs bcom ldan
229b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na/ nang par ram nyi ma 'char kar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la zhon nas mkha' la 'phags pa dang tshangs pa gnyis par 'gyur ro// ci ste rma bya sgrub par 'dod
229b3(rgyud 'bum): na 'jim pa la rma bya'i gzugs byas te/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la/ zla ba drug tu bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas
229b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas te/ mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma 'char kar rma bya'i skad 'byin par 'gyur te/ skad phyung ma thag tu sngags pas blang bar bya'o// de blangs pa tsam gyis sngags
229b5(rgyud 'bum): pa smin drug gi bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / cho ga de bzhin du sa srungs kyi bu sgrub na brgya byin dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lus mi snang ba sgrub par 'dod na mi'i thod pa blangs la shing mngar dang
229b6(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig tu zhib mor btag te/ tha mar yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la arka'i shing gis me bus la ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgyas par byas nas/ mtshan rangs sbyin sreg byas te nang par
229b7(rgyud 'bum): de'i thal bas sor mo'i sum ris byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur te/ lus mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// sbyor ba gzhan yang 'byung ste/ li khri mar dang lhan cig tu
230a1(rgyud 'bum): bsres la/ de nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgyas par byas nas shel bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du mtshan rangs brjod par bya'o//
230a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ des thig ler byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur te lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// ci ste mig sman sgrub par 'dod na sna ma'i me tog dang lig bu mig blangs
230a3(rgyud 'bum): te zhib mor byas la/ de nas snga ma bzhin du zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas snga ma bzhin du gyur nas des mig bskus
230a4(rgyud 'bum): na phyogs gang du bltas pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / ci ste des mig bskus na rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal po'i bu mo dang /
230a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gang su la bltas pa de thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas mig sman gyi mchog sgrub par 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la mi ro rma med pa blangs te tsan dan dmar po
230a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/ de nas mi ro'i lag tu mig sman bzhag ste bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa dang mi ro'i lag na mig sman 'dug pa 'gul bar 'gyur ro// /
230a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'grub par 'gyur te des mig la bskus na gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong gi sbyin sreg byas na las thams cad bdi thag tu 'grub par 'gyur
230b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te mar gyi zhag brgyad la brtsams nas bsod snyoms kyi zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ yang yul sbyin par 'gyur
230b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la bsod snyoms kyi zas za zhing ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
230b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas zas su 'o ma 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na pha rol gyi dmag 'byer bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang bar byas te/ ri mo'i sku
230b4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par byas la mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/
230b5(rgyud 'bum): rA dz+ya ma da dA ti/ lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas te zas su chu 'thungs na de nas nam mkha' la ral gri
230b6(rgyud 'bum): thogs par 'gyur te/ des mchod yon phul la blang bar bya'o// de blangs pa tsam gyis skra lcang lor 'khyil zhing lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs dang 'dra bar 'gyur la/ rig
230b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang du mas bskor zhing sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa mang pos rol mo byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / nyin gcig bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
231a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du'ang mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dag grub par byed do// gang gi tshe shi bar gyur pa de'i tshe'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su
231a2(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// ci ste ral gri sgrub par 'dod na dgon par song la chu 'thung zhing zla ba gcig bzlas brjod
231a3(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ de'i 'og tu zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya cher byas te mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na de nas ral gri 'phar bar 'gyur te/ de blangs
231a4(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// lo drug khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de'ang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro//
231a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa bzhin du dgos pa thams cad byed do// gang gi tshe shi bar gyur pa de'i tshes dang po la dbang bar 'gyur ro// ci ste zas mi zad par 'dod na spro ba'i rtsa ba blangs la sle tres dang
231a6(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad pa 'byung ngo / / mig na na rgya ma tshwa btags pa la lan bdun bsngags te mig bkab na mig nad sos par 'gyur ro// ka la bing ka'i rtsa ba
231a7(rgyud 'bum): srog chags med pa'i chu dang btags la lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na bud med bde bar bu btsas par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod du
231b1(rgyud 'bum): bcug ste tsi ri ri zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / nye ba'i gso sbyong byas pas tshes bcu drug nas brtsams te til dang sbrang rtsi bsres pas
231b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na rA dz+yA ma pra ti la b+h+ya te/ ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong bar
231b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ chos ston par yang byed do// de thos pas phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// tsan dan dmar po las rdo rje byas la/ de glor bzhag ste 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod/
231b4(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ de la reg pa tsam gyis gling bzhi'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// shing pa ta'i 'bras bu sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// rgya shug gi 'bras bu
231b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang de bzhin te/ gang gi ming nas brjod cing sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// yang na nim pa'i 'bras bu sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro//
231b6(rgyud 'bum): ba ru ra'i me tog sbyin sreg byas na yul chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// ma li ka'i me tog sbyin sreg byas na zas zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// ka ra wI ra'i me tog 'bras bu 'bum phrag
231b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig sbyin sreg byas na di na ra 'bum rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog khri sbyin sreg byas na mdun na 'don mchog tu 'gyur ro// gra ma'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig zangs kyi snod
232a1(rgyud 'bum): du bzhag ste ri nar rnyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ / gu gul gyi sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal phran thob par 'gyur ro// shing bil bas me bus la ma li ka'i me tog
232a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / ba ru ra'i shing gis me bus la a ka ru'i yam sreg shing khri'i sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//
232a3(rgyud 'bum): lha chen po'i gnas su song ste ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byas la arga'i me tog brgyad phul na lha chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub gang 'dod pa sbyin par
232a4(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / lha chen po'i gnas su ri mo'i sku gzugs bris te 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na dka' thub bzlog gi khyo mthong bar 'gyur te dngos grub ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do//
232a5(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod chen por ri mo'i sku gzugs bris te lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na ro langs chen po mthong bar 'gyur te/ mche ba mi sdug par gtsigs la me'i phung po chen po ltar byung
232a6(rgyud 'bum): na'ang de la 'jigs par mi bya bar phyag rgya bcings la bsnum na des 'gyel bar 'gyur te/ de la dam pa bslangs na rgyal srid dam/ gter ram/ mi snang ba 'am/ yul lam/
232a7(rgyud 'bum): rkang mgyogs kyang rung ste/ dam pa lnga po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig sbyin par byed do// lan tsha'i sbyin sreg gis ni lha'i bud med 'gug par byed do// sna ma'i me tog kham bye ba
232b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na nyin gcig bzhin du di na ra re re rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste dgra srog dang bral bar 'dod na sreg blugs lan tshwa 'bum sbyin sreg byas na srog dang bral bar 'gyur
232b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ci ste nam mkha' lding sgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa las nam mkha' lding gi gzugs byas te ba las byung ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la/ de nas nam mkha' lding gi gzugs de
232b3(rgyud 'bum): ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la/ 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la zhon nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro'o// de la yo byad thams cad
232b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang sgrub par byed do/ / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// ci ste 'khor lo sgyur ba sgrub par 'dod na lcags ur mo'i 'khor lo byas
232b5(rgyud 'bum): la spos chus bkrus la gur kum gyis byugs la/ de nas a shwad tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na des 'grub par
232b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ des bzung ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs
232b7(rgyud 'bum): su bskor zhing / lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor nas lha'i gzhal med khang gi nang nas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// ci ste bcom ldan 'das
233a1(rgyud 'bum): ma sgrub par 'dod na ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzlas brjod drug 'bum byas na bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs/
233a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur ro// ci ste zhi bar byed par 'dod na pad+ma kha bye ba brgyad stong
233a3(rgyud 'bum): phul na su'i ched du phul ba de zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na de'i nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// ba ru ra'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin
233a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/ / dpal gyis zin par 'gyur ro// a d+hi mug ta ka kha ma bye ba khri sbyin sreg byas na/ gang gi ched du byas pa de gdon gang gis zin par gyur pa de la bltas
233a5(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyi gtong bar 'gyur ro/ / zla ba spyang gis zin pa'i tshe mar zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste du ba 'thul gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ci ste rma
233a6(rgyud 'bum): bya sgrub par 'dod na chu ngogs gnyis ka nas sa blanga? te tsan dan dang bsres la rma bya'i gzugs byas te/ de nas rma bya de ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la/ rma bya'i sgra 'byin gyi bar
233a7(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ / ci ste rdzas sgrub par 'dod na ka ra wI ra'i me tog 'bum phul na nyin gcig bzhin di na ra lnga lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro// mid pa nub pa tsam gyi
233b1(rgyud 'bum): chur zhugs la 'bum bzlas brjod byas na gter rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog kha bye ba 'bum sbyin sreg byas na bud med gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// a d+hi mug ta ka'i me tog wi
233b2(rgyud 'bum): phul na lus la nad ci yod pa thams cad byabs pas med par 'gyur zhing phyis mi ldang ngo / / tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro// lus la skal ba bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lo brgyar 'tsho
233b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste pha rol gyi dmag gzhig par 'dod na mdzub mo la lan bdun bsngags te bsdigs na dmag 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'thab par 'dod na 'ug pa'i sgro 'bum sbyin sreg
233b4(rgyud 'bum): byas na cher 'thab par 'gyur ro/ / dgra phung bar byed par 'dod pas ske tshe 'bum sbyin sreg byas na dgra srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rgya shug gi 'bras bu tsha ba gsum gyi mar du bsnyugs
233b5(rgyud 'bum): pa khri sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams cad kyang mi gtse bar 'gyur ro/ / ba ru ra'i 'bras bu nyung kar gyi mar du bsnyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma lngas dgra phung bar 'gyur ro//
233b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya na 'bras sA lu'i phye ma las gzugs byas la gtub cing sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis brgya byin yang dbang du 'gyur ro// ka ra wI ra'i me tog kha ma bye ba sbyin sreg byas na gnod
233b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ / snga ma'i lo ma sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de spyo bar byed do// dza ti ka li ka nan la k+Sha dzu tu yang rA dza naM ba shi ka ro ti/ a ti mug ta ka'i me tog brgya stong
234a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na yul dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi sbyin sreg gis zhag bzhi pa med par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa sbyin sreg byas na nyin gcig
234a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du di na ra re re rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas klu sgrub par 'dod pas ma li ka'i me tog kha ma bye ba 'bum sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ de dag yod pa thams
234a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis ci 'dod pa bzhin 'grub bo/ / mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog kha ma bye ba khri sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin g.yog lnga brgya'i gos
234a4(rgyud 'bum): zas 'bul lo/ / ci ste gnod sbyin mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na a ka ru'i ya ma sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ de dag ci 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub bo//
234a5(rgyud 'bum): ci ste lag na rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/ tha mar zla ba nya la ut+pa la'i me tog ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te/ mtshan rangs
234a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas na nang par ram nyi ma shar na lag na rdo rje 'ong ste/ 'ongs nas sngags pa'i mgo la reg par byed de/ reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
234a7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ gzhan ci'ang rung ba zhig rnyed par 'gyur ro// des ci 'dod pa de thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kyi mdun du shing kau shu
234b1(rgyud 'bum): ka'i me tog 'bum phul na di nar stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kyi lag pa la bzung ste zla ba gcig bzlas brjod byas na nyin gcig bzhin di na ra re re sbyin par byed
234b2(rgyud 'bum): do/ / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ sna ma'i me tog kha ma bye ba khri phul na nyin gcig bzhin kar sha pa Na re re sbyin par byed do// zla ba gcig tu nam
234b3(rgyud 'bum): phyed na langs te nyin gcig bzhin gi'u wang gis dkyil 'khor byas la/ bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na las thams cad nus par ro// bgegs rnams kyis mi 'tshe
234b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gcig tu tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do// rang gi
234b5(rgyud 'bum): khrag gis dkyil 'khor bskus te zla ba gcig bzlas brjod byas na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do/ / shu dag dkar po 'bum sbyin sreg byas na ma mo thams
234b6(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ de dag ci 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub bo// 'bras kyi 'bru stong sbyin sreg byas na nyin gcig bzhin snod gang ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// sge'u gsher gyi rtsa ba sbyin
234b7(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na nyin gcig bzhin kar sha pa Na bzhi bzhi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / a pa marga'i snying po khri sbyin sreg byas na longs spyod zad mi shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// na le sham gyi 'bru
235a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas la thal ba blangs te thig le byas la mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i phung po'i nang du gtor na de mi zad par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste 'jam dpal
235a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par 'dod na a ka ru dang bsres pa'i gi'u wang gis dkyil 'khor bskus la der gzugs bzhag ste/ zla ba gcig bzlas brjod byas na bdag nyid kyis 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur
235a3(rgyud 'bum): tedes chos ston to/ / de thos nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de ji srid 'dod kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
235a4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dkar po brgya stong phul na de la 'jam dpal 'grub par 'gyur te rgyal srid dam/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa 'am/ sman bcud
235a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis len yang rung ste/ dam pa lnga las gang yang rung ba gcig sbyin par byed do// skyu ru ra'i am sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
235a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur te/ de dag ci 'dod pa grub par byed do// bil ba'i 'bras bu 'bum sbyin sreg byas na dpal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te ci 'dod pa bzhin du
235a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub bo/ / na dz+ya di ma pra yang tsan ti/ ba ru ra'i 'bru sbyin sreg byas na/ dbyangs can thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ de dag grub pa'i tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur ro//
235b1(rgyud 'bum): pri yang ku'i me tog kha ma bye ba khri sbyin sreg byas na nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Na lnga lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro// ci ste thams cad gnyid kyis log par byed 'dod na grong khyer gyi bdag po'i lha'i
235b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ri mor bris la ske tshe'i sbyin sreg byas te/ de'i thal ba thogs la grong khyer du song ste gtong na de dag thams cad gnyid kyis log cing 'dug par 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do//
235b3(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer la ji lta ba bzhin du sbrul la'ang de bzhin du bya'o// mtshe'u skam par 'dod na sreg thugs rang gi khrag dang sbags la khri sbyin sreg byas la/ de'i thal ba blangs te mtshe'u der gto
235b4(rgyud 'bum): na mtshe'u skam par 'gyur te/ de na gnas pa'i klu rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du rin po che rnams 'bul lo// a ba marga'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg byas na lha mo dpal mthong bar
235b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ sa tsa rA dz+ya ma pra yang tsha ti/ bil ba'i 'bras bu stong sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur ro// mya ngan 'tshang gi yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg byas
235b6(rgyud 'bum): narkang pa bzhi pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog 'bum sbyin
235b7(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na bud med thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ / ske tshe'i sdong bu'i yam sreg shing sbrang rtsi la bstsags pa brgya sbyin sreg byas na gdon thams cad de la'i bar byed par 'gyur
236a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / 'bras kyi 'o thug dang sbrang rtsi 'bab chu'i nang du gtor na klu mo thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur te rang gi gnas su'ang 'khrid par byed do// log 'dren sgrub par 'dod na
236a2(rgyud 'bum): a d+hi mug+na ka'i me tog 'bum gtor na log 'dren thams cad dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ / a shwang tha'i lo ma sbrang rtsi la skugs te brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad sngags
236a3(rgyud 'bum): pa de la nyin gcig bzhin du sgo snod gang ba ci 'dod pa 'bul lo/ / rma bya'i sgo brgyad sbyin sreg byas na bdud kyi gdon thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro// a ka ru sa marda nan/ a sta
236a4(rgyud 'bum): sran dzu hu yAng rA dzA ba sho b+ha ba ti/ pri yang khu ba'i yam sreg shing gis ni/ ma hA rA dzA gra ma hi shi ba sho b+ha ba ti/ a ka ru'i yam sreg shing gi me bus la til 'bru khri sbyin sreg byas
236a5(rgyud 'bum): na yul dbang du 'gyur ro/ / shing 'o ma can gyi me bus la til 'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do// shing ma da ka sa me bus la na le
236a6(rgyud 'bum): sham gyi 'bru brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na 'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ 'byung po'i bdag po re re la'ang nyin gcig bzhin du g.yog brgya'i zas sbyin par byed do// gar
236a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa der phrag pa la bskyon te 'gro'o/ / mon sran gre'u 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'byung mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ de dag sngags pas de'i yo byad thams cad sgrub bo// 'jam
236b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'di dag la sogs pa gzungs 'di rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni gang du sbyor ba de'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ / 'dod pa dang / sbyor ba tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba mang yang
236b2(rgyud 'bum): rung nyung yang rung bas kyang sgrub par byed do/ / 'jam dpal gzhan yang gzungs sngags 'di dag 'dzin pa dang sgrub pa rnams la ni bgegs rnams kyi skabs med do// lag
236b3(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang
236b4(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba'i rgyud chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI lan+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
236b5(rgyud 'bum): phab pa/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+ma de bI d+hA ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/ sangs
236b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa thams cad byang bar mdzad ma/ nad thams cad rab
236b7(rgyud 'bum): tu zhi bar mdzad ma/ bgegs thams cad rab tu 'jigs par mdzad ma/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mdzad ma/ gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo'i mchog 'di
237a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / rnams cata thAg teb+h+ya/ sa su 9u0f7f/ sapa rbA hA+e sa/ sarba pa rna / kar+dz+nyA k+Shadz+dza/ # /
237a2(rgyud 'bum): gas nA rA/ sanas/ dam sa mA bsnurnams ma rnams pa/ sa shad+hA tamam la/ sungs
237a3(rgyud 'bum): tInA/ snang brgya brgyam seM// thAg g+hA/ gnags#/ rims na/ ban/ mamachog sas/ bcom ldan
237a4(rgyud 'bum): gas rnyed par dbang brgyar ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ / nasaHsarba ta thAg teSh+Tha/ sab kra kheb+h+ya/ saSh+Ta/ a ma'i a ma ri/ b+h+yaH/
237a5(rgyud 'bum): sa soTas/ bas pa/ tshungs kasan/ sam ha thAg hU~M/ sa ma
237a6(rgyud 'bum): thAg tar+dz+dzane/ badz+ran dang traHtraH/ s+t+waM paHpru Ta/ glAHgar+N+Na pa ra ma ti/ bi Ta ri ka sa!/ na maHsarba ta pA ti b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba
237a7(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi te a sarba pA pa kA yaM ka ra dzA na artsi sA ra Ni/ b+hany+dzaHny+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ dam da ma/ A na ya A na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra yama?
237b1(rgyud 'bum): raya/ sarba bud+d+hadza nitrI ye swAhA/ na maHsUrbata thA ka te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba m+b+ha khai b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ krAH kar+dz+dza/ mA tha ma pa/ d+ha ma rnam/ ThaHny+dza/ dun+dar+d+ha
237b2(rgyud 'bum): sarba nir g+ho She/ ha na ha na/ bi d+han sa ya bi d+h+wan sa ya/ mo Ta yA mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi phu la ni rma la nir dzA te/ A ha ra A ha ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sarba bud+d+ha btu
237b3(rgyud 'bum): ba sa ti ma/ mA bi lam bstan/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu kho b+h+yaHsarba u0f7f o
237b4(rgyud 'bum): M b+ha ga pa ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ke pU ra ya pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta Ta taT/ mang med/ A har A hA ra/ druM hU dza ti swAH/ bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes
237b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzungs so/ / na maHsarba tA thAg te b+h+yaH/ sarba su khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ hU~MhrI/ sarba bud+d+ha mi ta/ b+hany+dzaHny+dzamatha ma tha/ dam ni dam ni/ gaN+Da ri gar+b+ha
237b6(rgyud 'bum): u0f7f/ bcom ldan 'das mardo rje mi bam ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba nu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ tA Ta trAH/ hu mu hu mu/ sarba pA pa 'i shod+haH
237b7(rgyud 'bum): sAH/ bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba su khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA/ d+ha kar+tha ka/ mo Ta mo rba
238a1(rgyud 'bum): da ha da ha/ sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na naSh+Thi te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka' ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH
238a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba thA/ ha ha mi hu mi hu/ da ma nga ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi tsi/ dur+d+han+ta da ma ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i
238a3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs so/ / na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma swA hA/ bcom ldan
238a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das ma sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ / 'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gis lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar
238a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/
238a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ chom rkun gyis bcom par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur/ de la dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung
238a7(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur/ rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ de'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
238b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang de nyid la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar
238b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas ngan song gi sgo rnams
238b3(rgyud 'bum): bcad par 'gyur ro/ / de ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur ro// gang zhig nab par langs nas su// lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi// srid pa nyam ngang gang byas
238b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// srin po la sogs chom rkun dang / mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing // dus min 'chi las rab tu thar// rtag tu dpal dang ldan par
238b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang // ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs gzung nas// bde ba car du skye bar 'gyur// de skad ces
238b6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal nas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so//
238b7(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
239a1(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pa Ni tan+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das
239a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po car la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
239a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa rdo rje rig kyi sangs rgyas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje sde dang / rdo rje kun tu 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje rab
239a4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'dul byed dang / rdo rje mi bzad 'joms dang / rdo rje gdug pa kun 'dul dang / rdo rje dbyings las rgyal ba dang / rdo rje dgyes gnas skyob la sogs pa'i 'khor bye ba phrag snyed rnams
239a5(rgyud 'bum): dang thabs cig tu zhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje thugs kar lan gsum gsor te/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lar gsum
239a6(rgyud 'bum): byas nas phyag 'tshal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha lnga sa la btsugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'byung po kun 'dul bar byed
239a7(rgyud 'bum): sa 'og gi gdug pa can 'dul bar byed pa'i rdo rje kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po bshad du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bshad du gsol/ khyab bdag chen po bshad du gsol/
239b1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa kun 'dul bar byed pa bshad du gsol/ mun pa kun 'joms pa chen po bshad du gsol zhes phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab bo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
239b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po gsang ba pa khyod sems can rnams kyi don du rdo rje kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud nga la zhu ba legs so// gsang ba'i bdag po legs so// byang
239b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po legs so/ / de'i phyir lag na rdo rje'i rigs rnam khyed rjes su nyon la yid la zung zhig/ ngas rnam par phye ste rdo rje sa 'og 'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad kyis rjes su zung zhig/ de skad
239b4(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis sa 'og gi gdon dang 'byung po kun 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom
239b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo gdug pa kun 'dul bar byed pa du ma spros te/ sa 'og sa stengs sa bla
239b6(rgyud 'bum): gang bar mdzad de/ sa 'og gi klu rnams kyi gnas rnams gdug pa'i hUM sgras kun tu gang bar byas nas klu'i rgyal po brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa btul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bkug
239b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas gdug pa'i sems langs te/ dbugs shin tu tsha bar gtong bar sems pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen te/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
240a1(rgyud 'bum): la byin gyis brlabs nas klu thams cad kyi zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM nI lAM badz+ra kro d+ha nA ga hUM phaT/ ces bzlas so// de nas
240a2(rgyud 'bum): klu mtha' yas sems rab tu zhi ste byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur pas klu thams cad sems rab tu zhi'o/ / de nas mtha' as la sogs pa'i klu rgyal sa 'og na bzhugs pa rnams kyis//
240a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i dus na slad ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sa 'og gi gdon rnams kyis bar du mi gcod cing / de
240a4(rgyud 'bum): dag gi gdug pa zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/ bdag cag klu'i rgyal po rnams dang bdag cag gi 'khor rnams kyis sems can chen po de la bar du gcod par mi nus pa bshad du
240a5(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ bdag cag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams
240a6(rgyud 'bum): la cung zad spyan gyi gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po dag legs so// zhu ba'i dus la bab bo// ngas sems can rnams kyi don du rab tu phye ste bshad kyis nyon cig/
240a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ klu rnams sngar nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi klu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bshad de/ hUM/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//
240b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin chen ston pa des// nyid kyi 'khor la rab gzigs te// 'od zer kun tu rab bkye nas// gdon rnams rlag byed thabs gsungs pa// dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dang //

240b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i rin chen bdun/ / dag par bsgrubs te rab bcug nas// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te// dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bden pas// 'byung po de la

240b5(rgyud 'bum): tu 'bar/ / sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po ste// de tshe sngon gyi sems dran pas// zhi bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i cho ga rab tu gsungs
240b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rtag tu byang chub sems thob cing // dam tshig sdom pa kun ldan pa// khrus kyi las rnams kun bya ste// rnam par dag pa'i sa gzhi la// dkyil 'khor ji ltar mdzes par
240b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM yig las byung lcags kyu yis/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// skad cig mdun bsams mchod so bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/
241a1(rgyud 'bum): stong ba'i ting du 'dzin rnams 'acos// nam sa m+b+ha'i khams su ya ni// zlabadang sa mag// 'od zer kun rgyu bar bang gnas/ 'ayo ga nam

241a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis brgyad/ / sku mdog nag po'i gzugs can de// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams// na bza' sman po'i bar 'jal can// spyan gsum dmar mdzes kyin du 'jal/
241a5(rgyud 'bum): ram pa gyen brdzes rdo rje yi// dbu rgyan can du bsam par bya'o// de nas ye shes khro bo che// spyan drangs chu hU~M'i hos gzhug/ mgo dang lkog ma sring kha ru// oM AHhUM gi rnaH
241a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / si kye bcu gsum sngags kyis brgyad// 'khor lo pad+mA rdo rje bsam// mi bskyod rdo rjes dbang bskur te// kun 'joms rnam par dag par bsam// de nas bcom ldan
241a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis 'di'i rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad pa gsungs/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ rab tu brjod par bya'o// sngags kyi 'phreng ba de dag kyang // 'i la rab
241b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar dbang la dmar/ / rgyus la ser po drag la gnag/ rtog pa kun tu spangs te bzlas// spro dang bsdu ba'i bye brag gis// ji ltar mos pa'i bsam gtan bya// mi mes rnal 'gyur/
241b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu spang // phyag na rdo rje khro rgyal gyis// dge kun rten pa'i yid 'di la// gang brtson pa de phan yon no// kun tu rab tu dga' sogs dag/ mi snang la sogs rab tu 'grub//
241b3(rgyud 'bum): kun rten rab tu spyad dge can// rten can sbyor ba rab tu dben// dngos grub mchog tu rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las// zhi ba'i las sgrub pa dang lha'i le'u ste
241b4(rgyud 'bum): dang po'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ston pa rdo
241b5(rgyud 'bum): rje 'dzin/ / bar chad zhi byed gtor ma yi// cho ga mchog ni bshad du gsol// sems can don du brtson ldan bgyi// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
241b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ legs so rdo rje 'chang ba gtso// bar chod zhi ba'i cho ga dang // dngos grub thabs kyi cho ga ni// gtor ma kun gyis ster 'gyur bshad// rab tu mdzes pa'i snod
241b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu/ / bza' dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa rab tu bya// stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro bas// bruM las mdzes pa'i snod bskyed de// khaM las kha zas
242a1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i khams/ / mnyam par bsams te sngags 'di brjod// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbaHmAdz+dza Ad+ya rut+pan+na tA tA oM AHhUM phaT+Ta swAhA/ zhes brjod do// badz+ra
242a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzir bsams te rab tu spel/ / spel ba gnyis kyis rnam par sbyang // nam mkha'i hrI las pad+ma brgyad// dpag tu med pa bsam bya ste// gtso bo mgon po rnam thos bu// gnod
242a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin bye tshogs kyis bskor cing / / klu brgyad kyis mchog spyan drang bya// gnon sbyin rgyal po de dag la// rmugs 'dzin gang ba bzang po dang // nor bzangs ku ber dang ni// yang
242a4(rgyud 'bum): dag 'thog gnas lnga rtsen dang / / tsi bi kun+da li rnams ni// 'khor gyi tshul gyis gtso la bskor// phyogs dang mtshams su bsam par bya// bye ba'i 'khor tshogs thun mong yin//
242a5(rgyud 'bum): klu brgyad gnod sbyin phyi na'o// de nas lcags kyus spyan drang la// ma bral gtso dang lcags kyu'o// bzhon pa seng ge rta yi tshogs// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// rin
242a6(rgyud 'bum): chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / / nor bu rin chen ral gri dang // gri mdu khang brtsegs ral gri phub// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar bar bsgom// spyan 'dren tshe na rnga sogs dang // dung
242a7(rgyud 'bum): chen 'bras spos dag ni dbul/ / oM bai shra ba Na sa pa ri bA ra sa mA dzaH/ dza hUM baM ho// oM be sAhA/ oM bai shra ba Na A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza/ zhes spyan drang ba'i sngags so//
242b1(rgyud 'bum): a mr-i ta kunA li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ces pa ni bgeg sku bskrad pa'i sngags so// de nas mye tog la sogs pas// mchod pa dag ni nam mkha' ru// rab tu mchod de spro bar bya//
242b2(rgyud 'bum): lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ i maM ba laM gr-ih+na tu/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma sid+d+him+ba pra yats+tsha tu ma ma sarba satwa sA hA/ oM be shra ba NA ya sAhA/ oM dzAm+b+ha lA ya sAhA/ oM
242b3(rgyud 'bum): pUr+Na b+ha dzA ya swA hA/ oM ma NaM b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ oM si pra dz+nyA nA ya swA hA/ oM gu h+ya d+ha nA ya swA hA/ oM pany+tsi kA ya swA hA/ oM tsa pi kun+da lA ya swA hA/
242b4(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so// de nas mchod de mgron rnams btang // 'od zer lcags kyu bkrol nas su// bkrol ba'i dus na gshegs dang mnyam// mnyam longs
242b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ / rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las// gtor ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub
242b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par 'dod pa'i don du 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i ba spu nas 'od zer spros te rnam thos sras 'khor bcas
242b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi thugs bskul nas 'khor der 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rin po che'i phye mas gtor nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos skyong
243a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi ba lags te/ bdag gis chos dang ldan pa rnams kyi chos bsrung zhing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid kyis gas
243a2(rgyud 'bum): ba bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar ci ga nang zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so// rang gi gsang ba legs
243a3(rgyud 'bum): pabar shod cig/ ngas rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyis kyang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis legs par smros shig ces bka' stsal to//
243a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rnam thos kyi bu rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi rig pa 'di smras so// oM be shra ba NA ya hUM hUM pa tsa pa tsa ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da swA hA/ zhes brjod
243a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sngags 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di lags te/ gang zhig bdag sgrub par 'dod pa des dus gsum du mchod
243a6(rgyud 'bum): pabargya chen po bshams te/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa mchod la sems rtse gcig dang ldan pas gnas dben par 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje sgom pa pos bdag gi sngags de
243a7(rgyud 'bum): khri zag gcig 'bras/ de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya'o// de ltar bdag sgrub pa dang bdag gi las sgrub pa po des bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa rgya chen pos
243b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya'o/ / de la bdag dang bdag gi 'khor rnams la mchod pa dang gtor ma rgya chen po dbul ba'i sngags ni 'di rnams yin te/ oM baM shra ba NA ya swAhA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA
243b2(rgyud 'bum): oM pun+da b+ha dA ya swAH/ oM ma Ni b+ha d+hA ya swA hA/ oM ku be rA ya swAhA/ oM saM pra dz+nyA nA ya swA hA/ oM gu h+ya d+ha nA ya swAhA/ oM pany+tsi kA ya swA hA/ oM pi tsi kun+d+ha lA ya swA hA/
243b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa'i sngags de rnams ni bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags gnyis su shes par bya'o// de nas bdag gi las sgrub pa ni bdag gis bshad
243b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes gsol nas/ 'di'i las bshad pa ni/ gang zag gang gis sgrub 'dod pas// gsad dang sbyin sreg mnan pa gsug
243b5(rgyud 'bum): rim pa ji bzhin shes par bya/ / bsgrub bya bstan la sdang ba rnams// spra tshil la sogs gzugs byas la// dgug dang gzhug sogs dbang du bya// yig 'bru bco brgyad sngags
243b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / dus gsum brdeg par rab byas nas// 'phral du yid ches 'joms pa ste// bsgrub byas gsod par the tsom med// gal te sbyin sreg byed pa na// zhi rgyas dbang dang
243b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon spyod las/ / 'dir ni drag pos bsgral bar bya// ner sbar tshal rab bsreg bya// bab khung rab dang 'bring tha ma// rab kyis mtho gsum 'bring gis do// thams mtho gang
244a1(rgyud 'bum): tshad du bya/ / bud shing tsher ma can shing gis// kun tu drag po rab tu sgrub// bag zan yungs kar mer sreg cing // sdang ba'i lus ngag yid gsum rnams//
244a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzas la bstim ste sbyin sreg bya// 'khor bcas gnod sbyin mer bsams te// sreg pa'i rdzas kyi mchod pa 'am// las me gnod sbyin rdzas kyis brag/ gang ltar byas kyang 'grub par
244a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de tshe bstod pa 'dis kyang ni// rtse gcig sems kyis bstod par bya// hUM/ kun 'dul mi bzad gnod sbyin sogs// gdug pa dpal tsha rab tu 'jigs// khro bo rngam pa cher
244a4(rgyud 'bum): / sgrog pa// 'khor bcas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM be shra ba Na puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM bai shra ba Na d+hu pe hUM swA hA/ oM bai shra ba Na dI pe hUM swA hA/ oM bai shra ba Na gan+d+he hUM swA hA/ oM
244a5(rgyud 'bum): bai shwa pa Na nai d+ye hUM swAhA/ gtso bo gnod sbyin 'khor yang mchod// de nas rim pas mchod pa ni// gsang sngags kun tu spel te bzlas// spro dang bsdu ba kun tu bya// spel byed kun gyi
244a6(rgyud 'bum): thun mong yin/ / oM bai shra ba Na che ge mo mA ra ya phaT swAhA/ gtso bo ji ltar 'khor yang de// rang gi rig pas mchod par bya// rig pa kun tu brten byas nas// rdul phran bzhin du brlab
244a7(rgyud 'bum): bapar bsam/ / 'phrin las bcol la gtor ma gtang // mchod dang gtor ma'i rim pa ni// go rims bzhin du dbul bar bya// zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa ni// thab khung mtho gang
244b1(rgyud 'bum): tshad nyid la/ / sreg rdzas la sogs rab tu dbul// lus ngag yid gsum sdig bcom nas// ye shes me yi ngo bor bya// snod dang za ba ni dor bar bya// der ni gdon rnams kun sreg
244b2(rgyud 'bum): cing / / bgegs chen zhi ba'i las kyang bya// rgyas dang dbang du bya ba la// las dang bye brag rim pa rnams// sngar bshad pa yi lus bzhin du// thab dbyibs bye brag shes par bya//
244b3(rgyud 'bum): ser dang dmar ba'i bud shing sogs// rim pa rdzas ldan dbul ba ni// oM bai shra ba NA ya d+ha naM puSh+paM ku ru swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NA ba shi ku ru swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya shAn+tiM ku swA hA/
244b4(rgyud 'bum): gtso bos ji bzhin 'khor bcas ni// rig pa'i rdzas kyis mchod par bya// sreg pa'i rdzas ni bag zan dang // yungs kar mngar sogs rim pas mchod// 'phrin las rnam bzhi kun
244b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub ste/ / brtse bar brtson pas nye bar 'grub// 'bring dang tha mas 'bring dang ni// tha ma nyid du shes par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rnam thos kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pa
244b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bshad pa'i las 'di rnams sgrub pa po des dus rgyun du bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang / gnod
244b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin rnams la dkar gsum gyis mchod par bya/ chang kun tu spang bar bgyi'o// sha rnams ni 'os pa dang shis pa drang bar bya'o// de ltar rtse gcig gis bdag cag sgrub pa de rnams
245a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'phrin las ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag gis ma bsgrubs na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'khus par gyur cing // bdag cag gi chos ma bskyangs par
245a2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa yin no/ / de la bdag gi bro tshig ni 'di yin no// oM bai shra ar+tha kha thaM zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam thos kyi bu chen po legs so//
245a3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu rab tu legs so// ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag gi don du rang gi gsang ba smras pa ni don chen po dang ldan no// ngas kyang de rnams kyi don nges par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di
245a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad kyis nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rnams ltar nyan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra pA Ni nI
245a5(rgyud 'bum): lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra s+pho Ta hUM phaT swA hA/ rig pa 'di ni las thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i sngags so// rnam thos kyi bu chen pos ji ltar khas blangs pa ltar gsang ba dang ldan par byed pa'o//
245a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gyur ces nas gnod sbyin mi snang bar gyur to// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ rnam thos sras kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang byang chub sems
245a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du gdug pa can la bsnun pa'i 'khor lo bshad du gsol
245b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes gsol ba btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar thugs kyis gnang nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer kun tu khyab par spros te/ sems can thams cad la
245b2(rgyud 'bum): byams pas khyab par mdzad nas lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ngas bgegs la bsnun pa'i 'khor lo bshad kyis khyod rtse gcig tu nyon cig/ de ltar 'tshal lo zhes
245b3(rgyud 'bum): wAr nyan no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'khrul 'khor byed 'dod pas// rnams dga' dben pa'i gnas dag tu// phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bya// sdod
245b4(rgyud 'bum): bcud rdo rje gtum por sgom/ / rlung las ri rab mthar thug pa// rdul snyed grangs kyi sku ru bsam// dbus na phyug rdor rnal 'byor bsgom// ri bong 'dzin pa zhabs kyis brdabs/
245b5(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum chod kyi zla ba la// bgegs chen kun tu 'dar bar bsgom// sku la nyi ma snying ldan pa'i// gzi brjid bzod dka'i 'od zer gyis// bgegs rnams ma lus 'tshig par
245b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / ljags las bzlas pa'i sngags 'phreng gis// stong gsum gang bar rab tu bsgom// rgyan du byas pa'i klu brgyad kyis// kha rlangs chen po btang ba la// lha klu thams
245b7(rgyud 'bum): cad sbags par 'gyur/ / thugs las khro spos de dag gis// bskal pa'i rlung ltar 'thor bar 'gyur// phyag gis rdo rje rab bsnun pas// sgyogs gzer bzhin du bsnun pa
246a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / hUM hUM 'brug ltar rab tu sgrogs// skad kyis kun tu bkug par bsam// de ltar byas gyur thams cad 'grub// las kyi mnar ba 'jig par
246a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / phyag na rdo rje mi shes par// gang zhig gzhan du skal dman par// 'di la gang 'grub thams cad 'grub// mchog dang thun mong bye brag go/ rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud
246a3(rgyud 'bum): las bsnun pa'i 'khor lo ste le'u bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor gyi// cho ga rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// gro ga'am shing shun dag la
246a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ re mig nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i// 'khor lo dag ni rab bris te// zla ba yar gyi ngo la brtsam// rtse gcig sems kyis rab tu bri// dbus su drag po'i yi ge dgod//
246a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis par nor 'dzin yi ge ste// gsum par badz+ra zhes pa dang // bzhi par chu yig dang po dgod// lnga par na ni rab tu dgod// mtshams bzhir bsgrub bya'i gsod snying bri/
246a6(rgyud 'bum): de ni nang gi re mig go// phyi yi re mig bcu gnyis la// oM spangs yi ge bcu gnyis la// de yi gsang sngags 'di yin te// nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM paT// ces bya'o//
246a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo ste// bsgrub bya'i snying khar dril de gzhug/ dang po mtha' nas dril bar bya// de nas sbyin sreg cho ga bya// gal te mnan pa byed 'dod pas//
246b1(rgyud 'bum): sngar bzhin 'khrul 'khor rdzogs byas nas// mtha' ru mnan pa'i cho ga bya// kham por gsar pa kha sbyar du// bcug nas rdo rje rgya gram bri// rdo rje spyan gyis rab sbyar nas//
246b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug lag khang sogs mnan par bya// gal te re mig mi 'dod na// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la// hUM yig dbus su rab dgod de// lhag ma bcu gnyis rtsibs la
246b3(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / bri ba rdzogs na snying khar gzhug/ dgug dang gzhug sogs byas la bsreg/ mi 'dod mnan pa'i cho ga bya// mar gyi dus la shis pa yin// 'khrul 'khor ji ltar
246b4(rgyud 'bum): bris pa ltar/ / gang 'dod las la the tsom med// dper na me lces rtsa bsregs 'dra// gang yin gnas par mi 'gyur ro// bri ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga ste rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud
246b5(rgyud 'bum): las le'u lnga pa'o/ / / de nas yang lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad zab mo'i spyod yul lag
246b6(rgyud 'bum): pas sbyin sreg la sogs pas grol bar cang 'gyur lags sam/ bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje snying
246b7(rgyud 'bum): rje che/ / dad pa'i shugs kyis rab nyams te// dkyil 'khor rdzas kyis sbyor ldan zhing // sbyin sreg las dang de nyid shes// sdom pa dam tshig rgyud ldan na// mtshan mas grol bar
247a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba ste/ / dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg rdzas la sogs// med na dngos grub mi 'grub pas// sbyin sreg las ni 'bad pas brtsam// 'phrin las bzhi yi
247a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg las/ / drag po'i rim pa bya ba ni// khru bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su zur gsum khru re tshad// zabs su khru phyed brko bar bya// phyi rol rim pa gsum ldan
247a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dbus su rdo rje'i mtshan ma zi// rim pa gsum la rdo rje yi// rtse gsum 'phreng gis bskor ba bri// mtshams su lcags kyu zi bar bya// tsher ma can gyi shing bu ni// khru
247a4(rgyud 'bum): gang tshad kyis rab tu shis/ / dug dang khrag dang ske tshe sogs// rdzas ni rim par shes par bya// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyi// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te// 'jig rten
247a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'dul gzugs su bsam/ / mchod pa'i rim pa rab tu dbul// de la sbyin sreg gi sngags gsungs pa 'di yin te/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra/ oM badz+ra dzA la a na la ha na sarba
247a6(rgyud 'bum): duSh+TAn sarba b+hasmiM ku ru nI lAm+ba ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni che ge mo mA ra ya hUM laT/ ces pas rdzas rnams sreg go// dug dang khrag dang lan tshwa las// gzugs byas rab tu bsgrubs te sreg
247a7(rgyud 'bum): oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha khA da ya ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya mo ha ya mo ha ya sha hUM A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ gzugs la brab pa'i sngags so// oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni sha hU~M gr-ih+Na A kaR+Sha
247b1(rgyud 'bum): hUM dzadza/ 'gro ba dgug pa'i sngags so// de ltar sbyin sreg rab byas nas// chu bo bskams dang klu shing bcad// glang chen g.yang lgang me chen 'bar// nang dang yams sogs
247b2(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i tshe/ / zhi ba mchog gi las bsgrubs te// thab khung zlum po rab dkar ba// rim pa gsum ldan khru gang tshad// zabs su khru phyed brkos byas nas// zhi ba'i las kyi
247b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bya/ / de ltar byas na mtshan ma yi// dngos grub thob par the tsom med// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// gus pas rgyud don rab tu zung // 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson gyis//
247b4(rgyud 'bum): kye ma rgyud chen mchog tu gsang // byin rlabs sngon du cher 'byung ba// ston pa rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// rab tu 'bad pas sgrub par gyis// dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las//
247b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi rim pa ste le'u drug pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang // dpal chen gdam la rab bzhengs nas// lag na rdo rje la gzigs nas// las kyi cho ga bshad
247b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la// gang 'dod pa yi gzugs byas te// snying khar 'khrul 'khor rab tu gzhug/ bdag nyid las kyi lhar gsal bas// ga'u'i nang
247b7(rgyud 'bum): du rab bcug ste/ / tshon gyi tha gu sna lnga dkri// snying kha'i lcags kyu rab bkug nas// yi ge bcu gsum 'khrul 'khor bzlas// 'gul g.yo yi ni rtags byung nas// chu chen
248a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhung la gtang bar bya/ / gal te rtags de ma byung na// da ngur yi khu ba dang // khrag dang dug bsres rab byugs te// tsher ma can gyi shing mes sreg/ oM
248a2(rgyud 'bum): nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni stam+ma ya mo ha ya ban d+ha ya da ha na a hUM hUM phaT/ dus gsum dag tu bdugs byas na// skad ngan sna tshogs 'don par byed// de nas sngags 'dis chu la
248a3(rgyud 'bum): ngor/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ tshon gyis gril nas rab tu bor// bsam pas ba tsha'i rgya mtshor bskur// de nas mi ldog bya ba'i phyir// sngags 'di rgyun du bzlas par
248a4(rgyud 'bum): b+h+ya/ mo nI lA pra rad+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni hu hU swam+ba a nan paT/ ces rgyun du bzlas par bya'o// de nas las de nges par 'grub bo// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ bslang pa'i 'a
248a5(rgyud 'bum): lo'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas sems can rnams kyi don du sngags kyi le'u 'di gsungs so// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni
248a6(rgyud 'bum): hUM hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad kyi sgrub pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'o// 'di ni ma bsgrub par yang las tham
248a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub ste/ phyag rgya thams cad 'ching ba sgrub pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rab tu gdengs pas so// sems can thams cad rjes su
248b1(rgyud 'bum): chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje bzhad pas so/ / thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM smras so// nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ku mu das bya'o// klu thams cad 'dul
248b2(rgyud 'bum): ba la ni rma bya'i mjug sgros bya'o/ / dgra thams cad gsad pa la ni 'khrul 'khor gyis so// nor sgrub par 'dod na dzam+b+ha la'i chu sprin gyis bya'o// bgegs 'phangs par 'dod na ting
248b3(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin gyis bya'o/ / thams cad 'gugs pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyus bya'o// rims srung ba la ni rtsa ku sha'i 'brum bus bya'o// klu sgrub par 'dod na mtshar bu'i lcug ma dang bdud
248b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i chus bya'o/ / pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par 'dod na gu gul gyis bya'o// las rnams la sngags 'bum gyis bya'o// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste
248b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bzlas pa yi// nges par 'dir ni bshad par bya// gang zhig dngos grub sgrub 'dod pas// dam tshig sdom dang rab ldan
248b6(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / bdag nyid las kyis lhar bsgoms te// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te// dzaHhUM baM hoHdgug sogs bya// rang nyid zla bar sngags kyi 'phreng // dngul sbram lta bur
248b7(rgyud 'bum): rab bsams te/ / myur dal gsal dang mi gsal spangs// yid kyis bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa bya// mchod pa rnam pa lngas kyang mchod// rab tu bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa
249a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis/ / gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'grub// oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra pA Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ dbang
249a2(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba'i sngags so/ / oM badz+ra pA Ni tiSh+Tha hUM/ thugs brtan pa'i sngags so// sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba dang // gsung gi gsang ba ma lus pas// myur du byang chub la
249a3(rgyud 'bum): reg 'gyur/ / gang tshe sgrub la brtson ldan pa// tshe gcig 'bras bu myur thob 'gyur// gnyis med rang bzhin rdo rje can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun tu khyab// brjod med rtog bral de
249a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid don/ / lhun grub pang la rab tu gzhag/ hUM dang AHyi rnam pa can// ji ltar chu yi zla ba bzhin// ma yengs sems kyis rgyun du bsgom// e maho mgon po bcom ldan
249a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das/ / mchog las mchog tu rnam par rgyal// e ma ho sprul pa'i rnam pa sku// sgra la rab tu dmigs pa med// dge chen kun gyi spyod yul yin// rang gsal nyid la rnam par
249a6(rgyud 'bum): dag/ mchog gi byang chub tshul du gnas// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ nges pa dang rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang //
249a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i mgon la rab gzigs te// srung ba'i cho ga rab tu gsungs// lag na rdo rje rab tu nyon// 'gro ba gdug pas zin gyur pa// zangs ma dag la dud 'gro'i gzugs/
249b1(rgyud 'bum): legs pa dag tu rab byas te// khong pa rdul la sogs pas dgang // gang nas 'dod pa'i sa phyogs sam// rang lus dag la legs sbas nas// srung ba dam par 'gyur ba'o//
249b2(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs sku gdung ring bsrel can// rab tu gnas pa legs byas te// gang gnod sar ni rab smras na// bden stobs brjod pas zhi bar 'gyur// bya la sogs pa'i byol
249b3(rgyud 'bum): song tshogs/ / yid 'ong mdzes pa'i dud 'gro la// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye tshogs kyis// gsungs pa'i gzungs sngags dag gis ni// skud pa sngon po dag dang ni// dar la brgya rtsa

249b5(rgyud 'bum): bdug sogs mchod byas te/ / sa la sbas na gnod pa rnams// zhi ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin// skud pa dkar po gsum bsgril la// mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// sgrub dang bsgrub

249b7(rgyud 'bum): pas zin las thar par 'gyur/ / ba ku na da'i me tog dang // mda' hu na da'i 'bras bu la// smin drug dus su rab bsgrubs na// gdug pa'i phyogs su mi gnas so// stag
250a1(rgyud 'bum): dang phred dang 'jal thar gyi/ / spus ni gdug pa las grol 'gyur// 'bab chu rgya mtsho la sogs pa// lus bsrung bya ba mthar byin par// byas na mchog
250a2(rgyud 'bum): tu srung bar 'gyur/ / rdo rje 'chang ba khyod kyis zung // mthar phyin zla ba sprin gza' las// grol ba lta bur 'gyur ba yin// dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ srung ba'i

250a4(rgyud 'bum): cig rdo rje 'chang ba khyod/ / sngags btu khyod la bshad par bya// gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// 'dod don thams cad rab 'grub la//

250b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te gzhag/ bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// yi ge U ni rab tu sbyar// stong pas mnan pas nyis 'gyur dang // lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la// gsum pa ya ni dang por sbyar//

251b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi dor du bdag gi thugs kyi gsang ba bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba

251b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can 'dul 'dod pas/ / dang po byang chub sems bskyed la// tshogs gnyis kun rdzogs mthar phyin pas// rin chen snod du pad+ma'i gter// dbus su gsang ba'i bdag po

251b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / bdag dang lha gnyis 'phro 'dur bzlas// klu brgyad zhi bar 'gyur sems kyis// hUM dang hUM gi thag pa las// bsgrub bya 'od kyi phung por bya// skad cig mas ni hUM du bslang //

251b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM chen 'phreng ba'i 'gro 'dus bcad// rdzas chen rnams la rab brtags nas// nges par gdon las grol bar 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma grub na// sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzlog ste
252a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas/ / rdo rje 'phreng bas rab bcad na// the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur// 'og gi bgegs bzlog cho ga mchog/ yid bzhin nor ltar 'byung ba yin//
252a2(rgyud 'bum): theg pa gsum la nges rgyal ba'i// rgyud chen gsang ba mthar thug pa// skyob pa thugs kyi rnam pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu// lag na

252b1(rgyud 'bum): rje la sogs pa rnams dang thabs cig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye bas 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang / lhas byung bas 'jig
252b2(rgyud 'bum): rten pa rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas rgyal bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ 'od zer 'di 'gyur pa dang lhas byung ba'i rgyu dang

252b4(rgyud 'bum): bslang du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye ste/ 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis brgyal ba las bslangs so// de nas 'jig rten pa
252b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi mched du brjod pa/ a ma thabs chen thugs rje yis// 'jig rten thams cad brgyal gyur na// thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis// brgyal ba thams cad spangs par gyur//

252b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rnams la phan gdags phyir// rdul bral chos rnams bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ zhes gsungs pas snod dang
253a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan par byas so/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khrugs so// shin tu yid 'khrugs nas kha g.yab cing brang brdungs te/ kye ma kyi hud bdag klu'i gnas dang ston pa ni

255a1(rgyud 'bum): Ni Shi r+yan+d+ha nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya ni/ 'jigs shing skrag ste brgyal bar 'gyur// snying khar yi ge hUM bsgoms pas// klu rnams thams cad

255a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang ni rtsa bzhir 'jug/ tho rangs mi dga' mngon shes sba// gnyid chung ba spu'i gshis kyang dkar// gu gul nag po bsten par bya// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje

255b2(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la tshar gcad pa'i thabs du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags dang 'khrul 'khor sman dang sreg/ thabs ni rnam pa
