255b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gsum du bshad/ / dang po zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ste// zlum po khru gang kha dog dkar// kha khyer sor bzhir rdo rjes mtshan// gru gsum sor bcu kha dog gnag/ kha khyer sor
255b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum rdo rjes mtshan/ / zla dbyibs zla ba dmar 'dra ba// khru do kha khyer de 'drar shes// zhi ba 'o ma can shing gi/ gtum pa 'bigs par byed de'o// dbang yang zhi ba dag dang
255b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / rgyan bzhag me dang rigs ngan khyim// raM las thab dang me lha bskyed// zhi rgyas dbang la bdud rtsi lnga// gtum pa dmar dang khrag dag dang // dug dang gu gul nag
256a1(rgyud 'bum): po dang / / gzugs brnyan dag gis mchod par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa mchog gi sras// me lha'i rgyal po Tik+kis dbang bskur zhing // shes rab
256a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg/ 'jigs byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gzi brjid chen po me yi lha// 'dod pa thams cad rab stsol zhing // bdag gzhan phan
256a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs la zhugs pa/ / tshangs sras mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// me yi thugs kar drag po ni// cho ga bzhin du bskyed par bya// sbyin sreg de dag 'brel ba yis// nor rnams
256a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ster bar byed/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la zhus pa/ drag po'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ de nas rdo rje
256a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pas lha srin thams cad 'dul ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ / tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi d+ha ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga uta sad nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya hUM paT
256a6(rgyud 'bum): a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha Na ya hUM phaT/ tA sa nA ya tsu phaT/ kuM prAr+Na uta sAd nA ya hUM paT/ pre Ta
256a7(rgyud 'bum): pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba bi g+h+na bi nA sha ka rA ya tsU
256b1(rgyud 'bum): baT/ sarba sha trUM saM brta bi nA sha kA rA ya phaT/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni ra dz+nyA pa ya ti sAhA/ oM badz+ra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wA la b+hasmiM ku ru swA hA/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ puSh+TiM ku ru a~M
256b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis ni/ / lha srin thams cad brgyal bar gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa/ e ma dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis//
256b3(rgyud 'bum): drag po 'dul bar dbang bskur nas// sngags rgyal gsungs pas skrag 'gyur pa// ngo mtshar 'di ni shin tu lha// zhes pa'o// de nas rang rang gi srog snying ston pa la phul nas
256b4(rgyud 'bum): bran gyi tshul du gnas so/ / rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ bcos dka' ba'i nad bzlog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rje
256b5(rgyud 'bum): rjes/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal
256b6(rgyud 'bum): pos/ / gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing // dbang bskur ba yang ma thob na// bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo// de bas da ni bshar bya
256b7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi// thig bzhi dag dang ldan gyur pas// cha chen bzhi ru btab byas na// shar gyi cha chen dang por ni// bzhir bgos dang po lte ba dang //
257a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa pad+ma ral gri gnyis// gsum pa lha yi snam bu'o// de nas tshon ni dgye bar bya// lte ba dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas// pad+ma sngon po ral gri sngon//
257a2(rgyud 'bum): lha snam gnag la rdo rje'i sgo// bzhi ni dkar po bri bar bya// sgo yi phyi rol kha dog gnag/ me ri 'bar ba bri bar bya// de la rdo rje 'phreng bas bskor// mda' dang phur bu bcu drug la/
257a3(rgyud 'bum): tshon skud sngon po bri bar bya// dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma la// klu chen phyed gzugs sbrul mgo can// rdzogs par byas nas rnal 'byor ni// cho ga bzhin du gnyis ka yi//
257a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du bskyed// dang po tha ma'i spyan sngar ni// phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun rnam dag/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' la// me tog gtor zhing bstod pa bya//
257a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal bskor ba bdun rnam dag/ byas nas ye shes dbab par bya// gnas gsum yi ge gsum bsams la// sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya// A be shastaM b+ha ya rA rA
257a6(rgyud 'bum): tsA la ya/ tsA la ya hUM a oM dzeH/ de nas dkyil 'khor bstan byas la// rig pa'i dbang ni cho ga bzhin// de nas sngags kyi rjes gnang sbyin// rnal 'byor snying kha'i sa bon las//
257a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi 'od kyis ye shes bskul// ye shes ljags las 'od byung las// snod gyur lce la thim par bsam// sgrub pa'i rdzas kyi bkra shis brjod// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/
257b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ snying po
257b2(rgyud 'bum): kun la phan gdags dang / / sangs rgyas bstan la gzhug don du// gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun la
257b3(rgyud 'bum): phan don du/ / gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa che la smod pa dang // de sgrub pa la snying nas brnyas//
257b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa 'di ni brtsam par bya// de la ri rab kyi 'og nas las kyi gnod sbyin gyi lus blangal gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi yod pa/ gdong dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags zlos pa/ gnyis pa rang gi srog/
257b5(rgyud 'bum): snying bzla ba/ gsum pa ni me lce'i dbugs 'byung / bzhi pa ni sha dang khrag za ba yod/ de sgrub pa'i thabs bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin
257b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / sngags kyi rgyal po 'bum bzlas la// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor bri// de yi steng du khrag chen gyis// pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa// btson dong tshul du bri bar bya// dar
257b7(rgyud 'bum): sngon de yi nang du bting / / dbus su mi yi sha dang khrag/ dang po khyi ste gnyis pa bag/ gsum par rna can zangs gtsug phud// lnga par skad can drug par ra// bdun par skye
258a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis brgyad par glang / / g.yas kyi phyogs nas bskor ba'o// ma he rta dang lug dang spre'u// g.yon gyi phyogs nas bskor ba'o// de ni dbul ba'i dam tshig go/
258a2(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang dug dang ske tshe yis// nam gyi phyed kyi dus dag tu// dur khrod ras la 'di ltar bri// zhal brgyad phyag stong yang na bcu// zhal bzhi dang po zhi ba ste// gnyis pa dmar po chu
258a3(rgyud 'bum): srin no/ / gsum ni khro nag med dang khro// bzhi pa yi dgas mgo yin no// skra ni gyen brdzes zhal dang mtshungs// sprul pa bya rgod khra dang spyang // de yi mgo can bri bar bya// dgug
258a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhug dbang ni bskrad par bya'o/ / 'di ni bsten pa'i dam tshig go/ bsnyen pa'i dam tshig gnyis dag gi/ gsum rgyal dag las shes par bya// oM yak+Sha ha sa ha sa/ da ra da ra hUM/
258a5(rgyud 'bum): khra dang spyang ki khyi la sogs// rmi lam du 'am dngos su 'byung // de nas mchod pa'i dam rdzas kun// bsgrub bya'i rdzas dang bsres byas la// gzugs brlan byas la thod par gzhug
258a6(rgyud 'bum): mar ngo gnod sbyin gzugs kyis mchod/ / oM yak+Sha mA ra ya mA ra ya/ a pra ti ha ba la ba rA kra mA ya phaT/ sarba sha truM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dzA pa ya
258a7(rgyud 'bum): ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la phaT/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na// gzugs brnyan rdul la sbyin sreg bya// las skyes gzugs brnyan gong bur gzhug/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na/
258b1(rgyud 'bum): oM yak+Sha mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ tsit+ta la rbang rbad/ phyag na rdo rjes bsnun par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// nI lAM pa sa nA ya phaT/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par
258b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa/ zung du 'brel bar gnas gyur pa// yaM las rlung ste paM las pad// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog
258b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis/ / bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
258b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba btab pa/ snying nas slob dpon smod pa la// klu gzhug pa ni ji ltar lags// rdo rje can gyis bshad du gsol// klu'i lag na nang bcu gcig yod de/
258b5(rgyud 'bum): mdze dang / mdza' to dang / ka ta ma dang / ka she dang / 'bras dang / phol dang / shu ba dang / skem pa dang / g.yan pa dang / dmu chu dang / gag pa'o// klu'i
258b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni sa 'og gi rim pa bdun no/ / klu bran ni 'dzam bu'i gling na'ang yod do// 'khor ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis// gtsang ma'i gos dag gyon nas ni// dkar gsum dag kyang bza'
258b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sngags rgyal nyis 'bum bzlas byas la// dkyil 'khor tsan dan gur kum byugs// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bya ste// bdag nyid lag na rdo rje la// klu chen brgyad kyis
259a1(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba bri/ / de la sogs pa bshad zin to// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub phyogs su// klu yi gzugs gcig brtsam bya ste// rin chen lnga 'am gla rtsi'am// mchod/
259a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs// dang po 'das pa'i mchod pa bya// spyan drang mchod dang bstod pa ni// cho ga bzhin du bya ba'o// klu yi snying khar hUM bsgoms la// 'od zer rnam pa gsum
259a3(rgyud 'bum): dag gis/ / klu chen gnas nas dgug par bya// gzugs brnyan de la bstim byas la// mchod pa dag gis mchod par bya// gzugs brnyan g.yo ba 'byung ba na// sdang ba'i lus
259a4(rgyud 'bum): la gzhug bya ste/ / dbang po brgyad nas gzhug bya ste// brgyad cha tha ma'i dus dag tu// 'o ma gla rtsi kha ra yis// lam ni drang por drang byas la// gong bu dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis//
259a5(rgyud 'bum): de la klu chen gzhug par bya// sgrub pa po yis gu gul bsten// gzugs la phur bus gdab par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// lha yi rnam pa nyid dag la// spogs pa dag
259a6(rgyud 'bum): gi cho ga bzhin/ / tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM/ nA ga bi dA ra NA/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba sha hUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya paT/ nI lAM/
259a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti sha tr-i tsi mA ra ya phaT/ oM nA ga g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI lA ya kI lA ya/ hU hU hUM badz+ra kI lA ya/ badz+ra daMSh+To A dz+nyA pa yak+Sha
259b1(rgyud 'bum): ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya phaT/ nA ga bi dA rA ya phaT/ nA ga uta sA da nA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can
259b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das brgyal ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ a ba sha gsungs pas thams cad kyang
259b3(rgyud 'bum): dbugs 'byung zhing brgyal ba sangs nas 'dar zhing thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'i
259b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa yis/ / sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzhal mi nus// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gtam
259b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos lha gnas rnam pa brgyad du rgyud thams cad bsdus nas ri rab kyi byang phyogs su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud
259b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de nas zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa'i sngags gsungs pas lha dang lha ma yin gyi rna bar song ngo // rigs sngags 'chang de rnams ngo mtshar nas bstod pa byas so//
259b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas gling gi snying por 'khor gyi snying po gnod sbyin gyi cha 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byon nas ma gyi snying po dang 'dra ba dam pa'i chos rgyud thams cad bsdus so//
260a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi las gnyis kyi bdag nyid can rgyud sde stong phrag brgyad cu'ang gsungs so// de nas 'jig rten du gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod de sgron ma za ba rdo rjes mgo lus
260a2(rgyud 'bum): phral te nyams par byas so/ / de nas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sa 'og rim pa bdun du byon nas rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud gsungs so//
260a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gtam rgyud kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kar
260a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong bya'i gdong pa can gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra b+hU mi tri rA dzA kalpa nA ma
260a5(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ rdo rjes gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i dbang phyug po// shAka thub kyi ni
260a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs khro bo/ / phyis kyi rtog pa las rgyal byed// rtog pa'i bla ma 'di mchog bshad// lha dang sngags dang sbyor ba yis// rtog pas rtog pa 'joms pa'i lam// rtog pa
260a7(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i rig pa yis/ / khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi ba brnyes// dang po phyag 'tshal de 'og tu// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes par byas// drag
260b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i gsum pa blangs byas la/ / 'og tu dbyangs kyi gnyis pas brgyan// de la zla phyed dang thig le// lnga pa'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni// drug pa'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang // bzhi
260b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin/ / yang ni me yi sa bon dang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa yi// 'og tu me yi sa bon no// lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang
260b3(rgyud 'bum): yang / / gsum pa'i sde pa lnga pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la
260b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i dang po mthar gzhag pa/ / 'di rnams rigs sngags dbang byed pa// grang+gA klung bcu'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas khro bo byang chub sems// 'byung por bcas pa
260b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs mdzad do/ / rig sngags rnams ni lha nyid de// stong dang snying rje 'dres pa yi// lha 'di snying kha'i sbyor ba ru// legs par bzhag pa bsam par bya// lugs su
260b6(rgyud 'bum): byung dang bzlog pa yi/ / sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT/ rig sngags 'bum phrag bzlas pa dang // yi ge re la 'bum phrag dang /
260b7(rgyud 'bum): de las lhag pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po yi bsam pa ni// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang // bskrad dang dbye rengs gsad pa dang // las ni gang gang 'dod pa des//
261a1(rgyud 'bum): snying khar sbyor ba rim bzhin sgrub// lus rtsa snying rjer ldan pa yis// rang lus lha dang bla ma la// phyag sogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas// rig pa'i khro bo bsgom par
261a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / dang por stong nyid rnam bsams la// lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru// rang gi snying khar dbyangs yig ni// dang po las byung zla ba la// hUM yig sngon po rnam par bsgom//
261a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi 'dus 'dra'i 'od 'phros nas// sems can dri ma rnams bsal te// skur gyur snying po bsdu bar bya// hUM yang rdo rje sngon por 'gyur// sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas la//
261a4(rgyud 'bum): sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba// rab tu dregs pas khros pa'o// ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du ni// bde bar g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs// brgyad gnyis lon pa'i nyams tshul
261a5(rgyud 'bum): can/ drag cing khros pa'i ro dang ldan// brang 'gro brgyad pos sku la brgyan// gzhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// rang gis rdo rje bsnams pa ni// bsnun pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa dang //
261a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// na bza' sngon po'i sham thabs 'dzin// spyan mig dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs// dbu skra nyi ma'i 'od 'dra pa// steng du bcings dbus cod
261a7(rgyud 'bum): pan ldan/ / zhal nas ha hi'i gad rgyangs ldan// khro bo'i bdag po 'jigs par byed// log 'dzin la sogs 'joms mdzad pa// de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la// de nas bdag
261b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid snyoms 'jug pa/ / de yi snying khar nyi ma la// rang gi chos kyi yi ge las// khros pas yang yang spros mdzad cing // de dang lhan cig bsgo bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa
261b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / de bzhin du yang dbang blang zhing // rdo rje hUM mdzad ting 'dzin gnas// gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing // 'od zer 'byung ba sna tshogs kyis// rims dang gdon
261b3(rgyud 'bum): dang dug sogs gza'/ / rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa dang po'o// // de nas spyan sogs skye mched la// hUM byung khro bo bsgom par bya// sku sogs gsum la
261b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsum/ / sgom pa 'di ni dbang byed pa'o// dang po zhi bas zhi bar bya// klu la sogs pa'i gzugs byas la// rang snying 'od kyis bkug la bstim// mchod sbyin bya ba snying rjes
261b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin/ / 'jog po dang ni rig ldan dang // mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang // pad chen dung skyong stobs kyi rgyu// dug rnams snying rje'i sbyor bas sbyangs// nag po dkar po sngon po dang //
261b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gnas su sbyang bar bya// yang na zhi ba'i thab khung du// klu yi sdig pa zhi bar bya// shin tu gnag pa'i rigs de la// mngar gsum chu yis gso bar bya// gang zhig sdig can zhi
261b7(rgyud 'bum): mi 'dul/ / gnyis kyi sbyor bas rgyun gcod bya// khrag dang dug sogs rdzas dag la// rig pa bzlog pas bsgrubs nas ni// shin tu khros pa'i khro bo yis// dgug dang gzhug dang
262a1(rgyud 'bum): myos gsad dang / / cho gas gdug pa dbang byas la// sreg pa la sogs las bya'o// brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i dus kyi tshe// skya rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha/
262a2(rgyud 'bum): nyin mtshan zad pa'i dus kyi tshe// skra bkrol bcud 'dzag gcer bu ni// byol song gnas su khrag skyug go/ lus dbus me 'bar bsgrub bya de// khro bo'i spu yi bu ga las// spros
262a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khro bo khros pa dang / / mngag gzhug rnams kyis drangs byas nas// rtog pas rtog pa bza' bar bya// sngar ni rdo rje sa 'og las// gdug pa bza' bar byas tshul du// gdug pa 'dir ni
262a4(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar bya/ / mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos// ma bcos pa yi sems can la// snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems// til sogs rdzas dang sngags sbyor gyis// sdig pa zhi byed sbyin sreg
262a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rig pa'i blo can kun bzang gis// zho la bsreg bya rgyas pa'o// mi rtag gyur pa'i gdul ba la// 'dod chags yid can bde chen gyis// bdag nyid dgos pa brtan bya'i phyir//
262a6(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal dmar sogs kyis sgrub pa'o// 'dir ni ma rung sdig pa byed// gtsor ni sbyangs phyir khro sems kyis// mngon spyod las ni rgyud kun las// bshad pa thams cad 'dir bya'o//
262a7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro// las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin// las ngan dag pa'i rang bzhin du// khros pas dmigs par mi 'gyur te// sbyor ba rnams ni bcos
262b1(rgyud 'bum): mar 'gyur/ / byang chub bcos med 'bad spangs pa'o// rdo rjes 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gnyis pa'o// / de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal po// sngar ni sprul pa
262b2(rgyud 'bum): drug pos/ / rtog pa bcu phrag dang bzhi yang // gnyis kyis rig ma 'joms byed 'dir// sprul pa brgyad du bsdus pa dang // bdag nyid gcig pu bsgom pa'ang gsungs// nam
262b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i khams su 'byung bzhi bsam/ / ri rab lhun po'i hrI yig las// pad+ma 'dab grangs lta ba la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// hUM las byung ba'i khro bo ni// zhal gcig
262b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag bzhin bza' sngo/ / rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu 'gengs// sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan cing // stag lpags smad dkris 'jigs sel ba// khro bo rnam rgyal bsgom par bya//
262b5(rgyud 'bum): thugs ka'i hUM gi sbyor ba yis// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs mtshams su// 'jig rten gsum snang rdo rje dang // 'jig rten gsum 'dul rin chen dang // 'jig rten gsum 'ching
262b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dang / / 'jig rten gsum 'jig las nyid dag/ g.yas rnams rang ming mtshan ma la// g.yon rnams gdug pa bsdig pa'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil dang dbyug sngon dang // mi gso
262b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang rta mgrin khro/ / rdo rje dang ni dbyug pa dang // ral gri pad+ma g.yas rnams so// g.yon pa gdug pa bsdigs pa'o// brgyad kyi dbus na khro bo bdag/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khrul
263a1(rgyud 'bum): pa sbyong / / dbyug pa nag sogs pho nya bzhi// sku mdog mtshan mas brgyan pa khros// lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa// khro bo'i 'khor lo 'jigs sel
263a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / gtso bcas rig pa'i khro bo kun// rgyu ma'i ba phreng bas do shal byas// gos sngon can la stag lpag dkris// gdug pa sel ba'i lam du bsgom// de nas khams
263a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnam rgyal gtso/ / khro bo'i mtshan nyid sngags bcas bshad// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod spyan gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
263a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa// mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba// 'jigs
263a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag pose ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po
263a6(rgyud 'bum): che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lha glog
263a7(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'gyu ba/ gsus po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par
263b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag la khur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gang rgyangs
263b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jig par byed pa/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sangs
263b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ya/ i dan nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra
263b4(rgyud 'bum): pA Ni hr-i da yaM ya sa mA ti kra ma tha mA ku lota sA da naM/ b+haM bi Sh+ya ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud d+ha bi bud d+ha/ ma hI prAp+ta ta ra ha ra na ga nAn/ ts+tshin+da tsIn+da/ nA ga hri da yA ni/
263b5(rgyud 'bum): b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga da ma ni/ b+hi Shir+yan+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho TA ya/ nA ga nA ya ni hUM hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI laM ba san
263b6(rgyud 'bum): ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la ba ra kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tan+ta ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pa ya phaT/ ro Sha nA ya hUM phaT/ trA sa nA ya hUM phaT kuM b+hAN+Da/ uta sA da nA ya hUM baT/
263b7(rgyud 'bum): pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra bi nA sha ka rI ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nan bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/
264a1(rgyud 'bum): sarba sha hUM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa chu la sngags kyis btab sta gtar na btang /
264a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro// klu bzlog par 'dod na smug shad kyi lcug ma 'am bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang /
264a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung bar gnas te pog gis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur la/ gser gyi
264a4(rgyud 'bum): dong tshe bdun stong ster bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni
264a5(rgyud 'bum): mar rnying pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu
264a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o// dug la ni rtswa ku shas bya ba
264a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / bdag srung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o// gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/
264b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gsum pa'o//
264b2(rgyud 'bum): / rtog pa 'di dag dbang byed pa// lag na rdo rje khros pa las// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// bran g.yog rnams ni bskul bar bya// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/
264b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bka' tsam nges bsgrags cing // bai yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod// snying kha'i 'od kyis dbang bya zhing // gu gul dud pas drod byas la// ser sna chen po sang ge la zhon pa
264b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rmugs 'dzin dang / gangs pa bzang dang / nor bu bzang dang / ku be ra dang / yang dag shes dang / 'brog gnas dang / lngas rtsen dang / pi tsi kuN+Da li rnams
264b5(rgyud 'bum): la mkho ba sbyin par bya'o/ / 'di rnams rtal chibs pa la// 'od dang ldan zhing me long can// ras dkar gtsang mas gsal byas la// gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya// yang na
264b6(rgyud 'bum): kun kyang sbrul nag chibs/ / 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams// bskul ba dag par dbang byas na// mngon spyod las kun byed par 'gyur// drag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad//
264b7(rgyud 'bum): sa gsum khyab pa spros nas ni// sngags grub stobs kyis bdag bran byed// dus tshod dus la mchod pa byed// de nas dbul bas 'jigs pa la// rmugs 'dzin sgrub pa yid 'o/
265a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad// kun kyang gter rnams mnan pa la// rin chen 'bar bas khyim 'gengs pa// sbyor gang rdo rje chus 'grub 'gyur// pad+ma zla dang gter chen la// dzA las
265a2(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu/ / bkug la rang rang gsang sngags kyis// chu dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin dbul// 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so// oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ oM dzam+b+ha
265a3(rgyud 'bum): lA ya swA hA/ oM pur+Na b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya sAhA/ oM ku be rA ya sA hA/ oM saM pra dz+nyA nA ya swAhA/ oM gu h+ya d+ha nA ya swAhA/ oM pany+tsi kA ya sAH/ oM bitsi
265a4(rgyud 'bum): kuN+Da lA ya swA hA/ de nas yang dag spyod pa'i mchog/ lha yi brtul zhugs dag pa bshad// kun tu ras gtsang gos sngon byin gyis brlab bya zhing // bram ze'i rigs ltar dri can zas
265a5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'gro mgyogs sha las ring du 'dug/ smyung bar gnas shing chus bkrus dkar gsum gtsang ma'i zas za zhing // ngag gi rlung bsdams dang dang snying rjes yid brlan brtson par
265a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug/ bsam gtan khang pa mdog ni sngo bsgyur ba yi lci ba dri zhim chu yis byugs// dkar dang sngo ba'i me tog bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la// cho rigs btsun pa'i sgrub
265a7(rgyud 'bum): pa pos ni gos dkar bgos la ku sha'i stan la 'dug/ snying rjes khros pa'i rig sngags dam pa mdzes par bzlas pa bya// ru rag sha yi bgrang 'phreng brgya phyed byin gyis brlabs la
265b1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas pas gzung / / ril bu re dang lha re sngags re bcas nas snying khur gzung // rnal 'byor 'di rnams spyad cing 'gro la 'jungs pa'i sems ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan
265b2(rgyud 'bum): la phan phyir rtog pa bshad pa yin/ / rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa bzhi pa'o// // dbyar kha skyes pa'i rtsa dang nags tshal las byung me mched ltar/
265b3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi grogs byas bsregs nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin// bskal pa dpag med skyes pa'i rtog pa'i dri ma'i rma rnams la// srung ba dad dang brtson 'grus sngags bzlas
265b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dag me yis sreg/ nyi ma'i snying po 'dzam gling dbus su rigs bzung ste// skyes dang bud med dbang po skyon med tshul khrims can// skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla
265b5(rgyud 'bum): ma'i lung thob pa/ / dad dang snying rje'i sems can gtong ba'i can blo des// rig pa'i khro bo bsgom dang de rjes de ni bzlas 'bad na// bstod dang mchod mnyes bran g.yog lha min
265b6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba brnyas med cing / / chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo gtor ma la brtson zhing // sbyin sreg rnams kyis lha dang bran g.yog mnyes byas na// ring por mi thogs sgrub pa pos des
265b7(rgyud 'bum): rtags dang phyag rgya 'byin par 'gyur/ / 'dir ni mang du smras mi dgos// sngar ni rdo rjes 'og tu// bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur// zangs lcags bla ma'i gnang bya'o//
266a1(rgyud 'bum): lus sogs rigs pa'i dbang gyur nas// me dang rlung sogs 'byung ba dang // nad dang gdon dang byad rnams dang // bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur//
266a2(rgyud 'bum): me lce 'phreng ba'i rtog pa las// bshad pa'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byung na// ser na 'di ni pha rol 'phang // smon lam lam na sna brten nas// 'di 'og byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'gro ba smin
266a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bla mar 'gyur/ / yang na srid pa'i bar ma dor// sngags kyi rnams shes gzi bskyed nas// 'gro phan rig pa 'dzin 'gyur nas// de yi 'og tu sems pa'o// tha ma'ang lam la
266a4(rgyud 'bum): brten nas ni/ / rang 'dod dam pa'i lus rnyed nas// snga ma lam sel de 'og tu// dngos grub la ni rnam par gnas// lha dang sngags sogs rtogs pa des// rtog pa dman pa mnan pa
266a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / nam mkha' lta bur rtog med la// 'jig rten ngor ni rtog pas sprul// gdul bya sdang sogs sems 'khrugs la// nga ni snying rjes sdang bar mdzad// khro sogs gsal du
266a6(rgyud 'bum): med gyur na/ / khro bor da ni ci phyir 'gyur// dang po rnal 'byor 'tshe ba bcom// de phyir rig sngags sbyor ba rnams// rgyud kun tu ni gsung ba yin// 'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni//
266a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dag pa ni bde ba yin// gdug pa'i sbyor ba phrogs pas na// bde bar byang chub lam brten la// rdo rje sku nyid 'gyur med la// bdag gis rig pa'i ye shes de// lus can
266b1(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'bras bu'o/ / ji ltar shes ni 'dzam bu ka'i// me tog gis ni gzhan du snang // de bzhin rtog med rig pa yang // khro bo'i dbang phyug 'dir snang nas// ji ltar 'dul rgyur sprul pa yis/
266b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyun mi 'chad par khro bor snang // snying rje med na 'bras bu nyams// 'gro la phan btags gnod bsal na// rang sems dag pas 'bras bu 'grub// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgrib pa rnams// /
266b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems kyis ring du spang // 'dis ni 'khor ba 'jig par nges// brtan dang g.yo ba'i sgrib pa rnams// blo mnyam dus na gnyen po dang // mi mthun nam mkha' ltar yang pa//
266b4(rgyud 'bum): lhun gyis 'grub 'bras phye ma yin// ji srid rtog pa'i dri ma yod// de srid 'bad de rig pa bsgom// sems sbyong snga ma rig pa yis// rgyud nyid du ni 'dod pa yin// gang la sems
266b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dri med pa/ / rtog pa'i dri mas nag por byas// de la spang ba'i blo med pa// rtog pa'i blo can 'khor ba yin// de phyir shAkya'i rigs can rnams// sa 'og tu rgyu ba'i klu'i rtog pa
266b6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i phyir sbyor ba rnams la gus par bya'o/ / rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba las rtog pa lnga pa rdzogs so// // dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag khri srong
266b7(rgyud 'bum): sde btsan gyi bka' khrims su/ / dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra badz+ra dang / ra byid lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o//
267a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI lAm+ba ra d+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni kalpa nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs
267a2(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang
267a3(rgyud 'bum): 'tsham pa/ mig me mngag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar
267a4(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar bza ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral
267a5(rgyud 'bum): bapa bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gsus po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa
267a6(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po
267a7(rgyud 'bum): dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrugs par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jig
267b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa/ klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA//
267b2(rgyud 'bum): b+ho b+h+yo paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan nI lAM ba ra d+hA ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha mA ku lo ta sA da naM/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/
267b3(rgyud 'bum): mA ti krA ma tha ha ra ha ra nA gA nAn/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA go hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marma ni bi shAr+yan+tu nA gA sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na ya nA ni hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA rA NA ya/
267b4(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya hU phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya hu phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ya hUM phaT/ kri tAn+ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha NA ya hUM phaT/
267b5(rgyud 'bum): trA sa nA a hUM pha Ta/ kuM b+haNA/ u ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya
267b6(rgyud 'bum): mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha yi/ sarba big+h+na na bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sarba sha truM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga la
267b7(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro/ / klu bzlog par 'dod na spyag shad kyi lcug ma 'am bal po'i se'u'i lcug mas bya'o// yaM dgas dang brjed
268a1(rgyud 'bum): byed rnams la skud pas bya'o/ / rims nad med par bya ba dang / gzhogs byed na ba dang / yid dka' chus pa la ni smad pa sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dod na 'ag gcig/
268a2(rgyud 'bum): smyung bar 'dug ste pog por gyis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston la/ gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do// rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal
268a3(rgyud 'bum): bas bya'o/ / sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba la ni mar rnying pa 'am/ thal ba'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs
268a4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la srung ba'i mdud pa byas
268a5(rgyud 'bum): te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o// dug la ni rtsa ku shas byab par bya'o// bdag srung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o//
268a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad
268a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya'o/ / de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon pos mchod de/ sngags stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro//
268b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa lag na rdo rjegs sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi pa~M kAr shrI dz+nyAn dang / bod kyi lo tsa brgya brtson 'grus/
268b2(rgyud 'bum): seng ges dpal na len dza'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni nI lAM ba re d+ha ra tri lo kabi na ya nA ma tAr+tha
268b3(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
268b4(rgyud 'bum): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi byang phyogs na lcang lo can gyi po brang na bzhugs te/ brjod kyis mi lang ba'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa'i 'jig/
268b5(rgyud 'bum): rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams pa 'jigs shig/ ma skrag cig/ ma dngangs shig ces gsungs so//
268b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la 'od zer kha dog gsum las grub pa/ 'od
268b7(rgyud 'bum): zer kha dog gsum pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'jig rten gsum du bkye ste/ thams cad bkug nas slar yang 'od kyis snang ba byas nas/ oM badz+ra tsar+Na pa tsa duSh+TAn ta
269a1(rgyud 'bum): gtan dag pas chub u0f7f/ nAg bi d+ha da rdza pa/ ts+tsha ba dar NA ya hraH/ pre tA ng+kar k+Shas paH/ nas badrar rdzal paT/ nangag pa'i dang rdza
269a2(rgyud 'bum): de ba bid+ha ra NA ya phaT/ ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi lus gas nas sems shel sgong lta bur gnas par gyur to// sems yi ge gsum lta bur gnas te/
269a3(rgyud 'bum): oM na zhal gsum phyag drug ste// AHni zhal gcig phyug gnyis te// hUM ni rgyan dang bral gyur pa// rigs ni gsum du gyur pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas rigs gsum du tha
269a4(rgyud 'bum): pas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba// zhe sdang chen po bdag nyid can// phyag na rdo rje rnyed dka' ba// bdag cag gis ni thob par 'gyur//
269a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs bskul ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// badz+ra pA Ni hri da ya da/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
269a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho g+ho pa na nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la/ uta sAd
269a7(rgyud 'bum): naM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ bstod pa 'dis bstod pas 'gyur ba bcu gnyis dang lhas bco brgyad byung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'byung ba'i lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad skrag nas dkon
269b1(rgyud 'bum): chog gsum la skabs su mchi'o zhes brjod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis rang rang gi gdul bya rnams sa 'jigs shig/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
269b2(rgyud 'bum): khams na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bzhugs pas 'jig rten mkhyen pa la bstod pa'i lhas yin gyis zhes gsungs so/ / rang rang gi 'khor dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang rang gi 'jig
269b3(rgyud 'bum): rten mkhyen pa la gsol pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas rang rang gi 'khor rnams rang rang gi ston pa'i 'od la 'jus

270b2(rgyud 'bum): ste rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo / / phyi yi phyag na rdo rje la// lha srin sngags kyis bskor bar bya// gnyis la rigs kyi nag pos brgyan// rgyan dang cha lugs tshang ba la//

271a2(rgyud 'bum): rje hUM la thim/ / de la mchod bstod sna tshogs bya// rdo rje dag las ye shes dam pa yis// me byung bas ni rdo rje zhu gyur nas// 'khor lo'i rnam par gyur par bsam// sku ni sku yi
271a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa ste/ / mtshan ma mtshan ma'i rnam par ro// sa de bsdus pa kir ti dang // bsregs pa'i nang du 'khor lo gzhug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod pa/

271b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig dbus gnas/ / de la sngags rgyal bskor bar bya// sngags ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// ming dang don dang spel ba dang / bzlas pa dag dang rnam pa bzhi// bzlas pa rnam

272a1(rgyud 'bum): sku bsrungs bka' nyan bzlas pa'o/ / khyab 'jug mdung dang tshangs pa'i gzhu// mar me lta bu'i bzlas pa'o// bzlas pa'i mtshan ma'i rang bzhin te/

272b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri/ / de steng nyi ma zla ba ste// 'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba la// dgra bo'i mgo bo thur bstan bri// de yi snying khar ming bri'o// 'khor lo yi ni rtsibs brgyad de//

272b7(rgyud 'bum): den yi sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o ston pa khyad par 'phags// e ma'o thabs kyang khyad par 'phags// e ma'o 'khor yang

276a2(rgyud 'bum): cang dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang /

283b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing de ni mnyam pa/ thag gru che ba/ yangs pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ lha'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ spos gtsang
283b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing skyon med pa/ lha'i spos dang me tog gis rab tu brgyan pa/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra skad dang glu'i nga ro 'byung ba/ lha'i rin po che'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan
283b5(rgyud 'bum): palha'i rin po che'i sang ge'i khris mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rin po che'i rdzing gis rab tu brgyan pa/ sa gzhi 'jam zhing snyib/ ri dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang
283b6(rgyud 'bum): tsher ma med pa/ bud med kyi dngos po med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sar gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag

297b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems
297b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po gtso bo gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya// gnyis pa'i ming ni zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya ste/ de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
297b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o/ / 'jam dpal de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye
297b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i smon lam thob cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems can so so'i skye bo gang dag dge ba dang / mi dge ba
297b7(rgyud 'bum): mi shes pa dag yod de/ de dag ni chags pas zil gyis non pa/ sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi shes pa'o// de dag ni byis pa/ glen pa/ dad pa'i dbang po dang
298a1(rgyud 'bum): bral ba/ nor sogs shing srung ba la mngon par brtson gyi/ sbyin pa yang dag par bgyid pa la de dag gi sems mi 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa'i dus nye bar gnas pa na rang
298a2(rgyud 'bum): pus kyi sha las bcad pa bzhin du yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/ / sems can de dag ni bdag nyid kyang du mas yongs su mi spyod na/ pha ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo la ster
298a3(rgyud 'bum): ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa rnams la lha smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan slong ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can de lta bu de dag
298a4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ yang na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// de la gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
298a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas kyang rung / bdud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas kyang rung ste/ der de bzhin ga
298a6(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur zhing dran ma thag pa tsam gyis de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas skrag nas yang
298a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas yon tan dag don du mi gnyer ba dang / sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ rim gyis
298b1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/ nor gyi phung po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam
298b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dag yod de/ de dag tshul khrims log par zhugs shing lta ba log par zhugs nas/ gang
298b3(rgyud 'bum): dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag ni tshul khrims tsam srung gi/ mang du thos pa yongs su mi tshol te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams kyi don zab mo mi shes/ gang
298b4(rgyud 'bum): dag mang du thos pa de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/ nga rgyal gyis ni non pas gzhan dag la phrag dog byed cing dam pa'i chos la dbang za bar 'gyur/ spong bar 'gyur ro// mi blun
298b5(rgyud 'bum): po de lta bu de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs pa ste/ bdag kyang lam ngan par zhugs la/ sems can gzhan gang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang g.yang sa chen por lhung bar byed pa'o// sems
298b6(rgyud 'bum): can de lta bu de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
298b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang / der sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur te/
299a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can du
299a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de dag khyim spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems
299a3(rgyud 'bum): can gang dag bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing phrag dog gis gzhan dag la mi snyan pa brjod pa yod de/ bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa'i sems can de dag ngan song gsum po dag tu
299a4(rgyud 'bum): lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag lo stong phrag du ma 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas ba lang dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu la sogs pa bdud
299a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ lcug lcag dang dbyug lcag rnams kyis brdeg pa dang / bkres pa dang skom pas lus nyen pa dang / khal chen po bkal te lam du 'gro bar
299a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal te brgya la mi'i rnyed pa rnyed pa na'ang rtag tu rigs dma' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bran du 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ro// gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom
299a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sdug bsngal
299b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa dang / gsal ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / dge ba yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa
299b2(rgyud 'bum): dang rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/ bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i chu klung skems
299b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro//
299b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag phra ma la mngon par dga' zhing sems can gang dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod de/
299b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can de dag rnam par rtsod pa'i sems su gyur pas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed do// gcig la gcig phan pa ma yin
299b6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dod cing rtag tu phan tshun gnod par bya ba'i phyir brtson te/ de dag nags tshal gyi lha dang / shing gi lha dang / ri'i lha 'gugs par byed/ dur khrod rnams su 'byung po tha dad pa dag
299b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par byed/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod cing sha dang khrag za ba'i gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams mchod par byed do// dgra bo de'i ming
300a1(rgyud 'bum): nas brjod pa'am gzugs byas nas/ der rig sngags drag po sgrub cing byung stems dang ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gi bar chad bya ba dang / lus rnam par gzhig par
300a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa la/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ de
300a3(rgyud 'bum): dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems su gnas par 'gyur/ rang rang gi bdog pas chog shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal
300a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag
300a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas te/ lo gcig gam zla ba gsum du bslab pa'i gnas rnams 'dzin cing / gang dag gis bsams pas bdag gi dge ba 'dis nub phyogs
300a6(rgyud 'bum): gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog cig ces smon lam de lta bu dag btab pa dag las/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de

300b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs rnams las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// gang la la dag lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni der skyes nas/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par
300b2(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig
300b3(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong du ma dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan du na yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta
300b4(rgyud 'bum): bu'i khyim dag dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po 'byor pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/
300b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpa' ba dang / rtul phod pa dang / tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi
300b6(rgyud 'bum): shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos shing bzung ba de'i bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
300b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chang pa dang /
301a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / glegs bam la bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
301a2(rgyud 'bum): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyi bkur sti bgyid pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyis bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom
301a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ / tha na rmi lam du'ang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrags
301a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / tshon sna lnga pa'i gos rnams kyi dkris te phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na/ gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa de dang der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha bye ba
301a5(rgyud 'bum): khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas
301a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/ sus kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus te/ phrogs na'ang slar 'phrog par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
301a7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la
301b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs byas te/ nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya/
301b2(rgyud 'bum): kha zas gtsang ma za zhing lus legs par bkrus te gos bzang po dri ma med pa bgo zhing phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs sil ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/
301b3(rgyud 'bum): ras dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su dri ma med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i
301b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems su bya/ rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / gru dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs
301b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor ba bya ste/ de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo sde 'di'ang ston na/ gang bsams pa dang / gang smon pa'i bsams pa de thams cad yongs su
301b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gal te tshe ring por smon na ni tshe ring por 'gyur ro// gal te longs spyod dang ldan par smon na ni longs spyod 'byor par 'gyur ro// gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par
301b7(rgyud 'bum): smon na ni tshegs chung ngus rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / gal te bu 'dod na ni bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmis sam/ gang du bya kha dang lhas ngan mthong ngam/ gnas gang
302a1(rgyud 'bum): du bkra mi shis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs

302a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / g.yang sas 'jigs pa dang / glang po che gtum pos 'jigs pa dang / seng ges 'jigs pa dang / stag

302b4(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o/ / bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzad pa myong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla

302b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang gi phyir nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i yon tan brjod par khyod dang dam/ yid
303a1(rgyud 'bum): ches sam/ yang na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo 'di la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom za ba med dam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la

303a3(rgyud 'bum): tshem 'tshal ba ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba'i slad du'o//

303a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags kyis kyang sems can dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dag mchis te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi
303a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos nas de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang phan yon du 'gyur snyam

303b1(rgyud 'bum): ba kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go skabs ma yin no/ / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas
303b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka' 'o/ / kun dga' bo khyod dad cing yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par blta'o// byang chub sems
303b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no/ / kun dga' bo mir 'gyur ba rnyed pa ni rnyed
303b4(rgyud 'bum): par dka' 'o/ / dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus pa'ang rnyed par dka' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa'ang rnyed par shin tu dka' 'o// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das
303b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni tshad med do/ / thabs la mkhas pa'ang tshad med do// smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'ang tshad
303b6(rgyud 'bum): med do/ / nga de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par rgya cher yang dag par bshad par 'dod kyang bskal pa zad par 'gyur gyi/
303b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mtha' rtogs par ni mi 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub
304a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskyab grol zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug
304a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems
304a3(rgyud 'bum): can bro nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir te/ un ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas cing bkres pa dang skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni bskams/ 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs
304a4(rgyud 'bum): mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams ngu ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong / gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni zangs te/ de'i lus 'di na
304a5(rgyud 'bum): nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing / mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha slang bzhin 'brang ba gang lags pa des ni des dge ba 'am mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa
304a6(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba'am mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de
304a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bsgo ba la/ gang dag nad pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabs su mchi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyid na/
304b1(rgyud 'bum): de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyi 'tshal ba'i gnas der mchis te/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig/ yang na ni gdugs
304b2(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la/ de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur
304b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ srog gi slad du'ang sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do// de lta lags pas dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
304b4(rgyud 'bum): pa kun dga' bos/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la ji ltar
304b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad chen po las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag gis/ nad pa de'i don du nyin
304b6(rgyud 'bum): bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya'o/ / dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang / skom rnams dang / yo byad thams cad kyis ci nus su
304b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang rim gro bya'o/ / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan yid la bya'o// mdo 'di lan bzhi
305a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o/ / zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par bya'o// sku gzugs bdun bya'o// sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar yang mar me bdun bdun gzha
305a2(rgyud 'bum): gomar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du bya ste/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o// tshen sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o//
305a3(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nad kyi gnod pa 'am/ rang gi dmag tshogs sam/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/
305a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar gyi gnod pa 'am/ gza' zla ba'i gnod pa 'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char gyi gnod pa 'am/ than pa'i gnod pa'ang rung ste/ gnod
305a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/
305a6(rgyud 'bum): btson du bzung ba rnams gtang bar bya zhing / gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la de lta bur mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po
305a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis
305b1(rgyud 'bum): yul bde ba dang lo legs par 'gyur/ rlung dang char dus su ldan zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/ yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang / bde ba dang /
305b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu dga' ba mang por 'gyur ro// yul der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro// ltas ngan pa
305b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe ra/ mdog dang / stobs dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel
305b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na tshe yongs su zad nas kyang mngon par
305b5(rgyud 'bum): skyebyang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod par khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las ma thos sam/ de'i phyir
305b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstan to/ / sems can nad kyis btab pa la de nad tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang rim gro byed pa dang mi ldan nam/ yang na sman pa sman ma yin pa byed
305b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang yod de/ 'di ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang po'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gnyis pa ni/ gang rgyal po'i chad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsum
306a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni gang dag ha cang bag med de/ bag med par gan ba de dag ni mi ma yin pa dag gis mdangs 'brog pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzhi pa ni/ gang dag mes tshig
306a2(rgyud 'bum): ste 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/ / dus ma yin par 'chi ba lnga pa ni/ gang dag chus 'chi ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba drug pa ni/ gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / wa dang / sbrul dang /
306a3(rgyud 'bum): gcan gzan khro bo'i nang du chud de 'chi ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba bdun pa ni/ gang dag ri kha nas g.yang du lhung ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad pa ni/ gang dag dug dang /
306a4(rgyud 'bum): byang dang / ro langs kyi sbyor bas gsod pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni/ gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas bkres pa dang skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// mdor
306a5(rgyud 'bum): na 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba chen por bstan pa ste/ gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni grangs med dpag tu med do// de nas 'khor der gnod sbyin gyi
306a6(rgyud 'bum): sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyal 'dzin
306a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon po dbang 'dzin
306b1(rgyud 'bum): dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
306b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po re re la'ang g.yog gnod sbyin bdun
306b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/ de dag gis tshig gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das
306b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la'ang ngan 'gror mchi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// des na bdag cag lhan cig tu
306b5(rgyud 'bum): mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ / chos la skyabs su mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang //
306b6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o// bye brag tu ni grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang / gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
306b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa'i sems can de dag la bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar
307a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin
307a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag/ gang gi phyir khyed bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la
307a3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu shes rab chung du kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/
307a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan thos pa dang / bzung ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi yon
307a5(rgyud 'bum): tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i bu blo gros chung ngu de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyi mkhyen nas
307a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu
307a7(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so/ / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang me tog gi sprin gyi char yang bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag kyang
307b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba lnga byung ba'i lha'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskos
307b2(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang /
307b3(rgyud 'bum): khyim bdag rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor te chos ston cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang thabs cig tu kun tu snang ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag dang /
307b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so// legs so zhes gsol nas/
307b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de thams cad kyis rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams las nges par byung ba'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spyad pa dang / rgyan rnams
307b6(rgyud 'bum): dang lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mngon par mchod de lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ / kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
307b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par dang / thabs la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshar du bgyi ba lags te/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ting nge
308a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'di lta bu thob par gyur cig ces sems can de dag thams cad kyis smon lam de skad btab bo/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bstan las langs te thal
308a2(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ting nge
308a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yang bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus
308a4(rgyud 'bum): na sems can bsod nams chung ba/ bro nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ba/ gnod sems su gyur pa/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gnod pa 'byung ba/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon
308a5(rgyud 'bum): pas gnod par gyur pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las bskyab pa dang / mgon bgyi ba dang / sems can de dag gis bcangs sam/ bklag sam/ yi ger 'dri
308a6(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ yi ger 'drir stsol tam/ 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang
308a7(rgyud 'bum): log par lhung bar mi mchi ba dang / dus ma lags pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi tshig de lta bu bshad du
308b1(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal sems can thams
308b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi don dang snying rje ba'i phyir khyod kyi spob pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis skyes so/ / yang legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// 'jam dpal de
308b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUR+Ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems kyis
308b4(rgyud 'bum): gzungs de bzung ngam/ bklags sam/ mchod na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs shing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur//
308b5(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
308b6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa bai DUR+Ya'i 'od ces bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsung dbyangs gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/
308b7(rgyud 'bum): g+hu ma g+hu me/ i me/ ni mi hi/ ma ti ma ti/ sap+ta ta thA ga tA sa ma d+h+ya d+hiSh+Thi te a te ma te/ bA le/ bA pa sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA baM nA sha ya/ ma ma bun+te/ bud+d+hot+ta me/ u me/ ku me/ pur+tha/
309a1(rgyud 'bum): k+She tra pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+ha me/ nir d+ha me/ me ru me ru/ me ru shi kha re/ sarbA kA la/ pri d+h+ya ni bA ra Ni/ bud+d+ha su bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha d+hISh+ThA na rak+Shan+d+ha me/ sarba de bA/ sa ma a
309a2(rgyud 'bum): sa me/ sa ma nA ha ran+tu sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA/ sha me sha me/ pra sha man+tu ma sarba i t+yu parba ba byA d+ha ya/ pU ra Ne pu ra Ne/ pU ra ya me/ sarba A shA yaM bai DUR+Ya pra taM b+ha se sarba pA paM kA yaM ka ri
309a3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ gzungs 'odi bka' stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung ste/ sa chen po g.yos nas rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dag snang ngo // 'khor ji ltar lhags pa des kyang lha'i spos dang bdug pa rnams
309a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te lan bdun bskor ba byas so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal
309a5(rgyud 'bum): to/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod dam/ gtsang mar byas te phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
309a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa dang ldan par byas la/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bas des de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag gi sku gzugs byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag
309a7(rgyud 'bum): la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / 'greng ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing nyi ma bdun du 'phags
309b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la gnas te/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems pa thams cad
309b2(rgyud 'bum): sems par 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyang yang dag par srung bar 'gyur/ lha thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang yongs
309b3(rgyud 'bum): su skyong bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur//
309b4(rgyud 'bum): dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa
309b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
309b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btu/
309b7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'ang thos
310a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon du mthong ste mchod pa bgyis so/ / yang bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs
310a2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi mtshan dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa der bdag cag g.yog dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
310a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba der bdag cag mthun par lhan cig tu mchis la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/
310a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rab tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / phyogs kyang yongs
310a5(rgyud 'bum): su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ / 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can thams cad
310a6(rgyud 'bum): la byas pa gzo ba lags te/ dus ma yin par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
310a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / ji ltar bsams pa dang / sems dang / yid bde ba dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi'o// dus thams cad du bsrung
310b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rang gi bro bor ba dang dam bcas pa 'di dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des rjes su dran par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a g+hu ma g+hu ta ra
310b2(rgyud 'bum): g+hum ma g+hu g+hu re/ ha hu he/ mra mra mra mra/ dzu dzu re/ dzu re swA hA/ gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
310b3(rgyud 'bum): yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'dzir stsol ba dang / rab tu gus par mchod pa bgyid pa pa ni ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar rig par bgyi ste/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
310b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur//
310b5(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu'am/
310b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi don du bdag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams rab tu stsal bar bgyi yis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
310b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag la dgongs su gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsung gcig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na
311a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje legs so legs so/ / lag na rdo rje khyod la dgongs zin gyis/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la phan par 'dod pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs

317b3(rgyud 'bum): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ rim gyis rang gi mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin
