317b5(rgyud 'bum): yod de/ de dag tshul khrims log par zhugs shing // lta ba log par zhugs nas gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag ni tshul khrims srung gi/ mang du thos pa yongs su mi
317b6(rgyud 'bum): tshol te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams kyi don zab mo mi shes/ gang dag mang du zos pa de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/ nga rgyal gyi non pas
317b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag la phrag dog byed cing dam pa'i chos la dbang za bar 'gyur/ spong bar 'gyur ro// mi blun po de lta bu de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs pa ste/ bdag kyang lam ngan par
318a1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs la/ sems can gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang g.yang sa chen por lhung bar byed pa'o// sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems can
318a2(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba mi bzad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni sems
318a3(rgyud 'bum): can dmyal ba na gnas kyang / der sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur te/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur//
318a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can du 'gyur ro// de dag khyim spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung
318a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing phrag dog gis gzhan dag
318a6(rgyud 'bum): la mi snyan par brjod pa yod de/ bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa'i sems can de dag ngan song gsum po dag tu lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de
318a7(rgyud 'bum): dag lo stong phrag du ma 'das nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ba lang dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ lkug
318b1(rgyud 'bum): lhag dang dbyig lcag rnams kyis brdeg pa dang / bkres pa dang skom pas lus nyen pa dang / khal chen po bkal te lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te brgya la mi'i skye ba rnyed
318b2(rgyud 'bum): na'ang rtag tu rigs dma' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ zan du 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ro// gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
318b3(rgyud 'bum): pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa dang //
318b4(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / dge ba yongs su stsal ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/ bdud kyi zhags pa
318b5(rgyud 'bum): gcod pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i chu klung skems par 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
318b6(rgyud 'bum): bsngal pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag phra ma la mngon par dga' zhing sems can
318b7(rgyud 'bum): dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod de/ sems can dag rnam par rtson pa'i sems su gyur pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi
319a1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed do/ / gcig la gcig phan pa ma yin pa 'dod cing rtag tu phan tshun gnod par bya ba'i phyir brtson te/ de dag nags
319a2(rgyud 'bum): tshal gyi lnga dang / shing gi lha dang / ri'i lha 'gugs par byed/ dur khrod rnams su 'byung po tha dad pa dag 'gugs par byed/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams
319a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi srog gcod cing / sha dang khrag za ba'i gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams mchod par byed de/ dgra bo de'i ming nas brjod pa 'am gzugs byas nas/ der rig sngags drag po bsgrub cing
319a4(rgyud 'bum): byad stems dang ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gi bar chad bya ba dang / lus rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa la gang dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i
319a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med
319a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems su gnas par 'gyur/ rang rang gi bdog pas chog shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
319a7(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas te/ lo gcig gam zla ba gsum
319b1(rgyud 'bum): du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'dzin cing / gang dag gi bsam pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nub phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
319b2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba can du skye bar shog cig ces smon lam de lta bu btab pa dag las/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag
319b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags nas lam ston par 'gyur te/ de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs rnams las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// gang la
319b4(rgyud 'bum): la dag lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni der skyes nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig
319b5(rgyud 'bum): rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na
319b6(rgyud 'bum): yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i tsho dag dang / nor dang /
319b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ma mang po 'byor pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog phun sum
320a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtul phod pa dang / chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs
320a2(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i mtshan thos shing bzung ba de'i bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol
320a3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus na/ gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /
320a4(rgyud 'bum): yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / glegs bam la bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
320a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam pa
320a6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ / tha na rmi lam du'ang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrags par bgyi'o// tshon sna lnga pa'i gos rnams kyis dkris te phyogs gtsang mar/
320a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhag na/ gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// gang dag bcom ldan
320b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyul
320b2(rgyud 'bum): sus kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus te/ phrogs na'ang slar 'phrog par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa
320b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / 'jam dpal dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs bya//
320b4(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya'o// kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te gos bzang po dri
320b5(rgyud 'bum): ma med pa bgo zhing / phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs sil ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyis
320b6(rgyud 'bum): legs par brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su dri ma med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi
320b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems su bya/ rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor bar bya ste/ de'i sngon gyi smon
321a1(rgyud 'bum): lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo sde 'di'ang bstan na gang bsams pa dang / gang smon pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gal te tshe ring por skyon nini cha
321a2(rgyud 'bum): ring por 'gyur ro/ / gal te longs spyod dang ldan par smon na ni longs spyod 'byor par 'gyur ro// gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par smon na ni tshegs chung ngus rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te bu dod na ni
321a3(rgyud 'bum): bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmis sam/ gang du bya khA dang lhas ngan pa mthong ngam/ gnas gang du bkra mi shis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la/ gang
321a4(rgyud 'bum): dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bkur sti byed na/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i
321a5(rgyud 'bum): dngos po thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang / chus 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / g.yang sas
321a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa dang / glang po che gtum pos 'jigs pa dang / seng ges 'jigs pa dang / stag gis 'jigs pa dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pas 'jigs pa dang /
321a7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa dang rkang lag brgya pas 'jigs pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas na 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// gang dag pha rol
321b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / rkun pos 'jigs pa dang // rnom pos 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dad pa'i
321b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dzin cing lha gzhan mi 'dzin pa dang / gang dag yang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag
321b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang / khyim gyi gnas nas byung
321b4(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i dge slong gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / dge slong ma gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag ji ltar yongs su
321b5(rgyud 'bum): bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de dag gi nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/ ngan 'gro ngan song gis 'jigs skrag pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das de
321b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/ de dag la ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o// bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i
321b7(rgyud 'bum): dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzad pa myong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi pra bai DUrI'i 'od de la mchod na de myur du yongs su thar par 'gyur ro//
322a1(rgyud 'bum): bu'ang yan lag yongs su tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang / mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang
322a2(rgyud 'bum): nad med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyur ro/ / de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
322a3(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo gang gi phyir nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i yon tan brjod par khyod dad dam/ yid ches sam/ yang na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab
322a4(rgyud 'bum): mo 'di la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom za ba med dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
322a5(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom 'tshal ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad
322a6(rgyud 'bum): du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gdugs dang dgung zla 'di
322a7(rgyud 'bum): lhar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis ni dog sa la lhung yang gda'/ ro'i rgyal po ri rab ni gnas nas 'pho'ang gda'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur
322b1(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lha lags kyis kyang / sems can dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dag mchis te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos
322b2(rgyud 'bum): na de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang phan yon du 'gyur snyam nas/ de dag mi dad cing yid mi
322b3(rgyud 'bum): ches shing spongs pas/ yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi sman pa dang / mi bde ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
322b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go skabs ma yin no/ / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs
322b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka' ba'o/ / kun dga' bo khyod dad cing yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
322b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma gtogs par/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no// kun dga' bo mir 'gyur ba ni rnyed par dka' 'o//
322b7(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus pa'ang rnyed par dka' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa'ang rnyed par shin tu dka'o// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
323a1(rgyud 'bum): pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni tshad med do/ / thabs la mkhas pa'ang tshad med do// smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'ang tshad med do//
323a2(rgyud 'bum): nga de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par rgya cher yang dag par bshad par 'dod kyang bskal pa zad par 'gyur gyi/ bcom
323a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mtha' rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ / yang de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'
323a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po bskyab grol zhes bya ba bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
323a5(rgyud 'bum): ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis
323a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gzir te/ yun ring po'i zo nad kyis lus kyi sha bas shing bkres pa dang skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni bskams/ 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/ mdza' bshes dang
323a7(rgyud 'bum): nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams ngu ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong / gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/ de'i lus 'di nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos
323b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing / mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang lags pa des ni des dge ba dang mi dge ba bgyis pa de thams cad legs par yi ge la bris
323b2(rgyud 'bum): nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba 'am mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba las/ gang dag nad pa
323b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la skyabs su mchi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyid na/ de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi
323b4(rgyud 'bum): lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis 'tshal ba'i gnas der mchi ste/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig/ yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdus
323b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la/ / de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur te/ srog gi slad du'ang sdig pa'i las
323b6(rgyud 'bum): mi bgyid do/ / de lta lags pas dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ byang chub sem
323b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bskyab grol la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la ji ltar mchod par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab
324a1(rgyud 'bum): grol gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad chen po las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag gis nad pa de'i don du/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du
324a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan yid la bya'o/ / mdo 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par
324a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sku gzugs bdun bya'o// sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar yang mar me bdun bdun gzhag go/ mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du byas te/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi
324a4(rgyud 'bum): bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o/ / tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba
324a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la nad kyi gnod pa 'am/ rang gi dmag tshogs sam/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/ rgyu skar gyi gnod pa 'am/ gza' zla ba'i gnod pa 'am/ gza' nyi ma'i
324a6(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char gyi gnod pa 'am/ than pa'i gnod pa'ang rung ste/ gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na/
324a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/ btson du bzung ba rnams gtang bar bya zhing / gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan
324b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi tha bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la de lta bur mchod pa byas na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gces

324b4(rgyud 'bum): pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/ / lhas ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs
324b5(rgyud 'bum): dang nad med pa dang / dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol la 'di skad ces smras so//

324b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa las ma thos sam/ de'i phyir sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstan to// sems can nad kyis btab pa la de nad tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang rim gro byed pa dang mi
325a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan nam/ yang na sman pa sman ma yin par byed pa'ang yod de/ 'di ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang po'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gnyis pa ni/ gang dag rgyal
325a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i chad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/ / dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsum pa ni/ gang dag ha cang bag med de bag med par gnas pa de dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis mdangs 'phrog pa'o// /

331a4(rgyud 'bum): ga ga na ma hA ba rA Na lak+Sha Ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na/ sA ga re swA hA/ de la rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ byang

331a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas bstan par mi spyod kyi/ gzhan du mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no// 'jis skyes bu dam pa de ni sgo mtha' yas pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing
331a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams la lhag par dmigs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sems can 'dul ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna
331b1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pas gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba/ las thams cad rjes su dran pa'i cho ga yang dag par sbyor ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur zhing / sems can gyi khams dang mos
331b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / stobs sna chos
331b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sgo sangs rgyas rjes su zin pa'i mos pas snying po 'di bzlas na gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i 'jig rten
331b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams sna tshogs pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yang 'byin par 'gyur ro// gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la
331b5(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i char yang mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad du yi dgas rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba'ang mngon par rab tu 'bab
331b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / dmyal ba rnams kyi grang ba la dro ba' yang dag par skyed par byed do// dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can mos
331b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i yul can gyi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ / byin gyis rlob par byed/ yongs su 'gegs par byed/ yongs su smin par byed/ rnam par
332a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dul bar byed/ nges par sbyong bar byed/ rab tu sbyong bar byed/ rnam par 'phel bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ so sor 'god par byed/ rnam par grol bar byed//
332a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi theg pa la lhag par 'dzeg par byed/ myur du lhag par 'dzeg pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag kyang ston par byed/ mdor na mthar gyis byang chub la gzhol zhing so sor
332a3(rgyud 'bum): 'god par byed/ dge ba sgrub pa la gnas pa skyed par byed/ sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa zad par byed/ rnam par 'joms par byed/ rnam par sel bar byed/ 'dren par byed/

332a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis 'dir yang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi don yongs su ma nyams pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sngags 'dzin
332a6(rgyud 'bum): pas dang por re zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnyed pa 'di nyid la

332b7(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pas rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas mkhyen pa ltar/ des kyang ji ltar rjes su yi rang bar nus pa
333a1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ / de nas mchod pa bya ba bya ste/ sems can gyi khams na gang nga'i ba med cing yongs su bzung ba med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga de thams cad
333a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod pa'i 'phrin las kyis dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang /

333a6(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ji ltar mngon par bsngos pa ltar de bzhin du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams

333b4(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba thams cad myur du stsol cig pa 'am/ yang na sems can thams cad kyi zag pa
333b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i dge ba 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yang dag par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces de lta bu la sogs pa sems can
333b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa yid la byed pa 'am dag tu brjod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub pa'i rgyu dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad

334a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis de dag gi sprul pa'i sprin rgya che ba mos pas mngon par bsgrub nas/ mdor na sems can gyi

334a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' kho nas mkhyen to/ / de nas de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / rjes su yi rang ba la sogs

334a7(rgyud 'bum): cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / dmigs pa dang / bzlas pa dang / nan tan du bgyid pa na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub
334b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / dmig pa dag la goms pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i snying po 'di ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de
334b2(rgyud 'bum): srid bzlas pa bzla bar bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
334b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sems can gyi don bla na med pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po'i sku yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
334b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag byas nas sdang bar bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa rig pa rgya chen po'i tshul gyis mdo
334b5(rgyud 'bum): sde rnams mngon par mchod cing klog pa 'am/ tha na phyag byas nas zas bza' bar bya ste/ dang po zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas
334b6(rgyud 'bum): kham gyi dang po lha nyid la dbul zhing / de'i 'og tu zas bza' bar bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM ba l-i da te te dzo mA li ni swA hA/
334b7(rgyud 'bum): kha zas kyis dub pa spangs nas kyang snga dro'i bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad phyi dro'i yang bya ba yin no// nyal na'ang yan lag thams cad kyis dang por sangs rgyas dang byang
335a1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bstod de mal stan la 'dug cing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis

335a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi dang po dang tha ma la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas dam pa'i chos 'don pa la sogs pa bya'o/ / sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des de bzhin du nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas dang
335a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dang por phyag bya ba dang / nyin re zhing bdag la 'bul ba dang / de bzhin du sdig pa so sor bshags pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /

335b4(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par byas nas/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi'i nyin mtshan la gso sbyong byas la/ ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas me tog gi gcal bkram pa'i
335b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la mchod rten nam/ lugs sku 'am dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mdun du bzhag la/ ku sha'i khres po 'am/ gcal du bkram pa la 'dug pa 'am/
335b6(rgyud 'bum): lo ma la nye bar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchog slong bas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba dang // dmigs
335b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bzlas pas lcags kyi 'khor lo lag pa la thogs la/ ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing sa chen po 'gul bar 'gyur te/
336a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing de dag gis kyang dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs su bsod nams ji lta ba
336a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / rang gi skal ba ji lta ba'i gnas rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur te/ de la lus nyams par yang mi

336b3(rgyud 'bum): gos sam/ zhags pa la bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ji snyed kyi grogs 'dod pa de snyed kyi grogs dang lhan cig 'phur zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//

336b7(rgyud 'bum): khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung / phyi'i gtsang sbra spyod pa la sogs pa med kyang rung / nya sha dang sha dag la sogs pa ma spangs kyang rung 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang
337a1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pa goms pa'i sems kyis 'grub bo/ / gal te bris sku la sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/ thang ka la bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i
337a2(rgyud 'bum): ri bo la rin po che'i pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pus mo btsugs nas pad+ma la bzhugs pa rdo rje dang bcas par thal mo

337a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang cod pan can gos gser po gyon pa/ lag pa g.yon gyis lcags kyu yongs su 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'bar ba'i snying po can khros shing
337a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs par 'gyur ba/ gzhon nu zur bud kyis brgyan pa/ ming mtha' med ces bya ba'i tshogs a sho ka dmar po'i mdog can lag pa na gri gug dang zhags pa thogs pa bri bar
337a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i 'og tu gzhon nu ma g.yon du zur bud gcig pa/ nag po sngo bsangs rol par gyur pas 'khor la dga' ba dang bcas pas lta ba/ gos sngon po gyon pa @
337a7(rgyud 'bum): na me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs pa/ mtha' med ma zhes bya ba zan mo bri bar bya'o// 'dir yang zis sku la gzhan du'ang las de dag nyid dang / sgrub pa de dag nyid bya ba dang / rtog
337b1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba 'am yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga sbyar bar bya'o/ / dur khrod du 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'ongs nas lag pa nas bzung ste lcang lo can du 'dzin par byed do//
337b2(rgyud 'bum): des rdo rje rigs kyi gzhon nur gyur pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs pa 'dzin pa'i sa dngos po ral gri la sogs pa la bsnyen pa byas pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor zhugs
337b3(rgyud 'bum): nas 'bum bzlas na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur zhing / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus rab tu thob
337b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/ rdo rje'am/ ral gri'am/ 'khor lo 'am/ rin po che la sogs pa de rnams kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
337b5(rgyud 'bum): mang por 'gro ba dang 'ong nus par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i rigs thams cad blo mthun par 'gyur ro// char chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtshe'u gang du
337b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bum bzlas na klu'i gnas der rab tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing der gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / gang gar zhugs shing 'bum bzlas la 'bum yongs su rdzogs nas de nyid du mchod rten
337b7(rgyud 'bum): brtsigs la sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / yungs kar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad skrag pas lhags par 'gyur zhing gang smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro// dur khrod du yungs
338a1(rgyud 'bum): kar gyi sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin gong ma bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ / ri'i lha la mar khu dang tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis sam/ nags kyi gnas su rig pa 'dzin pa la sbrang rtsi dang
338a2(rgyud 'bum): pi pi ling gi sbyin sreg byas nas na thams cad 'dus par 'gyur zhing / dus thams cad du rjes su dran pas bka' lung sgrub par byed do// shing gi grib mas shing gzhan la ma phog pa ni shing
338a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig go/ / shing gcig gi drung du rjes su dran pas mchod rten byas shing 'bum bzlas la/ mdun du a shwad tha las byas pa'i rtse gsum pa byas la nyin mtshan smyung bar 'dug ste/ nyal
338a4(rgyud 'bum): dris bskus shing ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ ji srid du 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du mtshan rangs pa'i bsgrub pa byas na/ gdul dga' ba 'dul bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
338a5(rgyud 'bum): de gling bzhi pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro/ / sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bzlas pa 'bum byas la nyal 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan nam/ rdo rje'i phyag mtshan nam/
338a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan blangs nas ji srid 'bur ba de srid bzlas na/ de kun tu 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// chu bor zhugs te bzlas pa 'bum byas nas sa la byas pa'i mchod mchod rten
338a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi rtsar nya la sogs pa'i nyin zhag la ji skad bshad pa'i gnas su cho ga snga ma bzhin lag pas nor bu blangs te/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid bzlas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang
338b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / yang de nyid lag pas blangs te bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bur 'gyur ro// zangs ma'i bum pa la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrub pa byas na bum pa gang
338b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / slong mos 'tsho zhing lcags kyi rdo rje lag par blangs te/ ji srid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi smra bar bya ba ston par byed pa de srid bzlas pas chos
338b3(rgyud 'bum): gang nyan par 'dod pa de mngon par ston par 'gyur ro/ / de'i steng du bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bar gyur pas lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro// rdo rje
338b4(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags kyu dang / glegs bam lag par blangs te bsgrubs pas rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du thogs pa
338b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu'am gzhon nu ma legs par khrus byas te rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sngon du bsnyen pa byas la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ nyin mtshan spyad
338b6(rgyud 'bum): bar mchod rten nam/ lug sku 'am/ glegs bam mam/ bris sku 'am/ gzhan dag gi mdun du ku sha'i gcal bkram pa la 'dug nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
338b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams la thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gsol ba btab la/ de nas tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gu gul lam/ du ru kas du ba med pa'i me mdag la sbyin sreg bya'o// de dag med na
339a1(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste lag pas de dag bzung la/ ji srid gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pas rab tu 'bar zhing 'phur bar
339a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lag pas blangs pa de dag dang bcas par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bud med legs par khrus byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa la ji srid skyes par gyur pa de srid du bzlas
339a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / dur khrod du bris pa 'am/ shing ngam/ sa las byas pa'i seng ge la ji srid 'gro bar gyur pa de srid bzlas pas de la zhon zhing gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te
339a4(rgyud 'bum): nyin re rtag tu bzlas na gang du 'gro ba'i sa phyogs der bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / gal te nyin mtshan du sgrub pa byed na ji srid du zhag lnga 'am/ drug gam/ brgyad dam/ lhag ma'i/
339a5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed kyi nang du yar 'phags par 'gyur zhing lha rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de la zhon na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rta 'am/ glang poche
339a6(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ khyu mchog gam/ ma he 'am/ ra skyes sam/ lug gam/ ri dgas la bzlas na de dag thams cad nyid gang du ji srid 'dod pa de srid du bzlas par gyur zhing 'gro ba dang 'ong
339a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / me tog gis rab tu gtor po'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod kyi shing la me sbar la/ mar dang yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na zla ba phyed kyi nang du ngas par mkha' la 'phur
339b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du ji lta ba bzhin du ri la sogs pa la'ang gcig tu dben par 'dug ste sgrub pa 'am/ ngang pa la sogs pa byA la smra ba 'am/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis shing khri 'am/
339b2(rgyud 'bum): mchil lham la sogs pa la'ang yid la 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// shing mya ngan med kyi yal ga la 'jus nas ji srid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi snang bar gyur pa de
339b3(rgyud 'bum): srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de bzhin du shing a shwad tha dad / n+ya gro d+ha dang / nA ga pus pa'i shing dang / shing til dkar dang / a mra dang / dur khrod kyi shing la 'dzegs te/ ji srid
339b4(rgyud 'bum): mi snang bar 'gro ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de ltar mi snang bar gyur pa sa lo stong 'tsho bar yang 'gyur zhing khru gang tsam gyis sa la ma reg par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms kyi
339b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho bas dur khrod du ji srid du mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / dur khrod du zhag lnga 'dug ste bzlas pa byas nas phyis de nyid du sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas nas/ der me
339b6(rgyud 'bum): tog gi dkyil 'khor byas te thal ba lag pa kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa byas nas/ des mdzub ris gsum byas pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sha ma ta
339b7(rgyud 'bum): la'i rtsa ba skam po phye mar byas te/ dur khrod du me tog gi mngon par gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor byas la/ lag pa kha sbyar ram kham por kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du ba 'phrul pa de srid
340a1(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas la des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du 'gro na bus pa dang / a ti pa la dang / in+d+ra ra ba ru ni rnam gyi rtsa ba 'am/ shu dag gam
340a2(rgyud 'bum): a pa ra tsi ta 'am/ a pa ra ta ni 'am/ pad+ma shu ka 'am/ daN+Dod pa la 'am/ ut+pa la'i me tog gam/ mi'i sha 'am/ rma bya'i sha 'am/ tsha ba gsum mama?/ ra dza pa ta 'am/
340a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag phye mar byas te/ kham por kha sbyar ram lag pa kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du ba 'thul pa de srid du bzlas pa des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod du sbrang rtsi
340a4(rgyud 'bum): la lan stong mngon par bsngags te mig la bskus na ma mthong ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / dgon par mchod rten gyi logs la shing rta bris la/ ji srid zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'gul bar gyur pa de srid
340a5(rgyud 'bum): nyin mtshan bzlas la de la zhon na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / ba bla blangs te dben pa'i mchod rten nam/ dgon pa 'am/ ri la sogs pa la ji srid dngos grub gsum grub par 'gyur
340a6(rgyud 'bum): ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang lig bu mig la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong gis rtag tu chos gos dang / lhung bzed dang / 'khar gsil la
340a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa blangs la bzlas pa bya zhing 'jog pa na bsrung ba byas te gzhag par bya'o/ / de lta bu la sogs pa'i las su bya ba byed pa na yid la 'dod pa'i cho gas sgrub pa 'am
340b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho gas sgrub na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po 'di 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro// thogs pa med pa don yod
340b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yid la 'dod pa'i cho gas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di ltar bdag pos khas blangs nas
340b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal ba dang / dmigs pa dang / bzlas pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar bcas pa rjes su dran zhing bzlas pa goms par bya'o// gal te skyil krung ma bshig par mtshan
340b4(rgyud 'bum): mo gcig pur ri la sogs pa dri zhim pa dben pa dben par 'dug ste bzlas pa byed na/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe bsnyen pa ma byas par yang rig pa 'dzin par nges par mtshan gcig gis 'grub
340b5(rgyud 'bum): bo/ / tsog pur 'dug nas byas na gdon mi za bar zla ba phyed kyi nang du lus yongs su 'grub par byed do// dkyil 'khor me tog la sogs pas mngon par gtor bar byas la
340b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten la mngon du phyogs pa 'am lugs sku la mngon par phyogs pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag dbul zhing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na dam pa'i
340b7(rgyud 'bum): chos spong ba dang / 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams spong bar byed do// chu bo'i ngogs su mchod rten byas la chu bo de nyid du rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te bzlas na de
341a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa zad par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du mchod rten la skor ba byed cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na sdigs pa las grol bar 'gyur ro// dben par mig
341a2(rgyud 'bum): btsums te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs nas/ ji srid mig btsums pa de kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na sdig
341a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las kyi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / mi smra bar stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dis dam tshig thams cad kyang/
341a4(rgyud 'bum): shes par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'tshe ba la mar dang yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// nad pa rnams kyi don du ni mar dang sbrang rtsis sbyin sreg bya'o// khros pa rnams kyi don du sbrang rtsi'o// rgyal
341a5(rgyud 'bum): po 'dren par byed pa la ni yungs kar til mar la btags pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ / g.yul 'gyed pa la ni 'od ma'i tsher ma 'am/ 'chi ba la ma da na'i tsher ma 'am/ arka'i me tog gam//
341a6(rgyud 'bum): du mu ra ga'i me tog yungs kar gyi mar la sngags nas sbyin sreg byas ni 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed do// mu tsu kun d+ha'i phur bu ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du sbas na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang
341a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags phur bus btab par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad bris te/ lcags kyi phur bus btab na rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang / ma dad pa dang / gnod pa byed pa phur
341b1(rgyud 'bum): bus btab par 'gyur ro/ / a sho ka'i phur bus lam po che'i bzhi mdor brkos na gdon chen po rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rims thams cad la skud pa'am/
341b2(rgyud 'bum): bdug spos dri zhim po rnams kyis bdugs na sel bar byed cing lhas bstan nas smra bar byed do// de bzhin du sbyin sreg gang yin pa des kyang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa med par byed do// rma
341b3(rgyud 'bum): ba gzas zin pa na zangs ma 'am/ lcags sam/ gser ram/ dngul gyi snod du bcug pa'i mar la ji srid dngos grub gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzlas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin
341b4(rgyud 'bum): dang rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma gzas zin pa na ba bla shing mya ngan med kyi lo ma la bzhag ste/ dgon pa'i mchod rten nam ri'i mchod rten gyi rtsar dkyil 'khor me tog gtor ba byas
341b5(rgyud 'bum): shing ji srid grub pa gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzlas na 'bar bar gyur nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / ba bla la ji lta ba de bzhin du lig bu mig dang ldong ros la sogs pa la zla ba'am nyi
341b6(rgyud 'bum): ma gzas zin pa na bsgrub par bya'o/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba 'am/ dga' bar 'dod pa 'am/ sems can rnams dang skye
341b7(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba las yongs su srung bar byed 'dod pa 'am/ bdag nyid mthong ba'i chos nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la nges par sbyor bar 'dod pa 'am/ gsal por
342a1(rgyud 'bum): snang ba la gzhan dag yang dag par sbyor bar 'dod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las legs so zhes bya ba'i rnam pa rab tu sgrags pa myur du rnyed par
342a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la skye ba rnyed par 'dod pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bya'o// thabs la mkhas pa 'das kyang yongs
342a3(rgyud 'bum): su zin par bya'o/ / smon lam rgya chen po bya ba dang / sdig pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang / dus gsum du byung ba'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
342a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'ang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyu nyid du rab tu sbyor bar gyur cig ces de ltar bsngo'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
342a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing / sems can gyi don 'byung bar gyur cig ces dang po'i tshig brjod pa 'am/ rjes su bsams pa 'am/ dmigs nas bdag gi bsod
342a6(rgyud 'bum): nams kyi stobs dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab cing / sems can gyi don 'di 'byung bar gyur
342a7(rgyud 'bum): cig ces dang po tshig tu brjod pa 'am rnam par bsams te bzlas pa bya'o/ / dben pa'i sa phyogs su 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa shin tu rgya chen po'i mdo dang / byang
342b1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i rgyu la rab tu 'jug pa klog pa nyid dang / sems pa nyid dang / mchod pa nyid ches gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o// de nas nyal mchod pa
342b2(rgyud 'bum): byas te mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon zhing mgo la phyag gis byugs te 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so zhes gsung bar 'gyur
342b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ de la sogs pa mi brjed pa'i gzungs rnyed par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su zhugs nas mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// ji ltar sems can
342b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams sangs rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig ces rnam par bsams la bzlas par bya'o/ / de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi nad rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs
342b5(rgyud 'bum): bapa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces de ltar bzlas par bya'o/ / grang ba'i dmyal ba rnams la dro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / tsha ba'i dmyal ba rnams la grang ba nyid 'byung bar
342b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o/ / dud 'gro gcig la gcig za ba rnams med par gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad du sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi
342b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba thams cad med par gyur cig/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad 'byung bar gyur cig/ yi dgas rnams la bza' ba dang btung ba byung bar gyur cig/ de ltar zang zing med pa'i sems
343a1(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la longs spyod pa 'byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba rab tu 'phel ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig/ bde ba dang yid bde bde/
343a2(rgyud 'bum): dag rnams la 'byung bar gyur cig/ dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig
343a3(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa la sems can so sor gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /
343a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang sems can la phan pa'i rgyur dmigs te sngags bzla bar bya'o// mdor na 'khor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub
343a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces sngags bzla bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du bzlas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang /
343a6(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams su sems can gyi don gyi khyad par chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
343a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par 'gyur te/ mos pa rgya che ba dang dang bas byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de la'ang dad par bya'o// de la 'di'i dpe bstan
343b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ yang 'dod pa'i khams na dbang phyug ces bya ba yod de/ 'dod pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dod pas brgyal bar byed
343b2(rgyud 'bum): cing 'dod pa'i longs spyod yongs su longs spyod pa'ang yang dag par ston par byed do/ / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa mang po dang / rin po che dang / nor bu yod pa'i sa phyogs dang
343b3(rgyud 'bum): yo byad dang / longs spyod nye bar stobs par byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba yod do// des yid ltar mgyogs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pas stong gsum gyi stong
343b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi las su bya ba byed cing / yo byad dang longs spyod mngon par sprul nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la'ang nye bar ston par byed do// 'di lta
343b5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ yang rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhal yas khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dri dang / me tog dang / phye ma dang /
343b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas yongs su longs spyod par byed cing gzhan dag la ster bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang mig 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mig 'phrul
343b7(rgyud 'bum): mkhan zhes bya bas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mig 'phrul ston par byed do/ / 'di lta ste/ snga ma yin rnams sngags kyi sgyu ma byed par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ yang sman pas sngab
344a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis sems can mang po rnams kyi rims sel bar byed cing / yi dgas dang / dug dang / nad rnams sel bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang sngags kyis me'i tshe
344a2(rgyud 'bum): ba med par byed cing grang ba'ang dro bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ mngon par gnod par byed pas rims kyis 'dzin par byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang ma mo'i rtog pas sems can mang po
344a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams la gsod pa dang rnam par 'tshe bar byed do/ / gzhan yang sdig pa rnams la sdig pa'i sngags kyis sdig pa la sbyor bar yang byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang gnod sbyin gyi sems rnam
344a4(rgyud 'bum): par g.yo bar byed pa'i sngags kyis sems dga' ba dang / yid bde ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro// de lta bu la sogs pa nges pa ston pa ni sngags kyi stobs
344a5(rgyud 'bum): yin par blta bar bya'o/ / gsang sngags de'i stobs ni gsang sngags nyid las 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ sems can la 'jug pa'ang ma yin/ sbyor ba byas pa'ang mi dmigs mod
344a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis sngon gyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga las gsang sngags kyi stobs rab tu shes par bya'o/ / byin gyi rlabs kyi chos nyid las byung ba las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyi
344a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di rang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang ma yin/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ 'gro bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ byed po'ang ma yin/ byed pa'ang ma yin/ bden par gyur pa mi bslu ba yin te/
344b1(rgyud 'bum): de bas na dad pas sngags 'dis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o// tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par 'dod
344b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa dang / yon tan rin po che so sor thob par 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o// sems can gyi don
344b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyir mngon par brjod pa'i sbyor ba 'dis bsgrubs na myur ba kho nar ji ltar 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang sems can rnams la phan pa'i
344b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyur gyur pa ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi go 'phang gang yin pa rnam par bsams la bzlas pa 'bum byas na/ nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mthong zhing mgo la byugs
344b5(rgyud 'bum): te/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang myur du stsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// yid kyis las su bya ba ci 'dod pa la sbyor ba'ang rung / rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan nam sngags 'di la rtog
344b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/ / dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po las gsungs pa'i cho ga las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u rdzogs so//
344b7(rgyud 'bum): yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhe bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i yan lag thams cad las de bzhin gshes
345a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i spyod yul thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po byung bar gyur to/ / na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM a ma la bi kran+ta te dzI ni a ra dze swA hA/ lag na
345a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'di ni chos kyi spyod yul mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rig pa mchog thogs pa med pa/ don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags chen po rtog pa'i sbyor ba rab
345a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byams yangs pa/ mtha' med pa/ sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dis las rnams gang bag med pa'i sems dang po bskyed
345a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtog par sbyang bar 'gyur ro// mdor bstan na bzlas pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur
345a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su thob nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku sems can gyi khams thams cad la yang dag par ston par
345a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams la 'tsham par 'khor ba las bzlog pa'i phyir sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du thams cad du song ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags chen po 'di//
345a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs las byung ba mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs dang /
345b1(rgyud 'bum): dge bas rgyas pa'i sems kyi 'jug pas byin gyis brlabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung gi 'khor lo dang / gzhan dag kyang sems can gyi khams rnams las 'byung zhing
345b2(rgyud 'bum): t hos par gyur cig ces sems can thams cad bskyab par dmigs nas sngags bzlas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyi shugs la dad par
345b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas tha na gzung ba tsam la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// rtog pa 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis don yod pa thogs pa med pa smon lam
345b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa 'thob pa'i thabs phyogs tsam brjod par bya'o// 'dir dang ba
345b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas re zhig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lus dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas dus thams cad
345b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sdig pa bshags te/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba rnams nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o// de nas
345b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/
346a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad skyob cing phan par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ngo // dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems
346a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa nyid la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo / / de nas 'di ltar yang bsam par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig cig gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
346a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyang tshad med do zhes rjes su yi rang nas/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir yongs su bsngo na mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na
346a4(rgyud 'bum): gang yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa mtha' mi mthong ba tshad med pa khong du chud par byas nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos/ yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
346a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa gang yin pa des rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang dag par byung ba/ bdag gi med pa/ rjes su ma bzung ba//
346a6(rgyud 'bum): thang las skyes pa/ rin po che'i ri la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa'i don du bsngo bar bya'o// de nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis de bzhin
346a7(rgyud 'bum): g shegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i dam pa rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs dang
346b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces nges par bsams la/ 'di skad lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ sarba thA ud ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM/
346b2(rgyud 'bum): ga ga na khaM sa man+ta ta swA hA/ de'i rjes la gzhan ma yin par de bzhin du mchod pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
346b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho rnams bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / bsod
346b4(rgyud 'bum): nams kyi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la/ sngags 'di lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi
346b5(rgyud 'bum): satwA nAM/ sarba tA saM ku su mi tA a b+hi dzA rA shI ni na mo stu te swA hA/ de nas bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du
346b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thams cad du sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag la dngos grub dang
346b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog stsal du gsol zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o/ / de nas sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs zag pa med pa rnal 'byor las yang dag par byung ba rab tu thob par gyur/
347a1(rgyud 'bum): cig ces kyang brjod do// de bzhin du mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba sbyin par yid la byas nas/ de lta bu'i sprul pa'i smin
347a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor bas bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sngags lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham
347a3(rgyud 'bum): cad la phyag 'tshal zhing dmigs la bzlas pa goms par byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub grub par
347a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad grub par gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba la dmigs pa'i sems kyis goms par byas shing bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid skyo bar ma gyur
347a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi bar du'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / bla na med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs
347a6(rgyud 'bum): pa kun tu bzang po ye shes kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa la mngon par mos pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas langs nas 'phags pa sdong po
347a7(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa la sogs pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i mdo sde klog pa'am gzhan yang rung / ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du dro dus kyi bar du gnas par bya'o// de nas glegs bam la sogs pa mchod pa/
347b1(rgyud 'bum): 'am tha na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba byas nas zas 'aza' bar bya'o// za ba'i tshe kha zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyang mngon par bsngags la dang po'i chang bu lha bshos su 'phrul la
347b2(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar bya'o/ / de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ oM ba lin+ta te te dzo mA li ni swA hA/ zas kyis dub pa cung zhig ngal ba sos la phyi dro'i dus su'ang cho ga 'di bzhin du
347b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / nyal ba'i tshe dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal nas/ bdag nyid phul la phyi nas mal du ji ltar 'dod par gnyid
347b4(rgyud 'bum): log la nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar bya'o/ / de la cho ga ni 'di yin no// tshes gcig nas brtsams nas nyin re zhing zla ba gcig rdzogs kyi bar du 'di bzhin du bya ba yin no// gal
347b5(rgyud 'bum): te cho ga 'ga' zhig ma byas sam/ bya ba gzhan gyis brel bas nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum la sogs par las las nyams na'ang des brtson 'grus dor bar mi bya ste/
347b6(rgyud 'bum): ba de nyid kyi nyal nyin mtshan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'am/ mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam/ gzhan gyi mdun du'ang rung / mchod pa
347b7(rgyud 'bum): ci 'byor pa byas nas ku sha bkram pa la 'dug ste bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / mdung dang / kha T+wAM ka'ang rung / lcags las byas pa 'am/
348a1(rgyud 'bum): sa las byas pa'ang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u nas gsungs pa'i mtshon cha rnams las gang 'dod pa zhig lag tu blangs nas bsgrub pa byas na
348a2(rgyud 'bum): des nam byed dam nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / de nyid rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ skad cig de la rig 'dzin gyi rigs kun nye bar 'dus nas de la dbang bskur bar 'gyur
348a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas bzung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du nam mkha' la rgyu zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rjes su 'jug cing mchod pa chen po byed
348a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs nas bde ba dang ldan bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin thams cad kyis mchod cing / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa
348a5(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/ / mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi 'khor la sogs pa la yongs su longs spyod kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing / lus de nyid mi 'dor bar bde/
348a6(rgyud 'bum): bar rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// thabs 'di nyid kyis mthar gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bar du'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo la sogs
348a7(rgyud 'bum): pa mtshon cha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du ldong ros dang / mig sman dang / ba tha dang / gi'u wang dang / gos dang / ku sha dang / nor bu dang / rma bya'i sgo dang / sdong dang / mchil
348b1(rgyud 'bum): lham dang / gdugs dang / dza yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ta la'i lo ma las ral gri dang / chu gri dang / gri dang / kha T+wAM ga la sos
348b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdzas su byas pa 'am/ lhag mas kyang bsgrub par bya'o// yid la gang 'dod pa 'am/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan la'ang sbyar ba 'am/
348b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i cho ga 'am/ yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas kyang bsgrub pa byas na
348b4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thad nas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga'o// ji skad bstan pa'i phyogs gcig tu mchod rten
348b5(rgyud 'bum): dang sku gzugs dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/ gang yang rung ba'i mdun du me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la/ ci 'byor pa'i dri dang / me tog dang
348b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas kyang rung / ma byas kyang rung / ku sha'i chang bu la nye bar 'dug nas lag pa'am gzhan du'ang rung / ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas bzung nas/
348b7(rgyud 'bum): lo ma'i bar ram/ gos kyi bar du 'am/ lcags dang / dngul dang / gser gyi snod du bzhag la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de bzhin du bsod nams
349a1(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i cho ga
349a2(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / cho ga 'di nyid kyis dben zhing stong pa'i ri dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / tshal nyams dga' ba 'am/ shing gcig gam/ gtsug lag gi gnas sam/ sku gdung
349a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsa 'am/ sku gzugs bzhugs pa'am/ gzhan yang gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dben par bsgrub par bya ste/ 'du 'dzi dang bral ba
349a4(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms par byas pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ ser sna med
349a5(rgyud 'bum): pas som nyi dang bral ba'i sems kyis lus dang srog la'ang bltos pa med par bya'o/ / gzhan yang thams cad kyi thun mong gi cho ga ni ri dang / chu 'gram dang / 'bab chu'i ngos la
349a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i gnas dben zhing stong pa rnams su dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dang gnyis su gnas la/ dus gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshegs la
349a7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar gsol ba 'debs pas ji srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// yang ngo'i nyal
349b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga snga ma bzhin du nyin zhag gcig sbyang bar gnas nas ji skad bstan pa'i rdzas rnams las gang yang rung ba blangs la/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na de nyid kyis rig pa 'ji
349b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa mchog don yod pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa/ thogs pa med pa/ yid la re ba'i phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyor ba de
349b3(rgyud 'bum): lha de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rang bzhin gyis grub pa bklags pas 'grub pa yin pas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba'am/
349b4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o// yang na ras ris sgrub par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su
349b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje kun nas 'bar bas bskor ba/ / bcom ldan 'das cod pan las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mngon par dbang skur ba bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon
349b6(rgyud 'bum): logs su rig pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal mo gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo
349b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba/ 'od kyi 'phreng bas brgyan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba'i 'khor ral gri dang zhags pa lag na thogs pa/ mdog sngo bsangs khros shing 'khrugs
350a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ gos dmar ser zung bgos pa/ khro gnyer bsdus pa/ bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa/ mngag gzhug pa rin po che'i zag la 'dug pa bri bar bya/
350a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar ba/ rin po che'i zag gi pad+ma'i sdong po la bzhugs pa/ me tog gi khri shing gis kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o//
350a3(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i ras ris kyi mdun du cho ga 'dis ji ltar 'dod par ram/ rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga dang yang sbyar bar bya'o// rig pa mchog gi ras ris gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la snyom
350a4(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs pa pad+ma dmar po la rab tu bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu mngag gzhug pa mtha' med lag pa na ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa de dang 'dra ba bri bar bya'o//
350a5(rgyud 'bum): ras ris 'dir yang las de dag kun bya'o// cho ga gzhan yang ri la sogs pa stong zhing dben pa'i phyogs gcig tu skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i
350a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs nas/ mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung ma zhig par bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas kyang tho rangs sam nam phyed na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur
350a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / mthu mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pas phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas mchod par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i cho ga 'di gang gi
350b1(rgyud 'bum): lag tu thob pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i
350b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas lha dang klu la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga gang yin pa'i dam
350b3(rgyud 'bum): ba nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
350b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi
350b5(rgyud 'bum): rlabs kyis rdo rje shugs kyi yi ge zhes bya ba byung bar 'gyur to/ / de las ni rig pa'i mchog gi rdo rje'i tshig 'di byung bar gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM bir dzI bi ra dzI ma hA hi
350b6(rgyud 'bum): ra dzI sA ta swa ta/ sA ra te sA ra te/ twA yi tra yi bi d+ha ma hA tI saM bany+dza ni/ tarma ti sid+d+ha a gre tAM swA hA/ 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di la'ang rig pa'i mchog dang po
350b7(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rtog pa'i cho gar dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa'i cho ga nyis 'gyur du sbyor ba gang yin pa'ang nyis 'gyur du 'jug go/ / 'di'i ras ris kyi
351a1(rgyud 'bum): khyad par ni rin po che'i brag las skyes pa'i rin po che'i pad+ma chen po la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag gis mchog stsol ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs
351a2(rgyud 'bum): su rig pa'i mchog phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ rin po che'i zag la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khor lo rdorje
351a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa/ cung zad sngo bsangs rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis kun nas bskor ba'o// de'i 'og
351a4(rgyud 'bum): logs su sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri'o/ / lha mo'i 'og tu ni mtha' med ces bya ba 'khor de nyid bgegs tshar gcod pa ral gri dang zhags pa lag na thogs la bri bar bya'o// ras ris
351a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa ni lha mo gcig pu gnas pa phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ / de'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du mtha' med lag na ral gri dang zhag pa thogs pa/ khro bo gzhon nu'i gzugs can khro gnyer
351a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba dang bcas pa'o/ / 'dir yang cho ga ni snga ma nyid kyis bya'o// ji ltar yid la 'dod pas sam/ rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang bya'o// 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin no// dkra
351a7(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//
351b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
