358a1(rgyud 'bum): ma bshig par gang yang rung ba'i rig pa'i mchog nam phyed dam nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na lus 'bar bar gyur nas gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ nam mkha' la 'gro/
358a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang thams cad du 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na bar du nub gcig ngal bsos la nub gsum pa la'ang de bzhin du bya'o// yang nub gcig gis bar du chod
358a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nub lnga pa la ni dam pa'i chos spong ba'ang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas 'bum bzlas te rdzas gang la bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// lcags las
358a4(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i 'khor lo'am/ rdo rje dang / ral gri la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa byas te/ de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gal
358a5(rgyud 'bum): te 'bar bar ma gyur na ba lang gi lci ba'i nang du de bcug la gang yang rung ba'i rig pa mchog gis bsrung ba byas te gzhag go/ / dur khrod du 'dug nas ji srid du gnod sbyin du gyur gyi bar du bzlas
358a6(rgyud 'bum): pa byas la mya ngan med kyi shing gi rtsa bar 'dug ste/ ji srid gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// 'ongs nas ci zhig bgyi zhes zer na/ gang 'dod pa smras na thams cad byed
358a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing 'khyud nas rang gi khyim du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / p+lag sha'i shing gi rtsa bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i bzhon pa bris la/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du
358b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / ri'i gseb tu seng ge 'am rta bris nas de nyid du 'dug ste/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de bzhin du glang po che dang / ma he dang /
358b2(rgyud 'bum): lug dang / ra dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya la sogs pa bris nas me tog sil mas brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshan mo rangs pa bzlas pa bya'o// gal te mtshan mo de la ma grub
358b3(rgyud 'bum): na'ang bsgrub par bya ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran bzhin du lha chen po'i khang par zhugs nas/ ji srid lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas de nyid du nyal
358b4(rgyud 'bum): na 'ongs nas gang smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro/ / sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan lag tu thogs nas/ ji srid sred med kyi bu 'ong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'ongs nas gang smra ba de byed par
358b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lha khang gi khang par bzlas pa'i lha de zla ba byed kyi nang du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na bskams par 'gyur ro// yar ngo'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ba bla blangs nas
358b6(rgyud 'bum): lha chen po'i byang phyogs su ku sha'i chang bu la nye bar 'dug nas/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rnam
358b7(rgyud 'bum): thos kyi bu bris nas ji srid mdun du 'ongs nas mchog stsol bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ / klu'i gnas mtshe'ur ji srid klu rnams gyen du 'phags kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// gal
359a1(rgyud 'bum): te ldang bar ma gyur na phug ma'i me la lcags kyi snod dam zangs kyi snod til mar gyis bkang nas/ ji srid khol bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa byas nas/ der klu'i lcug ma
359a2(rgyud 'bum): tsha dang rang skyur gyis bskus nas bsregs na nges par ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am dri ma can du 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la bltas nas ji srid smra ba dang / 'gul ba
359a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de nas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi mdun du me tog gis mngon par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas/ ji srid du 'phags
359a4(rgyud 'bum): pa phyag na rdo rje byon gyi bar du bzlas na byon nas mgo la reg par 'gyur ro/ / reg pa tsam gyis lhung lo can du gnas nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i
359a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje blangs la ji srid mi snang bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ / 'bum bzlas pas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs
359a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhabs kyi the bong la bzung nas ji srid 'bar ba dang / 'phro ba dang / khro ba ston gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing gsung bar yang
359a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta zhing ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ba 'am rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa kun tu bzang
359b1(rgyud 'bum): po la lta zhing ji srid dge ba la ngoms mi shes pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / mngon par 'bar gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// rgyud 'dir sngags kyi spyod pa la zhugs pas zla ba gzas zin pa'i
359b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe zangs kyi snod du mar bzhag nas dri zhim po'i me tog gis dkyil 'khor byas te/ bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas nas de 'thungs na thos
359b3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba dang nyi ma gzas bzung ba na lha chen po'i khang par zhugs nas ldong ros sam/ mig sman nu ma/ ba bla blangs nas a shwad tha'i 'dab ma'i bar du bcug
359b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lha chen po'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas ji srid mi snang bar gyur kyi bar du
359b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa bya'o/ / dur khrod du gnas nas ji srid mi snang bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// dur khrod du dkyil 'khor byas nas kham por ma bsregs pa kha sbyar thal bas bkang nas du ba byung gi
359b6(rgyud 'bum): bar du bzlas pa byas la de chu gsum byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' dgug pa dang / lha dang klu dgug pa ni nub gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na rig
359b7(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog 'di dag gis ni 'dod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa byed pa yin no/ / yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas ji ltar bsgrubs pa de de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes mkhas pas brtags la
360a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas som nyi mi bya'o/ / de nas 'di'i thun mong gi ras ris bstan par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa'o//
360a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas su ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'o// lha mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa dang bcas pa/ gser gyi mdog can thams cad rig pa'i mchog ces bya ba 'am/ dri ma med
360a3(rgyud 'bum): par rnam par gnon pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'ang rung / 'di lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od kyi 'phreng ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/ zag la gnas pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la bzhugs pa'o//
360a4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa'i g.yog mo mtha' yas zhes bya ba bri ba'o// phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// yang na ras
360a5(rgyud 'bum): ris ni ji ltar 'dod pa de lta bu bri bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku ni mtha' yas pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rtog pa
360a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas rnams kyis ni ras ris kyi cho ga med pa'am mchod pa med par yang 'grub bo/ / gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rig pa mchog
360a7(rgyud 'bum): gi rgyal po bsdus pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so/ / // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bstan pa don yod pa'i dngos grub rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/
360b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo gsol ba btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
360b2(rgyud 'bum): cad gcig tu rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo mchog 'di sku thams cad las gsungs so// na ma ste
360b3(rgyud 'bum): ya d+hi kA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ oM ga ga na lo tsa ne ga ga na sa ma/ sar+b+ba thA oM ga tA ti sa ra saM/ b+ha badz+ra lA na mo a mo g+hA nAM sA hA/ lag na rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo chen me 'di ni de
360b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa'i yum/ mtha' yas pa/ thogs pa med/ don yod par grub
360b5(rgyud 'bum): pa sngags kyi spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la rab tu sbyor bar gnas pa'o/ / 'di 'dzin par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//
360b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// bzlas pa nyid kyis yon tan mtha' yas pa mnyam pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
360b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sa la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
361a1(rgyud 'bum): mi 'phrogs pa don yod pa 'dis tshegs chung ngus thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas da ni rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga phyogs tsam zhig 'byung bar
361a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/ dang po re zhig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar
361a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dbul ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o//
361a4(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis dus thams cad du sdug bsngal ba bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ yongs su gzung du gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol
361a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod do/ / de nas sdig pa bshags par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bskyed pa gang gis bshags pa'i sems bskyed pa des dus thams cad
361a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sdig pa thams cad bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bshags par bgyi'o zhes bya ba 'am/ nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par
361a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i rgyur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
361b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnams la rjes su yi rang ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang zhes bya ba'am/ nus pa ji lta ba
361b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa na/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ thang dang chu las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri dang
361b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho'i rin po che la sogs pas mchod pa'i thabs la goms par byas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la dbul zhing yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//
361b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgya che zhing gya nom pa mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byams rnams bdag gi smon lam dang / bsod rnams kyi stobs
361b5(rgyud 'bum): dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis so sor 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la/ de lta bu'i mchod pa chen po mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i//
361b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mo chen mo 'di'ang lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA ung+ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM/ ga ga na khaM sa man+ta ta swA hA/ de nas gzhan ma yin par
361b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rnams de bzhin du yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rab 'byams
362a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sems can gyi khams thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings su grags pa 'jug par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su//
362a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par gyur cig/ mdo sde'i tshul rab tu sgrogs par gyur cig ces bsams la/ bstod pa dang bsngags pa sgrub par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs par byed
362a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rig pa chen mo'i rgyal mo 'di'ang lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sar+b+ba tAM saM ku su mi ta/ a b+hi dzA rA shi nI na mo stu te swA hA/ de nas de
362a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du gzhan ma yin par bstod pa brjod pa dang / chos brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du nges par
362a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam gtan la ched du byed pa'i dmigs
362a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi mtshan mas brtags pa'i spyod lam ston cing / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings su spros pas sems can thams
362a7(rgyud 'bum): cad la mngon du phyogs pas gnas pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa'i bar du gyur cig ces tshig tu brjod pa 'am bsams la/ de lta bu'i
362b1(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa chen po mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ na mo stu te/ ma hA badz+ra sar+b+ba sA d+ha hi taM ka
362b2(rgyud 'bum): ratiSh+Tha sa sar+b+ba tra sar+b+be ShI d+harmA NAM/ a d+hiSh+ThA ya swAhA/ de nas ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'di kun yang gong du ji tsam 'dod pa'i
362b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa byas na gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang dag par grub pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro// des de ltar sems
362b4(rgyud 'bum): can gyi don dang dgos pa bdag gir byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar
362b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi sems can thams cad kyi don bslus pa la rjes su yi rang zhing dmigs pa la goms par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba 'am dmigs pa la goms par
362b6(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ 'dir yang nam mkha'i spyan bzlas pa bya'o// yang na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis
362b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan rnams ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlob cing 'byung bar gyur cig ces dang po yid la byas la bzlas pa bya'o/ / yang na de
363a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pas sems can thams cad kyi don 'byung ba'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig ces bya'o/ / yang na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
363a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya'o/ / yang na dge ba la 'bad pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya'o// yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya'o//
363a3(rgyud 'bum): yang na stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa 'am
363a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa sems can thams cad kyis so sor thob par gyur cig ces bya ba
363a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang yang dag par 'grogs shing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub pa
363a6(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa rnams rim gyis gnon pa'i
363a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir ram/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa 'am/ gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa thams cad so sor 'thob
363b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ mchod pa chen po'i sprin mngon par sgrub pa sprul pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprin las chos kyi sprin las chos kyi char gyi rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gnas par bya ba 'am
363b2(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa 'am/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i dpal thob par bya ba 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa'ang sems can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces
363b3(rgyud 'bum): brjod do/ / yang na bsam pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'am/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i
363b4(rgyud 'bum): bsam pas bzlas pa bya'o/ / yang na bla na med pa'i dngos grub thams cad bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can thas
363b5(rgyud 'bum): cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces sam/ ji ltar rigs par sems kyis bsams la bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar goms par bzlas pa byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// smon
363b6(rgyud 'bum): lam dang rjes su mthun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang rjes su mthun par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par phyogs shing 'jug na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di
363b7(rgyud 'bum): dag ni rtag tu bya ba'i cho ga yin no/ / yang na som nyi med pa'i dad pas ji ltar nus pa'i cho gas bya'o// de nas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam
364a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che ba'i lugs rgyas par byed pa'i mdo sde gdon par bya/ mchod par bya ba 'am/ tha na phyag byas nas so// kun nas ngal bar
364a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas zas za na sngags 'dis zas la lan brgyad mngon par bzlas par bya'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM ba li~M da de te dzo mA li ni swA hA/ de nas zas kyis dub pa bsal la
364a3(rgyud 'bum): phyi dro'i dus su'ang snga dro'i cho ga 'di nyid kyis bya'o/ / skyo bar gyur na sngags bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid mi skyo'i bar du'o// de nas smon lam btab nas ldang bar bya'o// langs nas
364a4(rgyud 'bum): zab cing rgya che ba'i mdo sde klog pa la sogs pa gzhan bya'o/ / nyal ba'i tshe'ang lus thams cad btud pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsam pa thag pas phyag byas la/
364a5(rgyud 'bum): phyi nas ji ltar 'dod par gnyid log par bya zhing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag la dngos grub dang mchog
364a6(rgyud 'bum): stsal du gsol/ gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes mkhas pas rtag tu bya'o// nyin re nyin re 'di lta bu'i las zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o// de nas zla ba nyal/
364a7(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag gcig smang bar 'dug nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs sam/ ras ris la dben zhing stong pa'i sa phyogs su me tog sil ma bkram
364b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mdun du bzhag ste/ spos dri zhim pos bdugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te/ lcags kyi 'khor lo 'am/ rdo rje 'am/ ral gri
364b2(rgyud 'bum): blangs la ku sha bkram pa la 'dug nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya ste/ nam phyed dam nyi ma shar ba'i dus su 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba na ltas chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
364b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ sa g.yo ba dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba'i ltas chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// skad cig de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis
364b4(rgyud 'bum): brlabs kyis 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo grogs dang bcas pa dang /
364b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pas de dbang bskur bas thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsod nams ji ltar nye bar bsags pa
364b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i nus pa'ang rab tu 'thob
364b7(rgyud 'bum): bo/ / lus de nyid ma dor bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo// stobs ji lta ba dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du go rims kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa
365a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams non par 'gyur/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du lus de nyid kyis thob par 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sa
365a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa la zhugs pa gtsor byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i cho ga yin no/ / ri 'am/ 'bab chu'i 'gram mam/ mtshe'i gling ngam/
365a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi drung ngam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag gi gnas sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du 'am tha na
365a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang pa 'am/ nye bar spyod pa'i sa'ang rung / stong zhing dben par ras ris kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya'o// gal te nus pa yod na ri la sogs pa b+he na
365a5(rgyud 'bum): dben pa'i gnas rnams su 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs nas/ tha na khyim mam/ zang khang ngam/ nye bar spyad sa 'am/ mdzod phugs su'ang rung / ji srid ma byung gi 'a
365a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas snga ma bzhin du 'khor lo 'am rdo rje la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// 'bum bzlas pa byas nas ldong ros sapa mig sman la sogs pa'i@
365a7(rgyud 'bum): thob par byed pa'i rdzas thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ri'i gseb tu zhugs la 'bum khrag
365b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / mthong nas gzungs la sogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// dben zhing stong pa'i ri la sogs par skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/
365b2(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung ma bshig par mtshan thog thag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas bzlas na nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su lus rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bar gyur
365b3(rgyud 'bum): nas lus brjes nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bzhen pa bris nas de'i steng du 'dug ste mtshan rangs pa bzlas na lha'i bzhon pa rin po che las grub par gyur nas nam mkha' la gang
365b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / rig pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin pas/ sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas pas kyang cho ga bzhin du bya'o// ji skad gsungs pa'i rig pa mchog gi tshe
365b5(rgyud 'bum): gas kyang bya ba 'am/ thabs dang mi ldan pas ni ji ltar 'dod pa'am/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin las kyis bsgrub par bya'o// rtog pa 'di tshogs yid la gang 'dod pa ci rigs par
365b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ / yang na ras ris sgrub par 'dod na ras ris de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// g.yas su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i
365b7(rgyud 'bum): gdan la bzhugs pa thal mo sbyar ba 'od kyis bskor ba bri bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du nam mkha'i spyan gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa dang
366a1(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'od kyi 'phreng ba can bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu khros pa gnag cing ldang ba/ ral pa gcig
366a2(rgyud 'bum): yod pa/ 'jigs pa chen mo zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma lag pa g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin cing 'phyar ba/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba can brag la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i 'breng pa can/
366a3(rgyud 'bum): dur smrig bgos pa/ mig cung zad dmar ba/ bgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris
366a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di la rtog pa 'di'i cho ga rnams bya ba 'am/ ji ltar 'dod pas bya'o// ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo 'jigs par byed pa'i grogs dang bcas pa/ ral pa thur la 'phyang ba/
366a5(rgyud 'bum): lus 'od kyi 'phreng ba can no// de lta bu la'ang 'dir sngar gyi cho ga rnams sbyar bar bya'o// thabs dang ldan nam/ thabs dang mi ldan yang rung / nam mkha'i spyan 'di ni don yod
366a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yin te/ bsod nams dang ldan nam/ bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung zhes rgya cher sbyar zhing gang gis kyang nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs par byed
366a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin no zhes mkhas pas rig par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan
366b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul la mngon par spro bar byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams
366b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub pa'i phyir sngags 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ Ar+ya A gA dze a nan+ta bi shA ya nI/ a ra dze bi ra dza/ hUM tA ka ra swA hA/ sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad
366b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa na// shin tu rgya che rnam par rol// nam mkha' la ni byung bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi
366b4(rgyud 'bum): mdun du 'di'i las kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa cho ga rab 'byams mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po skad cig de la sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'o/ / cho ga de dag thams
366b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang 'di la sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ yang na ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho gas bya'o// snying po rtog pa'i tsho gas nyis 'gyur du sbyar ba 'am mnyam pas kyang rung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
366b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i lus zhes bya ba chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i rtse mo 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/
366b7(rgyud 'bum): tri tri tI/ a ha ha b+his sa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ a sa tri she swAH/ kun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i rtse mo 'di ni cho ga de dag nyid kyis
367a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar rgyal ba rnams kyis mkhyen pa yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba kun nas nam mkha'
367a2(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA naM/ a ha ha ha/ ma hA mu ni bisma ye/ ha ra ha ra/
367a3(rgyud 'bum): / tra ya tra ya/ bi sho d+ha ke na mA sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHswA hA/ don yod pa'i don yod pa zhes bya ba ngag gi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yangs shing rgya che ba'i rnam par
367a4(rgyud 'bum): rol pa'i spyod yul yin te/ 'di'i cho ga'ang de dag nyid kyis bya ba'am/ yid la gang 'dod pas bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu shin tu mnyam par rdzogs par grub pa
367a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyal po'i rtse mo la snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
367a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen mo'i rgyal mo 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a ma la ba le ha ha/ a sa ma sa man+ta/ ga ga na ga ga na/ sa ma sa ma/ ku ru
367a7(rgyud 'bum): ku ru/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo 'di sa twe b+h+yaHswA hA/ sangs rgyas sras dang bcas rnams kyis// lhan cig 'dir ni gsungs pa na// chos dbyings ngo mtshar chen po 'di// thams cad kun
367b1(rgyud 'bum): tu rmad du gyur/ / 'di'i cho ga'ang de dag nyid yin no// 'jig rten thams cad kun tu yang // 'di dang 'dra ba de yod min// ras ris kyi khyad par ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi gnas su lha mo ku mu
367b2(rgyud 'bum): dade'i mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa/ rgyan dang bral ba/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni de lta bu nyid yin no// lag na rdo rje ni gtum
367b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / g.yon du ni ral pa gcig yod pa/ gnag pa/ mig dmar ba/ bgegs mthar byed pa/ khros pa/ ngur smrig bgos pa/ gzhon nu lag na ral gri thogs pa bri bar bya ste/
367b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas bskor ba rin po che'i zag la gnas pa'o// lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no// rin po che'i brag la gnas pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la gnas pa bri bar bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i
367b5(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo 'di ras ris la rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad sbyar bar bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i
367b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mo'i rtse mo don yod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ ar+tha sid+d+ha bi d+yA/ ut+ta ma a gre swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' longs spyod mtha' yas pa zhes
367b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ a ra dze sa ma ye/ sa d+ha yI ku ru ku ru/ si d+ha ma/ a mo
368a1(rgyud 'bum): g+ha a pra ti ha taste sid+d+hi/ sa ta ke ta/ u thA a ga ga nAM sA hA/ gtum po mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo
368a2(rgyud 'bum): d+hi satwA nAM/ sa ma sa ma/ a gre a gr-i/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ta i ta yi/ ga ga nAM sA d+hA ya/ sar+b+ba na mo stu a pra ti ha ta a grA nAM dzA la dzA la/ ha sa ne sA hA/ de bzhin
368a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ tri ta yaM/ sa ma yaM sa ma aM/ na d+hi bid+yA
368a4(rgyud 'bum): ti y+ya sa d+ho/ Sha ma yaM/ ta Ti dan+ta/ na ma a gra/ g+hu NA a nan+ta/ ma yaM gu ru te/ sa tsa sar+b+ba/ mi d+haM ma pi te/ stobs gsum pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo thams cad du
368a5(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam pa thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa yin no/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a mo g+ha/ a tsi pra bi sha ba ra de/ a ma la a ma la/ dzA la na tsa lo d+b+ha de s+pha ra Na sAhA/
368a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa med pa don yod pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a sa ma d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ma sa ma/ saM ga ta saM ga ta/ tI TI tI
368a7(rgyud 'bum): TI/ ha sa ha sa/ tI tI ma hA ma hA/ bi sho d+ha krA a gra/ hUM sA ra sA rA/ bi ma laM ku ru/ a mo g+ha a pra ti ha te/ as+tha sid+d+hi/ yaM a du kha ga ra sA hA/ mnyam pa med pa'i mchog
368b1(rgyud 'bum): gi stobs kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no/ / de nas mnyam pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ don yod par grub pa/ thun mong ma yin pa'i ras ris 'byung bar 'gyur te//
368b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ni pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba bri bar bya'o// g.yas su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi
368b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du ni gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ nga rgyal dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'i lha mo'o// lha mo'i 'og tu drag gtum zhes bya ba'i
368b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yog po gzhon nu ral pa can gnag cing sngo ba/ gos sngon po bgos pa/ khros pa/ mig dmar ba/ lag na rdo rje thogs pa/ 'bar bas bskor ba/ bgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar
368b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'og tu ni sgrub po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// 'di la'ang las de dag thams cad sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas sam/ rig pa mchog
368b6(rgyud 'bum): gi cho gas sbyar ba 'am/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pas sam/ rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang bsgrub par bya ste/ the tsom dang bral ba'i dad pas bya'o// thogs pa med pa don yod par
368b7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i rtse mo 'dis kha cig la ni mtshan gcig gis dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / kha cig la ni nub gnyis na'o// kha cig la ni nub gsum na'o//
369a1(rgyud 'bum): kha cig la ni zla ba tsam gyis nges par dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dir yang snga ma bzhin du phan yon yod par shes par bya'o// 'di la ni tshul khrims dang ldan
369a2(rgyud 'bum): yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung / bsod nams dang ldan yang rung / bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhan du na dad pa med pa dang / byang chub tu
369a3(rgyud 'bum): sems ma bskyed pa ni ma gtogs so/ / thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo rab 'byams rim par phye ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'bar bzhi
369a4(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo kun tu mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i gad mo spyi gtsug nas grags pas mthar thug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i rnam par rol pa'i spyod yul can/ gtsug tor gyi
369a5(rgyud 'bum): yang gtsug tor dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rig pa byung bar gyur ro/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a grA a gra bi Sha ye/ sa ma sa ma/ ba ra ba ra/ de da yaM ku ru/ ar+tha sid+d+hi
369a6(rgyud 'bum): la na maHpra ti ha to/ / uSh+NI ShA NAM/ a ti a ti swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang gzhan dag las kyang thogs pa med par gtsug tor gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba gsungs pa na
369a7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas shing yangs pa'i ngo mtshar byung bas thams cad g.yos par gyur to/ / de nas shar phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya bas
369b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'od kyi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs shing thos par gyur to/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ a gra bi ma ye nam/ a gra bi maN+Da le nA mA a gri ya a mras
369b2(rgyud 'bum): de nA mA/ sid+d+ha a gra ya ke na ma/ a tsa la ma hA ba la a gre na ma/ dzA la dzA la/ d+hu na d+hu na do Sha Na dza ga ta/ grA ta g+ha ta/ bi sha yan na mo s+t+waM a pra ti ha te b+h+yaHsAhA/ gtsug tor
369b3(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med pa'i gtsug gi rtse mo zhes bya'o/ / steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i snying rjes brgyan pa zhes bya bas kun tu bzhad pa'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa'i mchog
369b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad nas rtse mo 'di gsungs shing thos par gyur to/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ a ho ma hA bisma ya a gri/ sad a grA nAM/ a ho ka ru Na/ a mri ta/ a gre brti ni
369b5(rgyud 'bum): sA d+ha ya a mri ta d+ha mA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ kA ru Ni kA ru NI/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ shI khI shI ShAM/ d+ha ri d+ha ri/ a gri ta ra a gri ta ra/ na mo a gre b+h+yaH/ ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH
369b6(rgyud 'bum): s+phar Na ga ga na ba re swAhA/ snying rje bdud rtsi rtse mo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i gtsug tor ro// yang gtsug tor gsum pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
369b7(rgyud 'bum): cad gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rtse mo 'di rab tu thob bo// rab tu thob nas gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba
370a1(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nA/ tr-i shaM khA/ a kra na mo stu te/ sa man+ta sha man+ta/ a gri gu na a tsa la a gra d+harmA te/ bi d+h+wa na hri kle shA nAM/ duHkha dz+wa laM dza ga ta/ sar+b+ba du
370a2(rgyud 'bum): da da hi tsaM/ shAn+te daM tri sa ma ye ku ru swA hA/ rtse mo'i rtse mo chos rtse mo// sems can kun gyi don byed ni// kun nas yon tan mtha' yas pa// sras dang bcas pas gsungs par gyur//
370a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bla na med pa thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs can rnams kyis thun mong gi cho ga la 'jug
370a4(rgyud 'bum): pa bshad par bya'o/ / thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rab tu byed par 'dod pas tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/ sangs rgyas dang /
370a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ba dang / snga ma bzhin du sdig pa bshags par bya'o// nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du gshegs
370a6(rgyud 'bum): p a'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang
370a7(rgyud 'bum): po/ / de bzhin du bdag gi bsod nams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba grub par gyur cig
370b1(rgyud 'bum): ces yongs su bsngo bar bya zhing / byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes brjod la/ dben zhing stong pa'i gnas rnams su sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la goms par bya'o// yid skyo bar gyur
370b2(rgyud 'bum): na dam pa'i chos bklag par bya'o/ / 'du 'dzi spangs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing phyag 'tshal nas bzlas pa la goms pas bzlas pa bya ba 'am
370b3(rgyud 'bum): nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba'i bar du bzlas la/ de nas zla ba nya la me tog dri zhim po bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas pa byas
370b4(rgyud 'bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byon te mgo la phyag gis reg nas 'dod pa'i don gsung bar 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sngags kyi spyod pa la
370b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong na slar yang zla ba gcig na mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
370b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u'i cho ga 'am/ rig pa mchog gi 'am/ rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga 'am/ yid la gang 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin
370b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i chos nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dir sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig ces bsams
371a1(rgyud 'bum): nas bzlas na/ de nas gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag la phan pa'ang
371a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dad par yang bya'o/ / don yod pa 'dir yang chung ngu 'am/ 'bring dang / chen po'i dngos grub nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
371a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis yang dag par mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du gang gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / yon tan mtha' yas pa'i bdud rtsi de kho na nyid rab tu
371a4(rgyud 'bum): thob cing yongs su spyad pa thams cad la 'phrogs pa med pa'i grogs dang bcas pas 'gro bas sam/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o// mdor na mtshan
371a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis kyang rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ skyil mo krung ma bshig par de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pas me tog dri zhim po bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i dam pa'i
371a6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du mtshan thog thag bzlas na des nges par nyi ma shar ba'i tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / las gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lha dgug pa ni yungs
371a7(rgyud 'bum): kar dang mar gyis so/ / klu dgug pa ni mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa dang lo ba ris kyis so// gnod sbyin dgug pa ni sbrang rtsi can gyi me tog mar gyis bsgos pa dang til mar gyis bsgos pa'i sngags mdud kyis so//
371b1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa la ni til mar gyis bsgos pa'i yungs kar gyis so// rgyal po dgug pa la ni mar gyis gang ba'i sbyin sreg gis te/ me tog dang bcas pa bsreg par bya'o// skyes pa
371b2(rgyud 'bum): / dbang du bya ba la ni mar gyi dkyil 'khor gyis so// bud med dbang du bya ba la ni pri yang ku'i me tog sbrang rtsis bsgos pas bsreg par bya'o// the tsom dang bral bas ji ltar 'dod par
371b3(rgyud 'bum): nges par bsgrub par bya ste/ thun mong gi sbyor ba yin no// 'di'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das gser gyi mdog can skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ spyi gtsug nas byung ba'i
371b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer gyi steng du 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor can bri bar bya'o/ / g.yas su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'od kyi 'phreng ba can
371b5(rgyud 'bum): no/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du ni ku mu da'i mdog can sgros dmar ba/ lag pa dang rkang pa dmar ba/ ral pa dang bcas la/ rgyan dang bral ba/ thal mo sbyar ba byas
371b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ pad+ma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i lha mo'o// de'i 'og tu gtum po chen po 'dul ba zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma khros pa/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gnag cing ldang la ral pa
371b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig yod pa/ mig cung zhig dmar ba bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// 'dir yang cho ga ni de dag nyid yin no//
372a1(rgyud 'bum): yid la gang 'dod kyang rung ngo // ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo pad+ma la gnas pa ral pa thur la bshal ba'o// mngag gzhug pa gtum chen ni gzhon nu sgra 'brang bar
372a2(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / gtsug tor rab 'byams kyi rim par phye ba'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi gtsug nas kun nas rol pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i
372a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di lha bu byung bar gyur to/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ au shI khA an+ta/ a gra a gra sA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha po d+hi satwa nAM/ a ma la a gra ma e na mo sta a gra tsan u
372a4(rgyud 'bum): bI sha ye shI khI nI sAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ amr-i te a d+ha ra bi sha ya/ a gra d+harma te/ na ma s+t+ri hI/ s+t+rit+te ma hA bi re swA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ tI sA mA yA ba sha
372a5(rgyud 'bum): yetI shA khA a gra tA bo gi nI/ a nut+ta ra a gra ut+ta ri ma hA shi khe sA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a gra ut+ta ra i gri bi sha ya nA ma swA hA/ spyi gtsug 'di dag thams cad ni de
372a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dang kun tu mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi zhing du gyur pa/ sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa bsgrub par bya'o// sngags chen po'i bla na
372a7(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i yon tan la'ang dang bar byas nas bsgrubs na las thams cad de bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi khyad par ni lha mo gser gyi mdog can rgyan dang bral ba ral pa'i cod pan
372b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/ / 'og tu spyi gtsug gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu ma lag pa g.yon pa na zhags pa/ g.yas kyis rdo rje 'gyur ba/ khros pa/ ral pa gcig yod pa/ gnag cing
372b2(rgyud 'bum): ldang ba/ mig dmar ba/ de bzhin du rin po che'i zag la gnas pa bgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o// spyi gtsug rab 'byams kyi rim par phye ba'o// // de nas yang de'i tshe byang
372b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' 'od zer gyi sprul pa zhes bya ba kun nas ma lus pa'i 'od zer gyi mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab 'byams la lta zhing sngags 'di smras so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/
372b4(rgyud 'bum): a te dze sa ma sa ma/ te dzi ni/ dz+wa la ya dzA la ya dzA la ya/ ma hA be gA A sa pre he/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ muM tsA hi sar+b+ba thA pra praM sA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo gzi brjid
372b5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya ba yin no/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ tI hI tI hI/ shi ri shi ri/ d+ha ma d+ham/ bi me laM/ d+hun d+hu na/ sa ma te da tu ta/ nA mAstaM
372b6(rgyud 'bum): tsan+d+ra naM s+pha ra swa ra/ dzA la na a ma le swA hA/ rig pa mchog dri ma med pa 'ab ra ba zhes bya ba yin no// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ a ti sha ya/ shrI te dza mA la a gra sa ma ya
372b7(rgyud 'bum): a gri NI la/ u la a/ be shI nI be shi ni/ ti ra ti ra/ a sa he a sa he/ sa ma sa ma/ ba ra te swA hA/ rig pa mchog ge zi brjid rtse mo rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba yin no//
373a1(rgyud 'bum): maHsar+b+ba prab+hA ba nas d+han+ta/ u0f7f/ nan+tetArA / the dz+wal sa nam swA rbAH/ am le swA/ 'jig rten gas m+b+ha b
373a2(rgyud 'bum): ar byed pa zhes bya ba'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ an+te sa man+ta to// d+hu na d+hu na/ lo ka a ma la/ dzA la sa man+ta sho gi/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ nA ma sAH/ bsam gyis mi khyab
373a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'bar ba kun tu ma chags pa zhes bya ba'o/ / da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i rtse mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i
373a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'ongs nas spyi bor babs nas yid la gang 'dod pas sam/ des nges par gser gyi mdog can gser gyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
373a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gro ba 'dis las thams cad la snga ma bzhin du/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u'i cho ga 'am/ yid la gang 'dod pas sam
373a6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa mchog gi cho gas sam/ rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang bsgrub par bya ba'o// don yod pa mi zad pa rmad du byung ba 'dod par bya ba'i dngos grub brgyad yangs shing mi zad pa 'khrul pa med
373a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / gzi brjid rab 'byams rim par bya ba'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i thig le zhes bya ba kun tu nam mkha'i spyod yul gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
373b1(rgyud 'bum): la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di smras so/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nA~M/ ga ga no pa me/ na mo stam+b+ha ya a kra nI swA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nA~M/ a ma le a nan+ta/
373b2(rgyud 'bum): d+he tra hrIHsar+b+ba sa tAn+d+haHkha tAn+na da ma/ sa man+ta nAM/ a nA ya a nan+ta/ a tsa la ku NA sA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ u ti u da ra/ a gra d+har+m+ma tAM/ badz+ra bi sa ra NAM su khi sa
373b3(rgyud 'bum): a sa ya yaM b+ha baM he hi mi sid d+hi a gri ga me de ma ni man+ta pa ra dza a gri b+ha ban+ta sa ma sa ma/ a sa ha/ a sa ha/ trA ya tra ya/ d+hu na d+hu na/ a sa man+ta/ sar+b+ba bi sha ye/ a ha na a ha na

373b7(rgyud 'bum): sngar gyi cho ga rnams kyis 'di la sbyar bar bya'o// yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas sam/ rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir khyad par ni ri la sogs pa dber zhing stong par slong
374a1(rgyud 'bum): mo'i kha zas dang / dus gsum du khrus dang gtsang sbrang byed cing dben par lus yang bas bzlas pa la goms par bya ste/ ji srid du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang
374a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur kyi bar du'o/ / rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs nas ji srid mngon par shes pa lnga thob kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// kun tu rab 'byams kyi rim par phye ba'o// /
374a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byams kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i
374a4(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa dang ldan pa ni smras so/ / de la dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'di ltar 'byung ste/ ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i phyag rgya bcings la
374a5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba/ 'dra ba med pa/ bla na med pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul de'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni 'di yin no// de la ni re zhig dang por gzhan dag mos pa bskyed par
374a6(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi phyir gsol ba gdab pa 'am/ bdag nyid nges par sbyor bar 'dod pas bar chad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang por sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
374a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa bya zhing / seng ldeng gi phur bus brkos la dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar mkho ba rnams bsogs par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta badz+rA NAM hUM a kro d+ha ya/ sa he ma
374b1(rgyud 'bum): ha tsaN+Da lI hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba tra rak+Sha na hA tra Ta tra Ta mA Ta srA TA phaT/ de nas tshes bco lnga 'am bcu gsum la dben pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon rtsi lnga'i phye mas

374b3(rgyud 'bum): tsam 'dod pa'i bar sngags 'di zlos shing bri bar bya'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a ma la a ma la/ ha ra g+ha a nan+ta/ sa su ta sar+b+ba dzI nA a shi mA NI ShA ba ra da ma ma den+na/
374b4(rgyud 'bum): a ti a da raM ba ra a b+h+yAM sa ma sarba ta a nan taM/ tad tre me badz+ra pA dA a ra ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ sa man+ta a nan+ta/ d+har+m+ma te kha Ne kha Na ma hA bI raM/ a tsa le sa ma se ma/ a sa hama?

374b6(rgyud 'bum): a gre a gri ni hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig pa yin no// 'di bzung ba tsam mam bzlas pa tsam gyis rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur
374b7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du stong bzlas na gsang sngags thams cad bzlas pa 'bum byas par 'gyur ro// las gzhan thams
375a1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang don yod pa thogs pa med pa 'dis byed par 'gyur ro/ / sngags 'di brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi nub kyi sgo bri bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor las khru do tsam
375a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyi rol byang gi sgo gnyis pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / de'i nang gi dkyil 'khor la phyag rgya 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong shar phyogs su gru gsum gyi

375a4(rgyud 'bum): satwA nAM/ a sar+b+ba thA sar+b+ba tra NA ke swA hA/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba sa ma nu badz+ra NAM/ sa ma sa ma ma hUM/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a sa ha haM maM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

375b4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra mA lA mA lA/ A tsA le/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ma na dzA staM s+pha Ta/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tri gu Ne ba ra ba ra swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yon phyogs su dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor

375b6(rgyud 'bum): rlu d+hA ma d+ha ma/ d+hun d+ha na/ ka ga ga/ hahaha/ tra ya twA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la swAH/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rAd+hA/ ma~M hA ba le dz+wA la swAH/ de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje 'dzin thams ca
375b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'o/ / de la sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+raNAM/ ma hA badz+ra a naH/ ba lA sa ma ye/ dz+wa la nA hU~M phaT/ rdo rje
376a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang sngags so/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+ra rje/ ma hA badz+rA a nan te trA swa d+ha me nu/ de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ces bya ba'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'i kyi
376a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/ / de la sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ma hA badz+ra a nan+ta te dza sA d+ha ya hUM/ ka la ka la/ sa man+t+ra/ a nan+ta/ bi Sha ya ad+d+ha d+ha/ d+harma te dz+wa la na
376a3(rgyud 'bum): ma sas+thi d+ha ne d+ha ne/ ha na ha na/ ma hA bi ka me swA hA/ sngags kyu'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ma hA be gA a ra tI/ a na ya/ a t+yaM gr-ih+Na swA hA/
376a4(rgyud 'bum): shar mtshams su rdo rje'i rdo rje lta bu'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ma hA a tsa la a tsa la/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bi d+ha ya bi d+ha ya ti le kaM hUM ma na swA hA/

376a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gru bzhi pa pad+ma la gnas pa lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi dbus na gnas pa'o/ / de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a ma la a ma
376a7(rgyud 'bum): labi ma la a nan+ta go tsA rA ya na mo s+yA te/ ma hA bai ro tsa na ye/ ha ra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ a nan+ta to/ a sa ma na a sa mA na/ a ra ra ma hA bi kran+ta/ me hA bI ra tu ru tu ru sAhA
376b1(rgyud 'bum): chos gos kyi phyag rgya dang sngags so/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nA~M/ bai ro tsan mA lA sAH/ lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta bar+d+had+d+ha/ bi tha bi tha/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ btA/
376b2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ba le swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ya/ baM d+ha baM d+ha swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su longs spyod rdo rje'i brang 'gro'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la
376b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'o/ / de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra r+tha/ tsa pa NA a gras phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA t+t+ra/ trin m+b+ha la ba ta ma hA b+hog/ ti Ti ti Ti/ hUM haM swA hA/ de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje gtum po'i gri gug gi/
376b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ma hA tsaN+Da la badz+ra hUM/ bi d+ha ra ya phaT/ rdo rje gri gug gi phyag rgya dang
376b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+radz+dzi/ ma hA badz+ra ka tA rA kA NAM raNA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+han+da b+han+da/ a pra ti ha ta ma ya tra kar phaT/ de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje dga' ba'i so shing dkyil
376b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/ / de la sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tA hi tA hi/ ma hA ba yA/ ta a tA u su/ tA ra su tA ra su ta ru na ma sid+d+hi ra/ astu
376b7(rgyud 'bum): swahA/ namaHsa man+ta badz+ra rje/ ti ti ye a kon tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du sgra re dang mchod sbyin do u0f7f u wa la'i steng du rdo rje'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa/
377a1(rgyud 'bum): de'i rig pa ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra dz+dza/ badz+ra aT+TA ha sa hU~M na ma swAhA/ phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ba rad te ha hid+d+ha ma bi ke swA hA/ de'i rjes la 'phags
377a2(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma sil ma'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/ / de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ bai ro tsa na ma hA ro tsa/ tA rA tA rA/
377a3(rgyud 'bum): ma hA tA ra/ he ho/ da ma da ma/ hUM dz+wa la na phaT/ na maHsan+ta badz+rA NAM/ A ra A ra/ tid ti ra raM sa ma yaM swA hA/ de'i rjes thogs la gtum po rdo rje'i dar dpyangs gnyis dang bcas
377a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da an+ta ka hUM badz+rA na la hUM phaT/ phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ g+ha TA na haM TA ka phaT/
377a5(rgyud 'bum): lho nub kyi mtshams su rol pa rdo rje'i rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de'i rig pa ni 'di yin te/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ khe la khe la/ la lI tAM/ kA rA
377a6(rgyud 'bum): pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM tA Ta tA Ta/ phyag rgya'i 'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tri gu Na ma hA badz+ra sa ma haM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ nub phyogs kyi sgo'i phyi rol gyi dkyil
377a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la gnas par rdo rje 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma'o/ / sgo'i g.yas su rdo rje rgya chen gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rANA
377b1(rgyud 'bum): ma ho da ra badz+rAr+tha/ ho badz+ra dz+wa la ya ma la tsu rbu hUM/ su ru su ru/ tri ba la daM ku ru ku ru/ na maHsastA stu sUH/ 'khor lo'i 'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ traM traM ga ga tra ka ra tsu/ de'i rjes
377b2(rgyud 'bum): thogs su rdo rje dpa' bo rdo rje dar dbyangs dang bcas pa'i gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu'o/ / de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ma hA krud tra an+ta ka dz+wa la hUM phaT tri/ ba lA a
377b3(rgyud 'bum): sha sa maM swAhA/ rdo rje dar dpyangs kyi'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA traM/ tri pa ta ke tri ba ta ke hA sha sA sha/ badz+ra ba lA a gre maN+Da lA ya/ ha ra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM hUM/ d+ha ni d+ha ni/ sa ma
377b4(rgyud 'bum): ye swA hA/ de'i rjes la rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa bri bar bya'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM
377b5(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ma henA ga Na ga Na/ bi ra bi ra/ hUM dz+wa la nA ma sAhA/ phyag rgya'i sngags so// na maHsa man+ta ba dz+nyA NAM/ ba ra ba li ni ba li ni/ ni thi ni thi sA hA/ de'i rjes la sgo'i g.yon du rdo rje
377b6(rgyud 'bum): yan lag gi rtse mo gsum gyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/ / de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsha Ta na/ ma hA shu la a gra pa ni/ hUM d+ha ma d+ha ma
377b7(rgyud 'bum): dar dar/ ma hA badz+ra aM ga d+ha na hU~M phaT/ rtse gsum gyi'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA rje/ e hi ma hA tri shU la phaT/ ban+d+ha ma hA tsan+da a sA da ka/ ti Ta tiT/ tsu tra phaT/ rdo rje yan lag
378a1(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya dang sngags so/ / de'i rjes la sta re'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA tAM/ ma hA ba/
378a2(rgyud 'bum): ga/ a mA mA la aM ga/ da ya da ya/ hUM sa dzA ya dzA ya na maHsA hA/ phyag rgya'i sngags so// na maHsa man+ta badz+nyA NAM/ a nan+ta ba lA bi kra me/ tI ri tI ri/ g+ho rA s+phu Ta ya hUM paT/
378a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i rjes la rdo rje zhal gyi rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ na meHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ a tsa la a tsa la
378a4(rgyud 'bum): tsU bi d+yA ut+ta ma/ bi d+yA ut+ta ma/ u da ra u da ra/ dzA la dzA la/ b+haM dza b+haM dza/ marda mdza/ a bI sha a bI sha/ khA da khA da hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+nyA NAM/ hUM badz+re uts+tsha ta ni/ tri shi
378a5(rgyud 'bum): khaM ni/ twe Ta tAT+Ta/ pI Ta phAT phaT/ phyag rgya'i sngags so// byang phyogs kyi char bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don ya grub pa'i phyag rgya 'od zer 'gyed pa'i rnam pa pad+ma la gnas
378a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dbus su bri bar bya'o/ / de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags ni/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha pra ti ha ta s+yA sid+d+hi dzA la dzA la/ tri shi khI sa ma sa ma/ a sa me ta ma
378a7(rgyud 'bum): ta ma/ a sa he d+ha ma d+ha ma/ na mo swa a ma le b+h+yaHsta ra sAH/ 'od kyi phyag rgya'i sngags so// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tra yai tra ya/ a ma la a hu te/ sar+b+ba thA sar+b+ba thA/ sar+b+bam
378b1(rgyud 'bum): hA te dza le le/ tri shi khI ni/ dz+wA la dz+wa la/ a A a A/ sa me d+hu na swahA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su ni rdo rje shugs kyi dbang phyug gi sta re gdan gyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas
378b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+nyA NAM/ hUM ga ga nA ga ga nA/ bA bA ma hA be ga kra ma kra ma/ hu lu hu lu/ hUM phaT swa re/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ sa ma sa ma
378b3(rgyud 'bum): be gA tA d+hi sa hA ba la hUM/ de'i rjes la rdo rje shugs chen po'i rdo rje mche ba gdan gyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA ShAM/
378b4(rgyud 'bum): / hUM hUM ka pA la mA lA/ hUM dz+wa la nA mA ya phaT Ta/ rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NA~M/ tiSh+Tha he tra Ta traT/ ma tha maT/ dz+wa la nA khI kha re/ gdan dkyil 'khor
378b5(rgyud 'bum): chung ngu dang ldan pa'i chu gri'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ / de'i rig pa ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ ka Ta ka Ta/ mA rA ba ra ta ka maM/ tI Ta tI Ta/ A lo kaM hUM phaT/
378b6(rgyud 'bum): nub byang mtshams su rdo rje rol pa'i ngag byed dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i gdan dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la a tsa la
378b7(rgyud 'bum): na Ta na TA/ a ma bi la sha/ s+phu ra s+phu ra/ hUM TA tA sA hA/ dag byed kyi phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tI ta ka badz+ra hUM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ma yaM hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du
379a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen po'i rdo rje gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa gzhag par bya'o/ / de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a sa ho da ya/ ma hA ma hA/
379a2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra ta ra ta ra/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ maM na ma swA hA/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a b+h+ya d+h+ya/ ka ra ka ra/ a pra ti ha ta/ ma tA ma tA/ a mo g+ha ta d+ha ka d+ha ka/ mAM mAM dzA/
379a3(rgyud 'bum): dus mtha'i 'bar ba 'dra ba'i gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'i gtun shing gi phyag rgya dgod par bya'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsan+ta badz+rA NAM/ a ti a tI swA hA/ saM ba ra tA/
379a4(rgyud 'bum): an+ta ka nu tsU/ A sa hA dz+wa la tA TA/ mA rA mA rA/ phaT phaT/ gtun shing gi phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tA Ta tA TA/ ku TA ku Ta/ ma hA ba ri bi gra ma a sa dri ga/ tri TA tri Ta/
379a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas de'i rjes la dri ma med pa'i rdo rje'i rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu dang bcas pa'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ga ga nA ga ga nA/ ku ru ku ru/
379a6(rgyud 'bum): ti ri ti ri/ sa ma sa ma ba ra d+ha na ma/ rdo rje dbyug gu'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tA TA tA Ta/ hUM ka na ka na/ raM raM bI dzA yA/ tI sa ti sa/ ba la ba la/ khaN+Da kha/
379a7(rgyud 'bum): rje hU~MHdkyil 'khar gyi dbus sun 'ab bas srin nas pa na pa'i dkyil thi bang bye'o/ 'i sdigs ni 'di yin te/ gang yang ste nas rje'i rigs rnams kyis sa min gcag tu
379b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ na maHsar+b+ba badz+ra gu la NA/ a sa mA sa mA/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a nan+ta/ sa man+ta sa man+ta/ ba lA ma hA badz+ra rA dza/ sar+b+ba tra sa mA ba tA/ de gi nar+tha
379b2(rgyud 'bum): lA dzA lA/ dz+wa la pa ya a nan+ta bi kra ma tre ga tra ga maM/ a sa ha ma hA sa ma yo hUM ta ra ta ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM ma hA ma hA/ su tsaN+Da su tsaN+Da/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sme ta yA sme ta yA/
379b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM hUM hUM badz+ra d+ha ra a gra hUM hUM/ bi d+hA ra ya bi d+hA ra ya/ hUM tsan+d+ha ra an+ta ka pA ta ya swA hA/ dam tshig rtse mo'i rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje'o// ang ga'i sngags ni 'di
379b4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / na maHsa man+ta badzA NAM/ trai lo tsa na/ e haM bi ra bA lA a gra/ e hi sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a d+hiSh+TA na/ a ho sha sA ka sha sA ka/ ma hA ba ra badz+ra hr-i ma ha sa ha/
379b5(rgyud 'bum): sa mA sa mA/ ta ra stA ra/ na mo stu te swA hA/ rdo rje'i mtshan ma ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs kyi sgor bri'o// rdo rje glu'i sbrul gyi phyag rgya dang / 'dul byed kyi sog le d+ha
379b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dag ni 'gram gnyis dgod par bya'o/ / de dag gi sngags ni 'di dag go// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ na mo stu te ga ga na sa ma a ba ra ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ba la da/ A tI sA tI/ be gra ba ti
379b7(rgyud 'bum): gaM baM baM ma hA na gaM hUM su ra a gra phaT/ rdo rje klu brang 'gro'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a ti biSh+Ta a ti biSh+Ta/ tI li tI li/ ba la ba la/ ba ra ba ra/ ta Ti ta Ti/
380a1(rgyud 'bum): tA nA tA Ta/ da ha da ha/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha phaT/ 'dul ba po'i 'o// na maHsa man+ta bar+d+har+N+Na/ tsaN+Da a gra a nan+ta ka hU~M da ma ya phaT/ sog le/
380a2(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'o// na maHse men+ta badz+rA d+h+waM/ tA gi ni mir+t+r-i ni a sa ha ba lA/ oM mr-in+na trAM/ byang shar mtshams su rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'i pi wang gi phyag bya bri
380a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ ma hA yo gen+na ba ru Ni/ sa ma sa ma/ dzA la dzA la swA hA/ pi wang gi phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ ti ni
380a4(rgyud 'bum): ti ni/ ta nu ta nu/ su g+ho ShA be ge/ ha raM ha raM/ e taM ha na ha na swA hA/ lho shar mtshams su rdo rje mdangs kyi lcug ma gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa dgod par bya'o// de'i rig
380a5(rgyud 'bum): pa nI 'di yin no/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NA/ ma hA tsaN+Da ta ra le na ma sha b+hI ni te dzi ni dzA la dz+wa la/ sid+d+hi ha ra ha ra/ bi re swA hA/ rdo rje lcug ma'i 'o// na maHsa man+ta badzAdz+dza/ tI mi
380a6(rgyud 'bum): tI li/ bi li bi li/ be ke dA ri ni/ badz+ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tAM tAM bo d+hi di ni aM/ lho nub mtshams su rdo rje rgyal chen gyi dril bu'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa dgod par bya'o//
380a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i sngags ni 'di yin no// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tri ru ts+yai/ sa ma ya ba li ba ra ba ra/ b+hi re b+hi re/ ra Na ra Na/ ra be ma/ tsi ni sAhA/ zil bu'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta
380b1(rgyud 'bum): badz+rA NAM/ ra Na dza ra Na dza/ ti ra Ne ti ra Ne/ raM raM dAn+ta swA hA/ nub byang mtshams su stobs mchog gi shugs kyi 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu dang bcas pa'o// de'i rig
380b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni 'di yin no/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+ra d+h+waM/ ti she ye ti she ye/ badz+re ti shi he ti shi he/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ tri pa ta kre sAhA/ 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NA
380b3(rgyud 'bum): tri ba li nI/ ba rA mA lI mA li na ban+d+ha ya/ ba ri nI su ra b+hi NI/ ba ra a gre sa ma sa ma/ ban+d+he ban+d+he/ ya d+he ni swA hA/ lhag ma bstan pa'i snam bu gcig la ni sems dpa' chen po thams
380b4(rgyud 'bum): cad dgod par bya'o/ / phyogs bzhi'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir ni bum pa gang ba ste/ nang dri zhim pa'i chus bkang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o// 'dir yang sngar gsungs pa'i rdo rje
380b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mo las rab 'byams mtha' yas pa sgrub par byed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas pa bya'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sAtwa NAM/ ma hA sa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a sa ma sa ma
380b6(rgyud 'bum): sa man+ta/ a nan+ta bi kra mA/ ma hA badz+ra rA dz+nyA/ a gra a gra e s+yo he sa ma ya/ ma hA ba lA be ga tA/ ma hA dzA lan+d+ha la dz+wa la/ mA mA mA/ sar+b+ba thA bA rU bA rU/ sa mA sa mA
380b7(rgyud 'bum): tra tra tra tra/ ba ra ba ra bi d+ha ut+ta ma a mra a kra/ hUM hUM/ dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba ma wa ma hA/ sid+d+ha sid+ha a mra a gra d+ha ma tsu hrI/ maM phaT laT/ sar+b+ba pA ut+ta ma~M swA hA~M/ de nas nang gi dkyil/
381a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan bdun gyi bar du brjod la thal mo brdab par bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po lan
381a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi bar du brjod la snga ma bzhin du thal mo'ang brdab par bya'o/ / de la snying po ni 'di yin no// na maHtrai yad+d+hi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tAnA~M/ sar+b+ba tA a pra ti ha tA/ bA pa ti/ d+har+m+ma tA ba
381a3(rgyud 'bum): mInAM/ aM a/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man+ta to/ a nan+ta to/ !d+b+hi/ shA sa ni ha ra ha ra/ s+phA rasma raH/ bi ga ta rAg/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te/ sa ra sa ra sa ma ba la/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/
381a4(rgyud 'bum): ga gnam hA bar lak+Sha Ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swA hA/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nA~M/ ba ra ba ra/ sarbaM saH/ sa ma sa ma ka ru Ni ka ru
381a5(rgyud 'bum): d+h+waMtra rA tA rA/ swa ra sA rA/ a tI a tAM/ a nI tA ya mI tAM/ a tI a tI/ d+hi ra d+hI ra/ a tI a tAM/ shu ra shwer/ ha ha ha hA/ ma hA sa ma ya/ na mo sta a ma ma
381a6(rgyud 'bum): sid+d+ha da ya ke b+h+yaHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ sar+b+ba a nan+d+ra ma d+h+ye b+h+yA ma hA ka ru Na/ mA lI nI/ tri sa ma ye dz+wA la swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po ste/ 'di dang 'dra ba gzhan med do//
381a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas lag par me tog blangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du brjod par
381b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de brjod pa tsam gyis rdo rje'i rigs thams cad nye bar lhags nas dga' ba la sogs pa'i lhas sam/ gsal ba 'am/ sgra thos pa 'am/ dri zhim po 'am/ 'od dam/ ser bu'i
381b2(rgyud 'bum): bsil ba 'am/ bzhon pa 'am/ gzhan yang rung ltas cung zad cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la kun tu thogs pa med par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
381b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stobs kyi snying po'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta a mo g+ha a pra/
381b4(rgyud 'bum): ti ha ta badz+nyArtA/ a kra a gra/ A kaR+Sha NI hAM/ be gI be gI/ ma hA be gI nI/ sar+b+baM badz+ra ku lA nAM/ A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ sarba mu drA ga NA nAM/ tIk+t+wA tIk+te/ ti ti ti ti/ ta tha ta tha
381b5(rgyud 'bum): a a n+da br-i te/ a pra ti ha ta/ a mo g+ha ba kra me/ sa ma sa ma/ a ma la ma hA me/ a ti a ti/ b+he b+ha pa tA ke/ sa ma ya maM daM ka ru shI tri na ya ta tA ang+gi ni/ A na ya shIg+h+nata
381b6(rgyud 'bum): thA ga tA ku shi swA hA/ de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas sngags 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sar+b+ba ud ga te s+pha ra Ne hi maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta tA sAhA/
381b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas sngags 'dis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu sbyin par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ba la ba ti ba lI de swA hA/ de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub tu sems
382a1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas la/ gtsang sbra byas nas g.yas su me tog thogs te gdong g.yogs pa gzhug par bya'o//
382a2(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar nas gcig gnyis gsum bzhi 'am lnga 'am gzhug par bya zhing sdom pa 'di ltar gzung bar bya'o// de la dam tshig dang sdom pa blang ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
382a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag 'bul gyis/ thams cad kyis dus thams
382a4(rgyud 'bum): cad du bdag la rab tu bzung du gsol/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bdag byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams thams cad
382a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su skyob par mdzad pa rnams kyis bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ las thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po bdag la stsal tu gsol/ zhes de ltar lan gsum gyi bar
382a6(rgyud 'bum): du brjod par bya'o/ / de nas lan re re rna bar 'di brjod par bya'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas dang mnyam rgyal dbang po// sras bcas ma lus kun gyi dam tshig gsol// 'chi ba med cing
382a7(rgyud 'bum): gsad med sems can bskyab pa med/ / shin tu bstan pas 'di ltar bya ba nyid// de nas me tog 'phang bar bya'o// me tog gang la bab pa de ni de'i rigs kyi lha yin no// de nas gdong
382b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs bkrol la de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/ / spyi bor mthe bong bzhag la gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya bya zhing sngags 'di brjod do// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha
382b2(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwa nAM/ tri shi khA a gri na na mo stu te/ sa man+ta/ a da sa man+ta a gri/ ku Na a tsa la a gri d+ha ra ma/ bI du nA hi kle sha duHkha dz+wa la na dza ga ta/ sar+b+ba su khaM da d+ha hI tsa shu tA tre d+haM dzi
382b3(rgyud 'bum): sa ma e ku ru swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di 'chang bar byed pa de la gtsug tor gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bar du nyams par yang mi 'gyur la/ yon tan mtha' yas pa'i sgor 'jug
382b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / nges par rgal nas so sor spyod pa'i dam tshig 'di rnam par bstan par bya'o// yang yang 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing // ngan 'gror mi 'gro 'chi 'pho
382b5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' yi// theg pa 'di la dam tshig srungs// dam pa'i chos kyang spang mi bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// mi gus mi bya/
382b6(rgyud 'bum): spang mi bya// srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing // bla ma la yang brnyas mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya spang mi bya// nyams par mi bya bdag gis min// rdo rje 'dra ba bsgom mi bya//
382b7(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar mi bya ser sna min// 'di spyod pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la mngon spyod mi bya'o// gnod pa byed pa la'ang
383a1(rgyud 'bum): mi bya'o/ / sdig pa'i las kyang mi bya zhing // byis pa'i chos kyang mi bya'o// bla ma la ni lha bzhin bya// mdor na bdag dang gzhan dag la// gnod par 'gyur bde
383a2(rgyud 'bum): mi bya/ / srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// 'dis ni nges par 'da' bar byed// ston pa'i bstan pa bdud rtsi nyid// thugs rje chen po'i bstan pa las// slar yang nyams par mi
383a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ngan 'gror min// myur du zhi bar 'gyur ba min// 'di ltar gsang sngags spyod pa yi// dam tshig 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams// sras dang bcas
383a4(rgyud 'bum): pas khyod la gsungs/ / gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bus// lus dang mthun pa'i yon tan 'byung // dad med ngan 'gro ba mi bya// sangs rgyas sras bcas yang rnams kyi// smon lam la
383a5(rgyud 'bum): yang spyad par bya/ / kun rdzob tu ni mi ldog par// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pas mthong // ring du mi byed ches drag pas// sems can don du smon par byed// ces brjod la/
383a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal ba de ni dam tshig gi thal mo zhes bya ba ste rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin no// ma maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/
383a7(rgyud 'bum): sid+d+hi sA d+ha ni a rba ka ru Na/ bA reH/ tA yi tra yi/ A lI ba len me stu/ ba ra d+ha yi/ b+he D+ho ma thakri the b+h+yaHswAH/ 'di na rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i sngags yin no// phyag rgya gang sa

383b2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ mdangs dang ldan pas 'dir dngos grub kyi dam tshig la zhugs nas myur du de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad

383b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag ni bya ba ste/ sdig pa thams cad bshags pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba rgyun mi gcad pa'o// 'dir gnyis po 'di spang bar bya ste/ bslab
383b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la mi 'byor pa dang / sgrub pa mi byed pa'o// 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ni gnyis te/ dad ma med pa dang / byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'o// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig ni gnyis
384a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ dus ma yin par bya ba byed pa dang / brtag pa med pa'o// sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i chos ni gnyis te/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
384a2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa la gzhol ba'o// de nas 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po rnams dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag
384a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya dang / sngags rnams kyi rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mar dang bcas pa'i gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis ni rims dang / gdon dang / 'byung po dang / sha za rnams la mi na ba
384a4(rgyud 'bum): dang na bas kyang rung / ras ris dang / ri mo dang / sku gzugs dang / shing dang / lo ma dang / ral gri dang / me long la sogs pa la 'bebs par byed do// gang yang
384a5(rgyud 'bum): rung ba'i bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni bcing ba dang / btsir ba dang / brdab pa dang / bsnun pa dang / gsad pa dang / gcad pa dang / dbab pa dang / rnam par sbyang
384a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bsgrub par bya ba ni bklags pas 'grub pa 'di nyid kyis byed par 'gyur ro// mchog sgrub pa

384b1(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa don yod par grub pa 'dis kyang bya'o/ / 'di dag gi thun mong gi ras ris 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni brag gi phug na pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa

384b4(rgyud 'bum): rung ba gnag cing ldang ba/ gzhon nu ral pa can/ mig cung zhig dmar ba/ khros pa/ rin po che'i zag la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// 'og tu ni sgrub pa po'o// 'dir yang rdo
384b5(rgyud 'bum): rje 'dzin gang yang rung ba'i snying po dang bsgrub par bya'o/ / de bzhin du sngar bstan pa'i cho ga 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i
384b6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o/ / 'grub par gyur na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po'i sngags bla na med
384b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho thogs pa med pa don yod par grub par byed pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ / rtog pa thams cad kyi cho gas sam/ yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas sbyar ro//
385a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu dpe med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi mdzod las yang dag par byung ba/ snying po'i mthus kyang de bzhin du bsgrub par

385a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba rtsig ngos sam/ ras sam/ spang leb bam/ lo ma 'am/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su tshon rtsi 'am/ dris bsgos pa'i
385a4(rgyud 'bum): bir ram/ tha na thal bas kyang rung / bris la dri dang me tog gi mchod pa byas te/ bdag gi don 'di mdzad du gsol/ bdag la mchog 'di stsal du gsol/ bdag gi 'di sgrub tu
385a5(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ bdag gi dgos pa 'di dag gzhan du ma gyur pa de bzhin du gyur cig ces yang dag par bsams nas/ phyag rgya'i sngags bzlas pa byas na dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur ba 'am/
385a6(rgyud 'bum): lha la sogs pa'am/ mi la sogs pa ngas 'ong bar byas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dang de smra bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i dgos pa'ang smra bar byed/ ston cig ce'am/ rgyob cig ce'am/ chod cig/

385b1(rgyud 'bum): rung ba bsams la rang gi khrag gis bris te khros pas 'dug la bzlas pa byas na gang gi don du byas pa'i lha 'am/ klu 'am/ rig pa 'dzin pa'ang rung ste nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gang
385b2(rgyud 'bum): gi tshe mchog sgrub par 'dod na des lpags las phyag mtshan byas la bzlas pa byas nas lag par gzung ste/ gang yang rung bas dben par ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bsgrubs na

388b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi cho ga gang yin pa de rtog pa 'di'i yin no/ / mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi dam tshig ces bya ba yi ge lnga pa yin no zhes

400a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'od kyi 'phreng ba can/ lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ g.yon na rin po che thogs pa/ cung zhig lus 'dud pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
