400b3(rgyud 'bum): ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ sngon po gyon pa bri bar bya'o// bka' nyan mo rnams kyang de bzhin du khros pa/ gzhon nu'i lus can rgyan dang bral ba/ nag ldang shing gyon pa/ mchog
400b4(rgyud 'bum): gi 'phreng ba lag na thogs pa 'am/ ska rags sam/ dar dbyangs sam/ sdong bu 'am/ ku sha 'am/ ral gri 'am/ zhi ba ma 'am/ phyag shing ngam/ mjug sgro lag na thogs
400b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / mngag gzhug pa rnams gang 'dod pa gcig bris la/ rang 'dod pa'i sngags gcig bzung nas ngas ris de la bsgrubs par bya ste/ rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / kha T+wAM ga
400b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / lcags kyu dang / mdung la sogs pa dang / ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas thams cad la sngar bstan pa'i cho ga 'am yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho ga bsgrub bya ste/ mi snang ba'i dngos
400b7(rgyud 'bum): grub la sogs pa 'am/ nor sgrub pa 'am/ dbang du bya ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bsgrub par bya'o// rab tu stong zhing dben par ras ris med par yang thams cad bsgrub par bya ste/
401a1(rgyud 'bum): tha na gtsug lag khang ngam/ brang khang gi phugs la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su bsgrub par bya'o// gang dag rims kyis zin pa de la dbab par 'dod na me long dang
401a2(rgyud 'bum): ral gri la sogs pa dang / ri mo dang lugs ma la sogs pa rnams la gzhon nu 'am gzhon nu ma me tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag na nub mo 'bebs par yang byed/ sma
401a3(rgyud 'bum): bar yang byed do/ / lha dang klu la sogs pa 'gugs par yang byed do// 'ching bar byed/ ltung bar byed/ gsod par byed/ gtum pos 'tshe bar byed do// de nas bgyi ba ci mchis
401a4(rgyud 'bum): pa bdag gis bgyi zhes sgrub par byed do/ / de'i phyir bka' nyan po mo de dag bsgrub par bya ste/ tshes gcig nas brtsams nas snga dro'i thun la ras ris kyi mdun du me tog gis mngon pa
401a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas lan brgya'i bar du rjes su rjod par byed do/ / zas zos pa'i rjes la'ang lan brgya mngon par brjod par bya'o// phyi dro'i dus su'ang lan brgya brjod la
401a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas gnyid ldog par bya'o/ / de ltar nyin re zhing zla ba nya'i bar du zla ba gcig tu cho ga bzhin du bya'o// zla ba nya la ji ltar 'byor
401a7(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin du mchod pa byas la/ nim pa'i shing las ma sbar la arka'i yam shing dang bcas pa'i yungs kar re re bsregs na srod nas bzung nas nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar nges par 'ong bar
401b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal te 'ong bar ma gyur na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas bdag la bka' stsol cig ces zer na de dang de brjod par bya'o// bdag ni ci'ang bgyid do zhes zer na de nas bzung ste
401b2(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro/ / ci bka' stsal pa byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten rnams kyang 'dri zhing smra bar byed do// steng gi mtshams su'ang 'khrid par byed do// bya ba thams
401b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang byed do/ / ji srid smra bar 'dod pa de srid du 'dri bar byed do// 'dis gang smras pa de de bzhin du 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// ri'i gseb tu 'bum bzlas nas ral gri
401b4(rgyud 'bum): blangs te mtshan rangs pa sbyin sreg byed cing 'di nyid kyis gang 'dod pa'i cho ga des bsgrubs na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod du 'dug nas me tog gis mngon par brgyan pa'i dkyil
401b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la 'khor lo bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na thogs na'ang mtshan bdun gyi nang du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor de nyid la ba bla blangs la ji srid du ba ma byung
401b6(rgyud 'bum): gi bar du bzlas na zhag bdun gyi nang du nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / thal bas tshud gsum byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las
401b7(rgyud 'bum): pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / bka' nyan pho mo'i rim par phye ba'i phyogs gcig bstan pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par grub pa yul mtha' yas pa mnyam
402a1(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du don yod par grub pas ma lus pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i sgo/ bde ba nam mkha' thams cad kyi rgyal po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ rmad du byung ba/
402a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi sgo gcig pu/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs pa/ lhag ma med pa'i mthu 'grub pa la sogs pa/ dngos grub thams cad yang dag par legs par
402a3(rgyud 'bum): thob pa byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po la sogs pa zhes bya ba thams cad du mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sgo ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa
402a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi snying po mchog bla na med pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang stabs
402a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha b+ho d+hi satwa nAM/ A saM ma aM b+hu ta a nan tu sid+d+hiHtA a she Sha d+harma tAM/ a sa man+te ga ga nA tA mu khaM sa mu pe tI ye Shu sa twa/ taM sa man+ta tA su khaM sid+d+hi
402a6(rgyud 'bum): d+ha na gu na dza sa ma a g+hi ni/ sa grid pya hau gu Na sa ma ba tI/ sha sA/ taM ta dre daM/ trA tA/ sid+d+hi ne sa ra yA/ su sA mA ba ti/ te a ma li ne sA d+ha ya/ kA ru Na ma ya sar+b+ba ta shA sa ni sA d+ha ya/
402a7(rgyud 'bum): tra ya sa man+tha/ sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya/ tri tA ye tri tA ye/ sa ma ye sa ma ye/ sar+b+ba thA su ma bA te/ sid+d+ha ya si d+he/ a ma le/ sha yi ye/ sA si ke sA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni
402b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa na/ / rnam par dag pa'i zhing kun tu// skad cig de la sangs rgyas kun// rmad byung gad mo chen mo mdzad// rig pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po mchog gi
402b2(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa mtha' yas shing chags pa med pa sgrub pa'i mchog dri ma med pa dngos grub mtha' yas pa mtshungs pa med pa'o/ / 'di bzlas pa byas pas dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
402b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di legs par bzlas pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro// chags pa med pas rig sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub thob par 'dod pas 'di
402b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / tha na gzung bar yang bya ste/ 'di la thams cad rab tu gnas pa yin no// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa don yod pa'i mthu dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan
402b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa la rjes su dran bzhin du sngags gsol ba btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad gcig tu rjes su 'gro bar mdzad nas rig pa'i rgyal po mchog
402b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / na mas+t+raM yad d+hi kA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM ga ga na lo tsa ne/ ga ga na sa ma sar+b+ba thA ud ka ta tI/ sa ra saM b+ha be dzA la nA ma aM gi ni swA hA/ lag na rdo rje rang gi rig
402b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po mchog 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / 'di brtsams pa tsam gyis 'di'i yon tan mtha' med pa mnyam pa med par 'gyur ro// bzung
403a1(rgyud 'bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba thob par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud du skye bar 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa
403a2(rgyud 'bum): byas na 'dis sgrub pa po dad pa'i nor can du 'gyur ro/ / de nas re zhig dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad dbul bar bya ste/ bdag sang
403a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi yis/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad dus thams cad du sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag la byin gyis brlab tu
403a4(rgyud 'bum): gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/ / de nas thugs bskyed pa gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdigs pa rnams bshags par mdzad pa'i sems bskyed pa des
403a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi sdig pa thams cad dus thams cad du bshags par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du 'am nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par
403a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ngo // 'jig rten gyi kham tham
403a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi khams su gtogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rnams bsgoms la bsngo bar bya ste/ na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kAnA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA/ sar+b+ba thA ud ga te sA ra Na hi maM gag na kha~M swA hA/ de bzhin gsheg pa tham cad kyi 'khor
403b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po sna tshogs pa'i sprin rab 'byams rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig
403b2(rgyud 'bum): ces bsams la sngags 'di bzla bar bya'o/ / de nas gzhan ma yin par yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs par 'gyur ro//
403b3(rgyud 'bum): namas+t+rai yang d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sar+b+ba tra sa ma ku su mi tI ra shI ni na mo sU te swA hA/ 'dis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags
403b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam rnams/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la/ de bzhin
403b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams la dmigs nas sngags bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas gzhan ma yin par bstod pa'i dbyangs rnams rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas smon lam btab pa byas nas sangs rgyas
403b6(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha
403b7(rgyud 'bum): cad mngon du phyogs pas phyag 'tshal te/ ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du sngags bzlas pa bya'o// de nas rgya che ba'i tshul la 'jug pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa sems la byas la
404a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi snying po brjod cing / lha la sogs pa kun nyon cig ces bya ba'i dam tshig brjod cing bsams la bsgom par bya'o// snga dro'i thun la de ltar byas nas zas za ba
404a2(rgyud 'bum): na stobs chen po dang / sman gyi rgyal po chen por byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ste/ na ma stai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM b+hu dza li te swA hA/ de nas ngal sos la phyi nas
404a3(rgyud 'bum): glegs bam klog pa la sogs pa byas te/ snga ma bzhin du phyi dro'i thun la'ang las rnams byas nas bzlas pa bya'o// srod kyi dus su smon lam btab la yan lag thams cad btud pas sangs rgyas
404a4(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rtsa bting ba la dang por nyal la gnyid ldog par bya'o/ / tshes gcig nas brtsams nas nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du las 'di ltar bya/
404a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing / nya'i nub mo dri'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bzhag pa 'am/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ bzhugs nas kyi mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs
404a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mdun du 'am/ gzhan yang dben par skyil mo krung bcas la skyil mo krung ma bshig par de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas bzlas pa bya ste/ ji srid 'od zer byung nas lus la phog gi
404a7(rgyud 'bum): bar du byas nas de nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i rjes la lus 'di yongs su gyur nas rig 'dzin gyi rigs rnams nye bar lhags te/ de la dbang bskur bas bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin
404b1(rgyud 'bum): du byang chub sems dpa' rig 'dzin gyi rigs su gyur nas bskal pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ / der yang shes rab dang thabs dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
404b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs pas rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
404b3(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa la yongs su spyad kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro// lus de nyid kyis sa non par 'gyur zhing bsod nams ji
404b4(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba dang / rjes su spyod pa'ang mthar gyis sogs shing so sor thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rig pa 'dzin pa thob par ma
404b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba 'am/ 'od kyis snang bar byas pa 'am/ gsung thos par 'gyur zhing / de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// gzung kyang
404b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan dag gis kyang bsgrub par bya ste/ ri dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / chu gling dang / khang phugs dang / gtsug lag khang gi gnas 'di lta bu
404b7(rgyud 'bum): dben pa rnams su sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs sam/ ras ris la ba na gtsug lag khang dben par 'du 'dzi spangs la dam pa'i chos la bla mar byed pas 'khor la
405a1(rgyud 'bum): lo dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri la sogs pa'i khyad par rang gis blangs la mtshan rangs pa gcig skyil krung ma bshig pa 'am/ cog tsog pur rtswa bting ba la nye bar 'dug
405a2(rgyud 'bum): la ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ / de bzhin du ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dri'i dkyil 'khor ram lo ma'i snod du bzhag nas bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ni sbyor ba dang ldan
405a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyi rab tu mi dmigs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / dben par mchod rten la sogs pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran
405a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la goms par byas nas ji srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ / zla ba nya la mtshan rangs pa skyil mo krung bcas nas bzlas pa bya'o// gnyid spangs nas nyin zhag gcig tu de bzhin
405a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams yongs su bzung nas bsgrubs na phyir ldog pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / 'di gzi brjid gang dang yang mnyam pa med par 'gyur ro// bsod
405a6(rgyud 'bum): nams dang mi ldan pas kyang tshe 'di nyid la nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris med kyang rung / mchod pa med kyang rung / nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ris sgrub par 'dod
405a7(rgyud 'bum): naras ris la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ni pad+ma la bzhugs pa'o/ / g.yas su ni 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du ni nam mkha'i spyan te/ 'od zer sna tshogs nye bar 'phro ba
405b1(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar nas 'dug pa'o/ / de dag la rdo rje 'dzin ni ut+pal sngon po'i mdog can no// nam mkha'i spyan ni sngo bsangs so// sgrub pa po ni 'og tu lha mo la mngon du phyogs par bya ste/ ras
405b2(rgyud 'bum): ris 'di la'ang cho ga snga ma nyid kyis zla ba nya'i bar du zla ba gcig gis bsgrub par bya'o/ / a pa ra tsi ta sngon po'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dgug par bya ste/ rtog pa thams cad kyi cho gas sbyar na
405b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo gcig pu gnas pa gser gyi mdog can zar ma'i me tog lta bu'i 'od 'bar ba pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa dang / ral pa dang bcas
405b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgrub pa po bri bar bya'o/ / de dag la'ang cho ga snga ma nyid kyis bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i ral gri dang ldong ros la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad du yid mi bde ba dang bral
405b5(rgyud 'bum): bas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya zhing / dmigs pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung ma bshig par zla ba nya la bzlas pa byas na mtshan gcig gis kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
405b6(rgyud 'bum): dben pa la mngon par dga' bas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam klog pa nyid dang / 'du 'dzi mi byed pa nyid don yod par las rnams nges par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos de
405b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing gsang sngags smras pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM asta ba ra b+ho gi swA hA/ 'di bklags pas 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa las phyir
406a1(rgyud 'bum): mi ldog par byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis brlabs par gtogs pa 'di'ang cho ga ni nam mkha'i spyan
406a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi cho ga nyid kyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o// g.yon du rta mchog gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba pri yang
406a3(rgyud 'bum): ku ltar ldang ba thal mo sbyar ba byas pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin thal mo sbyar ba'o// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po bri bar bya ste/ lha mo la mngon du phyogs
406a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / ras ris gnyis pa ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa'od zer sna tshogs su spro ba/ ral pa thur du 'khyir ba/ ral gri 'dzin pa/ gser gyi
406a5(rgyud 'bum): mdog can dang / sgrub pa po'o// ras ris 'di'i cho ga'ang de dag nyid yin te/ rig pa 'dzin pa las mi ldog cing mnyam pa med par 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
406a6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po'i stobs mnyam pa med pas lus de nyid kyis mthar gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa nyid kyis 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur zhing / yang nyams
406a7(rgyud 'bum): par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / sngags gzhan yang / na ma s+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sa man tA gA me nen/ u dz+wa lA ya swAhA/ 'dis ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mngon du phyogs
406b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mthong ba'ang 'grub par byed do// rnam par sbyong bar byed do// nges par rdzogs par byed do// rim gyis 'di nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par
406b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'di'i cho ga'ang snga ma rnams nyid yin no// gzhan yang mchod pa sprul pa'i rig pa ni/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA ung+ga te/ s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na kha~M swA hA/ zhes bya ste mchod pa
406b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bsams la/ de ma thag tu skyo bar ma gyur kyi bar du brjod na nges par tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i rtse mo don yod pa 'di rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad
406b4(rgyud 'bum): dang sbyar bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du 'di bsgrubs na dge ba'i rgyun las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la snang ba rgya chen po thob par 'gro bar 'dod pa dang
406b5(rgyud 'bum): smon lam chen po'i rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas skyil mo krung ma bshig par mtshan gcig
406b6(rgyud 'bum): gis don yod par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab nas sngags smras pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM
406b7(rgyud 'bum): ho he raM he raM/ su ga tA su ka tA/ badz+ra shi khA rA/ na mo stu te ku mA ra/ sma ra sma ra swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga'ang de dag nyid yin no// ras ris med kyang rung / lha med kyang rung
407a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi khyad par ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad gzhon nu las 'das pa rgyan thams cad kyis 'bar ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
407a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi g.yas su rdo rje 'dzin pad+ma la pus mo'i lha nga btsugs pa bri bar bya'o/ / sgrub pa po ni thal mo sbyar ba'o// ras ris gnyis pa ni gcig pu pad+ma la gnas pa sgrub pa po mdun du gnas pa la
407a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs pa lta bur bris na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed do/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sngags smras pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM so mya ra/
407a4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra dz+wa la saM b+ha rA dzA ya/ na maHswA hA/ ras ris ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po lha'i gzhal yas khang na bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje gzhon nu ni gnag cing ldang ba pad+ma la bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/
407a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis bskor ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po'i gnas su rdo rje 'dzin te/ gzhon nu'i steng du bri bar bya ste/ 'di ni ras
407a6(rgyud 'bum): / ris kyi khyad par ro// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin gyis rdo rje'i rigs thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas sngags smras pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha rA NAM/ oM tsaN+Da lA
407a7(rgyud 'bum): tsaN+Da lA/ tsa la tsa la/ badz+ra badz+ra/ shAn+ta nA shAn+ta nA/ ba la na pa la na/ ta ra tar/ mA ra mA ra/ badz+rad la/ s+pho Ta lA s+pho Ta lA/ li shi kha ra sa man+ta/ badz+ra NI dzA la ne dzA la naM
407b1(rgyud 'bum): sa ma s+tha a gre/ a gra sha sa kA nAM/ ra NA ra NA/ hUM phaT badz+ra u ta me swA hA/ 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pas tshe bar mi 'gyur zhing /
407b2(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren la sogs pa'ang nye bar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga'ang de dag nyid yin no// rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi tsho gas kyang don yod pa'i las rnams kyis rig pa 'dzin par
407b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gnas der yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pas 'dug nas gnyid spangs te mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na/ de'i rjes la 'grub pa'i mtshan ma 'byung
407b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas ldong ros la sogs pa 'am/ rdo rje dang ral gri la sogs pa gang 'dod pa bzung la bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba nya'i thun dang po la nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro//
407b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la'ang 'jug par 'gyur zhing nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrub
407b6(rgyud 'bum): pab byas na nges par myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi las med kyang rung / khrus med kyang rung / mchod pa med kyang rung ste/ bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
407b7(rgyud 'bum): sku mthong ba la sogs pa'i ngo mtshar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'di ni don yod par grub par bya ba'i phyir dang / bstan pa'i mthu yang dag par bstan pa'i
408a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin no/ / sems can rnams dad pa dang spo ba mtha' yas pa bskyed pa'i phyir mtshan gcig tsam zhig kyang brtag par bya'o// gang dag gsang sngags 'di
408a2(rgyud 'bum): dag klog pa de dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / rdo rje 'dzin gyis yang dag par bsungs pa'o// nam mkha'i spyan gyi tsho gas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub
408a3(rgyud 'bum): pabapar bya'o/ / gal te nus pa yod na brtson 'grus dang ldan pas mtshan rangs par skyil mo krung bcas pas yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho ga dang 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// sngags 'dis bsrung
408a4(rgyud 'bum): babar bya'o/ / gang yang mang du ni gtsug tor dang / rma bya chen mo dang / rdo rje mchog la sogs pa rnams kyis so// na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/ sar+b+ba tA pra ti ha ta bA pa d+harmA
408a5(rgyud 'bum): tA ba lI nAM/ aM a sa ma sa ma/ sa man+ta to// a nan+ta to bA ba ti shA sa ni ha ra ha ra/ smA ra sma ra na/ bi ga ta ra ga bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ba la/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya
408a6(rgyud 'bum): ga ga na ma hA ba ra lak+She Na dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba'o// / de nas rim par phye ba rab
408a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byams thams cad kyi thun mong gi rtog pa'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad bstan par bya'o/ / 'dir byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i cho ga ni rnam pa gnyis
408b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ thabs dang bcas pa dang / thabs dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o// sngon du bya ba'i bsnyen pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ sngon gyi dus su goms pa dang / rgyun ma chad par bzla ba la sogs
408b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'bum bzlas pas lha mthong ba 'am/ ngag thos pa'am/ 'od zer lus la phog pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba'o// gnas ni rnam pa gnyis te/ rang bzhin
408b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis dben pa'i ri la sogs pa dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i 'du 'dzi dang bral ba'i gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa'o// sngon du 'gro ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ dus
408b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes la rjes su yi rang ba'o// goms par bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ legs pa la sbyor ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang
408b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa goms pa'o/ / gtsang sbra ni gnyis te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas sems can dad pa can la phan pa yang dag par ston
408b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'khor ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' bas sdig pa kun tu mi spyod pa'i gtsang sbra'o// myur du 'grub par byed pa'i chos ni gnyis te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa
408b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor las rnam par grol bar sgrub pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par bsams nas bzlas pa bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang
409a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pas bzlas pa bya'o/ / gnyis la ni dngos grub ring bar 'gyur te/ ma dad pa dang / byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa la'o//
409a2(rgyud 'bum): stobs rnam pa gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams dman pa dang / bar ma dang / mchog rnams kyi don 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rang gi smon lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
409a3(rgyud 'bum): stobs dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs so// bsgrub par bya ba ni gnyis te/ bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don no// dngos grub ni
409a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis te/ rig 'dzin thob par bya ba la sogs pa dang / spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'o// 'dir sbyor ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ tshad med pa'i sems bskyed pa'i sbyor ba dang /
409a5(rgyud 'bum): sgyid lug pa med pa'i sbyor ba'o// bya ba ni gnyis te/ thabs dang / shes rab kyi sgor 'jug pa'o// mi bya ba ni gnyis te/ som nyi dang / sems can la nye bar 'tshe ba'i las
409a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / lus 'di'i yon tan ni gnyis te/ don yod par myur du 'grub pa dang / bgegs med pa'o// 'dir spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te/ gsang sngags la sogs pa spong ba dang /
409a7(rgyud 'bum): mi gus pa'o// goms par bya ba ni gnyis te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'o// 'dir rmad du
409b1(rgyud 'bum): byung ba ni gnyis te/ ji lta ji ltar sngags rnams bsgrub par byas pa de lta de ltar rjes su mthun par 'gyur ba dang / cho ga gang dang gang gis gang la sbyar ba de bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ba'o//
409b2(rgyud 'bum): ma mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan ni gnyis te/ gang du skyes par byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs shing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rgya che ba la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o//
409b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa byas na gnyis las mi g.yo bar 'gyur te/ chos nyid las byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs las mi nyams pa'o// ras ris ni gnyis te/
409b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcas pa dang / rig pa gcig pu nyid do// 'dir spyad par mi bya ba'i dam tshig ni gnyis te/ myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba dang / khri la nyal ba'o//
409b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dir mi bya ba ni gnyis te/ gsang sngags la sar sna mi bya ba dang / don chung ngu'i las mi bya ba'o// 'dir 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ni gnyis te/ skyon du 'gyur ba'i las thams
409b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / don med pa la 'dod pa'o// 'dir nges pa ni gnyis te/ rmad du byung ba'i chos 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'jug pa'o// 'dir byin gyi
409b7(rgyud 'bum): rlabs 'byung ba ni gnyis te/ thams cad du lhag ma lus par mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'grogs par 'dod pa'o// de dag la sogs
410a1(rgyud 'bum): pa sngags kyi spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams la thabs mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas sgrub pa po rnams kyi thun mong gi sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga bshad par
410a2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dang po re zhig sngags gang yang rung ba blangs nas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ gang la lhag par mos pa nye bar bzung la snga dro'i thun la sku gzugs kyi mdun du
410a3(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ ras ris kyi mdun du 'am/ dam pa'i chos kyis glegs bam gyi mdun du mtshan ma bzhag la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag thams cad
410a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ / bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul gyis/ thams cad du bdag rab
410a5(rgyud 'bum): tu gzung du gsol/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par
410a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas sdig pa byas pa bshags par bya ste/ 'dir 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las skyes pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa thams cad bshags par bgyi ste/ thugs
410a7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bshags pa des bdag gis kyang bshags par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen
410b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin du'o zhes bya ba 'am/ yang na nus pa ji lta ba'i bshags pas bshags par bya'o// de nas 'di skad kyang brjod par bya'o// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
410b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad la yang dag par byung ba'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa mnyam pa nyid la rjes su yi rang ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rje su yi rang sa
410b3(rgyud 'bum): rjesu yi rang ste/ thams cad du thams cad yongs su skyob pa nyid dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa dus gsum du gtog pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dge ba la
410b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang ba mchog gis rjes su yi rang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
410b5(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar mkhyen pas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya zhing / nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa'i nye bar
410b6(rgyud 'bum): mkho ba'i dngos po ji snyed yod pa 'di lta ste/ bang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri la sogs pa dang / rgya mtsho'i rin po che la sogs pa nyams dga' ba/
410b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag po med cing yongs su bzung ba med pa ma lus pa de dag dang / sems can gyis khams na yod pa de dag dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
411a1(rgyud 'bum): la yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ / yongs su bsgos nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis mchod pa'i
411a2(rgyud 'bum): smin rab 'byams mchog tu rgya che ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la/
411a3(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i mchod pa'i sprin 'byung bar byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di'ang brjod par bya ste/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te a d+hiSh+Thi ti ga ga na khaM b+ho sA rA sa man+te na swA hA/
411a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o// lhag ma'ang ji tsam 'dod pa brjod par bya'o// / de ras sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mchod
411a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing byin gyis rlob la mkhyen par yang 'gyur ro/ / de nas bdag gi bsod nam kyi stob kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
411a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i rgya mtsho klu dbyangs mchog rgya che ba rab 'byams rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la/
411a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / chos sgrogs pa'i dbyangs 'byung bar byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par
411b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nA~M/ sar+b+ba tra saM ku su mi ta a b+hi dzA rA shi ni/ na mo stu te swA hA/ de ltar don yod pa 'di la mngon par dad par byas nas bsgrubs na de bzhin du 'dir
411b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs de dag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o// de nas tshad med pa'i sems
411b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed la sngags bzlas shing / de ltar re zhig bdag gis sems bskyed pa dang pos bdag gi smon lam dang / bsod
411b4(rgyud 'bum): nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dir sems can gyi khams thams cad sems bskyed pa grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang 'byung bar gyur
411b5(rgyud 'bum): cig ces bya'o/ / yang na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa grub par gyur cig/ 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod do// yang na bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi chog rgya mtsho sems
411b6(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya ba 'am/ yang na dngos grub gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa de dag gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang /
411b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la/ sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par
412a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwAnA~M/ na mostu te ma hA badz+ra sar+b+ba stAhI tA kA ra tI s+tha sar+b+ba tra sar+b+ba 'ang d+had+hA dz+dza ma si s+thA ya swAH/ de'i rjes la 'dir sems can gyi
412a2(rgyud 'bum): khams rnams la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du sems can rnams la phan pa'i rnam pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
412a3(rgyud 'bum): dmigs shing phyag byas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad la rjes su yi rang
412a4(rgyud 'bum): bar dmigs nas ji srid skyo bar ma gyur kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o/ / de nas glegs bam bklags la zas la spyad cing / zas kyis dub na bstis nas snga dro'i cho ga de nyid kyis phyi dro'ang
412a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / nyal ba na dang po yan lag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas khri ma yin pa la nyal bar bya'o// cho ga 'di nyid kyis nus
412a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ji lta ba dang / stobs ji lta ba bzhin nyin re zhing yar ngo'i nya'i bar zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o// de nas thabs dang mi ldan pa'i cho ga'ang ji skad gsungs pa bzhin nus pa ji lta ba
412a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bsgrub par bya'i/ bdag gi nus pa ma yin no zhes sgyid lug par mi bya ste/ yas ji lta ba 'bras bu'ang de lta bu'o zhes bya bas dngos grub kyi 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes
412b1(rgyud 'bum): bsams la/ ri la sogs pa'i gnas rab tu dben pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i khang pa stong pa 'am/ bla gab med par 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs la sems can la gno//
412b2(rgyud 'bum): pa med pas cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o// khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung // ras ris med kyang rung / tshul khrims 'chal pa yin yang rung / dman pa yin yang rung / bsod nam+ba
412b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ gang yang mang du sgrub pa la goms par bya'o// mun pa chen po nas snang bar 'jug par 'dod pa dang / 'khor bar ltung ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i
412b4(rgyud 'bum): theg pa la bskyon par 'dod pa dang / gang yang mang du 'bad pas log par ltung ba rnams rab tu bzung zhing snang bar byed pa rab tu thob par 'dod pa cho ga bzhin nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du byas
412b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ mthar yang ngo'i bco lnga la ji ltar mngon par 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / ras ris dang / dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam/ gang yang
412b6(rgyud 'bum): rung ba'i mdun du me tog sil mas bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la lo ma bting ba la 'dug ste/ srung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa snga ma bzhin bsams la lan gsum gyi bar du sngags brjod
412b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de nas lcags kyi 'khor lo 'am/ rdo rje 'am/ ral gri 'am/ mdung ngam/ lcags kyu 'am/ chu gri zla phyed kyi bar du ba lang gi lci ba'i nang du bcug nas bton la/
413a1(rgyud 'bum): lag tu bzung nas srod dang po nas brtsams nas mtshan rangs par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bsgrub par bya'o// yang na
413a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las byas pa ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bcug pas so/ / yang na dngul dang / zangs dang / gser las byas pa zla ba phyed du chu'i nang du bcug pa 'am/ mi dman pa'i 'o ma'i bum
413a3(rgyud 'bum): par bcug pa 'am/ bsregs pa 'am/ ldong ros dang / ba bla dang / gi'u wang ngam/ rang bzhin gyis gnas pa lo ma 'am/ gos kyi bar du lag tu bzung la bsgrub par
413a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / yang na nor bu 'am/ yang na 'phreng ba 'am/ yang na lhung bzed bkrus pa 'am/ gos sam/ gnas sam/ gdugs sam/ ri mo lag tu bzung bas sam
413a5(rgyud 'bum): ta la'i lo ma las byas pa'i ral gri la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams dang / mtshan rangs par bsgrubs na nam phyed dam nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'bar bar gyur nas
413a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te grub na ngo mtshar chen po blo bur du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la me tog gi char bab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo ba dang / snang ba chen po glo bur du 'byung
413a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gzhan yang ngo mtshar chen po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs thams cad nye bar 'dus nas de la bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du sngags kyi
413b1(rgyud 'bum): mthu khyad par can gyis dbang bskur bar byed/ yongs su 'dzin par byed do// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig 'dzin gyi sde dpon tshogs na spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di rang gi skal ba
413b2(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin gyi sde pa'i rgyal po nyid sdug bsngal med par 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de nyid dus la bzhugs nas rdo rje
413b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyi gtso bo chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rab 'byams mtha' yas pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi spyod yul 'phrogs pa med par song ba/ rnam par rol pa mtha'
413b4(rgyud 'bum): yas pas mdzes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa 'dzin par byung nas yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba thob pas sreg pa'i bskal pa'i dus su'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
413b5(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa'i bde ba'i bdud rtsi las kyang mi nyams la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga longs spyod pa las mi nyams shing / bud med mang po'i tshogs kyis
413b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor bar yang 'gyur ro/ / shes rab dang thabs so so 'thob cing stobs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sems can la gnod par yang mi byed do// 'jig rten gyi rig
413b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang do'i bde ba'i bdud rtsi'i longs spyod mang po la ltos na zad pa dang dman pa lta bu yin pas/ 'jig rten pa'i rig 'dzin de dag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing snying rje bar sems
414a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / 'di'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la ltos na lha'i 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang rkang gis 'gro ba lta bur sems so// gang 'jig rten pa'i
414a2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang rkang gis 'gro ba lta bur sems so/ / gang 'jig rten pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa de dang 'di'i khyad par yang rtsa dang ri rab kyi khyad par lta bur 'gyur ro// 'di lta
414a3(rgyud 'bum): bu'i thabs dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o/ / thabs dang mi ldan pas ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba rab 'byams kyi cho ga'o// /
414a4(rgyud 'bum): sngar gyi rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi sgrub par bya zhing / sngar gyi rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis sbyar bar bya'o// mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis te/ rab tu dben
414a5(rgyud 'bum): par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas dmigs pa rtag tu zlos pa dang / lha mnyes par byed pas mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa ste/ cho ga'i thabs de dag gis rtag
414a6(rgyud 'bum): tu goms par byas nas mngon par shes pa lnga nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / las rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams thob par 'gyur te/ lus yang ba dang sems yang ba
414a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid la goms par byed cing zlos pa dang / dben par 'dug nas bzlas pa la goms par byed pa'o// mo snang ba'i cho ga ni gsum ste/ nyin gcig tu sgrub pa 'am/ nyin mtshan gcig
414b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas sgrub pa dang / dur khrod du sa la byas pa'i mchod rten byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas pa la me tog sil mas bkram pa la 'dug nas pa thA 'am/ gi'u wang ngam
414b2(rgyud 'bum): a shwad tha'i lo ma 'am/ byang chub kyi shing gzhan yang rung / mya ngan med pa la sogs pa bkra shis kyi shing gi lo ma la bzhag nas sgrub pa pos tho rangs kyi dus nas srod kyi bar du nyin
414b3(rgyud 'bum): rangs bsgrub par bya'o/ / de las du ba byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma de la ma grub na nyi ma gsum gyi bar du bsgrub par bya'o// de lta na'ang ma grub na nyi ma bzhi pa la nyi ma
414b4(rgyud 'bum): rangs par dur khrod du 'chag cing bsgrub pa byas na nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur la/ ri rab kyi ngos kyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur
414b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / yang na de nyid du mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes bcu gsum gyi nyi ma nub nas nyi ma shar gyi bar du mchod pa byas nas shing lo la 'dug ste/ ba bla 'am gi'u wa nga lo ma'i bar du bzhag nas nyi ma
414b6(rgyud 'bum): nub pa'i dus nas brtsams te/ mtshan rangs pa bzlas nas du ba byung bas tshud gsum byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yang na dur khrod de nyid du khrag gis thig ler byas nas lag tu ral gri
414b7(rgyud 'bum): thogs nas 'dug la mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na nyi ma shar ba'i dus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / ro la rkang pas mnan nas lag par ral gri thogs te ji srid mi snang bar 'gyur gyi bar du
415a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa bya'o/ / lag tu ral gri bzung nas nyi ma gang yang rung ba la ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la khrag gis bsangs pa'i yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg mtshan rangs pa byas nA
415a2(rgyud 'bum): tho rangs mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / mdor na rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga gang yang rung ba de dag dur khrod du bya zhing sbyar ro// yang na nyi ma rangs pa ri la sogs pa dang / khyim stong dang / lha'i
415a3(rgyud 'bum): khang pa dang / shing gcig dang / dgon pa'i mchod rten dang / mtshan ma gcig pa dang / dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la/

415a5(rgyud 'bum): bris pa'i mdun du mtshan rangs pa mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mi'i rus pa phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar 'phar bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang du 'dod par 'gro zhing mi

415a7(rgyud 'bum): go da pa ri zhes bya ba dang / ma hA be ga'i rtsa ba la yang tre la brtse zhes kyang bya ba dang / shing chen gyi rtsa ba dang / shun pa dang / 'di dag cha mnyam par phye ma zhib mor byas nas rang gi
415b1(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang ril bu gsum byas nas zangs kyis dkri bar bya'o/ / ril bu gzhan yang mya ngan med kyi me tog dang / ma du lung ga'i rtsa ba dang / tar ba ra rta'i rtsa ba dang / zar ma'i shun
415b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byas la/ rang gi khrag dang ril bu sran ma tsam gsum byas te zangs kyis dkri bar bya'o// ril bu gzhan yang til gyi rtsa ba dang
415b3(rgyud 'bum): tra pu sha'i sa bon dang / ma la ta'i rtsa ba dang / ta ma la'i lo ma rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas pa'i phye ma zhib mo dang rang gi khrag gis ril bu gsum byas la zangs kyis dkri bar
415b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / ril bu gzhan yang yungs kar dang / til dang / bong ba dang / a ru ra'i shun pa 'di rnams cha mnyam pa'i phye ma zhib mo sbrang rtsi dang / rang gi khrag gis sprul nas

416a1(rgyud 'bum): nas tshes bcu gsum gyi nyin mtshan rangs pa lo 'dab bting ba la myur bar 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas par ral gri thogs nas g.yon du ril bu gang yang rung ba bzung la
416a2(rgyud 'bum): srod nas brtsams nas ji srid du ba 'byung ba dang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur gyi bar du bsgrub par byas na/ de nas ril bu gcig khar bcug na nyi ma'i 'od lta bur 'gyur ro// khru gang tsam gyi sa la ma
416a3(rgyud 'bum): reg par 'gyur ro/ / gal te de'i nub mo ma grub na slar yang dur khrod du srong nas brtsams nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du 'chag cing bzlas pa bya'o// yang na dbang phyug chen po grub pa'i khang
416a4(rgyud 'bum): par mtshan ma'i steng du bzhag nas kha byang du bltas te 'dug pas lag tu ral gri thogs te/ srod dus nas brtsams nas nyi ma shar gyi bar de bzhin du khar bcug nas bsgrubs na nyi ma'i mdog

416b2(rgyud 'bum): bar du bzhag nas lag tu ral gri bzung nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub bo/ / dgon pa'i mchod rten nam byang chub kyi shing gang yang rung ba'i rtsa ba dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su 'phags pa

417b1(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ zla ba lnga'i nang du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi rnams kyi nang du skal pa ji rna ba bzhin du gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// ril slong mo spyad cing ral gri mabor bar rtag tu bzlas pa byas

417b7(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / ri la 'dzegs nas lcags kyu de bzung nas bzlas pa byed cing / rig pa 'dzin pa grub par byed pa rdzas gang 'dod/

420a1(rgyud 'bum): bar du bzlas la gzugs brnyan gyi gnas gang yin pa der gdab par bya'o/ / btab nas khros pas gnas de nyid du mtshan ma cung zhig byung bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa

420a7(rgyud 'bum): bcings par 'gyur ro/ / grol bar gyur cig ces bsams na grol bar 'gyur ro// de lta na'ang 'dir sems la dbang ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur zhing dam tshig la dbang bar yang 'gyur ro//
420b1(rgyud 'bum): de la 'dir thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i 'ching ba'i sbyor ba ni yungs kar dang 'bras btags pa la tig dang tshab sres la/ lcags sgrog gas/ rdo rje 'a/ mdung ngam
420b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor ram/ rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas nas dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na 'ching ba chen pos bcing bar 'gyur ro// yang na nim pa'i lo ma dang ni bi na lhan cig btags na sbyin
420b3(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na de bzhin du 'ching ngo / / mon sran gre'u dang / ske tshe dang / skyu ru ra dang lhan cig btags nas phyag rgya byas la dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na 'ching bar 'gyur ro// mngon spyod ni
420b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar 'byung ste/ dur khrod kyi shing tig ta dang bcas pa dang / tshwa dang bcas pas yam shing gis dur khrod dang / khang pa stong pa dang / skyed mos tshal rnying pa dang / sa sgren gyi phyogs
420b5(rgyud 'bum): su khros pas nim pa las rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bur byas la/ de nas rus pa'i phye ma rang gi khrag dang bsgres pas sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma dgus nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na sha chen po
420b6(rgyud 'bum): mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ / yang na nya'i zhag dang bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// yang na til mar las bstegs pa'i ba lang gi shas so// yang na ke shal li thal ba dang /
420b7(rgyud 'bum): rta'i khrag dang / ske tshes so// yang na kha'i sgo la sogs pa til mar la bstegs pa'i sgra thams cad kyis so// yang na rang gis khrag dang bsres pa'i thabs pas so// yan
421a1(rgyud 'bum): arga'i 'bras bu mar la bstegs pas so/ / yang na dug dang khrag gis so// yang na tsha dang khrag gis so// yang na yungs kar dang khrag gis so// yang na ba
421a2(rgyud 'bum): lang gi sha dang / tshwa dang / khrag gis bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg khro ba dang bcas pas nyi ma dgus byas pas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na dur khrod du zangs las byas pa 'am/
421a3(rgyud 'bum): lcags las byas pa'i snod til mar gyis bkang nas bsgos pa la sngar gyi rdzas de dag nyid dang / rang skyur la bsnyegs pa 'am/ mar dang / til mar dang / 'gyur byed las bstegs pa

421a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg blugs bya'o/ / shin tu drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// mar gyi sreg blugs kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro// khrus byas pas sam skud pa bcings pas kyang ngo // gdug pa tshar
421a6(rgyud 'bum): bcad pa'i las 'di dag gis nges par gdug pa can 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ / gang yang klu gdug pa can zhi bar bya ba'i phyir klu'i gnas kyi rtsa bar de ltar byas na de nyid du zhugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur
421a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gang lhag gdug pa can bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa 'am/ sems can mang po la gnod pa byed pa 'am/ rig 'dzin gdug pa can rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'am/ gang
421b1(rgyud 'bum): yang gnod sbyin gdug pa can nam/ gang yang srin po gdug pa can nam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i skyes bu 'am/ khams kyi rgyal po 'am/
421b2(rgyud 'bum): phan pa ma yin pa byed pa de rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khro bo dang bcas pas mngon spyod bya zhing / bstan pa la phan par bya ba'i don dang / sems can mang po'i don mthong na don yod par
421b3(rgyud 'bum): grub pa 'dis sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bstan pa'i sngags rnams kyi ni mngon spyod kyi las mi bya'o// don chung ngu la'ang mi bya'o// mi ngas la ni zho dang / sbrang rtsi
421b4(rgyud 'bum): dang mar la bstegs pa'i sha chen dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nim pa'i shing btsos pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba 'am/ de bzhin du bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas phur bus gzugs brnyan la
421b5(rgyud 'bum): gdab cing zhag bdun du gnas kyi zas bza' ste/ dbang phyug chen po'i g.yas phyogs su steng nas phur bus gdab cing brgya bzlas par bya'o// yang na lam gyi bzhi mdor lcags kyi rdo rje
421b6(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas bzlas pa byas na mi ngas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / char mi 'bab pa la ni klung gi rgyun 'bab pa la me tog gis byas na 'char 'bebs par byed do// drag po'i las rdzogs so//
421b7(rgyud 'bum): / dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di la ni khrus ma byas kyang skyon yod par mi 'gyur ro// sha za ba'ang dgag pa
422a1(rgyud 'bum): med do/ / la phug dang la du la sogs pa la spyod kyang skyon med do// lhag ma la'ang skyon med do// 'on kyang gang zhig dad pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed
422a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la jo bo bzhin du gus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ched cher byed pa/ 'du 'dzi spong ba la dga' ba de dag ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro//
422a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir log 'dren nye bar 'byung bar yang mi gyur ro// 'di la bgegs 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di 'bad pa chung ngus don yod par 'grub pa'o// 'di ni las thogs pa med pa'o// /
422a4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa 'di ni chags pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrubs pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyis 'dir rjes su 'jug par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spro bar byed pa'i sgrub
422a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i thabs don yod pa 'di goms par yang bya'o/ / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di la som nyi med pas sgrub pa'i thabs la sbyar bar bya'o//

422a7(rgyud 'bum): la gsol ba gdab pa dang / mkhyen par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dgos pa sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub
422b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhir bsgrub par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thang nas legs so zhes bya ba dang / byin gyis brlabs la so sor thob par bya ba'i phyir sngags
422b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ / myur du brten gnas gyur nas bde ba'i bdud rtsi rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir gang yang chags pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sngags kyis bsgrub par
422b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'dir brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsangs sngags bzlas sam/ sems can gyi khams rnams kyi don du sngags bzlas na/ sangs
422b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rgya chen pos mchod pa chen po'i sprin sems can gyi khams rnams la bde ba yang dag par skyed pas mngon par mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ro/ /

422b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang 'gyur ro// 'di la gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas spyod pa dad pa can bag yod pas som nyi med par bya'o// brtson 'grus dang bcas pa'i snying
422b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pas 'di la gus par byas nas gtsang sbras gsang sngags kyi spyod pa 'di nyid dang / bslab pa 'di nyid la dmigs pa yongs su ma btang bas dben pa'i
423a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas su 'du 'dzi dang bral bar byas la sems bskyed pa thams cad du tshad med pa la goms par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu
423a2(rgyud 'bum): da pas dmigs par rjes su 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi las dang rab tu ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa ste/
423a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa la zhug pas chos de dag la spyad par bya'o// de la 'di dag ni rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bar du gcod par 'gyur ba yin te/ le lo dang / 'dod pa med pa dang /

423b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams rtogs par bya'o// 'di la ser sna'ang mi bya'o// gzhan dag sngags kyi spyod pa la gzhug par bya'o// bslab par bya/ yang dag
423b2(rgyud 'bum): par gzung bar bya ste/ de ltar byed na bstan pa'i don byas pa'ang yin no// dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'ang yin no// gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'dzud par 'gyur/ bskul bar yang
423b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / des ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// bklags pa dang bcangs par yang 'gyur ro//

423b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi cho ga ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi gnas su ni rdo rje'i mchog ces bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i mchog bya ste/ kun nas 'bar ba/ gnag cing ldang ba/ rab tu 'bar

424a1(rgyud 'bum): nAM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la AM gi n+ya A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ 'dis ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa 'dis bde sogs bkug nas yongs su

424b1(rgyud 'bum): 'ching bar byed do/ / 'phags pa rdo rje lcags sgrog gis sngags smras pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+ha kAn+tu/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/ oM a na la saM b+ha be swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i

424b3(rgyud 'bum): shi khi/ na mo a ma lA nA/ sA rA sA rA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma le swA hA/ shin tu gnod mdzes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/ na mas+t+raM yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ d+hu ba re d+hu ba re/
424b4(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badz+ra sA ga re swAhA/ rnam par sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai yad d+hi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA naM/ oM tsa ra ba na tsar ba na/ ha ra ha ra bi skam bAsA/

424b7(rgyud 'bum): oM kro d+ha dz+wa la u ta ha si ni swAhA/ mtha' yas rdo rjes sngags smras pa/ na maHa nan+te nA~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM a sa mA ga ga ne swAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa
425a1(rgyud 'bum): a sa nAn+ta gu Na ut+ta man+taH thar/ ga ga na a na n+ta ga ti/ dz+wa la nA dz+wa lan/ sA ma tA sa ma ta/ b+hA bI ta hr-id ye/ sha khal ba le ge/ sar sa me/ d+hub d+hU ba swaH

425a7(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra d+ha re/ d+ha re na du ye na mo a pra ti ha ta uSh+NI ShA ya swA hA/ d+ha ri d+ha ri/ d+ha na ti ye sA hA/ gtsug tor so so so so la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
425b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad du so sor brjod par bya'o// na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nA/
425b2(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga tA nA~M/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tsaN+Da la sar+b+ba de ba nA ga yak+Sha na A kaR+Sha sa swA hA/ na maste yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ hUM s+phA Ta ya ma ru d+hi ra/ e ga/ hUM tsaN+Da lA mA d+hi pa ta ye hUM phaT phaT/
425b3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra sa ma d+ha na tA ra ga tA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Tha tA yi/ a le hi mAM dzA le hUM ha na ha na/ Te ta a kar shA de ba a ti nAM/ tA ra sa ru d+hi ra aHger ma hA tsaN+Da la/ oM d+ha sha dur d+ha ma/

426a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams g.yo bar byed do/ / gnyis pas ni gzugs rnam so// gsum pas ni 'ching bar byed do// bzhi pas ni thar pa dang gzi brjid sgrub par byed do// lnga pas ni gcod par byed do//
426a3(rgyud 'bum): drug pas ni rengs par byed do// 'di dag ni phyag 'tshal re re'o// na ma s+the yang d+hI kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sa ma be ga be/ e lA a d+hiSh+ThA nAM/ ut+ta ra/ ga ga na sa ma su s+tha tA/
426a4(rgyud 'bum): shrI ka ra shA ba na to khe la nA to shA nA rA gA na shi shan tu/ a nan+tha tAM/ sA ra sA ra/ ka mA la ka mA la/ ba ra sha ra Na/ na mo stu/ sar+b+ba tra sha re NA/ b+hU ma b+hU ma swA hA/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga
426a5(rgyud 'bum): tA nAM/ a nan+ta ya swAhA/ rdo rje gdan gyi'o// na mas+t+rai yad d+haM kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nAn/ sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra nA/ badz+ra ni le ni la/ g+hi hUM sUTahUM/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de nas
426a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ mgrin gcig tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i chos rdo rje
426a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di smras so/ / na mastai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ a ma lA be ga sam b+ha ba a d+hiSh+ThA na/ badz+ra ba la be ga sa man+ta ga mi/ b+h+ra maM b+h+ra maM/ bi d+ha ra Na bi d+ha ra Na/ na mostu te dz+wa lA na lA/
426b1(rgyud 'bum): bi ma la lo tsa na/ sar+b+ba tra pra sa ra Na ba ra pra ba la dru ba ra sha ra Na hUM swA hA/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung bar byed pa rdo rje rgyal po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spun gyi
426b2(rgyud 'bum): cho gas rdo rje bsgrub na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / bklags pa tsam gyis lag pa'i rdo rje mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ri la 'dug nas sngar bstan pa'i cho gas ji srid mtshan ma 'byung gi bar du bzlas
426b3(rgyud 'bum): pa byas na/ de nas zla ba nya la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur nas rig pa'i rgyal po rje
426b4(rgyud 'bum): rje 'chang du 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad nam mkha'i spyan gyi cho gas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab cing zhus pa ste/ rig pa mchog gi
426b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di ni mthu mtshungs pa med pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa sgrub
426b6(rgyud 'bum): pa nges pa med pa'o/ / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po bsdus pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'di lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa yongs su
426b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yang dag par ston par byed pa/ mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rmad du byung ba'i mthu mthong bar 'dod pas sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bzung
427a1(rgyud 'bum): nas bsgrub par bya'o/ / 'di la ras ris med kyang rung / ma bsgrubs kyang rung / mchod pa med kyang rung / khrus med kyang rung / sha la sogs pa ma spang
427a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang rung ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu dad pa bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su bzung
427a3(rgyud 'bum): ba de'i nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'dir 'di'i dam chog ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
427a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i mchod rten gyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas pas 'dug la/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
427a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o/ / yan lag thams cad sa la phab la 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal bar
427a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa bdag yongs su gzung du gsol/ / bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes bya ba'i ngag kyang brjod par bya'o// de nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ na maH
427a7(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ga ga ne ga ga ne/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag gang yang rung ba ma nyams par bya'o//
427b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / cho ga 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba ste/ sems can 'dul bar byed pa la
427b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod par byed pa dang / skyon thogs par 'gyur ba'i las byed pa dang / bstan pa la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan
427b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba la mngon spyod kyi las byed pa dang / mi smra ba'i sbyor bas phyag rgya sbyor bar byed pa dang / gzhan bsod nams ma yin pa la sbyar bar mi bya bar gsol
427b4(rgyud 'bum): ba gdab par bya'o/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir 'di dag dam tshig yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang /
427b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgor 'jug pa don yod par grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam 'dren par byed pa'o// rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa btab pa
427b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i snying por 'gyur ba'o/ / dad pa can brtson 'grus dang ldan pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la khyad par thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub
427b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i sku thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku nges par sgrub par 'dod pas/ dben zhing stong pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dmig
428a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor ba byas nas sngags gang yang rung ba bzlas pa bya'o/ / dben par dam pa'i chos gdon pa dang sems pa'ang rung // nus pa ji lta ba bzhin phyag 'tshal ba'ang
428a2(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi mdun du ri dang / chu klung dang / mtsho dang / gling dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / nye ba'i tshal la sogs pa rnams su 'am/ gtsug
428a3(rgyud 'bum): lag khang gi gnas dang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i sa 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ tha na gtsug lag khang gi brang khang du'ang rung / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du'am
428a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas la dmigs pas 'du 'dzi spangs la snyoms las dang bral bas dam pa'i chos la bla mar byed pas bsgrub pa byas na mtshan gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / bco lnga pa la
428a5(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung ma bshig par mngon par bsngags shing legs so zhe bya ba'ang gsol bar mdzad do/ / kha cig gis ni mthong ba'ang gsol bar mdzad do// kha cig gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad
428a6(rgyud 'bum): med pa 'phel bar byed cing 'bebs par yang byed do/ / byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ tshad med pa'i yon tan nyid la'ang rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ro//
428a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtha' yas shing mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams kyis yon tan rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// mthu chen po'ang rab tu
428b1(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar 'di ni de'i 'jig rten gyi chos kyi tha ma yin no zhes bya'o// de ltar na'ang sngags kyi spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med par rab 'byam rgya che ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
428b2(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med cing tshad med pas mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po mchog pa med pa dam tshig chen po gsum gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gsum
428b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i sgo nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang yin pas rdo rje 'chang las gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par bzung ba nyid ni/ sangs rgyas
428b4(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkor gyi snying po 'di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir dang / bstan pa srung ba'i phyir te/ 'di gnyis ni sngags dang
428b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya la spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho'i mchod pa'i mchog bka'
428b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin byed pa zhes gsungs so/ / sngags dang phyag rgya spyod pa zhes kyang gsungs so// g.yo ba med pa'i nor bu zhes kyang gsungs so// yon tan mtha' yas pa zhes kyang gsungs so//
428b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so// bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i smon lam 'dzin pa po zhes kyang gsungs so// bstan bsrung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so// stobs chen po zhes kyang
429a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / don yod pa 'di la som nyi dang bral bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la dad pas nan tan du bya'o// 'dir de lta bu'i bstod pa rmad du byung
429a2(rgyud 'bum): bgang bdag gis sngon dbyangs su blangs pa de dbyangs su brjod pas de dang mthun pa'i dngos grub rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ / na mas+t+rai yad d+h+ri kA nA~M/ ma hA kri sa b+hAHa sa ma a tsa
429a3(rgyud 'bum): sa ma tA sA ra/ d+har+m+ma Na kA ru Na At+ma ga dza gA tI duHkha hA ri NA/ a si man+ta/ sar+b+ba gu nA sid+d+hi d+ha yi no/ sa ma lA/ a tsa lA/ sa ma ba ra a gra/ d+harmi Na ga ga na sa mo pa ma ga ta/
429a4(rgyud 'bum): na bi d+ya te/ gu na la sha ra Na tu ka ti ki pya/ shau ma ke sa d+ha sar+b+ba d+hA tu ba ra/ sid+d+ha d+ha yiSh+Ta bi ga ti/ u pa me Shu/ a sa man+ta/ sid+d+hi shu sa ta tA/ a ma ya/ kA ru Na be ga to/ utra
429a5(rgyud 'bum): bi tapra nid+hA nA/ sid+d+hi ra ni ro d+har+m+ma tA/ dza ga to ar+thA sA d+ha na pe ra/ a sa man tI nAM/ sha ta tAM bi ro tsi ta ma hA/ kri pa At+ma nAM/ na ni ro d+ha traM kA ru NAM/ tsA ra ka/ a tsa pa pra
429a6(rgyud 'bum): dza te tri lo ki/ d+ha ra sid+d+hi d+ha yi ka/ a mI ta a mI ti Shu su sa ma pA ti tAM/ ga ti shA bi/ a ho su d+har+m+ma tA/ tri sa ma ye a gra/ sid+d+hi ba ra d+han te/ me ba ra d+ha na tA a gra ti ti ti taM/
429a7(rgyud 'bum): sA d+ha sa ka lA/ trai lo ka~M ba ra d+ha a gra/ sAd+ha nA nA aM rathA/ traM yang d+hi kA tI ka/ A na thi tA/ ni maHsa man+ta badz+rad+ha/ a mo b+h+ra e hi/ a rba ti ha ta/ e hi a tsalA
429b1(rgyud 'bum): tsan+da a nan tA kaN tiSh+Tha/ tsarba tsaT/ tATi taTi/ tAT traH/ big+h+nAn/ k+Sha tA ya/ mA ra sa da sa/ snroH ma/ shatA tA tsama?/ an+na r+dz+dza yadz+nyA kara?/ as had+han aH/ ka Ta kar+tha
429b2(rgyud 'bum): he haM/ a ti bA lA/ a ho ma hA gu Na bi ShaNAM/ na TA na Ta/ A be sha A be sha/ a tsa la tse Ta sar+b+ba tra a nu ta tA rA e ka tsi tA Ta tA Ta/ da mA da mA/ phaT phaT swA hA/ khol po
429b3(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo ba'i snying po'o/ / dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so// // dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog pa'i rgyal po
429b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
429b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ma Ni bi bu la bi mA na sha su pra tiSh+Thi ta gu h+yan pa ra ma ra ha s+yan kalpa rA dza na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/
429b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs// // bam po dang po//
429b7(rgyud 'bum): / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par
430a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa thams cad dang / mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang btul nas pham par mdzad de/ 'khor ba'i skyon 'khor
430a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chu bo'i pha rol tu gshegs so/ / gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba de'i tshe/ bcom ldan
430a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra'ang ma thos shing / mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su
430a4(rgyud 'bum): bab par gyur to/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de'ang rdol nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa/ rtsa ba ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ sdong bu ni baM
430a5(rgyud 'bum): DUR+Ya/ snying po ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ ze ba ni rdo'i snying po/ srid ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug pa 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad sna
430a6(rgyud 'bum): bar byas so/ / de nas pad+ma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyis bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo // phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams
430a7(rgyud 'bum): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM ma Ni badz+ra hr-id ya badz+ra mA ra se n+ye bi za ba ni/ ha na ha na/ badz+ra garbe tA sa ya trA sa ya/ sar+b+ba mA ra ba ba na ni hU~M hUM/ saM d+ha ra sa~M d+ha ra/ bud+d+ha ma tri sar+b+ba ta thA
430b1(rgyud 'bum): ga ta/ badz+re kalpa a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ pad+ma de las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grags ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgras bkang nas/ shAkya thub pa srid pa'i
430b2(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa las ni brgal/ bdud ni bcom/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni sbar te/ gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus sa
430b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud 'di bcom pa lags so legs so/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing lus 'dar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
430b4(rgyud 'bum): la btugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rig sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la 'dzam bu'i gling du byung lags/ bcom ldan
430b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das rig sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar ma thos lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nor bu chen
430b6(rgyud 'bum): po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas
430b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di'ang me tog sna tshogs su gyur te 'bab bo/ / gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags bye ba btul to// 'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su
431a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'di byung bar gyur to/ / lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di med par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus/ bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho
431a2(rgyud 'bum): skems par ma yin te/ chos kyi sgron ma sbar bar mi nus so// lag na rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spyad na/ ji srid gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang mngon par brtson pas
431a3(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus ma byas kyi bar du ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi nus kyi/ phyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje 'di ni
431a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa yin no/ / lag na rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
431a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / brjod cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bskur ba dang / zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de nas
431a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang / dri dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
431a7(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi khyad
431b1(rgyud 'bum): par ci 'dra ba bdag gda' ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag las gzhan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can
431b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lags na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje sems can de dag ni
431b3(rgyud 'bum): snyoms las can/ brtson 'grus dman pa/ gti mug gis rmongs pa/ 'dod pa'i dregs pas rmongs pa/ yid ches par dka' ba/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ dge
431b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste/ des ni gzungs 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams chung ba/ skal ba chung ba
431b5(rgyud 'bum): blo zhan pa rnams kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'chad par mi 'gyur zhing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di la dad pa skyed par mi
431b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nga ni 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
431b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing tshad med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes pa grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu
432a1(rgyud 'bum): dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i ra ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ skyes pa
432a2(rgyud 'bum): dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing / nor bu dang gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo
432a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ lha'i gzugs can mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ bshes gnyen thams cad dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pa snang bar yod par 'gro'o//
432a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ blon po bye ba phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba bud med nyi khri'i 'khor
432a5(rgyud 'bum): can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus la 'gran pa zhig yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / drang chu'i shing dang / dri'i shing gang yin pa
432a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no/ / chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no// thang las skyes pa'i me tog gang
432a7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rang bzhin yin no/ / mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thub ste/ thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ sangs
432b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa yin no// rgyal po de'ang chos dang 'thun pas rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyi/ chos dang mi mthun pas ni ma yin te/ sems can thams
432b2(rgyud 'bum): cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yin no/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas
432b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs
432b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de ni gser gyi kha mdog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas bskor ba/ 'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu dpa' ba yin no//
432b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba/ mtshan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i gdan la 'khod pa ste/ thams cad kyang spobs pa mi
432b6(rgyud 'bum): zad pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i
432b7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sems shing / gzungs de nyid kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to// sems
433a1(rgyud 'bum): can de rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong ba ste/ sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
433a2(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams las yongs su thar par gyur to// ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyang bcad par gyur to// mtho ris kyi sgo rnams phye'o// bde
433a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro'i sgo thams cad kyang phye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so//
433a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas ste/ 'di lta ste/ chu dang 'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon
433a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
433a6(rgyud 'bum): du skye bar gyur pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces smon la btab bo/ / gang dag
433a7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / 'don pa dang / sems pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang /
433b1(rgyud 'bum): chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/ lag pas reg gam/ lus la 'chang ngam/ mig gis mthong ba tsam mam/ glegs bam la bris pa 'am/ ras la bris pa 'am
433b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsig pa la bris pa mthong na/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/ 'phag pa la skur ba btab pa
433b3(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ shan pa 'am/ gdol pa 'am/ rngon pa 'am/ bya ba 'am/ long ba 'am/ 'on pa 'am/ sha bkra can nam/ bkren
433b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ zhar ba 'am/ sgur po 'am/ smad pa 'am sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam/ myong bar gyur par ma nges pa
