433b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / chung ngu na dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang / bya dang / sbrang
433b7(rgyud 'bum): bu mchu ring dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / grog sbur rnams dang / gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skyes pa 'am
434a1(rgyud 'bum): drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa la sogs te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/
434a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par 'gyur to//
434a3(rgyud 'bum): lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu bab bo// lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra
434a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byin no/ / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi lus las kyang 'od zer byung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs
434a5(rgyud 'bum): ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nyams dga' ba/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ grwa
434a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi nyi ma ltar 'od 'bar ba/ nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du ma spungs pa/ dril bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyi ba dan
434a7(rgyud 'bum): med pos kun nas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo // sa 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mtho ba
434b1(rgyud 'bum): dang dma' bar gyur to/ / lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang bskur to// rig sngags 'chang
434b2(rgyud 'bum): gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul te/ lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren thams cad sngangs skrag ste cho nges
434b3(rgyud 'bum): 'debs shing phyogs bcur byer ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas shing
434b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis/
434b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das khyod de
434b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bskur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyis bzhud pa nor bu chen
434b7(rgyud 'bum): po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de'ang rgyas par gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags so// gzungs
435a1(rgyud 'bum): de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/ gang la la zhig nyan tam/ chung ngu na ming ngam/ lag pas reg na'ang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
435a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas
435a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas
435a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rig kyi bu dag tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung ba ni 'di yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan las bzhengs pa dang / khang pa
435a5(rgyud 'bum): brtsegs ma de'i dbus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas/ khri de'i steng du rin po che'i pad+ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ sdong bu ni gser/ pad+ma'i snying po ni mu tig
435a6(rgyud 'bum): dmar po can zhig byung ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen
435a7(rgyud 'bum): po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor thams cad dbugs phyung nas/ steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de 'khor
435b1(rgyud 'bum): mang po dang / 'khod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang / rnam par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang
435b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa mang po dang / rig sngags
435b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang bye ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po

436a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa dang / des phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang
436a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ zab cing zab pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ khang pa brtsegs ma de nyid du bzhugs

439b6(rgyud 'bum): / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo// mchod rten
439b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'di sgo phye zhig dang / mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs te/ de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par chen po 'di snang zhing / de kho
440a1(rgyud 'bum): na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'ang snang / nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs/
440a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbus su legs par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ro//
440a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces
440a4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rin po che 'di dang 'di na bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po ma
440a5(rgyud 'bum): tog rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rnam par bkra ba dang / rdo rje 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de dag bstan pa'i skabs dbye bar mdzod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
440a6(rgyud 'bum): pa shAkya thub pas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gang na ba der bzhud de/ phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa brkyang
440a7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ mchod rten mchog de'i sgo'i sgo 'phar phye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa
440b1(rgyud 'bum): legs so legs so/ / deng khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor ro// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'di nyid la bzhugs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshes
440b2(rgyud 'bum): pa shAkya thub pa mchod rten gyi nang du dri de nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
440b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i phyir byung / gang nas ni gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sngon byung
440b4(rgyud 'bum): ba bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal gyis mi lang ba/ tshad gzung du med pa/ ches grangs med pa na/ gang gi tshe 'dzam
440b5(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gling gi 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang zhing / ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu byung ste/ bdag gi ba
440b6(rgyud 'bum): med cing yongs su bzung ba med de/ 'jig rten thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas med do// de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong gsum zhig
440b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas te/ gcig gi ming ni nor bu'i gtsug tor/ gnyis pa'i ming ni gser gyi gtsug tor/ gsum pa'i ming ni rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/ de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams
441a1(rgyud 'bum): cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur snyam zhing / gcig tu sangs rgyas yid
441a2(rgyud 'bum): la byed/ / chos yid la byed/ dge 'dun yid la byed do// de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur cing sems dpa' na/ de rnams kyis sems
441a3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i byams pa rnam par bkra ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / lha'i mig skyes nas ji tsam na steng du bltas na/ gnas gtsang ma'i
441a4(rgyud 'bum): ris kyi lha'i bu bar snang la sgra 'byin pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// khyed 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni legs
441a5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / kye skyes bu dam pa dag nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du
441a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa thos pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo thams
441a7(rgyud 'bum): cad mngon du 'gyur/ bdud thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi sgron ma spong bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
441b1(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur/ dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi chos rnams las yongs su thar par
441b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las
441b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su thar par 'gyur ba thob nas/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can gang dag par mi 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa
441b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / mi dge ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / sangs rgyas dang
441b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' la slu ba dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / bram ze gsod pa dang / ba lang gsod pa dang / chom rkun byed pa dang /
441b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon can dang / sho gam dgug pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa dang / phra ma smra ba dang / tshig 'khyal pa smra ba dang
441b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhal ba la sgyu byed pa dang / gzhal blugs la sgyu byed pa dang / srang la sgyu byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / gtams pa mnog pa dang / bshes pa la khu ba dang
442a1(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pas zin pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzungs 'di'i mthus thos pa tsam mam/ bklags pa tsam mam/ kun chub par
442a2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'am/ lus la thogs sam/ bris nas 'chang ngam/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 'dogs sam/ glegs bam du byed dam/ ras la bris pa 'am/ dar la bris pa 'am/
442a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsig pa la bris pa 'am/ ra ba la bris pa 'am/ chung ngu na sgra nyan pa 'am/ lag pas reg gam/ grib mas phog gam/ sems can gzhan gyis reg na'ang de dag thams cad gdon
442a4(rgyud 'bum): mi za bar phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon tan brgya stong mtha'
442a5(rgyud 'bum): yas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ bdud thams cad mthar byed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams
442a6(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dga'
442a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ rtag tu lag pa dang rkang pa gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ tshig gnyen zhing snyan par
442b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ bkren par mi 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur/ lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ mes ma yin/ chus ma
442b2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ de la gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/ mi rgod kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ kla klo'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ lam
442b3(rgyud 'bum): dang lam gol ba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ 'byung po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ srin po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ sha za'i 'jigs pas
442b4(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pas ma yin te/ sbrul gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / lus la rim gyis mi tshugs ste/ zhag gcig pa 'am/ zhag gnyis pa'am/ zhag gsum
442b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ zhag bzhi pa 'am/ rtag pa'i rims sam/ rims thams cad kyis lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mig gi nad mi 'byung ste/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/ sna'i nad ma yin//
442b6(rgyud 'bum): lce'i nad ma yin/ kha'i nad ma yin/ so'i nad ma yin/ mchu'i nad ma yin/ mgrin pa'i nad ma yin/ rna bar zug pa ma ya ni/ lag pa'i nad ma yin/ ro rgyab kyi nad

443a1(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa'i nad ma yin/ nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ bas thags dang / ldog pa dang / me dpal dang / ljon pa dang / g.yan pa dang /
443a2(rgyud 'bum): bol mig dang / khyi rngo dang / mdze dang rkang shu la sogs pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung / klad pa na ba ma yin/ gzhogs phyed na pa ma yin/ long bar mi 'gyur//
443a3(rgyud 'bum): zhar bar ma yin/ sgur po ma yin/ pha rol gyi mthus 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ 'on par mi 'gyur/ sha bkra can du mi 'gyur/ brnyas shing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi
443a4(rgyud 'bum): khyad par 'di dag chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'chi ba'i tshe na'ang spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur/ sems 'khrugs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
443a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zhal mngon sum du bstan nas dbugs byin pa mdzad par 'gyur/ lus la byad dang g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs/ lus la sngags kyi sbyor bas mi tshugs/ bde bar gnyid

443a7(rgyud 'bum): cad mthong bar 'gyur te/ gsang ba'i gzungs kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu 'byung ngo zhes smra ba mthong ngo // de nas drang srong de rnams chos kyi dga' ba snying la reg cing spro ba thob nas
443b1(rgyud 'bum): mar gsar gyi gong bu bzhu ba bzhin du lus zhig nas zhu ba'i khu ba de sa'i nang du thim mo/ / de nas sa gzhi de las smyug ma'i mde'u gser gyi kha dog can/ rtsa ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/
443b2(rgyud 'bum): lo ma gser las byas pa/ rtse mo mu tig las byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ dri zhim pa/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum
443b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes so/ / smyug ma'i mde'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dang gas te/ de rnams kyi dbus nas khye'u gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
443b4(rgyud 'bum): pa gsum byung ngo / / de nas khye'u de rnams phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te sgom zhing 'khod do// ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
443b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas te/ gser gyi kha dog gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ 'od dom gang gis kun nas brgyan par gyur to// smyug
443b6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i mde'u de rnams kyang khang pa brtsegs mar gyur to/ / nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di'ang nam mkha' la gser gyi yi
443b7(rgyud 'bum): ger snang ngo / / rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang steng na gdugs 'dzin cing me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten du sangs rgyas byung ngo zhes dbyangs su sgrogs cing / 'di lta ste/ klu'i
444a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag po rgyal po chen po gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba dang / grul bum gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / zang 'gro'i bdag po rgyal po chen po nor
444a2(rgyud 'bum): bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa byed do// sa phyogs de'ang
444a3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to/ / me tog gi shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin du gyur to// lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshe drang srong smyug ma'i mde'u rnams las byung ba byang
444a4(rgyud 'bum): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje de dag ni khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gyi de
444a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag yin no/ / sa phyogs kyang 'di yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'di yin no// lcug ma'i mde'u'i khang pa brtsegs ma'ang 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa'
444a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'dus pa'ang 'di yin no/ / de rnams drang srong du gyur pa na gzungs 'di thos pa tsam mam/ snying po sems la bsgoms pa tsam gyis drang srong gi lus spangs nas/ byang chub mngon par
444a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par bsngags pa smra ba gang yin pa de gzhan zhig
444b1(rgyud 'bum): yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar gyur to// lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba gang gis/ drang
444b2(rgyud 'bum): srong de rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la bkur sti dang rim gro byas pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
444b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas pa 'di gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i rim gro bar gyur pa na/ de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan
444b4(rgyud 'bum): to/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin to// shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam
444b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di 'dra bas sngon gyi sbyor ba gsungs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
444b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi gsang ba'i gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
444b7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri la gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
445a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
445a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i gnas kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
445a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bye ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin
445a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
445a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyan gyi gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin
445a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rtogs par thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba 'di gsungs pa legs so legs so// de nas de bzhin
445a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas 'od zer kha dog sna
445b1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi mdog dag bkye ste/ de rnams
445b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su dong nas sang rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la
445b3(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so/ / 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs chen pos bkang nas rig
445b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags chen po 'di gsungs so/ / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dIp+ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags
445b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu ri dang / tshal dang / nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba
445b6(rgyud 'bum): byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis mchog tu gsang ba 'di gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs te legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar
445b7(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i sprin chen po nam mkha'i dkyil du chags so/ / phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab bo// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang bab bo// u dum wa ra'i
446a1(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi char yang bab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ gzhan yang me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri ngad ldang
446a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes pa dang / mdog mdzes pa chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / yid 'ong dang
446a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ri sha ka dang / me tog tsam pa ka'i char dag bab bo// bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad skrag cing sngangs par 'gyur ro// bgegs
446a4(rgyud 'bum): dang log 'dren thams cad kyi lus rdul cing lus dri mi zhim par gyur nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros par brtsas so/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang dag yin pa'i lha
446a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang rang
446a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gzhal med khang rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phul lo/ / de nas nor bu rab snang sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nor bu dang
446a7(rgyud 'bum): rin po che sna tshogs thogs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su mchod pa byed do/ / de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ras bcos
446b1(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gos brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma me tog sna tshogs dang / bdug pa dang /
446b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// tshangs
446b3(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs te tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson
446b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / de bzhin du sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha la sogs pa'ang bcom ldan 'das la
446b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byed do/ / lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba'ang nam mkha'i dkyil nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// dpal lha mo chen mo dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang /
446b6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo chen mo dung can ma dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma'ang 'khor brgya stong dang / lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dang / me tog so dang / lha mo chen me
446b7(rgyud 'bum): pho nya mo dag kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ / dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa brgya stong bcom
447a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pas dkrol bar byed do/ / klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal
447a2(rgyud 'bum): po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / chu lga dang / shin tu rab gnas dang / gtsug gi nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam pa kun nas rdzogs pa'i 'od dag kyang rin po che nor bu skur 'od snga
447a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ / 'khor chen po'ang 'dus par gyur to// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po de'ang blon po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor
447a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / btsun mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas shing / bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas yongs su bskor te mdun gyis bltas so// sa de'ang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur to// de nas 'khor
447a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po de nyid kyi dbus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la brtol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i 'khor
447a6(rgyud 'bum): po rtsibs stong dang / mu khyud dang bcas pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ lhags pa'i 'od 'phro ba nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba zhig byung ngo // de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
447a7(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas/ 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i nang nas sgra byung ba/ shAkya thub pa gang 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs kyi gsang ba rnams gsungs pa ni legs so legs so// chos
447b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ byang chub chen po'i snying por gshegs pa'i rig sngags/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig sngags kyi snying po/ de bzhin
447b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das yang gsungs shig/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes
447b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gzungs gsungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul cing 'khor gyi dkyil
447b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gsung ba'i dus ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i rtsa ba sdig pa
447b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sel ba/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mtsho skems pa/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las nges par 'byin pa lags/ 'di ni chu bo chen po las sgrol ba lags te/ gzungs
447b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ma mchis par sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par rngo mi thogs lags so/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi sa bon lags/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi sgron me spong ba
447b7(rgyud 'bum): lags/ 'di ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa lags/ 'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la mchis pa lags te
448a1(rgyud 'bum): de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor cho ga dang bcas pa/ gsang ba dang bcas pa/ phyag rgya'i le'u dang
448a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa/ ras bcos bu zung dang bcas pa/ yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho ga legs par rgyas par gsungs shig/ de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
448a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas thams cad kyis bcom ldan
448a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba yang dag pa 'di dang / gsol ba btab pa gsan nas rig
448a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di rgyas par bka' stsal to/ / bskul ba'i le'u ste cho ga dang po'o// // 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med kha
448a6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po gnyis pa/ / / de nas sdig pa kun ni sel byed pa'i// rig sngags lus kyi dri ma med
448a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med pa yi// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po dge bar bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bi pu la gar+b+he/ maNi pra d+he
448b1(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga ta ni rde sha ne/ ma Ni ma Ni/ su pra b+he/ bi ma le sA ga ra gam+b+hI re/ hUM hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bud+d+ha bi lo ki te/ gu h+ya a d+hiSh+Thi ta gar+b+he swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bu chen
448b2(rgyud 'bum): po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rin po che'i char chen po bab par
448b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / me tog gi char chen po bab bo// 'khor thams cad kyang 'dus te/ thams cad kyis ca co dang gzha'i sgra phyung nas thams cad sa bcu la gnas par gyur te/ thams cad
448b4(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa gang byang chub kyi snying por
448b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i gzungs 'di lta bu gsungs pa legs so legs so/ / thos pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di dran pas de bzhin
448b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad la lha'i na bza' dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pas mchod par 'gyur ro// bklags pa tsam gyi mod la
448b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams
449a1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'du byed pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong du'ang brjod par mi spyod de/ de ltar gzungs phan yon ched
449a2(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ bgegs kyis bya bar ma yin/ phyir rgol bas ma yin/ mi mdza' bas ma yin/ 'byung pos ma yin/
449a3(rgyud 'bum): gdon gyis ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ lan cig
449a4(rgyud 'bum): dran pa tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan gyi phan yon mang por 'gyur na/ shin tu bya ba mang po byed pa lha mos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal
449a5(rgyud 'bum): po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sems can de rnams bsrung
449a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// spro bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
449a7(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de rnams la dbugs phyung ste/ ngas
449b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di gtad do/ / sems can de'ang gtad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di dang / sems can yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du yongs
449b2(rgyud 'bum): su gzung lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM ma Ni badz+re hUM/ 'di ni snying po'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o//
449b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyi cho ga ni/ tshes grangs ma yin rgyu skar min// smyung ba yang ni bya mi dgos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam// mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i//
449b4(rgyud 'bum): drung du bzlas brjod 'ba' zhig khri byas nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la shin tu khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i drung du ci 'byor pas mchod pa
449b5(rgyud 'bum): byas te mar me bzhi dbul bar bya/ / dri dang me tog la sogs pa'ang dbul bar bya'o// zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// mchod rten la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// rig
449b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nyid kyi drung du nyal na/ nam langs kyi dus tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'ang mthong bar
449b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa zhig yin na'ang des dus
450a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum du bsgrubs na gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// nang par langs te bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na don
450a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de'i lus la dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ sbyor ba ngan pas ma yin/ chus ma yin/ mas ma yin/ chom rkun gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur
450a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ lus la nad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur// dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ste/ nad mig nad ma yin/ sna nad ma yin/ lce nad ma yin//
450a4(rgyud 'bum): rna ba'i nad ma yin/ so nad ma yin/ klad nad ma yin/ yan lag dang nying lag gi nad ma yin/ rims ma yin te/ zhag gcig pa 'am/ zhag gnyis pa 'am/ zhag gsum
450a5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ zhag bzhi pas lus la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pas ma yin zhing / lus la byad kyis tshugs par mi
450a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gzungs 'di ni yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/ sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa yin/ yon tan
450a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad grub par byed pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid grub par byed pa yin te/ gzungs 'di ni bklags
450b1(rgyud 'bum): bapas grub pa ste las thams cad byed do/ / ri khar 'dzegs te bzlas brjod byas na mig gis gang du bltas pa der sems can rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro//
450b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can dmyal ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba thams cad kyang thar par 'gyur ro// lha khang du zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na lha thams cad
450b3(rgyud 'bum): des ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i gnas su zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// nyi ma la kha bltas te bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma mngon sum du
450b4(rgyud 'bum): babs nas mdun na 'dug cing mchog ci smras pa de sbyin par byed do/ / lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na mchog thams cad ster cing mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// shu dag la sngags
450b5(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de zos nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro// ci smras pa de sbyin par byed do// na le sham gyi 'bru
450b6(rgyud 'bum): la lan bdun bzlas te khar bcug na ci smras pa ster bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ / yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te nam mkha' la tor na rlung dang ser ba thams cad bkag par
450b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lan tshwal lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bram ze rnams la byin na/ gang dang gang gis lan tshwa zos pa de dang de kho na dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du bya na yungs kar
451a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ / gu gul la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gang dang gang gi gdon la bdugs na de dang de nyid la 'bab par 'gyur ro// bdugs na gdon
451a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ / char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gzugs byas te gnas gru bzhi byas la/ ba ser mo'i lci bas klu mgo gsum pa byas la snying khar gser gyis klan par
451a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / lus ni li khris byugs par bya'o// gnas kyi gzhi ni sngon pos bsku bar bya'o// gnas gru bzhi ni shing pa la sha ltar kha dog sngon por bya'o// bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag
451a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / pog por bzhi gzhag par bya'o// bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ gcig ni 'o ma/ gcig ni zho/ gcig ni 'o thug/ gcig ni zhun mar bu ram can no// pa'i lci
451a5(rgyud 'bum): bas gling bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / grwa bzhi ru phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o// mda' bzhi btsugs la tshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya'o// tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gdags par bya'o//
451a6(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa sna bzhi po gu gul dang / lce pog dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka ba sreg par bya'o// sa bon bdun gtor bar bya'o// kha dog lnga'i gtor ma gzhag par bya'o// 'bras bu
451a7(rgyud 'bum): dang me tog gzhag par bya'o/ / rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas spyi bor brdeg par bya'o// stong rtsa
451b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad tshang bar bzlas na/ de nas klu rnams char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do// klu thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas te klu'i mtshe'ur gtor na char gyi
451b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ / sang ldeng gi phur pa la bzlas brjod byas te klu'i gnas su btsugs na rlung dang ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
451b3(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te log 'dren gyi klad par btab na log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ / 'o mas bkrus na phyis sos par 'gyur ro// las gang dang gang kho na bya ba'i las de dang de dag
451b4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyi cho ga'i tshul yin no// gnyis pa'o// da ni snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bzlas
451b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod 'bum byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / nyis 'bum byas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// sum 'bum byas na dkyil 'khor
451b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bzhi 'bum byas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// lnga 'bum byas na lha
451b7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i gnas thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// drug 'bum byas na gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod 'dun 'bum
452a1(rgyud 'bum): byas na tshe rabs thams cad dran par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas brjod brgyad 'bum byas na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod dgu 'bum byas na
452a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlab thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas brjod sa ya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob par
452a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa gong nas gong du yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am/
452a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba'ang rung / de dag thams cad kyis bzlas brjod 'bum byas na las kyi sgrib pa thams
452a5(rgyud 'bum): cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ skye ba dran par 'gyur/ de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mig rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam
452a6(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / dbang po yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ltar gong nas gong du yon tan gyi khyad par dang / gong
452a7(rgyud 'bum): nas gong du lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi dngos grub tu bya ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de kho na grub pa bla na med pa ldong ros la sgrub pa
452b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ shin tu khrus byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum bza' bas ldong ros blangs te/ zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
452b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshes bcu gsum nas/ tshes bco lnga'i nya'i bar du bzlas brjod 'bum byas na/ de nas rnam pa gsum 'grub par rig par bya ste/ gal te nag por gyur
452b3(rgyud 'bum): na dpral ba la thig le bya'o/ / des ni mi snang ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ gang 'dod
452b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de byed par 'gyur ro/ / gal te dud pa byung na des mig bsku bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i gnas thams
452b5(rgyud 'bum): cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / nor dang 'bru thams cad rnyed par 'gyur te/ gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'bar bar gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/
452b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur/ gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/
452b7(rgyud 'bum): ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te bzlas brjod 'bum byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad ci bsgo ba bzhin
453a1(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur ro/ / mtshor zhugs te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar blangs nas sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
453a2(rgyud 'bum): nas nam mkha' la gtor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur/ klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro// bum pa chus bkang
453a3(rgyud 'bum): ste ha bshang tshe'u dang / shing pa la sha dang / yungs kar dang / gur kum dang / tsan dan rnams lhan cig bum pa der blugs la bzlas brjod khri byas pas/ nad chen pos
453a4(rgyud 'bum): thebs pa bkrus na nad thams cad med par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ de'i sdig pa thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/
453a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// mdze'i nad thams cad kyis thebs pa bkrus na mdze nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// sha bkra'i nad kyis thebs pa'ang bkrus na sha
453a6(rgyud 'bum): bkra'i nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / bud med bu 'dod pa rnams des khrus byas na bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// dngos grub med pa khrus byas na dngos grub chen po thob par byed de// de la sogs

460a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa med pa'i mig thob par 'gyur/ nor bu rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar

460a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ ser sna'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/ bsod nams thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur// bde ba thams
460a5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi brlabs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang

460b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par blta bar bya/ shes par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa gnang bas/
460b7(rgyud 'bum): sems cad de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gsal bar lung bstan pa yin no// phyin chad ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur/ 'jig
461a1(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar shes par bya'o/ / phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ byang chub
461a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad pa 'gyur zhing //

461a4(rgyud 'bum): sreg cho ga bshad par bya/ / sems cad kun gyi bde thob pa// zhi ba yi ni las brtsam mo// rig pa 'dzin pas gsang bya ste// nges par tshangs par spyod pa yi// sems can thams cad

462b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhib mo'i rgyal po yin/ 'di ni yon tan khyad par chen po can yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum yin/ 'di ni de
